<TS1>— Sesus katsumuẽhĩtsa ity ziwatawy — Deus niy.<Ts>Siharere soho humo tsihyrinymyrẽta iwatahi ana ekze kuorẽ niy. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa iapik niukurunaha. Asaktsa simyitsapyrẽtsa nisizororowyba.
Nisizororowyze ispe niy:<CM>— Hawa mykara kytsa bo soso byitaha — niy.
Iwa niy. Iwatahi amy ty Deus sohokotsa tubabatu ziwatahaka atsatu nikara. Ta ziwataha Deus tihi:<CI>

<PI>— Atakta katsumuẽhĩtsa utakta ibo piwatawy.<CI><PI2>Ihumo kakurẽta hiba. Ihumo kamypokzitsiarẽta.<CI><PI>Kahyrikoso ibo pipeha ituk tawahi mynapykyryk,<CI><PI2>kahyrikoso ituktu mynapykyryk ihumo kazikwy ituk my.<CI><PI>Kasopykwy tisapyrẽna kytsa bo my.<CI><PI2>Hawa mozihikik aparakbaha bo motsaso.<CI>
<PI>Ba zikaha pebetsak sizubarẽtsa tuk batu kakaik my,<CI><PI2>batu aty tohi ske buruk ba zikaha pebetsak.<CI>

<PI>Kytsa asaktsa siakubyitsa hwi tsibik wata ihumo sipunihikrẽtsa moziknaha.<CI><PI2>Asaktsa batu siaku izo mybeke ta hyrity wa ihumo sakurẽtsa moziknaha, sihumo batu imyi.<CI><PI>Myzubaha kaharere bo hyỹ mykaranaha mozihikik.<CI>
<PI>Kytsa abazubatsa ihumo sispirikporẽtsa maha — niy.<CI><PI0>Iwa Deus sohokotsa Isaijas inarokota tubabatu Sesus soho ziwataha aba zuba atsatu my.<CM>

<TS1>Kytsa Sesus Beresebuhu humo ihyrikoso sapybara ziksiwyhik mybarapetu nikaranaha.<Ts>Kyze kytsa maku ihyrizikubyita Sesus bo zioktyhyryknaha. Ana humo kino iharerebyita ihyrikoso sapybara humo. Sesus zizororowy iwatahi inataharerezo, iwaze iktsazo niy. Tsakurẽta niyzik.
Hawa Sesus niy kytsa sizubarẽtsa paikpa iktsa nikaranaha. Nimypybybaiknaha. Asahi:<CM>— Tozeka ja Deus zipehata, tozeka ja taparakta Dawi tsekoka — nikaranaha.<CM>

Kyze Pariseutsa ana hi ziwabynahaze asa kino:<CM>— O Beresebuhu Satanas usa naro hyrikoso sapybara pehatsa zikwy humo Sesus maku zizororowy. Izikwy humo hyrikoso sapybara nisipehaka — mybarapetu nikaranaha.<CM>

Hawa ha humo mytsaty nikaranaha Sesus tsihyrinymyrẽta. Iwaze ispe niy:<CM>— Ityryktsa asa zuba niharapebakanaha zeka nepyknaha. Nawaze kytsa metutu niakmyinaha. Wahoro ezektsa moharapebakanaha zeka mopyknaha. Hyrikoso sapybara wahoro ezektsa watsa.
Iwahatu Satanas tatyryktsa mysibaka zeka mopyk. Hyrikoso sapybara mysiksiwyhik zeka iwaze atahi metutu mozik iwaze mopyk. Batu sipehatsa my.<CM>

Ikiahatsa iwa mybarapetu tsimykaranaha “O tahi Beserebu zikwy humo hyrikoso sapybara nisiksiwyhik” tsimaha niy. Utakta hyrikoso sapybara mysiksiwyhik zeka Beserebu humo ahatuktsa zinymyrykynahatsa ja. Aty zikwy humo sa atuk zinymyrykynahatsa hyrikoso sapybara mysiksiwyhiknaha. Iwatsahi atuk zinymyrykynahatsa pahawatawynaha, uta batu izikwy humo hyrikoso sapybara mysiksiwyhik ana humo pahawatawy. Ahatuk zinymyrykynahatsa niwatihi Satanas zikwy humo ba hyrikoso sapybara ziksiksiwynaha batu zikaha.<CM>

Utakta Deus hyrikoso zikwy humo hyrikoso sapybara mysiksiwyhik. Utakta Deus zikpehata kytsa wata ikyzik abaka Deus tyryktsa ahatuk mozumu ana humo hi ahahyrinymyrẽtsa. Kytsa Deus harere bo botu hyỹ mykaranaha.<CM>
Batu aty tohi tsipaikrẽta wahoro bo mytsukze inamy piakse. Batu zik. Taparaka tsipaikrẽta ziakwaraka iwaze iwahoro bo mytsuk, inamy piakse.<CM>
Aty batu katukta kabete batu yhỹ niy. Aty katy tsumuẽhĩ byizeka kytsa Deus bo batu mysioktyhyryk atakta metutu myzapyk batu katukta.

Iwatsahi kytsa simysapybyitsa ty nikaranaha Deus mysiokzohik, siharerebyitsa ty Deus mysiokzohik. Aty zeka Deus hyrikoso pisapybyiki zeka ana hi Deus ba ziokzo. Atakta amy ty tisapyrẽna “batu sapy” mykara Deus anahumo hi ba zikspiritsokdatawy batu zik.<CM>

Aty skaraba Deus zipehata soho pisapybyikinaha zeka ana kino Deus mysiokzohik, aty Deus hyrikoso humo pisapybyikinaha zeka ana kino Deus ba zikokzowy. Imysapybara ty tawahi kytsa tuk mynapykyryk ba zikokzowy ziknakara — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Hwi wihara kino niwatihi nisispirikpoko.<Ts>— Kyze hwi tisapyrẽta zeka wihara bobatu zeka tisapyrẽna. Hwi batu sapy my zeka wihara batu isapy. Wihara humo hwitsa soho tsinymyrynaha. Uta hwi tisapyrẽta wata, hawa ha ty mykara tisapyrẽta. Hawa ha ty mytsaty mykara wasani wihara tisapyrẽna waha.<CM>

Ikiahatsa pyryhyktsa watsa tsimaha. Pyryhyktsa batu simysapy maha. Ikiahatsa kino niwatihi ahaharere batu imysapy tsimaha. “Katsaktsa mysapyrẽtsa tsimaha” mybarapetu tsimykaranaha. Iwa batu tyso tsimaha. Mysapyrẽtsa tu zeka hawa ha ty wasani zuba mytsaty tsimykaranaha. Hawa kytsa mysitsumuẽhĩnaha ana bo hi mytsaty tsimykaranaha. Atakta imysapybyita tu zeka amy ty batu sapy mytsaty mykara ana humo hi imysapybyitsa ty mykara. Hawa mytsaty tsimykaranaha ana hi tsimoziknaha.<CM>

Mysapyrẽtsa tu zeka isapyha ty mytsaty tsimykaranaha iwatsahi myharere tisapyrẽna tsimaha. Atakta hwi tisapyrẽta wata wihara niwatihi tisapyrẽna my. Katsa mysapybyitsa tu zeka hawa batu mysapy mytsaty tsimykaranaha iwatsahi myharere batu sapy tsimaha. Atakta hwi batu sapy wata my, wihara niwatihi batu sapy my.<CM>

Hana wa puruze Deus kytsa soho motsasoze abazubatsa Deus bo amy skaraba tahaharere nitsasonaha. Wastuhu tahaharere batu sapy ana soho Deus bo mopamykysonaha. Ustsa tahaharere wasani ana soho Deus bo mopamykysonaha. Abazubatsa tahaharere soho Deus bo motsasonaha.

Taharere humo Deus tihi: Sihareresapyrẽtsa pe: “Ikia tsamysapyrẽta” my. Sihareresapybyitsa pe: “Ikia batu amysapy” my. Iwatsahi ahaharere humo pykyhytutaha! — Sesus niy. — Hwi wihara batu metutu zikaha. Ikiahatsa ahaharere niwatihi batu metutu zikaha. Hawa mytsaty tsimykaranaha ana kino tsimoziknaha, iwa hỹ — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sizubarẽtsa iwatahawy nizapykykynaha.<Ts>Kyze asaktsa Deus harere zinymyrynahatsa Pariseutsa niwatihi Sesus pe:<CM>— O myhyrinymyrykytsa, Deus zikwy mybo tsiwatawykta! Amy ty kytsa zikahabara ty tsimyktsa ana hi tsimyzihikiknaha — niaha.<CM>

— Batu yhỹ niy. Abaktsa kytsa Deus harere bo batu ma zikaha. Kape tsimaha “Watahatykta” tsimaha. Batu yhỹ my. Tubabatu amy ty Deus zikwy Sonas bo niy ana hi pahawatawy ana humo kino pahahyrinymyryky.<CM>
Sonas piknu puẽtsikbyita hakoke eze niapykyryk harakykbyi zuru. Anawahi Deus zipehata wytyk eze harakykbyi hi puru.

Sonas Ninewe ezektsa bo Deus harere nitsasokoze asaktsa:<CM>“O mysapybyitsa tsimaha. Imysapybara tsimoewynaha” niaha. Asaktsa hanawa puruze Deus kytsa mynasihyrizikpowynahaze abaktsa kytsa bo asahi ahape: “Batu wasani tsimaha. Ahamysapybyitsa tsimaha” maha. Ninewe ezektsa Sonas nitsasokoze iwatsahi Deus harere bo hyỹ nikaranaha. Abaktsa kytsa Deus wasaniha bo batu yhỹ zikaha. Utakta abazubata kaharere bo batu yhỹ zikaha.<CM>

Hanawa puruze Deus kytsa soho motsasoze Seba tyryktsa pehatsata atatsa mynahyrizikpoze abaktsa kytsa pe: “Ikiahatsa batu ahamysapy tsimaha” my. Atatsa nokponi niukuru. Soromao harere tawaby. Tsihyrinymyrẽta harere piwaby tsihikik. Soromao hyrinymyry baba tisapyrẽna. Kaharere hi abazuba Deus wasaniha soho tisapyrẽnikia — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Hyrikoso isapybara ziksizo.<Ts>— Ihyrikoso sapybara maku ekze poize pitabaka zuba. Maku wahoro wata, atakta ihyrikoso sapybara sapy nikara. Hyrikoso isapybara tseheha bo pitabaka. Taty byryhabyita tu hana eze tabyrywy myziberiki.

Iwaze tapetu isopyk:<CM>“Piksizo. Nezeba maku ekze ikzoihik atabo hi piksizo” my. Kyze anasapy bozo. Zumuze batu ihyrikoso sapybara. Iwaze wahoro bo itsarawybyita wata. Tsiziurẽna wahoro itsytsykyha niy. Maku wahoro wata niy.<CM>

Kyze niparakzo. Hyrikoso sapybara nisihobykzo. Ustsa bo, sete ispe my:<CM>“Panytaha! Katuk tsimahaktsa. Maku bo tsimaha” mykara. “Atakta anaeze mysapy ziknakara. Ibo pororo tsimykaranahaktsa! Ituk tsimypykyknaha” niy. Iwa hyrikoso sapybara simysapybyikitsa maku bo nisioktyhyryk. Maku tuk mynapykyryknaha.<CM>Tapara maku batu iaku ihyrikoso sapybara estuba ituk. Abaka tisukatsihikrẽta babata iakubyikita hyrikoso sapybara oito humo. Iwa ikiahatsa niwatihi batu simysapy tsimaha — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus je itukytsa iwatsa ibo zumunaha.<Ts>Iwaze Sesus myzubaha bo nipamykysokoze taje tukytsa kino niwatihi zumunaha. Batu ibo zikzumunaha, kytsa pokso ba zikzumunaha. Asahi:<CM>— Katsaktsa Sesus bo tsimypamykyso tsihikiknaha — niaha.
Iwaze tohi Sesus pe niy:<CM>— Aje atukytsa niwatihi ape baze maha. Atuk mopamykyso tsihikiknaha — niy.
Sesus:<CM>— Aty skaraba kajebabatatsa hawa hatsa skaraba katuk kytsa babatsa — niy.<CM>

Iwaze tatsyhyrype ty zinymyrykynahatsa nisiwatawy:<CM>— Iktsa tsimahaktsa! Asahi kaje watatsa, sihumo kamypokzitsiarẽta kaje watatsa mykara. Asaktsa katukytsa watsa, sihumo kamypokzitsiarẽta katukytsa watsa mykara.
Aty zeka kazo bijoikpe eze tu iharere bo zuba hyỹ mykara asahi kajebabaza katukytsa babatsa — Sesus niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus nisihyrinymyryky mysipariknahaze ky soho.<Ts>Kyze nawa zuruze Sesus wahoro eze zoi. Karireja pihikzotsabyri baze nidyhyky kytsa nisihyrinymyryky. Deus tyryktsa soho nisihyrinymyryky.
Sizubarẽtsa ibaze niriktotohokonaha. Zihyrizabaiknaha. Iwaze tsaraha bo takoro, anaeze dyhy niy. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa zarape sak eze niriktotohokonaha iharere ziwabykynaha.

Nisihyrinymyry. Nipamykysoko atahi nisihyrinymyryky. Hawa kytsa mektsaktsa Deus harere humo maha, wastuhu iharere bo hyỹ nikaranaha ustsaktsa batu yhỹ nikaranaha ana humo hi nisihyrinymyryky. Atahi:<CM>— Kyze maku waratok bo niy. Atahi nisiparikik.
Nisiparikikze ske sak buruk wastuhu natsukunaha asaktsa piyktsa zumukunaha nisihorozukbaiknaha.<CM>
Iwaze mektsatu nisiparikikze harahareziktsa bo inatsukunahatsa. Iaksukpe bete tu zipokonaha iwatsahi niakbabaiknaha harahareziktsa humo niakbabaiknaha.
Batu siharatatsaka. Iwatsahi niakbabaiknaha haramwe humo niakbabaiknaha.<CM>
Iwaze ustsa nisiparikikze inikoso bo hi inatsukurunaha. Tahaypykyknahaze, ini saha humo hi batu tahatypyk, niakbabaiknaha.<CM>

Iwaze ustsa riktsa jytykziuha bo inatsukunahatsa. Niahatsahi tahaypykyknahaze tahasuknaha nipopobaiknaha. Asahi niubaranahaze tirĩta riktsa. Ustsa niwatihi niubaranahaze sesẽta riktsa. Ustsaktsa niubaranahababa sẽ riktsa. Sizubarẽtsa hiba riktsa ty siytyk tisapyrẽna bo nisiparikik. Iwa hỹ.<CM>
Kaharere tsiwabynaha zeka wabyziutaha! — niy.<CM>
<TS1>Hawa Sesus nisispirikpoko.<Ts>Kyze zinymyrykynahatsa ibo niaha. Asa zuba ibo nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— Amy skaraba riktsa soho kytsa tsimysihyrinymyryky — niaha.<CM>

— Deus kaharere ahabo piwatawy tsihikik pahahyrinymyry tsihikik. Deus tyryktsa soho pahawatawyky. Ikiahatsa kasoho ezytyk humo yhỹ tsimaha. Deus tyryktsa tsimoziknaha. Ustsa batu. Iwatahi tsasohowy humo tysihyrinymyryky.

Aty zeka kaharere tsikaeni zuba pinymyryky Deus ibo mopamykysotohi my. Atakta pihyrinymyrytsihik zeka mopamykysotohi. Aty zeka kaharere batu ihyrinymyry batu ihyrinymyry za. Batu amy tohi Deus ibo ba zik pamykysozo. Hawa ha ty botu zinymyry ana kino pispiriktsokda.
Iwatahi tsasohowy humo kytsa mysihyrinymyry. Asaktsa iktsazuba maha batu sihyrinymyry. Piwabykynaha zuba batu sihyrinymyry. Kaharere bo batu yhỹ zikaha.
Hawa Deus sohokotsa Isaijas tubabatu ziwatahaka atsatu mykaranaha. Atahi:<CI><PI>“Tsiwabyikiknaha batu ahahyrinymyry hỹ.<CI><PI2>Tsiksisuparaikiknaha batu ahahyrinymyry hỹ” niy.<CI>

<PI>Asaktsa kytsa batu simytsatyhy piwabynahaze tahaty spioki zuzuk sisopyk,<CI><PI2>iwatsahi batu waby zikaha. Iwa hawa wasani abaka batu iktsa zikaha, hawa wasani abaka batu ziwabynaha.<CI><PI>Iktsaziu maha zeka hawa wasani mytsaty maha.<CI><PI2>Piwabytoktokonaha zeka, simysapybyitsa ty mykaranaha pimoewy tsihikiknaha.<CI><PI>Iwaze Deus simysapybyri ty nikaranaha mysiokzohik iwaze mysizororowy — niy.<CI><PI0>Iwa Deus sohokotsa Isaijas tubabatu ziwatahaka abaktsa kytsa soho, asahi kaharere piwabynaha zuba batu sihyrinymyry tsihikik.<CM>

— Ikiahatsa ahakurẽtsa tsimaha. Hawa motsasoko Deus tyryktsa soho tsipiwabytoktokonaha ahahyrinymyrẽtsa. Hawa mykara ana kino iktsaziu tsimaha ana humo hi ahahyrinymyrẽtsa. Iwatsahi ahakurẽtsa tsimoziknaha.

Kaharere tsiwabytoktonahaktsa! Tubabatu Deus sohokotsa, asaktsa Deus harere bo hyỹ nikaranaha niwatihi hawa ikiahatsa tsiwabynaha ana kino ziwaby tsihikiknaha. Batu zikaha. Amy ty iktsa tsimaha ana kino ziny tsihikiknaha. Batu zikaha. Ikiahatsa hi kaharere tsinymyrykynaha. Ikiahatsa hi kabo iktsa tsimaha iwatsahi ahakurẽtsa tsimoziknaha — niy.<CM>
<TS1>Hawa siriktsa soho ty mymyhyrinymyryky.<Ts>— Abaka wabytoktoktaha! Amy ty tsasohowy sipariktsa soho pahawatawy. Asaktsa kamyspirikpowy ezytyk humo hyỹ maha zeka Deus tyryktsa moziknaha.<CM>

Aparakbaha Deus wasania ty piwabynaha. Asahi riktsa watsa ske sak bo inatsukunahatsa. Asahi Deus wasaniha piwabykynahaze Satanas sibo mozumuze Deus harere ziakse. Kytsa sihyrinymyrybyitsatuze Satanas Deus harere ziakse piyktsa hyrity watsa, iwatsahi Deus wasaniha humo batu sispirikpo.<CM>
Ustsa Deus harere piwabykynaha. Asahi riktsa watsa asahi harahareziktsa bo inatsukunahatsa siharatatsa zuba byitsa watsa. Taparaka wasaniha ziwabykynahaze sakurẽtsa.

Iwaze riktsa wytyk supe bete inatsukunahatsa watsa asahi tsikaeni zuba zinymyrykynaha. Tsihokdaharẽna zeka Deus harere bo batu yhỹ zikaha, iharere humo nispiriktsokdanaha. Ustsa kytsa Deus harere zimyijakanahaze Deus wasania ty zerekeknaha. Deus humo sispirikpobyitsa hi nikaranaha.<CM>

Ustsa Deus harere piwabykynaha. Asahi riktsa hyrity watsa inikoso bo inatsukunaha. Wasaniha piwabykynahaze tahanamy bo zuba mytsaty mytsaty nikaranaha. Tahanamy mozihikiknaha zuba. Deus harere humo sakubyri zumunahaze ihumo batu sispirikpo. Asahi wihara waha batu jakuk.<CM>

Ustsa Deus harere piwabykynaha. Asahi riktsa jytykziuha bo inatsukunaha hyrity watsa. Ustsa kytsa Deus harere ziwabynahatsa watsa. Deus wasaniha piwabyziukunaha. Piwabynahaze iharere humo sispirikporẽtsa Deus harere bo hyỹ mykaranaha. Iwatsahi wihara nijakuk. Wastuhu niubaranaha tirĩta riktsa. Ustsa niubaranaha sesẽta riktsa. Ustsa niubaranaha sẽ riktsa. Sizubarẽtsa hiba — niy. Deus tuktsa niwatihi iharere bo hyỹ mykaranahaze simysapyrẽtsa moziknaha wihara nijakuk naha waha. Iwaze hawa kytsa Sesus ihyrinymyrywy ezytyk piwabykynaha iwaze tysihyrinymyryky.<CM>

<TS1>Towahaditsa soho humo kytsa nisihyrinymyryky.<Ts>Kyze usa soho sibo nipamykysokozo. Deus tyryktsa soho humo nisihyrinymyryky. Sesus tihi:<CM>— Maku tsuhuk bo riktsa nisiparikik. Tiriko riktsa tisapyrẽna waratok buruk nisiparikik.
Unata zurubanahaze isukyrytsa itsuhuk bo izumu. Kytsa papatu towahaditsa nisiparikik, tirikotsa tazahara buruk towahaditsa nisiparikik, nesepykze ziksizo.
Kyze tiriko zipokonahaze towahaditsa tuk zipokonaha. Tiriko towahaditsa tuk tayhapykyknaha.<CM>
Iwaze tsumuẽhĩtsa tsihitsa pe “O mypehakatsa riktsa tisapyrẽna zuba atsuhuk eze tsiksiparikik. Hawa sa towahaditsa tiriko tuk taypyknaha” niaha.<CM>
“Kasukyrytsa iwa niy, atahi towahaditsa nisiparikik” niy. Iwaze sitsumuẽhĩtsa tihi:<CM>“Towahaditsa sa tahaboboknaha” niy.<CM>
“Batu. Towahaditsa tsimysiboboknaha zeka tirikotsa tuk tu tsimysiboboknaha byri tsinasiboboknaha. Siharatatsa tuk tu nisiakwarabaiknaha. Byriktsa!”

Abaka niwatihi zitahaypyknaha. Aibani tirikotsa muanahaze tu kytsa mysipurunaha. Ispe my:<CM>“Tapara towahaditsa tysiboboknahaktsa! Tsimysiboboknahaze haĩhaĩ tsimaha, izo bo tysioktsotsoknaha. Kyze tirikotsa tysipurunaha katirikododowytsa bo tysizozonaha” my.<CM>Yhỹ niaha. — iwa Sesus tiriko soho towahaditsa niwatihi nitsasoko. Aty Deus harere bo hyỹ mykara zeka tiriko watsa. Aty Deus harere bo yhỹ habyi zeka towahaditsa watsa my ana humo hi nisihyrinymyryky.<CM>

<TS1>Sirikbuzubyitsa soho humo nisihyrinymyryky.<Ts>Kyze usa soho humo sibo nitsasoko. Deus tyryktsa soho humo nisihyrinymyryky. Sesus tihi:<CM>— Deus tyryktsa sirikbuzubyitsa watsa. Mostarada riktsa watsa niy. Maku waratok eze ziparikze.

Ziktsa buzubyitsa tuze ziponaha. Taypykze hwi puẽtsikbyita mozik. Tisarapatsazubarẽta. Iwaze piyktsa isarapatsa bete tahasukuknaha — niy.<CM>Iwa nitsasoko hawa Deus tyryktsa sizubarẽtsa moziknaha. Hawa mostarada nisiubara iwatsa Deus tyryktsa mysiubaraka.<CM>

<TS1>Atsikara pytowy soho humo nisispirikpoko.<Ts>Kyze Sesus usa soho humo sibo nitsasoko Deus tyryktsa soho humo nisihyrinymyryky. Atahi:<CM>— Deus tyryktsa atsikara pytowy hyrity waha. Wytyk tiriko tsizubarẽna ty, iwaze ipytowy ty tsikaeni zuba tiriko eze nitsakyky iwaze napytoko. Abahi atsikara ziharazoko — niy.<CM>Iwa nipamykysoko Deus tyryktsa soho. — Taparaka Deus tyryktsa hudikhudikwy eze estuba zuba. Aibani nanabyitaba kytsa Deus tyryktsa moziknaha — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Taparaka iokpitsĩ hatuk anasoho hi kytsa mysihyrinymyryky.<Ts>Iwaze Sesus isoho tsizubarẽna myzubaha bo nipamykysoko. Iwa Deus tyryktsa soho humo nisihyrinymyryky. Kytsa nisihyrinymyrykyze isoho humo zuba nipamykysoko.

Iwa niyze hawa ha ty Deus sohokotsa tubabatu ziwataha atsatu nikara. Deus sohokotsa tihi:<CI><PI>— Uta isoho humo kytsa mysihyrinymyryky.<CI><PI2>Isuknihibyize Deus ispirikpowy iokpitsĩ<CI><PI>abaka kytsa mysihyrinymyry isoho humo — niy.<CI><PI0>Deus sohokotsa, tubabatu ziwataha iwa Sesus atsatu nikara.<CM>

<TS1>Hawaha towahaditsa soho humo nimyhyrinymyrykyzo.<Ts>Kyze Sesus kytsa sizubarẽtsa nisierekze wahoro bo nitsuk. Zinymyrykynahatsa ibo zumunaha. Ipe niaha:<CM>— Hawa ha sa tiriko towahaditsa soho mybo tytsasoziu — niaha. Iwaze sibo nitsasoko.
Aty wata ja:<CM>— Tiriko riktsa itsuhuk eze nisiparikik utakta Deus zikpehata kytsa wata ikyzik, tawata atakta riktsa nisiparikik, utakta Deus harere ty mysihyrinymyryky.
Itsuhuk mybarawy ezektsa watsa. Tiriko riktsa tisapyrẽtsa Deus tyryktsa watsa ituktsa maha. Towahaditsa hi Satanas tuktsa watsa.<CM>

Sisukyrytsitsa towahaditsa nisiparikik atakta Satanas hyrikoso sapybara pehakatsa watsa. Ziubara mybarawy nepykze wata astatu my. Asaktsa nisiubara mysipurunaha bijoikpe iknyktsa Deus tsumuẽhĩtsitsa watsa maha.
Towahaditsa tysipurunaha izo bo tysioktsotsoknaha iwaze Deus Satanas tuktsa sinini ykarawy bo mysipehahik.<CM>
Utakta Deus zikpehata kytsa wata ikyzik, utakta bijoikpe iknyktsa Deus tsumuẽhĩtsitsa mysipeha mybarawy ezektsa bo my. Asaktsa kytsa mysimyiwynahatsa asahi simysapybyikitsa tu nikaranaha.
Izo bo tysioktsotsoknaha, sinini ykarawy bo tysipaparanaha. Anaeze niakmyinahatsa tahatsaputsa ty dydydy mykaranaha. Tahakyrikinaha humo mopuziukunaha.<CM>

Iwaze kytsa Deus harere bo hyỹ mykaranaha wasani mykaranaha haramwe haneze watsa. Jekyrikoso watsa maha. Deus tuktsa soho “O ikiahatsa ahamysapyrẽtsa” my. Kytsa niwatihi sibo iktsa mahaze “O simysapyrẽtsa” mykaranaha. Deus tahazo tuk tahawahi mynapykyknaha — Sesus niy. — Kaharere tsipiwabynaha zeka tsiwabytoktonaha — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Maku tisapyrẽna tsipokzitsiarẽna zikaha naha humo nisihyrinymyrykyzo.<Ts>Kyze Sesus usa soho humo sibo nitsasoko Deus tyryktsa soho humo nisihyrinymyryky. Atahi:<CM>— Deus tyryktsa tisapyrẽna tsipokzitsiarẽna waha ty. Maku tsuhukze tisapyrẽna tsipokzitsiarẽna zikaha. Atsoko ziytykikzo ziokpitsĩhikzo. Tsakurẽta anamy tsizubarẽna okyrysaro humo zihuak. Iwaze itsuhuk tsihitsa bo, itsuhuk okyrysaro humo zihuakak iwaze tisapyrẽna ty tsipokzitsiarẽna ziakse. Ikiahatsa Deus tyryktsa tsimyzihikiknaha zeka sakurẽtsa maku wata, atakta tisapyrẽna tsipokzitsiarẽna ziakse niy.<CM>

<TS1>Maku perora tisapyrẽnikia ty zuba ziakse naha humo nisihyrinymyrykyzo.<Ts>Kyze Sesus nitsasokozo:<CM>— Deus tyryktsa maku wata atahi peroratsa ty ziakse. Perora haraharezipyryktsa sipokzitsiarẽtsa. Perora tisapyrẽnikia ty zuba ziakse tsihikik.
Perora isapyrẽnikia zikahaze tanamy tsizubarẽna okyrysaro humo zihuakak iwaze perora isapyrẽnikia ziakse. Perora humo tsakurẽta my. Ikiahatsa ahakurẽtsa iwatsa Deus tyryktsa tsimoziknaha.<CM>
<TS1>Tõhõryk soho humo nisihyrinymyrykyzo.<Ts>Kyze Sesus Deus tyryktsa tõhõryk waha my. — Piknutsa tõhõryk bo sasabyitsa sizubarẽtsa piknutsa inapupukunaha.<CM>

Inahareknahaze piknutsa hokyktsitsa nimyra eze nidyhydyhykynaha. Piknutsa nisinykynaha sisapyrẽtsa ty nataba sisapybyitsa ty natabaha niaha. Piknutsa sisapyrẽnikitsa ty ka peryk bo nisipupukunaha. Piknutsa sisapybyitsaktsa ty ka nisipaparakanaha.<CM>

Mybarawy mopykze iwa my. Bijoikpe iknyktsa Deus tsumuẽhĩtsitsa mozumunaha. Kytsa simysapyrẽtsa asaktsa Deus harere bo hyỹ mykaranaha Deus bo mysioktyhyryknaha. Simysapybyikitsa kino niwatihi metutu mykaranaha.<CM>
Simysapybyikitsa izo bo mysioktsotsoknaha sinini ykarawy bo maha. Anaeze simysapybyikitsa tahatsapu ty dydydy mynakaranaha. Tahakyrikinaha humo mynapuziukunaha — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Ibyky harere tsiwabynaha, hawa ha ty abaka harere tsipiwabynaha ana humo kino tsinymyrynahaktsa kytsa.<Ts>Kyze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa pe niy:<CM>— Kaharere ja tsinymyrynaha — niy.<CM>Yhỹ niaha.<CM>

— Kyze niwazuba asaktsa zinymyrykynahatsa babatsa Deus tyryktsa tuk sihyrinymyrykytsa moziknaha. Wahoro tsihitsa watsa, anamy zozowy eze wahoro ezektsa bo nyny my. Iwata sinymyrykytsa kytsa bo mysihyrinymyrykynaha. Hawa ty botu ziwabynaha Moises harere mysihyrinymyrykyzo kaharere ezytyk humo kino niwatihi kytsa mysihyrinymyryky aba zuba anasoho piwabykynaha — niy. De.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus Nasare eze.<Ts>Sesus nitsasobaze anaeze niparak.

Nasare bo niukuru anaeze hi taypykyryk naha bo zumu. Deus wahoro bo nitsuk. Anaeze kytsa nisihyrinymyryky. Ihumo sipybyrẽtsa. Asa tihi:<CM>— Atakta hawa zinymyryky. Hawa myhyrinymyrywy babaha ja. Aty ja zispirikpoko. Amy ty kytsa batu zikaha ana ty hi mykara. Aty zikwy sa ituk mynapykyryk — niaha. Iwa asa zuba nipamykysokonaha.<CM>
— Hwitsa bikitsa tse ja. Hawa skaraba Maria ije. Hawa skaraba Tsiaku, Sudas, Soses, Simaõ ahatsa itukytsa maha.
Ituk kykyryk mytuk mopykyryknaha ja. Iwaze izikwy ihyrinymyrywy babaha iwa hana eze sa zinymyryky — nikaranaha. Iwatsahi ihumo batu sispirikpo.<CM>

Ihumo kyze ky sisopyk. Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Nanabyitaba kytsa Deus sohokotsa harere piwabynaha. Atakta tahudikhudikwy eze tuze ka batu wasani zikaha. Tawahoro ezektsa tu zeka batu wasani zikaha. Itukytsa tukze ka batu wasani zikaha — niy.<CM>
Sesus Nasare eze tu zikwy batu watawy. Amy ty kytsa batu zikaha Nasare eze tu batu zik. Kytsa ihumo sispirikpobyitsa tu iwatahi zikwy batu watawy.<CM>
<TS1>Suão Batista hyrikosokdawy.<Ts>Iwaze Erodes Karireja ezektsa pehakatsa Sesus soho ziwaby. Sesus zikwy humo nikara amy ty kytsa batu zikaha izikwy humo nikara ana ziwaby.
Iwaze Erodes tatsumuẽhĩtsitsa pe:<CM>— O atahi Suão Batista, inahyrizikpo iwatahi tsizikwyrẽta amy ty kytsa batu zikaha ana ty hi mykara — mytsaty ahabyi nikara.<CM>

<sup>(3-4)</sup> Tapara Suão Erodes pe niy:<CM>— Ikia Deus harere humo batu hỹ tsimy. Deus harere humo usta oke ba ziakse. Ikia ja. Atsy oke Erodias tsiakse iwatahi Deus harere bo batu yhỹ tsimy. Batu wasani tsimy — nikara. Ana harere humo Erodes takyriki. Kyze Erodes sodadutsa pe:<CM>— Suão tyzioktyhyknaha! Sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy bo tytsahurukiknaha. Anaeze tsipawaranaha — niy.<CM>Hyỹ niaha. Iwa hỹ.
Erodes Suão zibeze tsihikik. Kytsa Sudeutsa humo batu zik. Kytsa Suão soho:<CM>— O atakta Deus sohokotsa my — nikaranaha. Iwatahi Erodes batu tybeze, kytsa mymyhudizunaha pokso.

Iwaze Erodes ipurukwy zumuze mytsaty nikaranaha. Tumy tsizubarẽna nikymynahaze. Imyikaha humo tumy tsizubarẽna nikymynahaze sizubarẽtsa siakzohotsa huahua niaha. Sizubarẽtsa imyikaha bo zumunaha. Erodias hi Erodes oke my. Atatsa ste tsarawybara bo kytsa okze nikariki. Kytsa sakzohotsa okze nikariki atatsa humo nakokonaha.
Iwaze Erodes ihumo tsakurẽta iwatahi ipe niy:<CM>— Amy tsimyzihikik kabo tsimyzapyky zeka atsatu abo nyny my — niy.<CM>

Kyze Erodias tatsapusare tsihikik. Suão harere humo iwaze tatsa taste pe:<CM>— Suão harek ty tuzapykyky — niy. Iwaze ije harere humo atatsa tihi:<CM>— Suão Batista harek ty kabo nyny tsimy. Aidy mypewy eze iharek ty kabo nyny tsimy iwaze nihyrikosokda my iwahi mozihikik — niy.<CM>
Kyze Erodes tisukatsihikrẽta. Sudeutsa ihumo ba ziktahakyrinaha. Iharere Deus bo nitsaso, anaharere sakzohotsa okze niwatihi nitsasoko, ana ty kino mytsaty nikara.
Iwatahi sodadu pe:<CM>— Suão Batista harek ty bokokik ty! Sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy bo tsimy anaeze isoik buruk bokokik ty. Iharekty kabo wabehyrykty — niy.<CM>
Yhỹ niy. Suão Batista harek ty bokokik mypewy eze korohyk niy, niytahi atatsa bo wabehyryk niy. Kyze atatsa taje bo nyny niy.<CM>
Kyze Suão zinymyrykynahatsa zumunaha sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy bo zumunaha inury zuba ziytyknaha. Iwaze nitururuknaha Sesus bo zumunaha. Hawa niy Sesus bo nipamykysonaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus kytsa sizubarẽtsa nisidisahawyky.<Ts>Sesus Suão soho ziwabyze niparak. Pihikzotsabyri bo. Iwaze ituktsa tuk tsaraha bo kokokorohyk, jerukbara bo koikny niaha, batu aty tohi isapy bo niaha. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa isohowy zinymyrykynaha iwatsahi, — O Sesus bo tupaktsa! — niaha. Iwaze ibo hara taba niukurunaha. Zitabakanahatsa tu jerukbara bo tapara zumunaha.<CM>
Kyze Sesus tsaraha nipoze kytsa sizubarẽtsa bo iktsa niy. Sihumo tsimypokzitsiarẽta iwatahi simyitsapyritsa nisizororowy.<CM>

Nubaze zinymyrykynahatsa ituk nitsasokonaha:<CM>— O Sesus, abaka punubaka batu mydisahawyky. Tykara eze ka batu mydisahawyky. Kytsa tysipehakta! “Ahahudikhudikwy boktsa! Ahadisahawy tyzebykyknahaktsa” tsimy — niaha.<CM>
— Kyzekta nabytykara ezetu. Ikiahatsa hi sidisahawy ty sibo nyny tsimaha! — niy.<CM>
— Katsa zuba atsikara mytsyhyry wa zuba piknutsa kino petok zuba tsimaha, iwaze kino ke ba nawatsatu ba zik mydisahanaha — niaha.<CM>
— Ana ty hi kabo wabehyryk tynaha — niy.<CM>Yhỹ niaha.<CM>

Iwaze Sesus sizubarẽtsa pe:<CM>— Dyhy dyhy tahaktsa! Parakbaha dyhy dyhy tahaktsa! — niy.<CM>Hyỹ niaha. Towahaditsa sisapyrẽtsa bete tahadyhydyhykynaha. Iwaze atsikara ty piknutsa ty iwahaty okok niyze bijo bo iktsa niy. Deus pe:<CM>— Ikia humo ka mykurẽtsa — niy. Atsikara zitsakze zinymyrykynahatsa bo nyny niy. — Sibo nynytahaktsa! — niy. Kytsa bo zibiakaknahaze tsizubarẽna niyzikik nyny nikaranahaze kino hawa zuba ja nikara. Piknutsa kino niwatihi, sizubarẽtsa nisisukniwy.<CM>
Kyze kytsa tihi:<CM>— O tsikmyksorokbanaha — nikaranaha. Tahadisahabanahaze itsatsakyhy ha jerehe peryktsa eze zipukpukunaha dose peryktsa zinymyrykynahatsa inasihareknaha.
Kytsa, sĩko miutsa tahadisahakanaha. Wytykyryk sihyrytsa iwatsa sizubarẽtsa tahadisahabanaha. Abazuba hiba.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus pihik tsiksukpe buruk niukuru.<Ts>Kyze aidy Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa pe:<CM>— Tsaraha boktsa! Kaharaze pihikzotsabyri koikny typunahaktsa kytsa! Bykyze pomo — niy.<CM>Yhỹ niaha. Zinymyrykynahatsa pihik koikny zitsikzanaha. Iwaze Sesus kytsa sizubarẽtsa nisipeha:<CM>— Ahawahoro bo tsiksinahaktsa! — niy. Nitururuknaha.
Kytsa sizubarẽtsa nitururukbanahaze Sesus tapetu isopyk:<CM>— Kazo bo mopamykysoko. — Kyze hara bo nido. Deus bo nipamykysoko. Zunubakaze ata zuba Deus bo nipamykyso.<CM>
Kyze zinymyrykynahatsa pihik tsikpukteze, ziturikinahaze zopoktsa nabybyknaha. Pihik ihiridawy hyrity waha niyzik zopoktsa humo.<CM>
Zokorobyitu Sesus sibo zumu. Miwa botu kytsa pihikzotsabyri tsikpukteze sibo niukuru. Pihik tsiksukpe buruk niukuru.
Sibo zumubanize sipybyrẽtsa nikaranaha. Sesus pihik tsiksukpe buruk niukuru tapokso kakaik niaha, sipybyrẽtsa nikaranaha:<CM>— O myhyrikoso ja — nikaranaha.<CM>
Sesus tihi:<CM>— Ahapyby byihu ja! Ahapunihikrẽtsaktsa kytsa! Uta hiba — niy.
Iwaze Peduru tihi:<CM>— O mypehatsa ikia hehỹ my zeka kape:<CM>“Pany! Kabo pihik tsiksukpe buruk tynaukta” tsimy — niy.
Sesus tihi:<CM>— Pany pãoty — niy. Iwaze Peduru tsaraha ekze niparak, Sesus bo pihik tsiksukpe buruk niukuru.
Kyze zopoktsa bo iktsa niyze tsipybyrẽta iwaze asiba niharazuk:<CM>— O kapehatsa katy paikty — niy.<CM>

Atsoko Sesus itsyhyrype humo paik niy. Iwaze Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Amy pokso tsapybyrẽta “Sesus batu kamypokzitsiuk” tsimy. Amo skaraba kaharere humo batu aspirikpo. Zopoktsa pokso tsapybyrẽta — niy.<CM>
Tsaraha bo kokokorohyk niahaze zopoktsa pyk niaha.
Zinymyrykynahatsa tsaraha eze tu:<CM>— Batu aty tohi pihik tsiksukpe buruk zitaba iwaze ikia zuba Deus tse babata. Ikia humo mykurẽtsa hỹ — niaha.<CM>
<TS1>Kenasere eze simyitsapyritsa nisizororowy.<Ts>Kyze pihikzotsabyri koikny niaha. Byu niahaze Kenasere bo niaha.
Kenasere ezektsa Sesus zinynahaze paikpa nitsasokonaha. Siotutsa pauktsitsa pe:<CM>— Panytaha! Ahamyitsapyritsa Sesus boktsa! — niaha. Iwaze kytsa simyitsapyritsa Sesus bo nisioktyhyryknaha.

Sizikeditsa ipe:<CM>— O asuk tsihara humo paik tsimaha zeka mykurẽtsa — niaha.<CM>Yhỹ niy.<CM>Iwaze asaktsa Sesus suk tsihara humo paik niahaze nisizororowy. Simyitsapyritsa sizubarẽtsa nisizororowybaik.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus Sudeutsa sopykwy humo nisihyrinymyry.<Ts>Kyze wastuhu Pariseutsa Moises harere humo zinymyrynahatsa kino niwatihi Serusarẽhe ikny nitururuknaha. Sesus bo zumunahaze ipe niaha:<CM>

— Atuk pinymyrykynahatsa taparaktsa myzotsa sopyk humo batu yhỹ nikaranaha. Tapara tahatsyhyrype piknaha iwaze tadisahanaha. Taha ty tsyhyrype pik byizeka ba zik tahadisahanaha. Asahi taha ty tsyhyrype pikbyitsa tu ziknatahadisahakanaha iwa taparaktsa harere bo batu yhỹ ziknakaranaha. Batu sapy — niaha.<CM>
— Ikiahatsaktsa ja. Ikiahatsa niwatihi Deus harere bo batu yhỹ zikaha tahanymyrywy humo zuba yhỹ tsimykaranaha. Batu sapy my Sesus niy.
Deus ahape niy:<CM>“Ahazotsa humo tysipokzitsikinahaktsa! Ahazo ahajeza humo kino niwatihi wasani ahasopyk. Atakta tazotsa mysisapy byizeka tysibaik” Deus niy.
Ikiahatsa kytsa pe tihi:<CM>“O kazo kaje kaokyrysaro ty ahabo nyny mykara. Ana okyrysaro ty Deus bo nyny my iwa zeka ba zahatsumuẽhĩ” — tsimaha.
Anaty hi tsimytsasokonahaze kytsa bo tsipimyikinaha. Kytsa tahanamy tahazotsa bo pibiak tsihikiknaha. Ahahumo hi batu nyny maha. Iwatsahi ikiahatsa humo kytsa niakmyinaha.<CM>
Ahamyspihikbatarẽtsa Deus sohokotsa Isaijas inarokota tubabatu ahasoho ziwatahaka. Hawa ha ty ziwataha wasani. Deus harere tihi:<CI>

<PI>— Asaktsa kytsa ziharawatakanahatsa watsa<CI><PI2>“O Deus harere bo zuba hyỹ tsimykaranaha” — mybarapetu nikaranaha.<CI>— Kaharere bo batu yhỹ niaha.<CI><PI>Hawa ha bo mytsaty nikaranaha mektsatu niy, iwatsahi kaharere bo batu yhỹ.<CI><PI2>Iwaze ziharawatakanahatsa watsa.<CI>

<PI>Hawa ha ty kabo nitsasokonaha asahi batu ma zikaha. Asahi:<CI><PI2>“Myharere hi Deus sopyk atsatu maha” iwa kytsa bo mybarapetu mykaranaha — niy.<CI><PI0>Batu ba tahaharere zuba nitsasokonaha Deus sohokotsa Isaijas Pariseutsa soho tubabatu iwa ziwataha.<CM>

<TS1>Hawa mytsaty tsimykaranaha pykyhytutaha.<Ts><sup>(10-11)</sup> Kyze Sesus sizubarẽtsa bo huahua niy. Izumubanahaze ispe niy:<CM>— Wabyziutaha! Iwaze tsinymyrynaha. Amy ty maku hauk myze ana humo hi ba zikmyi. Batu disahawy humo Deus okzeka imysapybyita niyzik. Batu ba. Hawa ha ty motsasoko, iharere batu mysapy motsasoko zeka ana humo hi Deus okzeka imysapybyita mozik — Sesus niy.
Kyze ituk zinymyrykynahatsa ibo zumunaha:<CM>— Pariseutsa aharere humo batu siakparawy ana kino tsinymyryky ja — niaha.<CM>

Iwaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Pariseutsa hyrinymyrywy iparikihi haratatsa watsa. Hawa kytsa iparikihi haratatsa watsa mysibobokonaha batu iakubarahi zibobokok naha humo anawata Deus sihyrinymyrywy nepyk, batu iharere humo hawa asahi mytsaty nikaranaha zuba. Iwatahi Pariseutsa hyrinymyrywy nepyk.<CM>

Pariseutsa sihyrizikubyitsa watsa. Ihyrizikubyrita usta ihyrizikubyrita ske piwatawy zeka petoktsa mynarahanaha. Sihyrizikubyitsa petoktsa wytyk hoke bo mynarahanaha. Pariseutsa siwahatsa, kytsa bo mybarapetu mykaranaha iwatsahi Pariseutsa humo amy ty wasani batu hỹ mykaranaha. Iwaze asaktsa Pariseutsa ty arekektaha! — niy.<CM>
Kyze Peduru tihi:<CM>— Asoho hawa tsipihauknaha mybo tytsaso — niy.<CM>
— Ikiahatsa ja. Ikiahatsa myzubaha watsa kasoho batu ahahyrinymyry.
Kytsa tadisahakanahaze siworozik bo zuba tasapy. Bykyze pikaranahaze hana bo ja.<CM>
Amy ty batu imysapybara ty kytsa mozihikiknaha ana soho mytsaty ziknakaranaha, ana humo hi simysapybyitsa niyziknaha.

Kytsa amy ty batu imysapy mytsaty mykaranaha zeka atsatu mykaranaha. Hawa mytsaty mykaranaha humo kytsa pibeze tsihikiknaha, ustsa okeza piakse tsihikiknaha, ustsa kytsa mysiwo tsihikiknaha ustsa namy piakse tsihikiknaha sitsyhyryboarẽtsa moziknaha. Kytsa mysimyiwynaha sisoho mybarapetu mykaranaha. Siharerewabymybarẽtsa moziknaha hawa mytsaty mykaranaha batu imysapybara humo.<CM>

Ana humo hi kytsa batu simysapy maha, Deus okzeka simysapybyitsa mykaranaha. Kytsa ba zik tahatsyhyrypetsa piknaha Deus okzeka mahani. Asahi ipe: “O ikia zuba tsamysapyrẽnikita” maha. Iwa Deus bo mopamykysokonaha — Sesus niy. De.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus Sudeubyitatsa ste zizororowy.<Ts>Iwaze Sesus Tiro bo niparak. Sidõ bo kino niwatihi.<CM>

Kyze wytyk anaezektatsa Sudeubyitatsa tu ibo zumu. Atatsa kakaik niy. Atatsa tihi:<CM>— O kapehatsa Deus zipehata Dawi tsekokatsa kahumo tsimypokzitsiarẽta. Kaste sinini mynakara, ihyrikoso sapybara pokso atakta pororo ziknakara iwatatsahi sinini mynakara.<CM>
Sesus batu iharere ty batu tyso. Zinymyrykynahatsa ipe:<CM>— O amy sa myzapykyky ikia atatsa bo nyny tsimyzeka bykyze ipe: nabo pãoty tsimy. Atatsa myhapik ka mynakara batu pyk aha.
Iwaze Sesus:<CM>— Utakta Deus zikpehata Sudeutsa bo zuba asaktsa hozipyrykza watsa batu siperynymyryhy, nizaranahatsa watsa maha, iwa hozipyrykza watsa.<CM>
Atatsa ana kino ziwabyze ibo izumu, iokeryk taekaratsa humo puruk puruk niy — O kapehatsa ikia amysapyrẽnikita tyziktsumuẽhĩ ky — niy:<CM>

Sesus:<CM>— Tapara kytsa hyrytsa zitadisahakanaha bykyze zuba kytsa disahawy tsihirik ty tsikuparinitsa bo nyny maha. Tapara sidisahawy ty tsikuparinitsa bo nyny my zeka batu sapy my. Isopyksapybyitsa. Ihyrytsa hi tapara tysidisahawynaha — niy.<CM>

— O kapehatsa wasape tsiky. Ikia Sudeutsa bo hỹ. Katsaktsa Sudeutsabyitsa tsikuparinitsa watsa, amy ty Sudeutsa ty tsihik byizeka katsaktsa yhỹ tsimaha. Tsikuparinitsa zipyryktsa mesa hwitsabihi pukezi tu asahi sitsatsakyhy arehe ty tahadisahakanaha. Itsatsakyhy inatsukunahaze ana ty hi tsikuparinitsa zipyryktsa tahadisahakanaha katsa kino niwatihi amy ty Sudeutsa batu yhỹ zikaha katsaktsa yhỹ tsimaha — niy.<CM>
— Aharere wasani my. Kahumo aspirikporẽtatsa iwatatsahi awahoro boktsa! Aste pizororowy ihyrikoso sapybara botu iksiwyhik hana bo ja. Aste tsakurẽtatsa hỹ — Sesus niy. Iwa hỹ.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus sizubarẽtsa nisizororowy.<Ts>Kyze Sesus niparak Karireja pihikzotsabyri sak bo niukuru. Kyze hara bo nido anaeze nidyhyky.
Kytsa sizubarẽtsa ibo izumunaha. Siekbyritsa, sihyrizikubyitsa, siharerebyitsa, simyiziubyitsa simyitsapyritsa sizubarẽtsa iwatsa nisioktyhyryknaha, Sesus paukbaze isty dyhy dyhy niaha.<CM>

Sesus nisizororowyba. Kytsa ihumo sipybyrẽtsa. Pãozikahabyitsa zitabazonaha, sihyrizikubyitsa iktsazo nikaranaha, simyiziubyitsa nizororobanaha, siharerebyitsa nipamykysozonaha kytsa ana bo iktsa niahaze sipybyrẽtsa. Ana humo hi Deus bo:<CM>— Ikia Isareu Deus my, ikia zuba Deus babata ahumo mykurẽtsa — nikaranaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus sizubarẽtsa nisidisahawyzo.<Ts>Kyze Sesus ituk zinymyrykynahatsa bo huahua niy:<CM>— Panytahaktsa! Utakta sizubarẽtsa humo kamypokzitsiarẽta. Harakykbyihi katuk zurunaha, batu sidisahawyky niaha. Ispe my zeka: “Tsiksinahaktsa kytsa ahawahoro boktsa” iwa zeka taharapatsapyrispyk ske buruk mynarahanaha iwatahi batu isty peha siwahoro bo. Tapara sidisahawy ty sibo nyny tsimaha — niy.<CM>
— Hawa skaraba tsimaha. Batu aty tohi sidisahawy ty sibo nyny my. Jerukbara eze batu mydisahawyky. Katsaktsa ba ziksitsumuẽhĩnaha.<CM>
— Hawa skaraba atsikara — niy.<CM>— Nawa, usta tsyhyry humo petok sete atsikara niaha. Piknutsa zipyryktsa kino batu sizuba — niaha.<CM>
Kyze Sesus kytsa sizubarẽtsa pe:<CM>— Wytyk humo dyhy dyhy taha! — niy.<CM>

Iwaze atsikara sete aha ty okokyk niy, piknutsa zipyryktsa kino niwatihi nisibykyk iwaze Deus pe:<CM>— Ikia humo ka mykurẽtsa tsimaha. Ikia hi mydisahawy ty mybo nyny tsimy — niy.<CM>Iwaze atsikara zitsakze zinymyrykynahatsa bo nyny niy. Piknutsa zipyryktsa kino niwatihi nyny niy.<CM>— O kytsa bo sidisahawy ty nynytaha! — niy. Sizubarẽtsa bo zibiakaknaha tsizubarẽna ty nyny nynyzo niaha. Ziubarawy.
Bykyze kytsa:<CM>— O mysorokrẽtsa — niaha. Tahadisahabanahaze itsatsakyhy arehe zipupukunaha. Peryktsa bo pukpuk nikaranaha. Iwa sete peryktsa bo zipupukunaha.<CM>
Kytsa abazubatsa. Kwatero miu ahatsa kytsa, tahadisahakanaha wytykyryk sihyrytsa ahatsa kino niwatihi iwatsa tahadisahakanaha.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Ahawahoro bo tsiksinaha — niy. Iwaze ziksikinaha. Ziksibanahaze tsaraha bo takoro Makadã bo niy.<CM>

<TS1>Siwatawytsa nizapykykynaha.<Ts>Kyze Pariseutsa asaktsa Moises harere sihyrinymykynahatsa, Sadusitsa kino niwatihi Sesus bo zumunaha. Sispirikpobyitsa tu ibo nizokparakanaha. Sesus Moises harere bo batu yhỹ mozihikiknaha iwatsahi nizokparakanaha. Niharapebetsakaknaha. Iwa ipe:<CM>— Deus zikwy mybo tsiwatawykta watawy tsimy zeka Deus zapeha iwa katsa tsipinymyrynaha — niaha.
Sesus tihi:<CM>— Nubaze bijoikpe tsaririha mozik zeka “O byri hyritsik ba zik nawõ” tsimaha.<CM>

Miwa botuze bijoikpe tsaririha zatata mozik zeka “O aba hyritsik nawõ” tsimaha. Wasani tsimaha. Bijoikpe iwatawy humo ahahyrinymyrẽtsa. Abaka amy ty mykara ana kino batu ahahyrinymyry, kawatahawy batu ahahyrinymyry.<CM>

Abaktsa kytsa iwatawywy piberikinaha asahi simysapybyikitsa Deus harere bo batu yhỹ nikaranaha. Kape tsimaha “Iwatawy tsimykta” tsimaha. “Batu hỹ” my. Tubabatu amy ty Deus zikwy ziwatawy Sonas bo niy, ana kino pahawatawy ana kino pahahyrinymyry — niy. Sesus niparak asa zuba niriktotohokonaha.<CM>

<TS1>— Pariseutsa, Sadusitsa niwatihi sihyrinymyrywy humo pykyhytutaha! — Sesus niy.<Ts>Kyze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa tuk Karireja pihikzotsabyri koikny niaha. Zinymyrykynahatsa tahadisahawy humo nispiriktsokdanaha.<CM>
Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— O pykyhytutaha kytsa! Pariseutsa Sadusitsa niwatihi simihipytowy humo pykyhytutaha! — niy.<CM>
Iwaze asa zuba nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— Ana hi nitsaso atsikara humo batu tywabehyk — mytsaty ahabyitsa nikaranaha.<CM>

Sesus siharere humo tsinymyrẽta iwatahi ispe niy:<CM>— Hawa ha ty skaraba tsimypamykysokonaha. “Katsaktsa atsikara awani iwatahi anapytowy soho nitsaso” tsimaha. Ikiahatsa kahumo batu ahaspirikpoziu, “Sesus myhumo batu tsimypokzitsiuk” tsimaha.

Amy skaraba batu tsihyrinymyrykynaha. Deus zikwy kabo nyny niy ana bo hi ikiahatsa botu iktsa tsikaha iwatsa tu kahumo batu ahaspirikpo. Hawa ha ty botu ikykara tsispiriktsokdanaha ja. Atsikara mytsyhyry tsawata zitsaktsakze kytsa abazubatsa “sĩko miu ahatsa” bo nyny iky. Hana wa ja itsatsakyhy jereheha ty peryktsa bo tsipupunaha — niy.<CM>— Dose peryktsa tsiknasihareknaha — niaha.<CM>

— Atsikara sete zitsaktsakze kytsa abazubatsa kwatero miu ahatsa bo nyny iky. Hana wa ja itsatsakyhy jereheha ty peryktsa bo tsipupunaha — niy.<CM>— Sete peryktsa tsiknasihareknaha — niaha. — Ana soho tsikspiriktsokdanaha ja — Sesus niy.<CM>

— Amy humo kaharere anapytowy soho batu ahawabyhy. Amy humo batu ahahyrinymyry hỹ. Iktsasokoze Pariseutsa Sadusitsa niwatihi anapytowy humo pykyhytutaha atsikara soho batu tyso sihyrinymyrywy soho pykyhytutaha iky, sihyrinymyrywy anapytowy waha my — niy.<CM>

Kyze itsaso Pariseutsa Sadusitsa kino niwatihi anapytowy ty batu atsikara soho, sihyrinymyrywy ana soho pykyhytutaha ispe niy. Hawa anapytowy humo atsikara inawerekbaik anawaha sihyrinymyrywy kytsa mysimyiwynaha. Aba zuba sihyrinymyrẽtsa iharere ziwabyziukunaha.<CM>

<TS1>Peduru Sesus pe — Ikia hi Deus tse babata — niy.<Ts>Iwaze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa tuk Sesareja Piripi hudikhudikwy bo zumubahaninahaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Kytsa kasoho paikpa nipamykysokonaha. Utakta Deus zikpehata kytsa wata aty skaraba kahumo maha — niy.<CM>
— Wastuhu “O ikia hi Suão Batista” mykaranaha. Ustsaktsa “ata hi Erias” mykaranaha. Mektsaktsa “ikia Seremias” mykaranaha “tozeka ja usta Deus sohokotsa” mykaranaha — niaha.<CM>
— Ikiahatsa ja. Aty skaraba uta ahaokze ka — niy.<CM>
Kyze Simaõ Peduru tihi:<CM>— Ikia hi Kiristu Deus tse babata. Ikiakta Deus koikny bakta tu zapeha — niy.<CM>
— O Simaõ Suãotse ikia tsakurẽta hỹ. Deus zatsumuẽhĩ. Anaharere kasoho kytsa humo batu ahyrinymyry. Deus kazo bijoikpe eze tu anaharere zahyrinymyry. Uta Kiristu Deus zikpehata, ata hi zawatawy hỹ.

Uta kino ape Peduru my ikia hi harahare wata my. Hawa ha ty botu nitsaso Deus hi zawatawy ana kino katuktsa sakurẽtsa moziknaha. Hawa wahoro tisapyrẽna my harahare humo, katuktsa sakurẽtsa moziknaha aharere humo wasani. Satanas hyrikoso sapybara niwatihi katuktsa tuk myharape pehakanahaze batu kazikwy humo simyiwy.<CM>

Aty moparak zeka myhyrizikpyryrykwytsa ty mekta botu nyny my atahi wahoro perytsa. Atawata ikia katuktsa mysipokzitsiki asahi kawahoro wata. Deus tuktsa sopyk sisoho “wasani tsimaha zeka” wasani hỹ. Sisopyk soho “batu imysapy” tsimaha zeka batu imysapy hỹ. Deus hi ahaharere soho “wasani” my — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa pe — Utakta Kiristu. Abaka ana ty hi kytsa bo soso byitaha! — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus tabezewy soho nitsasoko iwaze tahyrizikpowy soho niwatihi nitsasoko.<Ts>Kyze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa bo hawa mohyrikosokda soho mypubara ty nitsasoko. Iharere batu tsihokdaharẽna. Atahi:<CM>— Uta Serusarẽhe bo my. Anaeze Sudeutsa sistsaikbatsa, taparaktsa Deus wahoro zubata eze ziknapamykysokonahatsa, iwatahatsitsa iwatsa piksukyrykynaha. Sinini mykara. Kytsa pikbezenaha. Iwaze petok puruze Deus mynahyrizikpowy — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Peduru Sesus zioktyhyryk. Atazubata tu zibetsakak ipe niy:<CM>— Awatu tykta! Ana humo kino abo batu mykara, ikia hi batu sinini tsimy iwatahi anatyhi batu tyso — niy. Iwa zibetsakak.<CM>

Sesus Peduru bo iktsaziu niy. Zipehahik:<CM>— Nabo pãoty Satanas. Ikia Deus harere bo batu yhỹ tsimy, hawa kytsa mytsaty mykaranaha ana bo hi yhỹ tsimykara. Ikia kape:<CM>“O kytsa pikbezenahaze batu yhỹ tsimy” iwatahi tsikykniki ikia harahare wata ske zihiza — Sesus niy.<CM>

Kyze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa pe:<CM>— Aty katuk babata mozihikik zeka. Atakta pibyituhukutu ta humo tu mospiriktsokda, amy ty imysapybyri kino pimoewy. Pibyituhukutu kytsa pahasapybyikinaha yhỹ tsimaha Deus pokzi sinini tsimykaranaha mohyrikosokdata wa. Hawa sinini mykara atakta niwatihi katuk babata mozik zeka kawata sinini mynakara. Iwatsahi tsikymynahaktsa kytsa! — Sesus niy.<CM>

Sesus tihi:<CM>— Aty “O utakta ba zikyrikosokda iwaze Sesus harere bo batu yhỹ iwaze kytsa ba zikbezenaha” my. Atahi Deus tuk batu tawahi mynapykyryk niy. Atakta hiba katuk babata tu kahumo sinini my zeka atakta Deus tuk tawahi mynapykyryk — niy.<CM>

— Atakta tanamy zuba mytsaty mykara zeka atahi ihyrizikararawy Deus tuk batu tawahi mynapykyryk atahi tisukatsihikrẽta mozik. Tanamy tsizubarẽna nizihikik, anahi zihokzaba. Tahyrizikararawy kino niwatihi mohokda, batu amy tohi sihumo ba zikwak.<CM>

Utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata myziksizoze kazo zikwy tuk mynasik, bijoikpe iknyktsa Deus tsumuẽhĩtsitsa niwatihi katuk mynasiknaha. Hawa skaraba kytsa nikaranaha mybarawy eze zikzurukunahaze sisoho motsaso. Asaktsa hawa ha ty wasani nikaranaha “O ahamysapyrẽtsa” my. Asaktsa simysapybyitsa nikaranaha. “O ikiahatsa batu ahamysapy” my. Iwa kytsa bo motsasoko.<CM>

Kaharere bo wabytoktoktaha! Ikiahatsa tazaharaeze tu sihyrikosokda byize tu tapara Deus pehatsa ahawata parakbaha moziknaha ana bo iktsa maha, Deus tyryktsa bo pinynaha bykyze mohyrikosokdanaha hawa ha ty iktsaso wasani my ana bo kino iktsa maha — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Moises Erias iwatsa Sesus bo inatakahanaha.<Ts>Iwaze seis ziharamuze Sesus Peduru, Tsiaku itsy Suão iwatsa nisioktyhyryk. Ustsa zinymyrykynahatsa nitarenaha. Iwaze asaktsa harakykbyitsa iapik hara bijobonita bo nidokoknaha. Asa zuba Sesus tuktsa hara bijobonita bo niaha.
Sesus tuktsa ibo iktsa niahaze meky watu tahyrity. Iok haramwe wata niyzik. Tisukbarazarẽta okoroze waha niyzik. Katsaktsa ibarazabaharẽta batu inyhuk.
Ibaze kytsa petoktsa natakahanaha. Erias, Moises ahatsa, tubabatu nihyrikosokdanahatsa, ituk nipamykysokonaha.

Iwaze Peduru:<CM>— O mypehatsa katsa ahumo mykurẽtsa tsimykaranaha. Nabytykareze tu tsimytarenaha. Hawa tsimyzihikik zeka ahaparik tsipizinaha harakykbyihi ahaparik tazi, estuba ikia bo, estuba Moises bo, iwaze usta Erias bo iwa — niy.<CM>
Nipamykysokoze atsoko haramwe zihiza bijo satata haramwe zihiza naikny Deus yksoho ziwabynaha. Atahi ispe niy:<CM>— Atakta katse babata ihumo ka kakurẽta hỹ. Iharere tsiwabytoktonaha! — niy.<CM>
Zinymyrykynahatsa anaharere ziwabynahaze sipybyrẽtsa niyziknaha. Sipybyrẽtsa wytyk bo inarahanaha.
Sesus sibo zumuze isty tuzu tuzu niy.<CM>— Kyiktaha! Ahapyby byihu ja! — niy.<CM>
Bijo bo iktsa niahaze Sesus bo zuba nikozonaha.<CM>

Iwaze hara jobonita ekze inasikzonahaze Sesus:<CM>— O jaba tsiknynaha ty ka ja kytsa bo ka soso byitaha. Byi puẽtsik utakta Deus zikpehata kytsa wata mohyrikosokdaze mynahyrizikpoze ana zuba kytsa bo tsimypamykysonaha — niy.<CM>Yhỹ niaha.<CM>

Kyze zinymyrykynahatsa pe:<CM>— Katsaktsa asoho Kiristu Deus zipehata tsimy yhỹ tsimaha. Amy humo asaktsa Moises harere sihyrinymyrytsa tihi: “Tapara Erias myziksizo bykyze zuba Kiristu mozumu”. Amy humo Erias aharaze izumu. Siharere ty mybo tsipiwatawy — niaha.<CM>
— “Wasape” nikaranaha. Tapara Erias mozumuze hatsa ty ezytyk tisapyrẽna mokymyky, atahi kaharaze zizokzikik.
Aba ahape Erias botu izumu kytsa ity batu sinyhy. Sisukyrytsitsa zimyijakaranaha zibezenaha. Utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik iwata sinini my piksukyrikiknaha — niy.<CM>
Kyze zinymyrykynahatsa sihyrinymyrẽtsa niyziknaha. Sesus Erias soho batu tyso, Suão Batista Erias wata isoho nitsaso.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus jypykyhyzytykta zizororowy.<Ts>Iwaze Sesus Peduru, Suão, Tsiaku ahatsa iwa ustsa zinymyrykynahatsa bo ziksizonaha. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa bo zumuzonaha. Iwaze maku estuba Sesus okeryk taekaratsa humo puruk puruk niy.<CM>
— O myhyrinymyrytsa katse humo amypokzitsiukta! Atakta iakmyita sinini mykara izo bo naoktsok inarahaikik pihik bo niwatihi inaharazuzukikik ziknakara, iwatahi tsizororowy.
Atuk zinymyrykynahatsa bo ikzioktyhyryk batu tyzororowy — niy.<CM>

Sesus tihi:<CM>— O katuk tsinymyrykynahatsa ikiahatsa Deus humo batu ahaspirikpo. Kaharere bo batu yhỹ tsimaha. Iwatsa tu ahatuk mynapykyryk Deus zikwy bo iktsa tsimaha kytsa batu isty tsumuẽhĩ iwatahi ahahumo batu kaku. — Iwaze maku pe:<CM>— Pany atse kabo tyzioktyhyk — niy.<CM>Yhỹ niy.<CM>
Tatse Sesus bo zioktyhyrykze Sesus ihyrikoso sapybara pe:<CM>— Nabo pãoty! — niy. Taharere humo ihyrikoso sapybara ziksiwyhik itse nizororo tsakurẽta niyzik.<CM>
Kyze asazubaze zinymyrykynahatsa ipe:<CM>— Amo sa katsa myhumo ihyrikoso sapybara ty batu tyiksiwyhik — niaha.<CM>

<sup>(20-21)</sup> Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Deus humo tsikaeni zuba ahaspirikpo iwatsahi hyrikoso sapybara ba zikponaha. Deus humo puẽtsik ahaspirikpo zeka ihyrikoso sapybara tsimysisukewyhiknaha. Deus humo tsimyspirikpotohinaha zeka amy ty tsimyzapykynaha zeka atsatu ahabo nyny my. Iwa zeka hara jobonita pe. “Nabo pãoty!” tsimaha zeka. Ahaharere humo moparak Deus humo tsimyspirikpotohinahaze batu amy tohi ihokdaha. Tsizubarẽna ahaharere bo hyỹ maha — niy.
<TS1>Sesus tabezewy soho nitsasokozo.<Ts>Kyze Karireja eze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa nisihyrinymyryky:<CM>— Utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik aibani kasukyrytsitsa pikbezenaha.
Pikbezenahaze petok puruze mynahyrizikpo — niy.<CM>Iharere humo sisukatsihikrẽtsa niyziknaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Deus wahoro zubata eze tsinieru zibykyknahatsa bo nyny niy.<Ts>Kyze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa niukurunaha. Kaparanaũ zumunahaze Deus wahoro zubata okyrysaro bykyktsitsa Peduru pe niaha:<CM>— Ahyrinymyrykytsa Deus wahoro zubata okyrysaro ja bykyktsitsa bo nyny my — niaha.<CM>
Yhỹ niy.<CM>Wahoro bo nitsukze Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Simaõ Peduru aty sa kytsa sipehatsa bo okyrysaro ty nyny maha. Situkytsa ja. Bipyritsa ja. Amy soho bo mytsaty tsimykara — niy.<CM>

— O bipyritsa zuba — niy.<CM>— Niwazuba! Sipehatsa tahatukytsa siokyrysaro ty sibo batu nyny maha niy. Iwaze situkytsa okyrysaro ty batu nyny maha. Iwatahi utakta Deus tse babata okyrysaro ba nyny zeky, iwatatu okyrysaro ty sibo nyny my.<CM>

Katsa bykyktsitsa mysoho “O asaktsa Deus harere batu ma maha” nawa batu tyso. Iwaze pihikzotsabyri bo tsimykta! Amyzowy ty pihik bo tu tsimyze taparababa piknu tsimyzezota. Isake ty zokbare tsimyze tsinieru isake eze tsimozikaha, ana ty hi mytsyhyryze Deus wahoro zubata bykyktsitsa bo nyny tsimy — niy. Hyỹ niy. Iwa hỹ niy.<CM>
<TS1>Aty sa myhyrizikwanita Deus tuk niy.<Ts>Iwazebabatu zinymyrykynahatsa Sesus bo zumunaha. Ipe niaha:<CM>— Aty skaraba imyhyrizikwani Deus tyryktsa tuk — niaha.<CM>
Iwaze kyry bo huahua niy. Ibo zumuze situk niriktohoko. Sesus zebyk.<CM>

— O zinymyrykynahatsa kaharere bo wabytoktoktaha! Ikiahatsa kino tawa kyrywa zeka anawahi mozihikik. Jabastsa zotsa pe: “Ma” nikaranaha. Amy ty sizotsa mozihikiknaha atsa tu nikaranaha siharere humo, iwa Deus harere bo hyỹ tsimaha iwaze Deus tyryktsa tsimoziknaha. Iwa ma ahabyizeka Deus tyryktsa ba zikyziknaha — niy.<CM>
— Aty Deus harere bo hyỹ my atahi jabasta wata. Hawa sizotsa jabastsa zipehaka aty tohi Deus myzipehaka atahi Deus tyryktsa tuk myhyrizikwanita mozik — niy.<CM>
— Aty jabasta humo tsimypokzitsiukrẽta, atahi kaharere bo hyỹ my, ihumo kakurẽta. Utakta ihumo kakurẽta Deus kino niwatihi tsakurẽta. Atahi mybarawy bo zikpeha — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Imysapybyiwy mykara ana hi pimoewyze Deus piokzo.<Ts>Jabyitsa kahumo sispirikporẽtsa, aty mysimyiwy zeka iwaze kahumo batu sispirikpo atakta imysapybyita mykara. Harahare ty pisoikaĩnaha iwaze pihik maporik bo tapapykik anaeze moharazukik anatyhi batu sapy my. Atakta jabasta imyitsihikik sinini ykarawy bo pipeha anaeze tawahi mynapykyryk, atahi imysapybyikita babata.

Asaktsa ustsa kytsa mysimyi tsihikiknaha Deus sinini ykarawy bo pipehahik. Kytsa kahumo sispirikporẽtsa batu siakparawy iwaze mysimyi tsihikiknaha. Aty kytsa mysimyi tsihikiknaha atahi Deus sinini ykarawy bo mysipehahik.<CM>

Amy ty atsyhyrype humo imysapybara ty mozihikikze atsyhyrype ty iykzykikty.<CM>Hana bo apyry imysapybara ty tsimoparak tsihikze pão pãobyity apyry ty iykzykikty! Deus tuk tawahi tsimypykyryk zeka atsyhyrype estuba zuba iwaze apyry estuba zuba niwatihi ana kino wasani. Ikiahatsa apyrytsa petoktsa atsyhyrypetsa petoktsa iwaze Deus sinini ykarawy bo papeha zeka ana bo hi wasanibara bo tsipasapy. Anaeze izo napokorok ba zikbe.<CM>

Amy ty imysapybara ty bo iktsa tsimy iwaze tsimyzihikik iktsa iktsabyity. Ahyrizik ty hyrykokik ty. Deus tuk tawahi tsimypykyryk zeka ahyrizik estuba zuba wasani. Ikiahatsa ahyriziktsa petoktsa tsimaha zeka iwaze Deus sinini ykarawy bo papeha zeka ana kino wasanibara bo tsipasapy. Anaeze izo napokorok ba zikbe.<CM>

<TS1>Hozipyrykza nizarata soho nitsasoko.<Ts><sup>(10-11)</sup> — Pykyhytutaha! Jabastsa humo tsipiwabykynaha! Batu tyso. “O asaktsa siharereharẽtsa” tsimaha. Bijoikpe iknyktsa Deus tuk mopykyryknaha Deus ispe: “Jabastsa humo tysipokzitsikinahaktsa” niy. Iwatsahi jabastsa mynasiperykynaha.<CM>— Sesus nisihyrinymyrykyzo. Iwaze hozipyrykzatsa tsihitsa myraratsa humo tsimypokzitsiukrẽta.

— Hozipyrykzatsa tsihitsa, sẽ sizubarẽtsa hozipyrykzatsa my, estuba myzara zeka hawa sa my. Ustsa ty ka arek niy, hara buruk zitahadisahakanaha iwatahi nizarata hapik niukuru. Nizarata piberiki tyberi beri wasani ibo zuk niy.<CM>
Myzikahazoze tsakurẽta niyzik. Ustsaktsa batu zara, iwaze nizarata humo tsakurẽta.<CM>

Iwatahi ahazo bijoikpe ezekta. Jabyitsa estuba ba zikzara — niy. — Deus hozipyrykza tsihitsa wata, aty Deus harere bo yhỹ habyi zeka izarata wata jabastsa hozipyrykzatsa watsa ahazo estuba zuba ba zikzara hozipyrykza nizarata watsa. Kytsa iharere bo hyỹ maha mozihikik — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Atukytsa pasapybyinaha zeka hawa sa tsimy.<Ts>— Kyze Sesus tukta pasapy byizeka ituk tsimypamykysokonaha petok zuba typamykysonahaze imysapybara ty ibo tsipiwatawyky. “Amysapybyi ty tytsaso tsimy” tsimaha. Aharere bo yhỹ my zeka wasani my. Atakta “O uta batu kamysapy my kasapybara ty pimoewy” my. Iwaze ata hi Sesus tukta babata iwatsahi ahakurẽtsa tsimaha.<CM>

Abo batu yhỹ my zeka ustsa Sesus tuktsa atuktsa mysioktyhyryk. Ibo mysapybara soho tsimytsasokozo. Hawa tsimyzeka Deus harere bo hyỹ tsimy. Iharere tihi:<CM>“Maku pisapybyize batu ta zuba zikumu ustsa kytsa aharere piwabynaha. Ustsa kytsa anaharere piwabynaha amy ty wasani zuba mopamykysokonaha iwa ustsa kytsa pokso batu mybarapetu maha.” Iwaze amy ty wasape zuba kytsa motsasonaha — niy.<CM>

— Atakta maku ahaharere bo yhỹ ahabyizeka imysapybara humo ka iwaze Sesus tuktsa ziknapykyknahatsa bo tsimytsasoziunaha. Kyze Sesus tuktsa maku pe: “O ikia amysapybara ty batu moewy” maha. Atakta maku Sesus tuktsa harere bo batu yhỹ my zeka ahaokze ka Sudeutsabyitsa ahasopyk ispirikpobyita tu okyrysaro bykyktsa ahasopyk.<CM>

<TS1>Hawa ahamybetesanikitsa ahasopykwy motsasonaha.<Ts>Iwaze ahape:<CM>— Sesus tuktsa tahasopyk tyhi nikaranaha sisoho “wasani tsimaha zeka” wasani. Deus niwatihi ahaharere wasani my. Ustsa Sesus tuktsa tahasopyk tyhi nikaranaha sisoho “batu imysapy” tsimaha zeka batu imysapy. Deus niwatihi ahaharere soho wasani my — niy.<CM>
— Pahahyrinymyrykyzo mybarawy ezektsa petoktsa zuba amy ty Deus bo myzapykykynaha atsa ty ty mytsaty mykaranaha iwaze Deus kazo siharere piwabytokto amy ty myzapykykynaha atsatu sibo nyny my.
Katuktsa petoktsa harakykbyihi niwatihi mynakypyknaha zeka kahumo simypokzitsirẽtsa, Deus bo myzapykykynahaze uta sipauk baze mynapykyryk — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Usta maku takyrize hawa ja piokzohik.<Ts>Peduru Sesus baze babatu ipe niy:<CM>— O mypehatsa! Usta atukta kabo piksapybyriki zeka hana wa ja piokzohik. Imysapybyita tuze sete mykara zeka nawa ha sa piokzohik — niy.<CM>
— Ba sete humo tsipiokzo tsimynakara. Imysapybara ty watu tsipiokzoikik.<CM>

Kyze Sesus usta soho humo nipamykysoko. Deus tyryktsa soho humo nisihyrinymyry. Hawa kytsa simysapybyikitsa tu nikaranaha sibo mysiokzoikiknahaze tu nisihyrinymyryky. — Kyze ipehakatsa tapetu isopyk:<CM>“Katsumuẽhĩtsitsa hawa sa mykaranaha sibo iktsa my. Sihyriziktsokzawytsa ty pykyhytu maha zeka iktsa myze” niy.
Ana hi pikymyze kytsa tsumuẽhĩtsa estuba ibo zioktyhyryknaha. Atakta okyrysaro tsizubarẽna ziakse, tsizubarẽna hỹ, iwatahi ana hi ziserezo.<CM>

Atakta ipehakatsa bo batu tyserezo batu ziky. Iwaze ipehakatsa kytsa pe:<CM>“Atakta, taoke ty, tahyrytsa ty, iwatsa mysioktyhyryk katsyhyryze piktsumuẽhĩkĩnaha kyze inamy tsizubarẽna zeka okyrysaro humo tyzihuaknaha! Iwaze okyrysaro ty kabo nyny tynaha hawa ziakse zeka piserezo” niy.<CM>
Iwaze atakta ipehakatsa iokeryk taekaratsa humo puruk puruk niy. Ipe niy:<CM>“O kapehakatsa kahumo tsikpokzitsikta! Ahyrizikbarasorokokta aokyrysaro ty ka abo nynyrezo my” niy.<CM>
Iwaze ipehakatsa ana harere ziwabyze imypokzitsi zumu. Atahi: “Okyrysaro ty kabo tysizotyk iwatatu mahani ziky” niy.<CM>
Iwaze maku zoihik. Niparakze usta itukta tsumuẽhĩtsa zihobyk. Atakta okyrysaro tsikaeni zuba ibo zisirezo. Iwaze isoik humo nizobatsik zisoikzyzyky. “Okyrysaro ty kabo tysizotyk kabo nynyty” niy.<CM>
Kyze atakta okyrysaro tsikaeni zuba zisirezo iokeryk taekaratsa humo puruk puruk niy. Atahi:<CM>“Ahyrikbarasorokokta! Aokyrysaro ty abo nyny my” niy.<CM>

“Batu! Abaka kaokyrysaro ty kabo nyny tsimy” niy. Iwaze okyrysarobyita hi sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy bo zioktykyryk. Nyny zikybyikita pe:<CM>“Anaeze tutare. Kaokyrysaro ty kabo nyny tsimyze tu tsimyzoizo” niy.<CM>

Kyze ipehakatsa ustsa tsumuẽhĩtsitsa maku itukta zipehahik sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy bo okyrysaro tsikaeni humo zuba iktsa niahaze tahakyrikinaha. Iwaze sipehakatsa bo niaha. Hawa ja nyny zikybyikita soho ibo nipamykysokonaha.<CM>

Iwaze ipehakatsa tihi:<CM>“Nyny zikybyikita kabo tyzioktyhykta!” niy. Izumuze ipe:<CM>“O ikia iakmyita! Okyrysaro ty nynyhabyita tu mahani iky. Ikspiriktsokda ahuak ty kabo batu nynyrezo. Tsikzapykykze ahuak ty mahani iky. Ikia ja.
Amo sa atukta humo kawata batu amypokzitsiu. Utakta ahumo kamypokzitsiarẽta ikykara iwatahi ikia kino atukta humo amypokzitsiarẽta tsimy ikia batu kawata tsimykara” niy.<CM>

Ipehakatsa ihumo takyriki. Iwatahi kytsa pe “Atakta maku sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy bo tyoktyhyryktaha! Ihuak ty kabo nynyrezo my zeka myzoik anaeze sinini mynakara” niy. Deus ahasapybyitsatu tsikykaranaha pahaokzohik iwaze ikia ustsa kytsa simysapybyikitsa tu nikaranaha tsimysiokzohiknaha niwatihi.<CM>

Iwa Sesus nipamykysoko:<CM>— Kazo bijoikpe eze tu nawa ahasopyk my. Ikiahatsa ahatukytsa simysapybyikitsa tu nikaranaha isty okzo byizeka kazo niwatihi ahamysapybyitsa tu tsikykaranaha batu pahaokzo — Sesus niy. Iwatsahi ustsa kytsa simysapybyikitsa tu nikaranaha tsimysiokzohiknaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus myoke moewy soho humo nisihyrinymyryky.<Ts>Sesus nisihyrinymyrybaze Karireja ekze niparak. Sudeja bo buburu Sorodão inarokota koikny zitsikza.
Kytsa sizubarẽtsa iapik niukurunaha, asaktsa simyitsapyritsa nisizororowyba.<CM>

Kyze wastuhu Pariseutsa ibo zumunaha. Asaktsa Sesus nizokparakanaha Sesus Moises harere bo batu yhỹ ana hi mozihikiknaha iwatsahi piwabytoktokonaha. Kyze ipe niaha:<CM>— Maku taoke moewy zeka Deus harere bo ja yhỹ my — niaha.<CM>
Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Deus harere humo tsahahyrinymyrẽtsa. Taparaka Deus mybarawy nizukni maku wytyk ahatsa nisisukni. Nisisuknize maku wytyk piakse zeka iwahahi Deus mozihikik.
Iwatsahi kytsa tahazotsa bara botu tahasapynaha, tahaoke tuk zuba tahasapynaha. Isukzata batu ata zuba mozuru harapetok mozurukunaha.

Iwatsahi Deus okzeka estuba zubata wata my. Deus tihi petoktsa nisisukni iwatahi batu aty tohi sibo ziky. Batu aty tohi zipyriryky. Ustsa kytsa okeza ziknasipyrirykynaha zeka iwa metutu mykara — niy.<CM>

Kyze Pariseutsa:<CM>— Yhỹ Moises harere ziwatahaka maku taoke perek tsihik zeka tapara atatsa soho papeu humo piwatahaka. Atahi:<CM>“Utakta kaoke perekek abaka ikia batu kaoke tsimy.” Bykyzehu atatsa perekek za niy. Moises iwa niy iwatahi maku taoke zerekek niy — niaha.<CM>

Sesus:<CM>— Batu. Moises ana kino ziwatahaka hawa Deus mozihikik humo batu yhỹ tsikaha. Ikiahatsa tsikauktsĩnaha, hawa Deus mozihikik batu yhỹ tsikaha hawa ha Deus mozihikik mybarawy nizuknize batu ahawabyhy.

Abaka ahape:<CM>Aty taoke pimoewy zeka papeu ty atatsa bo nyny my, papeu tyhi “Utakta kaoke pe: ‘nabo pãoty!’ ” my ana hi batu mysapy my. Atatsa mekta botu zeka iwaze tabarikta perek zeka yhỹ my. Iwaze maku atatsa pe: nabo pãoty wasani za. Aty mektatsa botu tasukza zeka Deus iozeka imysapybyikia ty mykara.<CM>
Iwaze zinymyrynahatsa.<CM>— Aharere bo yhỹ tsimaha zeka tsihokdaharẽna, iwatsahi katsa mysukza byizeka wasani my, katsa zuba tsinapykyryknaha — niaha.<CM>
Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Kytsa kaharere bo yhỹ maha zeka tsihokdaharẽna batu sizuba pinymyrykynaha. Deus hyrikoso zuba kytsa kaharere mysihyrinymyryky.<CM>

Wastuhu kytsa sihyrytsabyitsa humo batu tahasukza niaha nipupurukuknahaze iwa niaha. Ustsa kytsa sihyrytsabyitsa humo kytsa sirikara ezektsa bobokohotsa iwatsahi ba zik tahasukzanaha. Ustsa kytsa Deus tsyhyryze batu tahasukzanaha. Tapara Deus tsumuẽhĩkĩ iwatsahi batu sisukza tsihik. Deus zuba kaharere ty kytsa mysihyrinymyryky. Aty kaharere bo hyỹ my iwaze ba ziksukza wasani mykara. Asaktsa kaharere tsihokdaharẽna zeka iwatsahi tahasukzanaha wasani mykara naha niwatihi — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus jabyitsa aha niy.<Ts>Kyze wastuhu kytsa tahahyrytsa Sesus bo nisioktyhyryknaha.<CM>— O Sesus myhyrytsa humo paik tsimyzeka mykurẽtsa. Deus bo sitsyhyryze tsimypamykyso zeka tisapyrẽna my — niaha. Batu ibo zuk niaha. Sesus tuk zinymyrykatsa sisakparẽtsa sizotsa nisibetsakaknaha.<CM>— O nabo tsiksizonahaktsa! — nikaranaha.<CM>

Sesus ana humo ziwabyze takyriki.<CM>Sesus:<CM>— O batu “Nabo tsiksizonahaktsa!” batu tahaktsa! Jabyitsa uta kabo tynasioktyhyryknahaktsa! Deus tyryktsa jabyitsa watsa. Jabyitsa kino: yhỹ sisopyk. Jabyitsa watsa zeka, Deus pe: yhỹ tsimaha. Deus pe: yhỹ ahabyi zeka ityryktsabyitsa tu — niy.<CM>
Sesus sihyrytsa nisibykyk sihumo paik niy. Sipokzi Deus pe:<CM>— O sihyrytsa tysipokzitsikikta kazo! — niy.<CM>
<TS1>Tsinamyrẽta Sesus bo zumu.<Ts>Iwaze mykyryburukta Sesus pauk baze rikto, ipe niy:<CM>— Myhyrinymyrykytsa. Hawa sa mykara iwatahi mohyrikosokdaze uta Deus tuk kawahi mynapykyryk — niy.<CM>
Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Hawa amy ty tisapyrẽna soho tsikzapykyky. Deus zuba tsimysapyrẽta. Deus tuk awahi tsizasapy tsihikik zeka iharere bo hyỹ tsimykara, Moises hyrinymyrywy bo yhỹ tsimykara — niy.<CM>
— Moises hyrinymyrywy bo yhỹ mynakara — niy.<CM>Sesus tihi: — Ba zibezenaha. Mektsa okeza ba ziksipyriryknaha. Usta namy ty hyryk hyryk byitaha. Kytsa soho ba zikspihikbataka.
Azotsa humo awatu ty atukytsa tysipokzitsiki. Aotutsa pauktsitsa humo tynasipokzi tsihikik awata tynasipokzitsiki! — niy.<CM>
— Uta jabasize tu aharere humo wasani ziknakara. Amo tohi my, usta harere bo yhỹ — mykyryburukta niy.<CM>

— Tsimysapyrẽta tsimyzihikik zeka anamy ty nynybaik anamy ty okyrysaro humo huak ty! Iwaze aokyrysaro ty sinamybyitsa bo nynybaik tsimy iwaze anamy hi bijoikpe eze tu tsimy. Anamy hi mynapykyryk ikia Deus tuk tsimynapykyryk. Bykyze Pany! Kapikta tynao — niy.<CM>
Ana harere ziwabyze tisukatsihikrẽta niyzik. Tsinamyrẽta hi tanamy pokzi tsiwy tuk batu yhỹ niy iwatahi batu iaku. Sesus pauk baze tatu niparak.<CM>

Iwaze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa pe niy:<CM>— Sinamynikitsa humo ka Deus tyryktsa moziknaha tsihokdaharẽna. Asaktsa tahanamy bo zuba mytsaty mykaranaha, iwatsahi Deus harere bo hyỹ maha humo tsihokdaharẽna. Katukta babata mozik tsihokdaharẽna.
Tsihokdaharẽna sirara kamero inarokota mysukwowowy ispioke buruk mytsuk. Uta ahape tsinamyrẽta Deus harere bo hyỹ mynakara iwaze katukta babata mozik ana hi abazuba tsihokdaharẽna — niy.<CM>

Zinymyrykynahatsa ana ziwabykynahaze sipybyrẽtsa. Sinamyrẽtsa Deus bo yhỹ aha byizeka batu aty tohi iharere bo yhỹ my.<CM>— Batu aty tohi Deus bo yhỹ mynakara itukbabata za. Batu aty tohi Deus bo myzioktyhyryk ja — mytsaty ahabyi nikaranaha.<CM>
Sesus:<CM>— Kytsa asazubaze Deus harere bo hyỹ ana kino batu zikaha. Deus tuk batu amy tohi ihokdaha. Ba hawa tohi zikzukninaha, atahi kytsa mysitsumuẽhĩ iwatsahi iharere bo hyỹ maha.<CM>
Kyze Peduru tihi:<CM>— Katsa mynamy tserekbaiknaha ikia tuk tsimyzurukunaha. Hawa Deus mymysapywyky — niy.<CM>

Kaharere wasani my. Wabytoktotahaktsa!<CM>— Hawa Deus pahasapywyky ahabo motsaso. Utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik mybarawy bo mynasikzoze kytsa mysipeha, ikiahatsa katuk ahadyhywytsa bete modyhydyhynaha. Sizubarẽtsa katuk mysipehakanaha mybarawy ezytyk eze Isareu siparakbahatsa dose mysipehaka ikiahatsa tsiktsumuẽhĩnaha — niy.<CM>

— Aty tawahoro perek zeka katukta mozik, atakta Deus wasaniha humo tispirikporẽta babata. Atahi abaka sẽ sizubarẽtsa wahoro ty nyny mykara. Iwata aty tazikeditsa myserekek zeka tatukytsa, taje, tazo, tahyrytsa iwatsa kapokzi myserekba zeka katukta babata mozik. Ustsa zikeditsa watsa nyny my. Aty tatsuhuk perekek zeka kapokzi katukta babata mozik usta ty itsuhuk ty nyny my. Deus baze tawahi mynapykyryk. Isapyhaty ibo nyny my.<CM>

Sinamyrẽtsa tihi:<CM>“O katsaktsa myhyrizikwanitsa Deus tyryktsa tuk tsimaha” mytsaty ahabyi mykaranaha. Batu. Sinamybyitsa tihi:<CM>“O katsaktsa myhyrizikwybyitsa zuba tsimaha” mytsaty ahabyi mykaranaha. Asahi myhyrizikwanitsa Deus tyryktsa tuk maha — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Hawa duabohotsa pariktsitsa sitsumuẽhĩtsa humo nikara.<Ts>Sesus usa soho nipamykysokozo. Hawa Deus isapyha ty ityryktsa bo nyny my ana soho humo nisihyrinymyry. Atahi:<CM>— Miwa botu maku duabohotsa tsihitsa kytsa bo niy.
Iwaze kytsa pe:<CM>“Duabohotsa sukpesapy humo tahaktsa! Kyze haramwe punubaze ihuak ty okyrysaro ty ahabo nyny my” niy. Yhỹ niaha. Iwaze duabohotsa bo niaha.<CM>
Nazotoktokoze ustsa kytsa bo asahi niriktohokonaha zuba. Ispe niy:
“Duabohotsa sukpesapy humo tahaktsa! Haramwe punubaze ihuak ty okyrysaro ty ahabo nyny my” niy. Yhỹ niaha. Iwaze duabohotsa bo niaha.<CM>
Iwaze niparak. Duabohotsa tsihitsa tokbaha astatu niy. Tykboze astatu niy. Ustsa kytsa duabohotsa sukpesapy humo nikaranaha.<CM>
Nubaze niparakzo. Kytsa zihobyk asaktsa niriktohokonaha zuba. Ispe niy: “Amo skaraba tsimyriktoriktohokonaha zuba” niy.<CM>

“Batu aty tohi mype ‘Katsyhyryze sukpesapy humo tsimaha’ iwatsahi tsipiperykynaha zuba” niaha. Tsihitsa ispe niy: “Duabohotsa sukpesapywy humo tahaktsa!” niy. Yhỹ niaha. Iwaze duabohotsa bo niaha.<CM>

Haramwe zunubakaze duabohotsa tsihitsa itsumuẽhĩtsa huahua niy. Ipe: “Kytsa duabohotsa sukpesapy humo mykaranahatsa bo huahua tykta! Ihuak ty okyrysaro ty sibo nyny tsimy. Tapara asaktsa kytsa nubaze izumunaha. ‘Asahi tapara siokyrysaro ty sibo nyny tsimy’ ” niy. Hyỹ niy.<CM>
Iwaze asaktsa kytsa nubaze zuba duabohotsa bo zumunaha, sitsumuẽhĩtsa bo zukzuk niaha. Estuba estuba zuba ihuak ty okyrysaro ty sibo nyny niy.

Taparaktsa kytsa asaktsa zokorobyituze sisukpesapy humo nikaranaha tahapetu zuba nikaranaha: “Duabohotsa tsihitsa okyrysaro ty puẽtsik mybo nyny my” mytsaty ahabyitsa nikaranaha. Zumunahaze estuba zuruze okyrysaro ty ihuak ty sibo nyny niy.
Siokyrysaro ziaksenaha. Iwaze tsihitsa soho zisapybyrikinaha. Asa tihi:<CM>

“Asaktsa kytsa nubaze zuba duabohotsa bo zumunaha tsikaeni zuba sukpesapy humo nikaranaha. Katsaktsa zokorobyitu sisukpesapy humo tsikykaranaha, haramwe buruk tu sisukpesapy humo tsikykaranaha. Okyrysaro ty sibo nyny tsiky atsa tu myokyrysaro my” niaha.<CM>

Tsihitsa estuba maku pe:<CM>“Katukta wabyty! Uta ahaty batu spihikbata, zokorobyituze aokyrysaro soho iktsaso, yhỹ tsiky atsatu nyny my. Anaharere estuba estuba ziwaby. Iwatahi tsiksapybyikize batu mysapy my.
Abaka aokyrysaro tsiakse awahoro bo tsiksikta! Uta tatihikta siapiktsa bo okyrysaro pinyny tsihikik aokyrysaro atsatu my.

Amy ty kaokyrysaro tuk mozihikik ana ty hi mykara wasani my. Kahumo ahazokdiharẽtsa iwatatu kamysapyrẽta” niy. Uta sizubarẽtsa bo okyrysaro ty nyny my. Kytsa nubaze zumunaha okyrysaro estuba zuruze ihuak ty sibo nyny my. Deus tsimysapyrẽta isapyha ty kytsa bo nyny my. Isapyhaty ahabo nyny my tytsumuẽhĩ habyita humo — anahi Sesus nisihyrinymyry.<CM>

Iwa Sesus nipamykyso Deus tyryktsa soho. Tapara Sesus:<CM>— Aty sa kytsa katyryktsa tuk myokzeka “O asaktsa simyhyrizikwanitsa maha” mytsaty ahabyitsa mykaranaha. Sinamybyitsa maha. Aty sa kytsa tihi “O sinamybyitsa maha” simyhyrizikwanitsa maha — niy.<CM>Iwaze tasoho ty nitsasoko. Sesus abazubata myze wastuhu ituktsa itsyhyryze tarabaja mynakaranaha batu simyhyrizikwabyitsa maha. Ustsa ituktsa itsyhyryze tarabaja tsikaeni zuba, sihyrizikwanitsa maha. Hawa mozihikik ihuak ty sibo nyny my.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus tabezewy soho tahyrizikpowy naha soho humo nitsasokozo.<Ts>Kyze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa Serusarẽhe bo niukurunaha. Niukurunahaze asa zuba nipamykysokonaha.

Sesus:<CM>— Abaka Serusarẽhe bo tsimykurunaha. Anaeze utakta Deus zikpehata hi ahawata ikyzik taparaktsa Deus wahoro zubata ziknapamykysonahatsa ustsa asaktsa Deus harere ziwatahakanahatsa sibo hi pikoktyhyryknaha, asahi:<CM>“O atakta tybeze” maha. Iwa kasoho motsasonaha.<CM>
Bipyritsa bo pikoktyhyryknaha, asaktsa pikmyijakanaha. Pikikinaha. Iharapatawyhyta bete pikyriziknaha iwa pikbezenaha. Iwaze petok puruze Deus hi myzihyrizikpowy — niy.<CM>
<TS1>Tsiaku Suão ahatsa je Sesus bo nizapykykynaha.<Ts>Kyze Sebedeu oke tahyrytsa tuk Sesus bo zumukunaha. Atatsa tasopyk ty hi iokeryk taekaratsa humo puruk puruk niy.
Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Amo. Atatsa:<CM>“Ikia aparakbaha abazubakta tsimozikze kahyrytsa abaze dyhy maha. Estuba apanuryk taba dyhy my. Usta apawazo taba dyhy my ana hi mozihikik” — niy.<CM>

Sesus Tsiaku itsy Suão kino niwatihi ispe:<CM>— Amy ty tsimyzapykykynaha batu ahahyrinymyry. Sinini mykara. Ikiahatsa ja. Kawata sinini tsimykaranaha ja. Pikbezenahaze ikiahatsa ja. Kawata pahabezenaha zeka ana kino ahapunihiku ja — niy. Yhỹ niaha.<CM>

— Kawata sinini tsimaha. Aty kabaze dyhy my batu tyso ziky. Aty kapanuryk taba aty kapawazo taba dyhy dyhy maha ana kino ba ziktsaso. Deus zuba ana hi motsaso atahi mysiwatawy asaktsa kabaze dyhy dyhy maha — niy.<CM>
Ustsa zinymyrykynahatsa des ana hi ziwabynahaze taokanikinaha. Tsiaku itsy Suão sihumo niwatihi sisakparẽtsa.

Iwaze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa nisihuahua. Izumubanahaze ispe niy:<CM>— Bipyritsa pehatsa asaktsa Deus humo batu sispirikpo kytsa mysipehakanaha ziknakaranaha, siharere pokso kytsa hyỹ ziknakaranaha ana humo ahahyrinymyrẽtsa.
Ikiahatsa ahatuk batu. Aty mypehatsa ahatuk mozihikik atakta sizubarẽtsa mysitsumuẽhĩ tsihikik.
Aty myhyrizikwanita ahatuk mozihikik, atakta ahatsyhyryze tarabaja mykara.<CM>
Ikiahatsa iwa tsimyzurukunahaze kawata tsimoziknaha. Utakta Deus zikpehata mybarawy bo iknasik ahawata ikyzikze kytsa bo mysitsumuẽhĩ, iwaze aparakbaha Deus tuk tahawahi mynapykyryknaha — niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus sihyrizikubyitsa nisizororowy.<Ts>Kyze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa tuk Serikoho bo nitururuknahaze kytsa sizubarẽtsa iapik niukurunaha.<CM>

Kytsa petoktsa sihyrizikubyitsa ske eze nidyhydyhykynaha. Kytsa ske buruk nikurunahaze ispe:<CM>— Mybo ja mybo ja — nikaranaha. Sihyrizikubyitsa Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa ziharamukunaha ana ziwabynaha. Iwaze asaktsa huahua niaha:<CM>— O Deus zipehata mywata Dawi tsekokata myhumo tymypokzitsiukta! Tymytsumuẽhĩkĩkta! — niaha.<CM>

Kytsa sizubarẽtsa piharamunaha iwatsahi nisibetsakaknaha.<CM>— O akso byitaha! — nikaranaha. Sisakparẽtsa nikaranaha. Asahi opykani hua huazo niaha.<CM>— O Deus zipehata Dawi tsekokata myhumo tymypokzitsiukta! Tymytsumuẽhĩkta! — niaha.<CM>
Sesus pyk niy:<CM>— Panytaha! Uta kabo tynasioktyhyknaha — niy.
Ibo zumunahaze ispe:<CM>— Amy skaraba, hawa sa my — niy.<CM>— O batu iktsa zikaha. Myhyriziktsa tysizororowykta! — niaha.<CM>
Sesus sihumo tsimypokzitsiarẽta nisihyriziktsa tsika tsikaka. Atsoko iktsazo niaha. Nihyriziktsa zororonahaze iapik niukurunaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Serusarẽhe bo zumu.<Ts>Kyze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa Serusarẽhe ske buruk niukurunaha. Betepake bo zumunaha. Betepake Oriwereja hwitsa hara baze my. Zumubahaninahaze Sesus tatuktsa petoktsa nisipeha:<CM>
— Nabo sihudikhudikwy bo pãotaha! kytsa. Atsaezubaha eze tsimypupunahaze pikuza tsipipiktumunaha. Itse tuk. Atatsahi isoikãihikta tsipinynaha. Satsukyktaha! Kabo tyzioktyhyknaha.<CM>
Ustsa kytsa:<CM>“Hawa sa tsimykaranaha” maha zeka. “Mypehakatsa tihi mype niy pikuza kabo tyzioktyhyknaha” tsimaha!<CM>“Bykyze ahabo tasirezonaha” tsimahakta — niy.<CM>
Tubabatu Deus sohotsa isoho botu ziwataha aba zuba atsatu iwaze ana harere wasani niy. Atahi:<CI>
<PI>— O Serusarẽhe ezektsa ahapehatsa ahabo mozumu.<CI><PI2>Batu imyi pikuza tsibik bete modyhyky<CI><PI0>Deus sohotsa niy.<CM>
Kyze zinymyrykynahatsa petoktsa Sesus harere bo yhỹ niaha. Atsatu niaha.
Pikuza ty itse ahatsa ty Sesus bo nisioktyhyryknaha. Tasuk pikuza bete zizozokonaha. Sesus ibete tadyhyhyk.
Wastuhu kytsa tahasuk ske buruk zipaparakanaha. Tsarakzapatsa jerukbara eze ty bokok bokok ky niaha ana humo kino niwatihi ske buruk nisipaparakanaha.

Kytsa Sesus iharaze kazi nikaranaha, kytsa iapiktsa niwatihi sizubarẽtsa kazi nikaranaha:<CI><PI>— Sesus Deus tuk niapykyryk.<CI><PI2>Atahi Deus zipehata mywata niyzik Dawi tsekokata.<CI><PI>Deus bazekta tu mybo inasik.<CI><PI2>Atakta tsimysapyrẽta. O mykurẽtsa — nikaranaha.<CM>
Sesus Serusarẽhe bo nitsukze kytsa paikpa mytsaty nikaranaha. Serusarẽhe ezektsa tihi:<CM>— Amakata skaraba — nikaranaha.<CM>
— Atakta Sesus, Deus sohokotsa Nasare ezekta. Nasare Karireja eze.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Deus wahoro zubata bo zumu.<Ts>Kyze Sesus Deus wahoro zubata bo nitsuk. Anaeze kytsa myraratsa ty hozipyrykzatsa ziknasihuakaknaha okyrysaro humo. Asaktsa nisiksiwykik. Atsoko nitururuknaha. Asaktsa okyrysaro ty nisihuakaknaha hwibihitsa nisitsihipetotokorok. Asaktsa amytudutsa nisihuakaknaha sidyhywytsa nisitsihipetotokbaik.
Deus harere tihi:<CM>— “Kawahoro zubata anaeze kytsa sizubarẽtsa kabo mynapamykysonaha” ziwataha. Ikiahatsaktsa kawahoro sitsyhyryboarẽtsa parik waka tsimyzahuaknaha — niy.<CM>
Kyze sihyrizikubyitsa, simyiziubyitsa kino niwatihi ibo Deus wahoro zubata isturupeze bo zumunaha. Nisizororowybaik.

Amy ty kytsa batu zikaha kytsa nisizororo Sesus tazikwy humo nikara. Tisapyrẽna niy. Deus wahoro zubata isturupeze eze ihyrytsa Sesus soho ziwabynahaze kazi nikaranaha:<CM>— O Deus zipehata mywata tsikyzik Dawi tsekoka ikia humo mykurẽtsa. Ikia tsamysapyrẽta hỹ — nikaranaha. Ana humo hi taparaktsa Deus wahoro zubata ziknapamykysonahatsa, ustsa asaktsa Deus harere ziwatahakanahatsa iwatsa tahakyrikinaha.

Sisakparẽtsa Sesus pe niaha:<CM>— Siharere tsiwaby sa — niaha. Yhỹ niy. Deus harere papeu humo tsinymyrynaha ja. Ziwataha Deus tihi:<CM>— O Deus ikia ibykyhytsa jabastsa kino niwatihi hawa abo mosakibazikiknaha nisihyrinymyry. Asahi abo mosakibazikiknaha, sinymyryrẽtsa hỹ — niy. Iwa papeu humo ziwataha.<CM>
Kyze Sesus Serusarẽhe ekze niparak. Betanija bo niy anaeze zuru.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus umaha soho humo nisihyrinymyrykyzo.<Ts>Zokorobyitu Sesus Serusarẽhe bo niukuru irapa zumu.

Ẽrykani ske sak betekta ta bo hwi umaha bo iktsa niy. Umaha bo zumuze ihara bo ziberiki batu iharaka isaro zuba. Kyze Sesus umaha pe niy:<CM>— Abaka ba ziktaharazokta ba aty tohi ahara zezukzo — niy. Iwaze babata. Atsoko niharapara.
Zinymyrykynahatsa ana bo nikozonahaze sipybyrẽtsa:<CM>— Hawa hãta sa atsoko niharapara — niaha.<CM>

— Kaharere wasani isoho mytsatyziu tsimaha. Deus humo tsispirikponaha zeka umahaty ikahaty ikiahatsa kino atsawatu tsimaha. Tsimytsasonaha zeka:<CM>“Deus hawa ha ty abo myzapyky mykara ja. Batu kanyhy”. Iwa mytsaty tsimaha zeka hawa ha ty ibo tsimyzapykykynaha batu yhỹ my. Deus humo tsimyspirikpobabanaha zeka hara jobonita pe:<CM>“Hara pe nabo pãoty buburuzuba bo tsimy” tsimaha. Nawa tihi my ahaharere humo.<CM>
Ikiahatsa Deus bo tsimyzapykykynahaze atsatu ahabo my. Deus ihumo tsimyspirikpobabanahaze hawa ha ty ibo tsimozapykykynaha atsatu ahabo nyny mykara — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Aty harere humo Sesus kytsa mysipeha. Aty sa ipe: — Natihiktsa — my.<Ts>Kyze Sesus Deus wahoro zubata bo nitsukzo. Anaeze kytsa nisihyrinymyrykyze taparaktsa Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokonahatsa, Sudeutsa taparaktsa kapitãotsa kino niwatihi ibo zumunaha. Ipe niaha:<CM>— Aty skaraba ape “Katsa tysihyrinymyrykykta, katsyhyryze tarabajatykta!” — niaha.<CM>
Sesus tihi:<CM>— Uta kino niwatihi kaharere estuba zuba ahabo my. Kaharere bo tsimaha zeka kyzeka aty sa kape “Katsyhyryze tarabajatykta!” my ahabo mykara — niy.

Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Aty sa Suão Batista pe:<CM>“Kytsa tysiharasusukta! niy. Deus ja. Kytsa ja. Aty skaraba ana hyriziktsokzawy zipeha kabo tsimytsasonaha.” — niy.<CM>Kyze kytsa asa zuba nipamykysohokonaha asaktsa:<CM>— Hawa sa tsimaha. Deus ipe: “tysiharasusukta” niy tsimaha zeka kyze atahi mype. “Amy skaraba ihumo batu ahaspirikpo my”.

Katsaktsa “Kytsa ipe tysiharasusukta!” niaha tsimaha zeka kytsa sizubarẽtsa Suão Deus sohokotsa humo sispirikporẽtsa iwatsahi kytsa pokso batu tyso kytsa ipe “tysiharasusukta!” batu tyso tsimaha — nikaranaha.<CM>
Iwaze ipe niaha:<CM>— Aharere Suão Batista soho batu myhyrinymyryhy — niaha.<CM>Sesus:<CM>— Uta niwatihi, ahaharere “aty sa kape tarabajatykta! my” batu tyso — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Maku hyrytsa petoktsa.<Ts>Kyze Sesus myhyrizikwanitsa, taparaktsa upykyhytsa niwatihi ispe:<CM>— Kasoho humo ka hawa sa mytsaty tsimaha — niy.<CM>— Kyze maku ihyrytsa petoktsa. Taparakta pe: “Katse duabohotsa bokta sukpesapy humo tsimykta! Abaka nabo tsimykta!” niy.<CM>
“Batu yhỹ” niy. Abahi tapetu isopyk:<CM>“Kazo harere bo hyỹ my duabohotsa sukpesapy bo my” niy. Niparak duabohotsa sukpesapy humo nikara.<CM>
Kyze maku iykpykbita pe “Katse duabohotsa bokta sukpesapy humo tsimykta! Abaka nabo tsimykta!” niy.<CM>Yhỹ niy.<CM>Atakta batu pão.<CM>

Aty sa tazo harere bo hyỹ niy — Sesus niy.<CM>— O taparakta — niaha. Iwaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Kaharere wasani my, kytsa okyrysaro ty zibykyknahatsa. Homa pehakatsa tsyhyryze sibykyhynahatsa, wytykyryk simysapybyiza kino niwatihi Deus tyryktsa moziknaha ikiahatsa batu.<CM>

Suão Batista Sudeutsa bo zumu. Hawa ha ty Deus okzeka wasani zahawatawy. Ihumo batu ahaspirikpo, okyrysaro zibykyryknahatsa wytykyryk simysapybyiza kino niwatihi asahi iharere humo sispirikporẽtsa. Iwatsahi Deus humo sispirikporẽtsa ana bo iktsa tsikaha. Iwatuze ikiahatsa ahamysapybyitsa tu tsikykaranaha batu tymoewy Suão harere bo batu ma zikaha — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Duabohotsa perytsitsa sisopyksapybyikitsa soho humo nitsasoko.<Ts>Usta soho ahabo mopamykysoko wabytaha!<CM>— Kyze maku waratok tsihitsa duabohotsa nisiparikik. Duabohotsa istsarãkatsa. Duabohotsa okarawytsa tyokehyry okehyry haraharetsa zozo nikara. Anaeze sokarawy eze harahare hoke duabohotsa tsikpypyrikwy nizukninaha. Kyze jobo isparik ziziki anaeze ziperykykta duabohotsa nisisukparaka. Iwaze wastuhu kytsa pe:<CM>“Utakta meky botu mokuru. Ikiahatsa duabohotsa tysiperykynahaktsa! Wihara huak ty ahabo nyny my okyrysaro ty tsapukte ahabo nyny my, katsyhyryze sukpesapy” niy.<CM>Yhỹ niaha. Iwaze niparak, mekybotu itasapy.<CM>
Duabohotsa nijakuknahaze tsihitsa tatsumuẽhĩtsa siperytsitsa bo zipehe. Okyrysaro humo nisipeha.
Kyze itsumuẽhĩtsa siperytsitsa bo zumuze nizokbatsinaha. Tapara itsumuẽhĩtsa nitsakikinaha, ustakta zibezehiknaha, usta haraharezipyryktsa ty nisipaparakanaha. Iwa itsumuẽhĩtsa sisopyk niaha.<CM>
Kyze duabohotsa tsihitsa ustsa tsumuẽhĩtsa puẽtsik nisipeha siperytsitsa bo niy. Hawa tapara sitsumuẽhĩtsa sisopyk atsatu ustsa bo niaha. Nisisapybyrikinaha.
Bykyze duabohotsa tsihitsa tatse babata sibo zipeha. Tapetu nikara: “Katse humo ka wasani sisopyk maha ihumo batu ipyriryk. Ata humo ka ba zikaha” niy.

Kyze siperytsitsa itse bo iktsa niahaze asa zuba nipamykysokonaha.<CM>“Iktsa tsimaha! Atakta duabohotsa tsihitsa tse niaha. Ata kino izo mohyrikosokdaze tazo namy piakse, duabohotsa tsihitsa mozik. Tabezehikta kytsa! Tabeze zeka katsa hi duabohotsa tahaksenaha. Iwaze duabohotsa tsihitsitsa tsimoziknaha” niaha.<CM>
Kyze nizokbatsinaha. Waratok bara bo zioktyhyryknaha anaeze zibezenaha.<CM>
Kyze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>“Duabohotsa tsihitsa myziksizoze amo skaraba siperytsitsa bo mykara. Hawa sa mytsaty tsimaha” — niy.<CM>

— O asaktsa iperytsitsa sisapybyinahatsa tu mysiba. Duabohotsa mektsa bo tu nyny my asahi tsapukte okyrysaro wihara humo ibo nyny maha hawa ha ty wasani maha — niaha. Iwa Sesus ustsa perytsitsa soho ty nipamykysoko.<CM>

— Deus harere papeu humo tsinymyrykynaha sa — Sesus niy. Deus harere papeu humo iwataha:<CI><PI>— Kytsa wahoro nizuknikinahaze nitsasonaha,<CI><PI2>“O ana harahare batu isapy my” iwaze nipapyknaha.<CI><PI>Ata hi harahare abazubata niyzik.<CI><PI2>Ana humo hi harahare tisapyrẽna humo<CI><PI>ustsa harahareziktsa buruhuwa babatu niaha — niy.<CM>
<sup>(43-44)</sup> Iwaze ahape:<CM>— Ikiahatsa Deus tyryktsa batu tsimoziknaha, asaktsa Deus harere bo hyỹ maha asahi Deus tyryktsa moziknaha — niy.

Kyze simyhyrizikwanitsa Deus wahoro zubata eze ziknapamykysonahatsa, Pariseutsa kino niwatihi Sesus soho ziwabynahaze sihyrinymyrẽtsa. Sisoho nitsasoko ana ty hi zinymyrykynaha iwatsahi tahakyrikinaha. — Katsaktsa siperytsitsa batu sapy watsa — mytsaty nikaranaha. Iwatsahi tahakyrikinaha.

Sesus tsipa humo pioktyhyry tsihikiknaha batu zikaha kytsa sizubarẽtsa pokso. Kytsa Sesus soho — Atakta Deus sohokotsa humo ka tsimaha — niaha. Iwaze simyhyrizikwanitsa kytsa pokso Sesus batu zioktyhyryk.<CM>
<TS1>Myikaha abazuba soho humo nisihyrinymyryky.<Ts>Kyze Sesus usa soho nipamykysokozo Deus tyryktsa soho humo nisihyrinymyryky.<CM>
Hawa Deus kytsa nisiwatawy nisihyrinymyryky. Batu sizuba hyỹ maha ana humo hi nisihyrinymyryky.<CM>Kyze maku myhyrizikwanita tse myikaha inakymy. Itse isukzata humo myikaha zihitsa niy.
Kyze zihitsa sitsumuẽhĩtsitsa nisipeha — Kytsa tynasakzo! “Pany aidy botu nakymy ispe tsimaha” — niy. Iwaze nitururuknaha. Sakzohotsa batu yhỹ niaha.
Iwaze zihitsa ustsa mektsatu nasakzorenaha. Iharere tihi: — Panytaha! katse tasukzata pimyikahaka. Pikuzatsa botu nisibanaha — niy. Anaharere sitsumuẽhĩtsitsa nasiakzokonaha.<CM>
Anaharere bo batu mytsatyziu niaha. Estuba tatsuhuk bo niparak. Usta tanamy bo niparak.
Iwaze ustsa sitsasohotsitsa nisisukbatsinaha nisikikinaha. Nisibaiknaha.
Iwatahi zihitsa takyriki sodadutsa pe:<CM>— Kytsa sakzohotsa botaha niy! Asaktsa katsumuẽhĩtsa nisibanahatsa tysibaiknaktsa! Sihudikhudikwy tsipokiknahaktsa! — niy. Iwa hỹ.
Kyze zihitsa sitsasohokotsitsa hua huazo niy ispe niy:<CM>— Katse myikaha inakymy sakzohotsa batu sisopyksapy maha.
Abaka ske buruktaha! Nabo kytsa sihobykwy watu tysipehanaha niy. Ikiahatsa tihi:<CM>“Panytaha! Abazubata tse myikaha sukzawy humo panytaha! tsimaha” niy. Yhỹ niaha. Nasiakzobanaha.<CM>

Iwaze sitsasohokotsitsa ske buruk maha. Sizubarẽtsa zihobyknaha. Simysapyrẽtsa pe simysapybyitsa pe asa kino niwatihi imyikaha bo mysioktyhyryk. Hamyikaha bo inahareknaha sizubarẽtsa hỹ. — Anaeze tahadisahakanaha.

Kyze abazubata zihitsa inatsukze sakzohotsa bo iktsa niy. Iwa kytsa abazubata zihitsa sisuk humo nisisukba iwa sisopyk. Estuba maku batu, tasuk tyzuba korobyk niy, zihitsa suk humo batu hỹ niy. Iwaze zihitsa maku pe, atakta tasuk tyzuba korobyk.<CM>
