Wytykyryk sihyryzahaza sisukatsihikrẽza mopykyknaha. Sijeza niwatihi tahabykytsa tuk sisukatsihikrẽza mopykyknaha.
Deus bo tsimypamykysonaha:<CM>“O myzo nawa puruze batu hyritsik tyziwõ tsimyzapykykynaha.” tsimaha.
Amakata okoroze sinini tsimykaranaha. Deus mybarawy nizuknize kytsa anawa haty batu sinini niaha. Ba sininizo zikaha. Iwaze zuba nawa sinini tsimykaranaha.<CM>
Deus siwatahawyhytsa pokzi nawa puruze mopykba. Batu mybara bo ka siwatahawyhytsa pokzi. Nawa puruze mopyk byizeka batu aty tohi ispitutsa ba zikapykyryknaha.<CM>
— Aty ahabo motsaso zeka “Iktsa tahaktsa! tabo Deus zipehata Kiristu maha” iharere bo ka ba hỹ tsimaha. Usta ahape my zeka “Nabo Kiristu my” iharere bo ka ba hỹ tsimaha.<CM>

Kytsa sizubarẽtsa mozumunaha. Asa tihi: “Utakta Kiristu maha” pahaspihikbatakanaha. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa siharere bo yhỹ mykaranaha. Mymyspihikbataikiknaha zuba. Mektsa tu mozumukunahaze “Katsaktsa Deus sohokotsa maha” mybarapetu mykaranaha. Siwatahawytsa mykaranaha ana humo hi kytsa mysiakmyiwykynaha. Deus watawyhytsitsa mysiakmyiwy tsihikiknaha.<CM>
Iwatsahi pykyhytutaha! Hawa mykara naha botu ahabo motsasoko iwatsahi ahaspirikpohuja!<CM>

<TS1>Uta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik myziksizo.<Ts>— Bykyze sininikarawy mopykze nanabyi iwatawy natakaha. Bijoikpe eze iwatahawy natakaha. Haramwe mybe. Miwa zuba byzoje kino niwatihi myhyrizikubyri.<CM>
Byrisoiktsa mynatsunaha. Bijoikpe iknyktsa mytydydykyryknaha.<CM>

Iwaze uta mynasikze kabo tsimykozonaha. Utahi Deus zikpehata ahawata bijo oktsĩ tuk kabo tsimykozonaha. Mynasikze kamysapyrẽta, kahyrizikporẽta, kazikwyrẽta ana kino kytsa sizubarẽtsa mytsaty mykaranaha.<CM>
Iwaze bijoikpe iknyktsitsa Deus tsumuẽhĩtsitsa mysipeha. Siwatawyhytsa bo mysipeha. Nanabyitaba siwatahawyhytsa mynakypyknaha — niy.<CM>Iwa Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa bo nipamykysoko.<CM>

<TS1>Umaha soho humo nisiwatawyky.<Ts>— Umaha bo iktsa tsimykaranahaze ana soho hawa pahawatawy tsinymyrykynaha. Umaha taypykze tapara isarapatsa ytsik humo tasaropok iwaze moziponaha. Iwaze ikiahatsa:<CM>“O hyritsik abaka jokboha” tsimykaranaha. Ahahyrinymyrẽtsa.
Iwaha hi sinini tsimykaranahaze utakta mynasik ana humo hi ahahyrinymyrẽtsa hỹ. Wasani my.<CM>
Kaharere ka wasani hỹ wabytaha! Abaktsa kytsa amy ty motsasoko pinymyrynaha. Kaharere atsatu mykara iwaze zuba mohyrikosokdanaha.<CM>
Bijoikpe mybarawy ahaka mohokda. Kaharere ka ba zikokza. Ba nawa taize ja zikaha ba zikpyk. Kaharere ka tawahi mynapykyk — iwa Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa nisihyrinymyryky.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus myziksizo naha humo batu aty tohi ihyrinymyry.<Ts>Sesus:<CM>— Utakta myziksizoze batu aty tohi nawa taize ja ziky ba sihyrinymyryhy. Batu aty tohi sinini ykarawy bo myze ba ihyrinymyryhy. Bijoikpe iknyktsa Deus tsumuẽhĩtsitsa kino ba sihyrinymyryhy. Uta kino Deus tse babata tu batu kahyrinymyryhy. Kazo zuba tsihyrinymyrẽta.<CM>
Iwatsahi tsimyziperykynaha! Tykymybanahaktsa!
Hana wa okoroze sinini okarawy mozumuze maku wata. Atahi meky botu moparak. Taparaka tatsumuẽhĩtsitsa sihyriziktsokdawy humo mysipehare. Hokbowy perytsitsa nisipeha. Iwaze tawahoro ekze niparak.<CM>
Iwa tsiperynahaktsa! Zihitsa myziksizo naha humo batu sihyrinymyry. Kyze punubaze ja myziksi, unopokte ja myziksi, nakokze ja myziksi, zokorobyi tu ja myziksi. Batu ahahyrinymyry.
Atsoko myziksizo zeka batu ahazika. Iwatsahi tsiperykynahaktsa!
Hawa ha ty ahape mykara atsatu sizubarẽtsa pe mykara. Ahazikara byihuja tsiperykynahaktsa! kytsa — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus zibeze tsihikiknaha.<Ts>Aba petok puru nahawaze simyikaha asiba inakymy. Simyikaha atsikara ipytowybara ty zikziokoknaha. Simyikaha eze Deus taparaktsa nisitsumuẽhĩ bo mytsaty ziknakaranaha. Iwaze Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa, siwatahatsitsa kino niwatihi Sesus ziberikinaha. Sisukyrytsitsa niaha. Itsipa humo zioktyhyryk tsihikiknaha. Tabezehikta nikaranaha tsahi kytsa papatu asahi Sesus zibeze tsihikiknaha.
Asa hi:<CM>— Mymyikaha eze tuze ba Sesus zibezenaha. Kytsa pokso mypybyrẽtsa. Tsipibezenaha zeka iwazeka kytsa mymybabanaha. Sizubarẽtsa niakmyinaha — nikaranaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Betanija hudikhudikwy eze.<Ts>Sesus Betanija bo zumu. Tapara Simaõ iakõrõrõta zizororowyta wahoro bo nitsuk. Tahadisahakanahaze wytyk inatsuk. Atatsa jokmorẽnikia ty taoporosuk arabastero harahare hi, tsipokzitsarẽna niy. Narado inarokoha tsipokzitsarẽna ty. Atatsa Sesus boze taoporosuk zisoiktsakik iwaze jokmorẽnikia ty iharek bete ziharasusuku. Iwa nikara.<CM>
Iwatsahi wastuhu sakzohotsa ihumo tahakyrikinaha. Tahasakparekenaha:<CM>— Amy skaraba jokmorẽnikia ty piharasusuku — asa zuba nipamykysonaha.<CM>

— Jokmorẽnikia tsipokzitsiarẽna. Katsaktsa jokmorẽnikia ty tahuak zeka okyrysaro tsizubarẽna humo, 300 denario tsimaha. Iwaze okyrysaro ty sinamybyitsa bo nyny tsimaha zeka wasani tsimaha — nikaranaha. Iwa zibetsakaknaha.<CM>
— Awatu betsak betsak byitaha! — Sesus niy. — Atatsa hiba wasani mykara. Amy humo sa tsipesuka tsihikiknaha nikara kahumo tisapyrẽna niy.
Sinamybyitsa ahapauk baze mopykyryknaha zeka sibo nyny tsimaha zeka wasani my. Utakta kabo ka ba nyny zikaha.
Abanurytu pikbezenaha. Mohyrikosokda. Atatsa kanury ziharasusuku iwaze kaytyk bo mokymy — niy.<CM>

— Kaharere tsiwabyziunahaktsa! Nanabyitaba Deus wasania ty myzubaha bo motsasokonaha. Hawa atatsa niy ana ty hi nanabyitaba inapamykysokonaha niwatihi iwaze sizubarẽtsa atatsa soho bo mytsaty mykaranaha — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sudas Sesus sukyrytsitsa bo niy.<Ts>Kyze Sudas Iskariotses isopyksapybyita tu mykara. Sesus tuk zinymyrykyta iwatatu Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysonahatsa taparaktsa bo zumu ispe niy:<CM>— O Sesus batu ahakparawy. Tsipibeze tsihikiknaha. Uta pahatsumuẽhĩ. Bykyze uta hi ibo pahaoktyhyryk — niy.

Iwaha ziwabynahatsa sakurẽtsa nikaranaha:<CM>— O ikia tsimymytsumuẽhĩ zeka okyrysaro ty abo nyny tsimaha — niaha.<CM>— Yhỹ. Bykyzehuta! Aba ibo piksizo — niy.<CM>— Yhỹ. Tsipiksi za — niaha. Iwaze Sudas mytsaty nikara:<CM>— Hawa sa Sesus bo mysioktyhyryk. Yhỹ ja. Bykyzehu — niy. Ziperyky zuba.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa myikaha ty tadisahaka.<Ts>Kyze Sudeutsa simyikaha mozumuze zinymyrykynahatsa ipe niaha:<CM>— O Sesus hana eze sa mymyikaha tsipikymynaha Hana eze sa ikia tuk karaneru tsani tazobaze tsimymydisahanaha — niaha. Amyikaha bo pororo ziknakaranaha Deus Sudeutsa taparaktsa ziknasitsumuẽhĩkĩnahatsa bo mytsaty ziknakaranaha.<CM>

Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— O nabo tsimykaranaha kytsa. Ikiahatsa petoktsa nabo Serusarẽhe hudikhudikwy bo tsimytururuknaha! Anaeze maku pihik suk pebykykyrykta bo tsimykozonaha. Pihik myzizokota hapikta! Wahoro bo mytsukze, iapik tu paku paku tsimaha!
Tsihitsa pe:<CM>O myhyrinymyrytsa “Hana eze sa amyikaha eze mydisahawy ty katuktsa tuk hauk tsimaha my” tsimahakta! Iwaze ahape my “Iktsatahaktsa”!<CM>
Wahoro jobo tsimydokoknaha, pokpedawy bo pykyhytu mydyhydyhywy bo iktsa tsimaha. Mysapy eze inakymy. Anaeze mymyikaha katsa mybo inakymynahaktsa! — niy. Yhỹ niaha.<CM>
Iwaze zinymyrykynahatsa petoktsa nitururuknaha. Serusarẽhe bo izumunahaze hawa ty Sesus botu nitsasoko, atsatu niaha. Nawa tahamyikaha zikymynaha karaneru tsani zizobanahaze.<CM>
Kyze zunubaze Sesus ustsa zinymyrykynahatsa tuk zumukunaha, mytsyhyrytsa watsa tuk izumuku.

<sup>(18-21)</sup> Tahadisahakanahaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Ahatuk estuba:<CM>“O Sesus kaharereziuwybyita my. Abaka batu Sesus tukta my” mykara.<CM>Iwatahi kasukyrytsitsa tuk kabo tynasioktyhyk. O bykyze atakta sinini myze zikpuruk byizeka wasani my. Imyspihikbatanikita tu Deus zipehata mywata humo sinini mykara. Ana hi Deus botu ziwataha — niy. Iwaha ziwabynahatsa hi batu siaku:<CM>— O aty skaraba. Uta kino batu. Uta kino batu. — nikaranaha. Sihyrinymyrybyitsa tu sibo Sudas soho nitsasoko. Sesus:<CM>— Estuba katuk tamihi ty sok mytahi imyspihikbatanikita — niy.

<TS1>Hawa Sesus tuktsa ihumo mytsaty mykaranaha.<Ts>Kyze tahadisahabanahaze Sesus atsikara waha ty okok niy. Deus pe niy:<CM>— Ikia humo ka mykurẽtsa — niy. Atsikara zitsatsakak. Sibo zibiakak:<CM>— O hauk tahaktsa, naty hauk tsimahaze, kanury soho bo mytsaty tsimaha, “Sesus mysapyzeky nihyrikosokda” tsimaha — niy. Iwa niaha.<CM>
Iwaze taoporosuk duabohotsa tsik ty okokzo niy. Deus pe niy:<CM>— Ikia humo ka mykurẽtsa — niy. Iwaze sibo nyny niy.<CM>
— O naka kaspu waha. Tsimyzikukunahaze kaspu soho bo mytsaty tynakaranaha. Kaspu mopuku iwaze Deus ahasoho pe my “Sisopyksapybyitsa humo mysiokzo iwatsahi kaokzeka meky watu moziknaha” Deus mykara.
Uta aba zuba duabohotsa tsik piku. Pikuzoze kazo tuk kytsa tuk asaktsa kaharere bo hyỹ mykaranaha, katyryktsa moziknaha — niy. Iwaze sizubarẽtsa duabohotsa tsik zikukunaha.<CM>
Kyze unata eze Deus bo nisakibazikiknaha:<CM>— O Deus ikia tsamysapyrẽta — nikaranaha. Kyze Deus bo nisakibazibanahaze ape bo ziponaha. Hara jobonita bo Oriwereja inarokota bo niukurunaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Peduru nizukpeheze — O batu Sesus kanyhy tsimy — niy.<Ts>Nakpo zukzuk niahaze. Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Utakta aba pikbezenaha. Pikbezenahaze, batu aty tohi katuk mopykyryk. Kasukyrytsitsa pokso tsimywaknaha. Deus harere botu ziwataha “Hozipyrykzatsa irarakata pibezenaha iwaze myraratsa mowakbaiknaha” iwa Deus harere botu kahumo ziwataha. Utakta hozipyrykzatsa irarakata wata.
Mynahyrizikpoze ahaharaze Karireja eze pahapery — niy.<CM>
Peduru:<CM>— O batu. Ustsa kytsa ja. Utakta batu. Uta kino atuktu mopykyryk.<CM>

<sup>(30-31)</sup> Sesus:<CM>— O Peduru aba unata eze harakykbyi kasoho “Batu Sesus kanyhy” tsimyspihikbata, kokuaro petok nipuze iwa tsimyspihikbata. Iwa ba zabezenaha — niy.<CM>— O niwazubakta. Abaze pikbezenaha zeka:<CM>“Utakta Sesus tukta” my — niy.<CM>Kytsa sizubarẽtsa kino niwatihi nikaranaha.

<TS1>Sesus zinymyrykynahatsa tuk Oriwerejatsa hara bo Kesemani inarokota niukurunaha.<Ts>Kyze Sesus zinymyrykynahatsa tuk hara bo nidoknaha anaeze isaziktsa koso Kesemani inarokoha bo hi nisioktyhyryk. Ispe niy:<CM>— Anaeze dyhy dyhytahaktsa! Uta kino Deus bo mopamykyso — niy.<CM>

Ustsa kytsa dyhy dyhy niahaze, Peduru, Suão, Tsiaku, ahatsahi nisioktyhyryk. Sesus mytsaty nikara:<CM>— O bykyze pikbezenaha — nikara. Paikpa mytsaty nikara. Iakubyita niapykyryk. Tisukatsihikrẽta nikara.
Tatuktsa pe niy:<CM>— O batu kaku. Pikbezenaha kasukatsihikrẽta mykara. Uta kino Deus bo mopamykysoko. Tykara eze tu tutarenaha. Tsikperynaha ahaõtutsabyihu ja — niy.<CM>
Iwaze siharapu bo niparak. Niparakze, wytyk bo okmymy niy, Deus bo nipamykysoko.

Iwaze Deus pe niy:<CM>— O kasukyrytsitsa kabo mozumukunaha, kazo. Tsiktsumuẽhĩkta iwaze sinini mykara. Uta tu zeka ba mohyrikosokda tsihikik. Ikia:<CM>“Tyhyrikosokdakta!” tsimy zeka, mohyrikosokda — niy.<CM>
Iwaze tatuktsa Peduru, Tsiaku Suão ahatsa bo iziksizo. Zurubaiknaha.<CM>— O tsikurubaik naha sa Peduru. Katuk batu tsiperyky ja hini hini byitahaktsa! — niy.<CM>

— Deus bo typamykysonahaktsa! Deus zikwy humo zuba ikiahatsa ahapunihikrẽtsa tsimoziknaha niy iwatsahi Satanas harere bo batu yhỹ tsimaha. Hawa ha ty wasani tsipitsihikiknaha ikiahatsa batu ahapunihik iwatsahi Deus bo typamykysonahaktsa — Sesus niy.<CM>
Atsa botu ziksizoze, Deus bo nipamykysokozo:<CM>— O “Tyhyrikosokdakta!” tsimy zeka, kazo, utakta mohyrikosokda — niy.
Sibo ziksizoze, zurubaikzonaha. Tahaõtutsaspyk nikaranaha. Sesus:<CM>— O tsipuruziukunaha zuba — niy. Batu harere zikaha.<CM>

Bykyze Deus bo nipamykysozoze sibo ziksizo.<CM>— O abaze sihi tsikahabyrynaha. Abaka ba zikumunaha. Abaka utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik kasukyrytsitsa bo pikoktyhyryknaha niy. Abahi pikbezenaha.
Kyiktykta! Tupaktsa! Abaka imyspihibatanikita mozumuku. Kasukyrytsitsa kabo tynasioktyhyryk.<CM>

<TS1>Kytsa Sesus tsipa humo zioktyhyryknaha.<Ts>Ana hi nitsasokoze Sudas ibo izumu. Sudas zinymyrykyta tu siharereziubyitsa tuk izumuku. Sesus bo inasioktykyryk. Tanoratsa upepetsa iwatsa tu nasebykyknaha.<CM>

Tapara Sudas ispe niy:<CM>— O Sesus piwatawyze piharapyrykze ahanyhybyitsa tsipinynaha kytsa. Atahi piharapyryk! Iwaze itsipa humo tsioktyhyryknahaktsa! — niy. Taparaktsa Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysonahatsa nisipeha Sesus pioktyhyryknaha, Moises harere hyrinymyrytsa, Sudeutsa taparaktsa kino niwatihi nisipehanaha.<CM>
Iwaze Sudas Sesus bo zuk niy. Sudas:<CM>— O ikzumukta kahyrinymyrytsa — niy.<CM>Iwaze Sesus ziharapyryk.
Kytsa Sesus zioktyhyryknaha.
Ipaukbazekta Sesus tukta tasokorotsapu izibok. Maku spi zizykik. Atahi taparakta maku ziknapamykysokota Deus wahoro zubata eze tsumuẽhĩtsa.
Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Amo skaraba tanoratsa ahaupepetsa iwatsa tsiknasebykyknaha. Awatutaha. Utakta katsyhyryboabyita. Batu kakyri.

Ahatuk zikzuruku. Ikiahatsa tuk Deus wahoro zubata eze zikzahahyrinymyryky. Iwatsa tu batu katsipa humo katy oktyhyryk. Deus harere botu ziwataha itsyhyryboanikita wata katsipa pikoktyhyryknaha. Aba zuba katsipa humo tsipikoktyhyryknaha — niy.<CM>
Iwaze zinymyrykynahatsa niwakbaiknaha. Tahapybyspyk hi niwakbaiknaha. — Iwa zeka mymybabanaha — niaha.<CM>
Itsipa humo zioktyhyryknahaze mykyryburukta Sesus hapik niukuru. Atahi niwakik panu ty irikpidiwyhyta niy.
Nizokbatsinaharẽta tu niwakik. Tazikpidiwy zuba sibaze zereke. Iwatahi isukbyitatu niwakik.<CM>

<TS1>Kytsa Sesus kytsa harerewabytsa bo zioktyhyryk.<Ts>Kyze Sudas tuktsa taparakta ziknapamykysokonahatsa tuk myhyrizikwanikita wahoro Sesus zioktyhyryknaha. Taparaktsa kapitaõtsa watsa Moises harere hyrinymyrytsitsa kino niwatihi anaeze niapykyryknaha. Sizubarẽtsa inakypyknaha.<CM>
Peduru tsipybyrẽta hi ẽrykani iapik inaukuru. Taparakta wahoro sturupe eze nitsukze iwarikspyk sodadutsa baze nidyhyky izo baze niakpyzazaka.

Iwaze taparaktsa Deus wahoro ziknapamykysonahatsitsa. Sudeutsa taparaktsa Moises harere hyrinymyrytsitsa ahatsa inakypyknahaze kytsa harere ziwabynaha. Asahi:<CM>— O kytsa Sesus soho pisapybyrikinaha iwatsahi pibezenaha — anahi mozihikiknaha. Siharere meky watu nitsasokonaha.
Iwaze wastuhu kytsa ispe:<CM>— Sesus harere batu wasani — niaha. Ustsa kytsa batu yhỹ niaha. — O batu imysapy — niaha. Isoho nimyspihikbataikik. Mekywatu nikaranaha.<CM>
Wastuhu niriktotohokonaha.

Asa tihi:<CM>— Katsa iharere tsiwabynaha mype niy:<CM>“Utakta Deus wahoro zubata anahi kytsa nizukninaha myzipyk bykyze petok puruze usta wahoro mozokni anahi kytsa batu mozokninaha” Sesus niy, anahi tsiwabynaha — mybarapetu nikaranaha.<CM>
Ana ty hi metutu nitsasokonaha iwatsahi Kajapas:<CM>— O mybarapetu mykaranaha — niy.
Nitsasobanahaze, Kajapas sibaze tarikto:<CM>— Amo Sesus. Kytsa asoho nitsasokonaha anahi tsiwaby. Hawa sa tsimy — niy.<CM>
Sesus batu harere. Iwaze Kajapas ipe niyzo:<CM>— Hawa sa Sesus. Ikiahi ja Deus zapehata. Ikiahi ja Deus bo tsimymyoktykta. Ikiahi ja Deus tse — niy.<CM>

— Yhỹ. Deus zuba izikwyrẽnikita. Utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik. Ibaze tuze mybarawy ezektsa bo zikpeha. Iwaze mybarawy bo mynasik. Aba uta Deus bo mydo. Ibaze tuze bijoikpe eze tu, kabo iktsa tsimaha iwaze mybarawy bo bijo satata tuk mynasikzo — niy.<CM>
Kajapas ana harere ziwabyze tsiakyriukrẽta niyzik. Iwaze isuk zisykik nawa ziwatawy takyriki.<CM>
— O soso byitaha ba ziktsasonaha! — niy.<CM>— “Utakta Deus wata” my. Iharere botu tsiwabynaha hawa sa ity tsimaha — niy.<CM>— Tabezehikta! Tabezehikta! — nikaranaha.<CM>
Iziakbatakanahatsa zehezozokoknaha, zihyrizikwarakanahaze iwaze hi nitsakikinaha.<CM>— Aty skaraba zaki — nikaranaha, zimyijakanaha. Isperytsitsa kino niwatihi nitsakikinaha.<CM>
<TS1>Peduru Sesusta batu kanyhy nikara.<Ts>Peduru wahoro peze nidyhyky. Anaeze myhyrizikwanita tsumuẽhĩtsata ziharamuze.
Atatsa Peduru izo bo niakpyzazaka ibo zinytokto, iwaze ipe niy:<CM>— O ikia tihi sa Sesus Nasare ezekta tukta tsiky — niy.<CM>
— O batu. Batu kanyhy — nikara. Iharere batu kawabyhy zispihikbata. Iwaze hokbowy baze zumuzoze kokuaro nipo.<CM>
Atatsa ibo nikozoze ustsa kytsa pe niy:<CM>— O ata tihi kok Sesus tuk zinymyrykyta — niy. Iwa niyzoze:<CM>
— O batu — mybarapetu nikara. Bykyze ustsa:<CM>— O atatsa nitsasoze wasape hi niaha. Ikia tihiba Sesus tukta ikia kino niwatihi Karireja ezekta — niaha.<CM>
Peduru tsipybyrẽta nikara:<CM>— Batu kanyhy. Aty skaraba Sesus batu itukta Deus kaharere piwabyky iwatahi kaharere wasani byizeka Deus piksininiwyky Sesus batu kanyhy — Peduru nikara.<CM>

Iwa nitsasokoze kokuaro nipozo. Peduru mytsaty niy. Tapara Sesus kape niy:<CM>— O kokuaro ipozoze: Harakykbyri kasoho “Batu Sesus kanyhy” tsimykara — niy.<CM>Peduru ana bo hi mytsaty niyze nipuziuku.<CM>

<TS1>Kytsa Sesus Piratus bo zioktyhyryk.<Ts>Kyze zokorobyitu Sudeutsa Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysonahaktsa, taparaktsa kapitãotsa Moises harere nisihyrinymyrykynahatsitsa iwatsa sizubarẽtsa inakypyknahaze hawa Sesus tabeze nipamykysokonaha iwaze Sesus Piratus bo zioktykyryknaha. Taparaka zipawarakanaha. Iwaze Piratus bo zipehahik. Piratus abazubata iharere awatu zeka Sudeutsa ba zikbezenaha.
Piratus ipe niy:<CM>— O Sesus ikia ja Sudeutsa pehatsa — niy.<CM>— Ikia tihi tsiktsaso — Sesus niy.<CM>
Taparaktsa Deus wahoro zubata eze ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa:<CM>— O Piratus Sesus batu imysapy — nikaranaha. Isoho humo zispihikbatakanaha.
Piratus ipezo niy:<CM>— Amo Sesus. Asoho humo zasapybyrikinaha. Tsiwaby sa. Iwa wasani sa — niy.<CM>
Batu harere tasoho humo batu harere. Iwatahi Piratus ata zuba tatu mytsaty nikara — O amo skaraba! Batu harere ziky, batu taokani! — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus tabezewy.<Ts>Tapara tahamyikaha eze Piratus maku estuba inazukenaha. Maku sizubarẽtsa sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy eze tu. Situkta estuba nizuke.<CM>— O aty sa myzuke — nikara. Atakta! Serusarẽhe ezektsa nikaranaha, yhỹ nikara. Iwa simyikaha eze ziknakara.<CM>
Serusarẽhe eze kytsa niwatsoronaha iwaze sakyriukrẽtsa nitsahurukiknaha. Estuba sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy eze Bahabas inarokota niy. Kytsa bakatsa niy. Ana humo hi nitsahurukiknaha.
Iwaze kytsa sizubarẽtsa Piratus bo zumunaha. — O aty sa tsimyzuke — nikaranaha.
Piratus:<CM>— O ikiahatsa istsa. Hawa sa tsimyzihikiknaha. Sudeutsa pehatsa za myzuke Sesusta tsimysapyrẽta! — niy.<CM>
Taparaktsa Sudeutsa tahakyrikinaha sizokdirẽtsa nikaranaha iwatsahi Sesus ibo zioktyhyryknaha ana humo hi Piratus tsihyrinymyrẽta.<CM>
— O batu. Mektatukta! Bahabas zakta! — niaha. Iwa taparaktsa botu kytsa sizubarẽtsa pe niy:<CM>— Ikiahatsa tsimaha zeka Bahabas. Bahabas tsimaha — niaha.
Piratus ispe niy:<CM>— Sesus ja. Hawa sa Sesus ty my. Atakta Sudeutsa pehatsa — niy.<CM>
Myzubaha tihi:<CM>— Tabezehikta! Iharapatawyhyta humo tabezehikta! — nikaranaha.<CM>
Piratus:<CM>— Amo humo sa. Amy ty sa imysapybara ty nikara — niy.<CM>— Tabezehikta! Tabezehikta! — opykani kazi nikaranaha.<CM>

Iwaze Piratus: Yhỹ niy. Nawa myzubaha humo zuba harereziu tsihik mykara iwatahi Bahabas nizukehik. Sesus ta batu. Sodadutsa pe:<CM>— O tytsakinahaktsa! Iharapatawyhyta humo tsibezehiknahaktsa! — niy. De.<CM>
<TS1>Sodadutsa Sesus zimyijakanaha. Inisaha ty zitsorikiknaha.<Ts>Kyze sodadutsa Sesus tahawahoro isturupeze bo zioktyhyryknaha. Sodadutsa zumubanahaze Sesus zispihikbatakanaha.<CM>

Isuk tsaririta ty zisuknaha.<CM>— O abaka Sudeutsa pehatsa abazubata! tsimy — zimyijakanaha. Inisaha ty zitsorikiknaha. Tubabatu nawa sisopyk. Sipehatsa mekywa tu sitsorik. Sesus ty ka inisaha ty zitsorikiknaha iwaze zimyijakanaha.<CM>
— O ikia Sudeutsa pehakatsa — zispihikbatakanaha.<CM>
Hwi ty ziharektotokoknaha, zihwezozokoknaha. Tahaekaratsa humo iokeryk puruk puruk nikaranaha, sipehatsa okeryk watsa iwa zisininiwyky.
Zispihikbatabanahaze isuk tsaririta zibokiknaha. Isuk babata ty tysukzonaha. Iwaze ape bo zioktykyryknaha. Iharapatawyhyta humo tabeze nikaranaha.<CM>

<TS1>Iharapatawyhyta humo zihyrizikiknaha.<Ts>Ske buruk niukurunahaze, Simaõ nasihobyk. Atakta Sireni ezekta tatsuhuk ikny ziksikirita. Ihyrytsa Aresãdere Hupus ahatsa inarokotsa. Iwaze sodadutsa ipe niaha:<CM>— O iharapatawyhyta tsebykta! — niaha.
Niytahi zebykyk! Iharekpokoso sapy inarokoha bo Sesus zioktyhyryknaha, iharekpokoso Sudeutsa harere kokota maha.
Anabo izumunahaze aty tohi mymyitsapyri hwi ty Sesus bo nyny niy:<CM>— Tsõty — niy.<CM>Batu niy. Batu tsõ.<CM>

Isuk zibokiknahaze ziaksenaha. Sodadutsa harahare zipyryktsa ty nisipaparakanaha aty ja Sesus suk piakse nikaranaha tsahi ziwatawykynaha. Iharapatawyhyta humo zihyrizikiknaha, itsyhyry soikare eze zaza nikaranaha zihyrizikiknaha, ipyrytsa ty kino niwatihi zaza nikaranaha zihyrizikiknaha. Iwaze nepykbanahaze iharapatawyhyta ziriktonaha.<CM>
Haramwe nazotoktoze iharapatawyhyta humo zihyrizikiknaha. Zikymynahaze, iharapatawyhyta zitseknahaze ziriktonahaze.
Iharapu bete iwatahaha ty. <font size=-1>SUDEUTSA PEHATSA </font> ziwatahakanaha iwa isoho humo hazi nikaranaha.<CM>
<sup>(27-28)</sup> Kytsa petoktsa sitsyhyryboanikitsa ituk nisibanaha siharapatawyhytsa humo nisibanaha estuba ipanuryk taba usta ipawazo taba ahatsa niaha.

Kytsa nabaze ske buruk niukurunahatsa, zisapybyrikinaha hazi nikaranaha:<CM>— O iktsatahaktsa. Taparaka zuba:<CM>“Deus wahoro zubata myokarabaka bykyze petok puruze usta pizi tsikykara” abaka tsimyraka — nikaranaha.
— Ikia tsahyrinymyrẽta babata zeka, pany, tynasikta! Ba zikumuzakta — zimyijakanaha.<CM>

<sup>(31-32)</sup> Deus wahoro zubata eze ziknapamykysokonahatsa Moises harere nisihyrinymyrykynahatsitsa kino niwatihi nitsasokonaha:<CM>— O ustsa kytsa nisitsumuẽhĩkĩ, atahi ba ziktsumuẽhĩ! Iwatatu sa pomoza Deus zipeha zeka “tynasikty”, Sudeutsa pehatsa babata zeka, iharapatawyhyta ekze “tynasikta!” Iwa tsimy zeka:<CM>“O Sesus hi Deus zipehata babata” tsimaha — mybarapetu nikaranaha.<CM>Asaktsa ituk nihyrikosokdanahatsa asa kino niwatihi zisapybyrikinaha.
<TS1>Sesus nihyrikosokda.<Ts>Iwaze tokbaha eze miwa niyzik. Batu haramweke. Sudeja eze miwa niyzik.
Iharakibikia bo zoize inaharamwezo. Iwaze Sesus:— Eri Eri rama sabaktani — ana taharere baba ty huahua niy. Anatyhi myharere. — O Deus amo skaraba uta zuba tsipikarikik — niy.
Ustsa kytsa niaha:<CM>— Amo sa Erias bo hua mykara — niaha.<CM>

Tohi duabohotsa tsik ipokzitsibara ty itsãrãkbara ty morosuk eze ky ty tsikok niy. Anabo mazori waha ty duabohotsa tsik bo sokyk niy. Zipypyikik. Mazori waha ty hwi humo korokbykyk jobo Sesus sak bo tsyk tsyk nikara. Atakta:<CM>— Byriktsa, tozeka ja Erias mozumu, iharapatawyhyta humo piakse. Tsiperynahaktsa! — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus kakazo niyze zumuza.<CM>
Iwaze panu ipamaba ipokpedawy Deus wahoro zubata eze ky nisykbaik. Tsapukte buruk nisyk bijoikny tu niaksykyryk.<CM>
Sodadutsa pehakatsa tuk nikozoko iharapatawyhyta okeryk niriktohoko Sesus iwa nihyrikosokdaze atahi:<CM>— O atahi Deus tse babata — niy.<CM>
Wastuhu wytykyryk nizokparakanaha. Maria Madarena, ustatsa Maria, Sarome, usiza, iwa ẽryk tu nizokparakanaha. Maria hyrytsa Sose Tsiaku jypykyhyzytykta iwatsa niy.<CM>
Asiza hi Karireja ikny ihumo simypokzitsiarẽza nikaranaha. Usiza wytykyryk iapik Serusarẽhe bo zikzumukunaha za kino niwatihi asiza nizokparakanaha: Zitsumuẽhĩekiknaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sose Sesus ziytykyk.<Ts><sup>(42-43)</sup> Iwaze byiri Sudeutsa nawa zurunahaze tahabyrykywy, nubaze Sose Arimeteja ezekta Piratus bo izumu. Sose taparakta Deus wahoro zubata eze tu niy. Tsimysapyrẽta atahi kytsa Deus harere bo hyỹ mykaranaha ana hi mozihikik. Batu pyby iwaze Piratus pe niy. — O Sesus nury ty kabokta. Uta inury ty iytyk bo mytsahok — niy.

<sup>(44-45)</sup> Piratus:<CM>— Botu sa pỹ niy — niy. Iwaze sodadutsa pehatsa pe niy:<CM>— Sesus sa botu nihyrikosokda — niy. Sodadutsa pehatsa ipe niy:<CM>— Yhỹ pỹ — niy. Iwaze Piratus:<CM>— Ikia za tsinazipik Sose. Iwaze tsimytsahok — niy.
Sose panu kõpara niy inury inazipikze, panu ty ziakwaraka. Tubabatu harahare yktaba nitsahoknaha, abaka anabo hi nitsahok. Harahare bobyri ihok bo zikorore. Zihokbore.<CM>
Maria Madarena, ustatsa Maria, ahaza nizokparakanaha. Iytyk zinyrenaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus inahyrizikpo.<Ts><sup>(1-2)</sup> Kyze petok zuruze, sabado nipykze miwa botu Maria Madarena ustatsa Maria, Tsiaku je Sarome, iwahaza iytyk bo niukurunaha. Jokmorẽnikia bykyhy tuk. Niukurunaha zahi inury iokmorẽnikia ty taharasusu nikaranaha. Anahi Sudeutsa sopykwy ty ziknakaranaha.
— O aty sa harahare mytsyhyryze pipetu nikaranaha. Titsakyrikrẽta hỹ. Aty skaraba mytsyhyryze sukyhy my — nikaranaha.<CM>
Iwaze nitururuknaha anabo zumunahaze iktsa niaha, mektatu botu harahare bobyri zipetuhikare.
Iwaze iytyk bo nipupunaha. Anaeze maku bo nikozonaha, atahi nidyhyky. Tisukbarazarẽta. Iwaze ipokso nipybybaiknaha.

Maku hi:<CM>— Kapokso ahapyby byihujaktsa. Sesus Nasare ezekta atahi kytsa iharapatawyhyta humo zihyrizikiknaha tsipiberikinaha ana hi pinymyry. Atahi inahyrizikpo. Nabo isapy bo iktsataha. Isapy zuba niapykyk.

Aidytahaktsa Peduru ustsa zinymyrykynahatsa bo tynakozorẽnahaktsa! ispe tsimaha:<CM>“O Sesus inahyrizikpo. Aba tsipinynaha Karireja bo ahaharaze mykara hawa botu ahape niy” tsimaha — bijoikpe iknykta niy.<CM>
Iwaze wytykyryk puke puke niaha. Nitururukuknaha. Sipybyrẽza ziksikirinaha. Nitydydykyknahaza tu paikpa mytsaty nikaranaha. Sipybyrẽza nikaranaha iwazahi kytsa bo batu tyso.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Maria Madarena bo natakaha.<Ts>Sesus domiko eze inahyrizikpo tapara Maria atatsa Makadã ezektatsa bo inatakaha. Tapara Sesus hyrikoso sapybara sete nisiksiwyhikze. Atatsa ihumo nizororobabatatsa.
Iwaze atatsa itukytsa bo niy. Ipokzi nipuziukunaha. Atatsa hi:<CM>— O myhyrinymyrytsa inahyrizikpo. Ispituzo my. Ikza inyzo — niy.<CM>
Itukytsa iharere humo paze! nikaranaha. Inahyrizikpo naha humo ma ahabyitsa nikaranaha. Atatsa mybarapetu ja mykara iwa mytsaty nikaranaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa petoktsa ahatsa bo natakaha.<Ts>Kyze Sesus meky watu itahyrity niyzik petoktsa ahatsa bo natakaha. Niukurunahaze amytsĩ eze natakaha. Situk nipamykysoko.
Iwatsahi ziksizonaha. Itukytsa bo nipamykysokonaha. Siharere humo kino niwatihi itukytsa ma ahabyitsa nikaranaha. Asaktsa mybarapetu ja mykaranaha iwa mytsaty nikaranaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa bo natakaha.<Ts>Iwaze zinymyrykynahatsa õse ahatsa bo natakaha. Tahadisahakanahaze sibo natakaha. Ma zikahabyitsa nisibetsakak. Tahaoktsĩnahatsa humo nisibetsakak. Ustsa harere humo inahyrizikpo naha soho batu ma ahabyitsa iwatahi nisibetsakak.
Iwaze ispe niy:<CM>— Nanabyitaba tynakaranahaktsa! Sihudikhudikwy taba wasania ty abazubatsa bo tytsasonahaktsa! — niy.

— Aty kaharere bo hyỹ my zeka kahumo tispirikporẽta mozik atahi imysapybara ty myzeka Deus piokzohik. Ata kino piharasuhikze iwatawyhyta katukta my, atahi Deus myzo bo pioktyhyryk. Aty kahumo ispirikpobyi zeka imysapybara ty my zeka ba ziokzo, imysapybara ty nikara ituk tawahi mynapykyryk.
Asaktsa kahumo sispirikporẽtsa Deus zikwy piwatawynaha. Kahumo hyrikosotsa sapybaratsa tysiksiwyhiknaha. Mektsa harere ty mopamykysokonaha.

Pyryhyk ty paik maha zeka ba zikyrikosokdanaha. Tumy tsarawyhyha ty pikunaha zeka ba zikyrikosokdanaha. Simyitsapyritsa tahatsyhyrype ty tsika maha zeka, mysizororowy sakurẽtsa moziknaha — Sesus niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus bijoikpe bo nido.<Ts>Taharere nitsasobaze jobo bijoikpe bo Deus zioktyhyryk. Tazo tuk ipanuryk taba mynadyhyky niy.<CM>

Iwaze itukytsa nitururuknaha. Nanabyitaba Deus wasania ty natsasokonaha. Hawa ha ty kytsa batu zikaha ana ty hi Deus zikwy humo nikaranaha. Iwatsahi kytsa siharere bo hyỹ niahaze Sesus humo sispirikporẽtsa niyziknaha. Sipehakatsa hi nisispirikpoko. Deus zikwy humo ziwatawykynaha, Sesus nisitsumuẽhĩkĩ iwatsahi myzubaha siharere bo hyỹ nikaranahaze Sesus humo sispirikporẽtsa niyziknaha. Niwazuba.<CM>
<TS1>Rukas wasaniha Sesus soho ziwatahaka<Ts>Uta Teopiro bo piwatahaka. Kyze tapara sizubarẽtsa kytsa papeu humo botu ziwatahanaha katsa mybaze hawa tsinynaha ziwatahabanaha.
Tapara zinynahatsa kino mybo nitsasobanaha Deus harere kino niwatihi nitsasobanaha. Ikia tsahyrinymyrẽta botu wasaniha soho niy.
Abaka uta kino tubabatu kahyrinymyrẽta. Iwatahi uta kytsa iksipeha:<CM>— Hawa skaraba niy — iky. Kabo sizubarẽtsa nitsasobanaha. Iwatahi uta ikia bo pykyhytu piwatahaka.
Iwatatu tsipinymyry wasani tsimy. Kytsa ikia bo botu nitsasokonaha wasani hỹ. Tapara mopamykyso Sakarias soho ioke niwatihi.<CM>

<TS1>Suão Batista nipuruk naha soho.<Ts>Kyze Erodes pehatsa Sudeutsa hudikhudikwy eze tuze Sakarias niy. Deus wahoro zubata eze ziknapamykysokota niy. Abias astsabarẽtsa niy Deus wahoro zubata eze nikara. Abias atsatubarẽtsa tsekokatsa ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa niwatihi. Atatsa ioke Arão tsekokatsa ikny niy. Arão niwatihi Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokota. Isabeu inarokotatsa.
Isukzakata zikzuruku harape tuk Deus harere bo hyỹ ziknakaranaha iwatahi Deus isukzakata soho tihi:<CM>— Wasani mynakaranaha — niy. Kytsa isukzakata soho humo wasani nikaranaha.
Batu ihyrytsa ka. Iwatatsahi ibykyhy byitatsa zikzuruku. Ihyrytsa ahabyita tu nitsaikbanaha.<CM>
Kyze Sakarias Deus wahoro zubata bo niy. Anaeze Deus tuk tarabaja nikara. Ziknapamykysokota humo tarabaja nikara. Abias astsabarẽtsa tarabaja nikara.
Tapara ustsa ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa ibo nitsasokonaha:<CM>— Abaka ikiazakta! Ikia hi Deus wahoro zubata bo tsimytsuk. Tsimytsukze anaeze Deus bo jokmorẽnikia ty tyziwezoko — niaha. Hyỹ niy.
Deus wahoro zubata bo nitsuk. Jokmorẽnikia ziwezokoze aparakbahatsa isturupeze Deus bo nipamykysokonaha.<CM>
Niytahi atsoko bijoikpe iknykta Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa ibo inasik. Iwezowy baze jokmorẽnikia niriktohoko.
Sakarias ibo nikozoze ihyrinymyrybyita nikara. Iwatahi ipokso nipyby.
Bijoikpe iknykta Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa ipe niy:<CM>— Apyby byitykta! Ikia tsikzapykykynaha Deus ziwaby. Aba aoke tabykyhy. Atse mopurukze Suão ty tsipinaro niy.
Ikia atse mopurukze akurẽta tsimozik. Kytsa kino niwatihi atse humo sakurẽtsa moziknaha.

Deus okze ka maku myhyrizikwani mozik. Iwatahi duabohotsa tsik ty ka tsõ tsõbyity my, tsõsĩ humo kino niwatihi tsõ tsõ byity. Taje arakokeze tuze Deus ituk mynapykyry. Deus hyrikoso piakse, mopurukze tu Deus hyrikoso ituk mynapykyryk hỹ — niy.<CM>

<sup>(16-17)</sup> — Atse taypykze Sudeutsa Deus bozo mysioktyhyryk. Atse Erias wata mozuruku. Erias Deus hyrikoso tuk zikzuruku. Atahi Deus zikwy ziwatawy. Deus harere ziwatawyky. Atse niwatihi Deus zikwy piwatawyky. Atahi kytsa Deus zipehata weryk pizozikbawy. Izotsa mytsatyziu maha. Sihyrytsa bo mytsaty maha iwatsatu niharapepehakanaha nakokozonaha atse harere humo mykaranaha. Abaka kytsa Deus harere bo hyỹ maha. Iwaze Deus zipehata mozumuze ityryktsa botu piperykynaha — niy.<CM>Iwaze bijoikpe iknykta Sakarias bo itse soho nitsaso.
Niytahi Sakarias ipe niy:<CM>— Iwaze sa kaoke tabykyhy tsimy. Hawa sa aharere baba. Utakta ba iktsaikba kaoke kino niwatihi nitsaikba. Iwatatsatu sa tabykyhy — niy.<CM>
— Utakta Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa Deus tuk mynapykyryk. Utakta kanaro Kabarieu. Deus zikpehata hi abo iknasik. Iwatahi wasania ty mopamykysoko.
Iwatahi ikia wabyziutykta kaharere bo yhỹ ahabyita hi iwatahi tsimyharerebyri. Atse mopurukze tsipaharerezo. Kaharere ka wasaniha — niy.<CM>

Kyze aparakbaha Deus isturupeze ziperykynaha. Sakarias Deus wahoro ekze izoik ziperykynaha. Aparakbaha paikpa iktsa nikaranaha.<CM>— Amy skaraba atahi Deus wahoro eze tu batu aidy puke ziky — nikaranaha.<CM>

Izoize niharerebyri. Sakarias Deus wahoro eze tuze itsotospyk waha zinyhik. Mytsotospyk waha ana hi zinymyrynaha. Bijoikpe iknyktsa bo iktsa niy. Myzubaha okze tu niharerebyri iwatahi tatsyhyrypetsa ty zuba pawyk nikara. Taharek ty zuba zikziwatawyky.<CM>
Iwaze zuba Sakarias tarabaja Deus wahoro zubata eze zepykze tawahoro bo ziksizo.
Taoke zityrykzuwyze tabykyhy. Estuba tsyhyrywa byzoje zetsuze tawahoro eze tu ziknapykyryk. Isabeu tihi:<CM>

— O Deus tsiksapywyky. Kahumo tsimypokzitsiukrẽta. Taparaka kasikpybyrẽtatsa. Kabykyhy byizeka kasikpybyrẽtatsa. Abaka batu. Batu kasikpyby. Iwatatsahi ikbykyhy hỹ. Abaka aparakbaha humo batu kasikpyby. Iwa ikbykyhy tatsatu Deus ziksikpybybyri — Isabeu nikara. Iwatatsahi Sakarias oke tabykyhy. Ibykyhyhuk byitatsa tu tabykyhy niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Kiristu nipuruk naha soho.<Ts>Kyze usta byzoje eze Deus bijoikpe iknykta Maria bo izipeha. Bijoikpe iknykta Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa Maria bo inatakaha Kabarieu inarokota. Deus zipehata. Deus ipe niy:<CM>— Maria pe nawa tykta Kabarieu atatsa Nasare ezektatsa bo — niy.<CM>Hyỹ niy.<CM>

<sup>(27-28)</sup> — Maria ityrykduwyhybyitatsa tu tabykyhy. Ikia atatsa bo wasania ty tsimy — niy. Iwaze byri puẽtsikze Sose atatsa piakse. Sose Dawi tsekoka niy. Iwaze atatsa bo bijoikpe iknykta inasik. Atahi:<CM>— O Deus atuk mynapykyryk — niy.
Tsipybyrẽtatsa iharere pokso nikara. — Hawa ha skaraba — niy.<CM>
— O apyby byityktsa Maria. Deus ahumo papokzitsiki. Ikia tuk mynakara. Aba tsipabykyhy.
Atse mopurukze Sesus ty tsipinaro. Taypykze maku myhyrizikwani mozik.
Aparakbaha isoho humo “Deus tse” maha. Deus tyryktsa tuk mynapykyry ba zikpyk — niy. Deus hi Sesus Sudeutsa pehatsa mozik Dawi wata, ahadiri mypehatsa wata.
Sesus Sako tsekokatsa pehakatsa. Sesus Deus tyryktsa tuk mypehatsa tawahi mynapykyryk.<CM>

<sup>(34-35)</sup> Maria ipe niy:<CM>— Hawa sa katyrykduwyhybyitatsa tu sa pikbykyhy — niy.<CM>— O atyrykduwyhybyitatsa tu tsipabykyhy Deus hyrikoso humo tsipabykyhy. Iwatatsahi atyrykduwyhybyitatsa tu tsipabykyhy niy. Iwatsahi kytsa atse soho humo. “Deus tse” maha — niy.
— Wabyty! Ajetsy Isabeu ibykyhyhuk byitatsa tu abaka tabykyhy nitsaikbatatsa tu tabykyhy hỹ. Tapara kytsa tsasowy “batu ibykyhyhuk” nikaranaha. Abaka tabykyhy tatsa estuba tsyhyry wa byzoje zetsuze.
Aba itse mopuruk. Deus tuk batu amy tohi ihokdaha — niy.<CM>
— O nawa my. Deus pikpehaze hyỹ my. Katyrykduwyhybyitatsa tu katse mopuruk. Ikza hyỹ my — niy.<CM>Niytahi bijoikpe iknykta hokda zuba niy. Batu ity nyzo.<CM>
<TS1>Maria Isabeu bo inakozore.<Ts>Bykyze Maria Isabeu bo harakoso bo atsoko niparak. Isabeu wahoro bo zumu. Ana hi hudikhudikwy Sudejaka.
Sakarias wahoro bo paku niy. Isabeu ziharapyryk. Nipamykysoko.
Atatsa Maria harere ziwabyze ibykyhy iarakokeze tsakurẽta nikara iwatahi kuanare kuanare nikara. Deus hyrikoso Isabeu tuk mynapykyryk.
Iwatatsahi Maria bo opykani nipamykysoko:<CM>— Deus pasapywyky. Ikia hi akurẽtatsa tynapykyryk. Awaky wytykyryk tynasiyzikwyky. Abykyhy niwatihi tsakurẽta.
Parakbaha okze tu ikza myhyrizikwanibyitatsa tu my. Hawa tsikytatsa ikia kapehatsa je kabo tsimynakozore.<CM>
Aksoho iwabyze atakta kaharakokeze tu kuanare kuanare nikara. Tsakurẽta iwatahi kuanare kuanare nikara.<CM>
Ikia bijoikpe iknykta Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa harere humo hyỹ tsiky. Iwatatsahi akurẽtatsa. Iwaze Deus harere humo aspirikporẽtatsa akurẽtatsa tsimy — Isabeu niy.<CM>
<TS1>Maria Deus bo nisakibazikik.<Ts>Niytatsahi Maria Deus bo nipamykysoko:<CI><PI>— Ikza tihi: O Deus ikia zuba tsamysapyrẽta.<CI><PI2>Ikia humo kakurẽtatsa.<CI>
<PI>Deus bo mykara zeka ipokzi kakurẽtatsa.<CI>

<PI>Iwatahi kabo mytsaty niy. Nanabyi humo kanamybyitatsa tu sa atsumuẽhĩtsata mozik.<CI><PI2>Abaka myzubaha kape maha Deus atatsa humo tsimypokzitsiarẽta mykaranaha.<CI><PI>Wabyty! Myzubaha eze mopamykysokonaha “Deus ziktsumuẽhĩkĩ” mykaranaha niy.<CI><PI2>Abaka aparakbaha sitsekokatsa niwatihi kasoho<CI><PI>“Deus atatsa humo zisapywyky” mykaranaha.<CI>
<PI>Deus kino atatsa tsyhyryze tsihokdaharẽna zik niy.<CI><PI2>Atahi tsizikwyrẽta. Atahi mekywata.<CI>
<PI>Deus aparakbaha humo tsimypokzitsiarẽta. Iwatsahi sispirikporẽtsa moziknaha.<CI><PI2>Abaka aparakbaha,<CI><PI>sitsekokatsa kino niwatihi<CI><PI2>Deus sihumo tsimypokzitsiarẽta.<CI>
<PI>Deus ziwatahaka tsihyrinymyrẽta hiba. Sizubarẽtsa mytsaty maha zeka “uta zuba mypehatsa” sisopykyktsa asahi mysipykik.<CI><PI2>Iwaze kytsa siharere tsihikbyitsa moziknaha.<CI>
<PI>Ispehatsa sihudikhudikwy ezektsa niwatihi mysipykik. Myhyrizikwybyitsa hi<CI><PI2>myhyrizikwanitsa moziknaha.<CI>
<PI>Siarapanikitsa disahawy ka tsizubarẽna mopykyryknaha.<CI><PI2>Sinamynikitsaktsa mysinamybyri. Batu amy tohi mykaranaha.<CI>
<PI>Iwa Deus Sudeutsa mysitsumuẽhĩkĩ.<CI><PI2>Tatyryktsa mysitsumuẽhĩkĩ.<CI>

<PI>Tubabatu Deus harere mydiritsa ispirikze niy.<CI><PI2>Abaka wasani niy. Sibo nitsasoko: “Ikiahatsa humo kamypokzitsiarẽta” niy.<CI><PI>Mydiritsa bo Abarão tsekokatsa bo iwa.<CI><PI2>Deus taharere humo ba zikspiriktsokda<CI><PI0>Iwa Maria Deus soho humo nikara.<CM>
Iwaze byzoje harakykbyihi zitsuze Maria Isabeu tuk niapykyk. Iwaze tawahoro bo ziksizo.<CM>
<TS1>Suão Batista purukwy.<Ts>Iwaze Isabeu bykyhy nipuruk.
Itukytsa, iututsa pauktsitsa kino niwatihi sakurẽtsa niapykyryknaha. Isabeu tse humo sakurẽtsa. Ziwabynahaze Deus atatsa humo tsimypokzitsiarẽta, iwatsahi sakurẽtsa niyziknaha.<CM>
Niahatsahi izumukunaha. Iwatsahi ibykyhy tsibik pipiakzyknaha. Kyze ibykyhy tsibik mytsyhyrytsa asiba nisipykze kytsa izumunaha. Zinaro tsihikiknaha Sakarias ty izo naro ty zinaro tsihikiknaha.
Ije ispe niy:<CM>— Batu zik. Sakarias humo batu inaro tsihik. Inaro babaka Suão — niy.<CM>
Iwaze ipe niaha:<CM>— Ikiatsaktsa zik anahumo ka batu atukytsa naro kok — nikaranaha.<CM>
Niahatsahi izo pe niaha.<CM>— Askyrywy sa tsipinaro — niaha. Sakarias niharerebyitahi iwaze kytsa ibo tahatsyhyrypetsa ty ziwatawykynaha zuba.
Niytahi Sakarias kino:<CM>— Kabo iwatahawy ty nynytynaha — niy. Hyỹ niaha. Iwaze ziwataha — Inaro ka Suão. — Aparakbaha paikpa iktsa nikaranaha sipybyrẽtsa nikaranaha.<CM>
Iwazebabatu Sakarias inataharerezo. Tsakurẽta. Iwaze nipamykysokozo. Deus pe niy:<CM>— O Deus ikiahi tsamysapyrẽta — niy. Iwa Deus bo nipamykysoko.
Iututsa pauktsitsa iwaha pokso hi sipybyrẽtsa nikaranaha. Nanabyitaba wasaniha Suão soho nitsasokonaha. Harakoso Sudeja eze tuze Suão soho ty nipamykysokonaha.
Ziwabynahaze mytsaty nikaranaha:<CM>— Hawa sa ibykyhy mozik Deus zikwy ituk mynapykyryk — nikaranaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sakarias Deus soho nitsasokota niy.<Ts>Iwaze niytahi nipamykysoko. Deus hyrikoso ituk ziknapykyryk. Iwatahi nipamykysoko. Atahi:<CI>

<PI>— Ikiahatsa Deus bo tsimypamykysokonaha. “Ikia hi tsamysapyrẽta.<CI><PI2>Ikia zuba wasani tsimykara. Iwaze ikia soho humo myharereziurẽtsa tsimaha” niy.<CI><PI>Kyze Isareu tsekokatsa, Sudeutsa Deus humo myspirikporẽtsa.<CI><PI2>Katsaktsa Deus humo myharereziurẽtsa. Deus tyryktsa tsimoziknaha.<CI><PI>Ata kino tatyryktsa bo mymyoktyhyryk — niy.<CI>
<PI>Deus mymyoktyhyrykta mybo myzipeha.<CI><PI2>Mymyoktyhyrykta Dawi tsekokatsa iknykta.<CI><PI>Dawi mydiri Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa.<CI>
<PI>Tubabatu Deus simysapyrẽtsa bo nitsasokonaha<CI><PI2>asahi Deus harere sohokotsa nitsasoko:<CI>
<PI>— Deus ispirikze iharerebaba mymyoktyhyryk. Iwatahi mysukyrytsitsa ba zik mybanaha.<CI><PI2>Iwaze kytsa myhumo siakyriukrẽtsa ba zik mybanaha.<CI>
<PI>Deus mydiri humo tsimypokzitsiukrẽta.<CI><PI2>Katsa myhumo niwatihi tsimypokzitsiarẽta.<CI>
<PI>Tubabatu Deus Abarão bo taharere baba ty niy.<CI><PI2>Abarão taparakta mydiri niy.<CI>
<PI>“Ikiahatsa pahaoktyhyrykta pipeha” niy.<CI><PI2>Abaka taharere bo mytsaty niy.<CI>

<PI>Mymyoktyhyrykta pipehahik my nikara.<CI><PI2>Mymyoktyhyrykta pipeha iwatsahi mysapyrẽtsa tsimoziknaha.<CI><PI>Mysukyrytsitsa ba zik mybanaha.<CI><PI2>Mysukyrytsitsa pokso batu mypyby.<CI><PI>Niahatsahi tyzibyituhukunahatu Deus tsipitsumuẽhĩnaha.<CI><PI2>Deus pokso batu mypyby — niy.<CI>
<PI>— Ikia kaskyrywy Deus sohokotsa tsimozik.<CI><PI2>Ikia mymyoktyhyrykta haraze tsimy.<CI><PI>Kiristu Deus bo mymyoktyhyryk.<CI>

<PI>Iwaze mozumuze sizubarẽtsa ahumo mytahazozikymybanaha.<CI><PI2>Mymyoktyhyrykta humo mokymynaha.<CI><PI>Iwaze hi aparakbaha bo mopamykysoko:<CI><PI2>“Deus sisopyksapybyikitsa nikaranaha iwatsatu mysiokzohik. Deus kino mysioktyhyryk.<CI><PI>Iwatsahi Deus soho humo sispirikporẽtsa.”<CI><PI2>Ikia humo Deus soho aparakbaha sispirikporẽtsa myziknaha niy.<CI>
<PI>Iwaze Deus myhumo tsimypokzitsiarẽta.<CI><PI2>Tsimysapyrẽnikita my.<CI>

<PI>Abaka atakta mybo bijoikpe iknykta okoro hyritywaka katsa mybo myziharamweke.<CI><PI2>Haramwe humo iktsa mahatsa watsa mypobyri katsaktsa mymyoktyhyrykta humo myspirikporẽtsa.<CI><PI>Taparaka miwa ahaburuk ziknaukurunahaze ky waha.<CI><PI2>Abaka haramwe waha niyzik.<CI><PI>Iwatsahi kytsa mohyrikosokdanahaze batu sipyby.<CI><PI2>Katsa batu mykyriuk. Katsa mykurẽtsa — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Sakarias Deus harere nitsasoko niy. Itse taypykykze Deus harere bo hyỹ mykara. Tsipaikrẽta mozik jerukbara bo niparak. Atazuba zikziuruku. Aiba zuba Deus tyryktsa bo niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sose, Maria ahatsa tahahudikhudikwy Berẽhe bo niukurunaha.<Ts>Sesus Kiristu purukwy. Deus zipehata mymyoktyhyrykta. Kuirini Sirija ezektsa pehatsa. Aukusto sizubarẽtsa pehatsa niy. Homa ezektsa pehatsa ityryktsa tuk niy. Aukusto tihi:<CM>— Ikiahatsa ahazubarẽtsa nabo pãotaha! niy.
Taparaktsa ahadiritsa hudikhudikwy bo tsiksizonahaktsa! Anaeze aty ahanaro piwataha — niy.<CM>
Hyỹ niaha. Iwaze kytsa sizubarẽtsa ziksikinaha.<CM>
Sose Nasare ezekta. Nasare Karireja eze tu niy. Iwaze Berẽhe bo zumu. Tubabatu Sose taparaktsa idiritsa Berẽhe eze nipupurukuknaha. Dawi inarokota. Iwatsahi Berẽhe bo zumunaha. Maria ituk zumuku.
Puẽtsikze zuba Sose atatsa piakse. Maria tabykyhytatsa Berẽhe bo zumu. Anabo zumunahaze wahoro inahareknaha. Batu iwewehe. Pikuzatsa parik zuba asa wanu sapy zuba.<CM>
Anaeze, Berẽhe eze ibykyhy nipuruk. Ibykyhywyzytykta nipuruk.
Nipurukze panu ty ziakwaraka. Pikuzatsa disahawy suk eze tyhoek niy. Iwaze nipurukze Sose taskyrywy zinaroko Sesus niy.<CM>
<TS1>Bijoikpe iknyktsa hozipyrykzatsa perykytsitsa bo nitsasokonaha.<Ts>Kyze Berẽhe baze tu hozipyrykzatsa perytsitsa. Unata eze hozipyrykzatsa nisiperykynaha.

Iwaze unata bijoikpe iknykta Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa sibo natakaha. Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa bo nikozonaha. Sibaze okoro ziky waha niukuru. Sipybyrẽtsa nikaranaha. Bijoikpe iknykta:<CM>— Ahapybybyihuktsa Deus hi izikpeha, ahabo wasaniha motsasoko. Tsipiwabynahaze ahakurẽtsa tsimoziknaha.
Aba Berẽhe eze Kiristu nipuruk.
Ibo tynakozorenaha! Ibykyhy panu eze iakwarahata. Pikuzatsa disahawy suk eze mohoeke.
Iwaze hi ikiahatsa tu tsimyzinyrenaha yhỹ tsimaha — niy.<CM>
Nitsasobaze bijoikpe iknyktsa sizubarẽtsa ibo atsoko inatakahanaha. Deus bo sizubarẽtsa sakurẽtsa nisakibazikiknaha.<CM>

Asahi Deus bo:<CM>— O ikia humo ka mykurẽtsa. Ikia hi tsamysapyrẽta Deus wasani tsimykara. Ikia hi taparata bijoikpe ezekta. Mybarawy ezektsa niwatihi sakurẽtsa mykaranaha. Ikia tynasipokzitsiki iwatsahi sakurẽtsa moziknaha — niaha.<CM>

Kyze bijoikpe iknyktsa ziksizonahaze hozipyrykzatsa perytsitsa kino:<CM>— Aidyktsa! Berẽhe bo tsimynakozorenaha! Deus katsa mybo nitsaso. Deus tatsumuẽhĩtsa mybo zipehaka. Tsimynakozorenaha! — nikaranaha. Yhỹ niaha.<CM>
Iwaze atsoko anabo niukurunaha. Maria Sose ibykyhy iwatsa bo zumunaha.
Ibykyhy pikuzatsa disahawy suk eze nihoeke. Hozipyrykzatsa perytsitsa Berẽhe ezektsa bo nitsasokonaha.
Berẽhe ezektsa bo wasania ty nipamykysokonaha. Sakurẽtsa nikaranaha.
Nipybynaha. Maria kino siharere ziwabytatsa tu mytsatyziu nikara. Bykyze hozipyrykzatsa perytsitsa ziksizonaha. Sakurẽtsa nikaranaha.<CM>

Deus bo nisakibazikiknaha. Asa kino:<CM>— O ikia humo ka mykurẽtsa. Bijoikpe iknytsa humo mykurẽtsa. Jaba Berẽhe eze Kiristu Deus zipehata nipuruk. Nitsasokoze wasani niy — nikaranaha.<CM>Bijoikpe iknykta harere ty asta hareretu nikaranaha. Iwa ziksizonaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sose Sesus ty zinaro.<Ts>Kyze estuba mytsyhyrytsa asiba nipykze Sose, Maria tahatse zipiakzyknaha taparaktsa sopykwy ty nikaranaha. Sesus ty zinaronaha. Tapara tu bijoikpe iknykta Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa Maria pe niy:<CM>— Bykyze abykyhy mopurukze Sesus ty tsipinaro — niy. Iwa bijoikpe iknykta ipe niy. Iwatsahi Sesus ty zinaronaha.<CM>

<TS1>Izo ije ahatsa Sesus Deus wahoro zubata bo zioktyhyryknaha.<Ts><sup>(22-23)</sup> Niahatsahi izotsa Serusarẽhe bo Sesus zioktyhyryknaha. Tubabatu Moises Deus harere ziwatahaka Sudeutsa bo:<CM>— Kyze estuba byzoje zirahaze makuskyry nipuruk, ikiahatsa ziknapamykysokota bo siraratsa ty nyny tsimaha. Ziknapamykysokota siraratsa ty Deus okze mysiba — niy. Iwaze makuskyry je wasani niyzikzo. Tabykyhy humo tsakurẽtatsa. Iwatsahi Sose Maria iwatsa Serusarẽhe bo tahatse Deus wahoro zubata bo zibykyknaha. Iwatsahi ziknapamykysokota bo zibykyknaha. Deus bo Sesus ziwatawykynaha.

Isukzata amytudutsa petoktsa ty ziknapamykysokota bo nyny niaha. Iwaze ziknapamykysokota amytudutsa Deus okze tysiba. Tubabatu Moises Deus harere Sudeutsa bo nitsasoko:<CM>— Wytyk tapara makuskyry pepurukze. Deus makuskyry soho motsaso:<CM>“Abykyhywyzytykta, atakta metutu kabo nyny tsimy. Katsewata. Kabo metutu abykyhywyzytykta humo” mykara.<CM>Iwatsahi Sose Maria ahatsa Sesus ziknapamykysokota bo zibykyknaha. Siraratsa ziknapamykysokota bo nyny niaha. Deus harere humo amytudutsa petoktsa ty nyny niaha. Siraratsa ty nyny niahaze iwatsahi aparakbaha sihyrinymyrẽtsa, Maria wasani mozikzo — niaha. Moises Deus harere Sudeutsa bo nitsasoko:<CM>— Ziknapamykysokota bo siraratsa ty nyny tsimaha. Ziknapamykysokota Deus okze siraratsa mysiba. Taparakta bykyhy nipuruk — niy.<CM>Iwa Moises Deus harere ziwatahaka.<CM>

<TS1>Simeõ soho.<Ts>Aba ikia bo Simeõ soho piwatahaka. Kyze maku Simeõ inarokota. Atahi Serusarẽhe eze ziknapykyk. Tubabatu Deus harere humo nispirikpota. Deus harere bo hyỹ ziknakara. Atahi mymyoktyhyrykta piperyky. Mymyoktyhyrykta Sudeutsa bo myze sakurẽtsa moziknaha. Deus hyrikoso ituk tu hỹ.
Tapara Deus hyrikoso Simeõ pe niy.<CM>— Deus myzipehata tsipiny. Iwaze Deus myzipehata tsipinyze tu tsimyhyrikosokda — niy.

Iwaze izotsa ibykyhy tsibik tuk Deus wahoro zubata bo inapupunahaze. Deus hyrikoso Simeõ pe:<CM>— O ikia Deus wahoro zubata bokta — niy. Ata kino Deus wahoro zubata bo nitsuk. Izotsa Deus wahoro zubata bo Sesus zibykyknaha iwatsahi Deus harere bo hyỹ niaha.<CM>
Niytahi Simeõ Sesus ziny. Iwatahi zebykyk. Deus soho humo tsiharereziurẽta. Nitsasoko:<CI>
<PI>— Abaka kakurẽta. O Deus aharere humo wasani my.<CI><PI2>Hawa atsumuẽhĩtsa pe tsiky atsatu tsikykara.<CI><PI>Uta abaka kakurẽta tu mohyrikosokda.<CI>
<PI>Abaka zipehata mymyoktyhyrykta iny — niy. Simeõ ibykykhy soho nitsasohozo:<CI>
<PI>— Atahi kytsa okzetu zipehata zumu.<CI>

<PI>Atahi haramwe hyrity wata.<CI><PI2>Hawa haramwe humo kytsa ske buruk mokozonaha.<CI><PI>Katsa bipyritsa ahatsa niwatihi Deus ske bo mymyoktyhyrykta humo<CI><PI2>aparakbaha sihyrinymyrẽtsa.<CI><PI>Bipyritsa bo izumu.<CI><PI2>Deus aparakbaha humo tsimypokzitsiarẽta iwatahi mybo izumu.<CI><PI>Iwatahi zipehata bipyritsa bo niwatihi izumu.<CI><PI2>Atahi haramwe hyrity wata ahatyryktsa Sudeutsa bo zumu.<CI><PI>Haramwe wata Sudeutsa bo<CI><PI2>iwatsahi kytsa okze ka siharereziurẽtsa moziknaha — niy.<CM>
Iypyktsa ije niwatihi paikpa mytsaty nikaranaha. Hawa ha ty Simeõ ibykyhy soho nitsasoko ana humo hi nipybybaiknaha.

Niytahi Simeõ Sesus je pe niy:<CM>— Wabyty! Deus abykyhy ziny. Sudeutsa sizubarẽtsa ihumo Deus harere bo batu yhỹ zikaha. Ustsa Sudeutsa ihumo Deus harere bo hyỹ zikaha. Sizubarẽtsa ihumo ba siakparawy. Deus atakta abykyhy ziwatawy iwatsahi hawa ha ty kytsa mytsaty mykaranaha ana humo hi tsihyrinymyrẽta. Iwaze kytsa Deus humo sispihikrẽtsa ihumo jokpitsĩhĩbara.<CM>

Ikia niwatihi ba asukatsihik. Abykyhy taypykze kytsa humo sinini mykara. Ikia kino niwatihi sinini tsimykara. Sinini ty sokorotsapu wata ty paskoik naha sinini tsimy — niy.<CM>Iwa Simeõ Maria bo nitsasoko.<CM>
<TS1>Ana inarokotatsa soho.<Ts>Kyze Deus wahoro eze Deus sohokotsata niy. Atatsa Deus wahoro eze ziknapykyryk. Ana inarokotatsa. Panuweu ste. Ase astsabarẽtsa. Nitsaikbatatsa oitẽta kwatero anos.

Tubabatu ibarikta nihyrikosokda. Ata tuk mytsyhyry wa ziytyk tseheze iwaze maku nihyrikosokda iwaze atatsa hi nipytsabyri iwatatsahi Deus wahoro eze ziknapykyryk. Iwatatsahi Deus bo ziknapamykysoko. Atatsa tu ziknatadukutu Deus bo ziknasakibaziki.

Iwaze baba tu izotsa Deus wahoro zubata bo inapupunahaze atatsa kino niwatihi izumu. Iwaze Deus bo nipamykysoko:<CM>— O kazo mykurẽtsa, ikia humo kakurẽtatsa. Ikia hi myhumo tsimypokzitsiarẽta — niy.<CM>Atatsa Sudeutsa sizubarẽtsa bo nitsasoko. Deus zipehata ziperykynaha. Asahi Deus tyryktsa moziknaha. Asahi Deus zipehata ibo mysioktyhyryk.<CM>
<TS1>Nasare bo ziksizonaha.<Ts>Deus wahoro eze zipykbanahaze tahahudikhudikwy bo ziksizonaha. Sose, Maria, Sesus ahatsa, Karireja bo ziksizonaha. Nasare bo zumunaha.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus tsiupyhyritorykrẽta taypykyk. Tsihyrinymyrẽta. Deus tatse humo tsakurẽta nikara. Ihumo iakparawy. Iharereziuwy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Deus wahoro zubata eze nitare.<Ts>Pororo ziknakara Sose Maria iwa ahatsa Sudeutsa myikaha bo nikozorenaha. Serusarẽhe bo niukurunaha. Simyikaha bo nikozore kozorekenaha. Deus taparaktsa nisitsumuẽhĩkĩ mytsaty ziknakaranaha.
Sesus niskyrybyrize Serusarẽhe bo zioktyhyryknaha.
Kyze simyikaha nepykze ziksizonaha. Sesus Serusarẽhe eze nitare. Iypyktsa ije ahatsa tahatse ty batu ityny.<CM>

— O kytsa tuk ja naukuru — niaha. Batu meky watu. Bykyze zunubaze, tahatykytsa bo situktsa kino niwatihi ispe niaha:<CM>— O mytse ja Sesus sa ikiahatsa tuk — niaha. Situkytsa kino:<CM>— O batu. Katsa batu ityny — niaha.<CM>
Iwaze itynybyitsa hi Serusarẽhe bo ziksizonaha. Tahatse ziberikinaha.
Kyze harakykbyihi zurunahaze. Deus wahoro zubata eze ibo zumunaha. Taparaktsa baze nidyhyky. Sihyrinymyrẽnikitsa harere ziwabyky. Situk zinymyryky.<CM>
Taparaktsa tihi:<CM>— O atakta tsihyrinymyrẽta — nikaranaha. Ije iypyktsa ahatsa nipybynaha.
Ije tihi:<CM>— O katse hawa sa tsimykara. Ikia pokzi batu myku. Botua tsikzaberikinaha — niy.
Sesus tihi:<CM>— Amo sa tsimozikberikinaha Utakta kazo wahoro eze iktare. Kazo zikpehata, nawa kasopyk — my.<CM>
Ipyktsa ije:<CM>— Amy skaraba — niaha. Batu sihyrinymyry.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus situk Nasare bo ziksizonaha. Zikzibyituhukutu hyỹ ispe nikara. Iwatatsahi ije tatse soho humo mytsatyziu nikara.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus zinymyrybaba. Itaypykze tsipaikrẽta niyzik. Deus ihumo tsakurẽta. Aparakbaha niwatihi ihumo siakparawy.<CM>

<TS1>Suão Batista Deus wasania ty ziknatsasoko.<Ts>Iwaze Deus Suão bo nitsasokoze. Tiberias Sesa Homa pehatsa niapykyryk, Põtsio Piratus Sudeja ezektsa pehatsa, Erodes Karireja ezektsa pehatsa, Piripi Itureja ezektsa pehatsa, Piripi Tarakoita ezektsa pehatsa niwatihi. Atahi Erodes tsy. Iwaze Deus Suão bo nitsaso. Anas Kajapas taparaktsa Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa. Risania Abirene ezektsa pehatsa niy. Iwa.

<sup>(2-3)</sup> Suão Sakarias tse jerukbara eze Deus ipe niy:<CM>— Sizubarẽtsa pihik ty tysiharasusu — niy. Iwatsahi sispirikporẽtsa moziknaha. Ikiahi:<CM>— O kytsa ahasopyksapybyri tsimoewybaiknahaktsa Deus harere bo hyỹ tsimahaktsa — tsimykara. Pihik ty pahaharasusu zeka ahaspirikporẽtsa tsimoziknaha. Ikia tsipahaharasusuze kytsa mekywatsatu tsimoziknaha iwatawy. Niytahi Deus ahasopyksapybyritsa ky pahaokzohik.<CM>Iwatahi Suão buburu sak bo niukuru. Buburu Sorodão inarokota. Nanabyitaba Deus wasania ty ziknapamykysoko.

Taparaka Deus Isaijas bo nitsasoko. Isaijas Deus sohotsa. Deus harere Isaijas ziwatahaka:<CI><PI>— “Maku jerukbara buruk hua mykara. Opykani mopamykysoko:<CI><PI2>‘Pykyhytuty Deus ske bo tsimy’.<CI><PI>Tsipiskezoze buruhuwa tsipiske.<CI>

<PI>Wytyk hoke taharatõtõ. Hara buruk piskezozikiknaha.<CI><PI2>Iske myiha humo tsihokdaharẽna buruhuwa tsizoziknaha.<CI><PI>Batu iske sapy iwaze tiskeziurẽta mozik.<CI><PI2>Hawa kytsa iske pizozikiknaha nawaha Suão Deus zipehata haraze aparakbaha mysispirikpo<CI>iwatsahi kytsa Deus zipehata piperykynaha.<CI>
<PI>Aparakbaha Deus mykaraze iktsa maha. Deus bo ityryktsa mysioktyhyryk” niy.<CI><PI2>Nawa myske Deus zipehata mozumuku.<CM>

Kyze myzubaha Suão bo zumukunaha. Aparakbaha mysiharasusukuze. Ispe nikara:<CM>— Ikiahatsaktsa pyryhyktsa myrawy watsa — niy. Pyryhyktsa pokso tytururukiknaha. Ikiahatsa niwatihi. Aty sa ahape:<CM>— O ahasopyksapybyitsa tu tsikykaranaha iwatsahi Deus iakyriwy pokso tsimytururukiknahaktsa — niy.

Aba ikiahatsa Deus harere bo hyỹ tahaktsa. Kytsa bo batu ahamyi tsihikik tsipiwatawynaha. Aparakbaha tsiwatawynahaktsa. Ikiahatsa mytsaty ahabyitsa tsimykaranaha:<CM>— O Abarão taparakta mydiri. Iwatahi Deus myhumo bazik takyri — tsimaha. Batu ba. Ikiahatsa tihi:<CM>— Katsa zuba myhyrizikwani — tsimaha. — Ikiahatsa batu ahahyrinymyry. Deus haraharetsa tuk Abarão tsekokatsa mysisukni ziky.

Ikiahatsa wiharatatsa, aba botu wywyk zizowy. Iharatatsa buruk mysikakarenahaze. Hwi iharasapybyita tu izo bo pioktsokik — nikara. Hawa kytsa hwi isapybyitakta piwenaha nawa aty imysapybyikitsa tu mykara sinini ykarawy bo pipehaka.<CM>
Iwatsahi parakbaha ipe niaha:<CM>— Hawa skaraba tsimaha — nikaranaha.
Iwaze ispe niy:<CM>— Aty petok suk zeka estuba nynyty isukbyita bo. Aty idisahawykyta zeka disahawybyita bo nynyty — nikara.<CM>
Asaktsa ispehatsa tsyhyryze okyrysarobyktsitsa izumunahaze — O tymyharasusukta! — Suão pe nikaranaha:<CM>— O myhyrinymyrykytsa! Hawa skaraba tsimaha — niaha.
Suão tihi:<CM>— Okyrysaro ahapehakatsa ahape maha atsatu tsipiaksenaha. Ana ty zuba wabehyryk tsimaha! niy. Batu amy tohi tsimaha — nikara.<CM>

Sodadutsa niwatihi ipe niaha:<CM>— Hawa skaraba katsa kino tsimaha — niaha. Suão tihi:<CM>— Batu kytsa okyrysaro ty ka okok okok byitaha ikiahatsaktsa ahapaikrẽtsa humo batu tsiaksenaha. Ahakyriukrẽtsaktsa paik paik byitaha. Sipybyrẽtsa ikiahatsa pokso batu okyrysaro zebyknaha. Batu okyrysaro humo mybarapetu tsimaha. Ahapehatsa okyrysaro ty ahabo nyny my. Anahumo hi ahakurẽtsa tynakaranaha — nikara.<CM>
Niytahi aparakbaha batu sihyrinymyry. Suão harere humo. Sihyrinymyrybyitsa tu nikaranaha:<CM>— Aty skaraba Suão, Suão Deus zipehata ja. Tozeka ja Kiristu — nikaranaha.

Suão aparakbaha pe nikara:<CM>— Utakta pihik ty zuba pahaharasusuku. Usta mozumuta. Atahi tsimysapyrẽta myhyrizikwani. Utakta batu. Ipyrysuktsa mysibokik zeka kasikpybyrẽta. Utakta pihik ty zuba aparakbaha mysiharasusuku. Atakta maku hi Kiristu Deus zipehata Deus hyrikoso ahabo mynasik myzipeha. Deus hyrikoso rika wata ahabo mynasik. Hawa miwa rika humo amypubyri nawa Deus hyrikoso humo tsimysapyrẽna ty zuba pahahyrinymyry myspirikporẽtsa tsimoziknaha. Deus hyrikoso mynasikze ikiahatsa tuk mynapykyryk.<CM>

Kiristu mozumuze maku dua ty wabe mozikta wata. Mektsaktsa ispawaha pipapara. Siriktsa mysizozekeze ispa zipaparakanaha. Anawahi Kiristu aparakbaha metutu my. Izo bo mysisapywy. Asaktsa simysapybyitsaktsa sinini ykarawy bo mysipehahik. Anaeze izo ba zikbe naha byikia bo. Ustsaktsa simysapyrẽtsaktsa ituk tahawahi mynapykyryknaha. Iwa aparakbaha metutu mykara — Suão niy.<CM>
Kyze Suão niukuru, wasania ty aparakbaha bo nipamykysoko. Niukuruze wasania ty kytsa bo nipamykysoko.

Iwaze Erodes sipehakatsa Karireja eze zikniapykyryk. Suão tsipa humo tyzioktyhyk. Sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy bo motsahuruk tsihikik. Nezeba Suão Erodes zipehaka. Erodias soho nitsasoko: Suão ipe niy:<CM>— Ikia atsy oke tsioktyhyryk batu iktsa zuba ziky. Ikia batu amysapy. Usa amysapybara ty tsikykara — niy.<CM>
Erodes zisapybyikik nikara. Aba usta imysapybara ty niy. Suão sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy bo zipehahik niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus harasuwy.<Ts>Kyze Suão aparakbaha nisiharasusubaze Sesus ibo izumu ipe niy:<CM>— Tsikarasusukta — niy.<CM>Iwaze Suão Sesus hi ziharasusu. Sesus Deus bo nipamykysokoze bijoikpe sakpare niy.

Deus hyrikoso inasik. Deus hyrikoso amytudu hyrity wata inasik. Amytudu ipapyry bete inazo. Iaksoho bijoikpe iknyky ziwaby:<CM>— Ikiakta katse baba tahi. Ikia humo kamypokzitsiarẽta. Ikia humo kakurẽta — niy. Iwa Deus Sesus pe niy.<CM>
<TS1>Taparaktsa Sesus diritsa.<Ts>Sesus kino taypykze tirĩta anos Deus soho ty sizubarẽtsa nisihyrinymyryky. Iwaze Deus hyriziktsokzawy humo ziakbataze. Aparakbaha nipamykysokonaha:<CM>

— O atakta Sose tse ja — nikaranaha. Batu ba Deus tse babata zuba.<CI><PI>Sose ta Eri tse niy. Eri ta Matate tse. Matate ta Rewi tse. Rewi ta Meki tse. Meki ta Sanai tse.<CI>Sanai ta Sose tse. Sose ta Matatias tse.
<PI>Matatias ta Amos tse. Amos ta Naũ tse. Naũ ta Esri tse.<CI>Esri ta Nakai tse.
<PI>Nakai ta Marate tse. Marate ta Matatias tse. Matatias ta Semei tse. Semei ta Sose tse.<CI>Sose ta Soda tse.
<PI>Soda ta Soana tse. Soana ta Resa tse. Resa ta Sorababeu tse. Sorobabeu ta Sarateu tse.<CI>Sarateu ta Neri tse.
<PI>Neri ta Mereki tse. Mereki ta Adi tse. Adi ta Kosã tse. Kosã ta Emadã tse.<CI>Emadã ta Er tse.
<PI>Er ta Sosue tse. Sosue ta Eriesa tse. Eriesa ta Sorĩ tse. Sorĩ ta Matate tse.<CI>Matate ta Rewi tse.
<PI>Rewi ta Simeõ tse. Simeõ ta Suda tse. Suda ta Sose tse. Sose ta Sona tse.<CI>Sona ta Eriakĩ tse.
<PI>Eriakĩ ta Merija tse. Merija ta Mena tse. Mena ta Matata tse. Matata ta Natã tse.<CI>Natã ta Dawi tse.
<PI>Dawi ta Sese tse. Sese ta Obede tse. Obede ta Boas tse. Boas ta Saro tse.<CI>Saro ta Nasõ tse.
<PI>Nasõ ta Aminadabe tse. Aminadabe ta Ami tse. Ami ta Esrõ tse. Esrõ ta Peres tse.<CI>Peres ta Suda tse.
<PI>Suda ta Sako tse. Sako ta Isake tse. Isake ta Abarão tse. Abarão ta Tera tse.<CI>Tera ta Nako tse. Nako ta Seruke tse.
<PI>Seruke ta Rakau tse. Rakau ta Pareke tse. Pareke ta Ebe tse.<CI>Ebe ta Sara tse.
<PI>Sara ta Kaina tse. Kaina ta Arapakasade tse. Arapakasade ta Sẽ tse. Sẽ ta Noe tse.<CI>Noe ta Rameke tse.
<PI>Rameke ta Metuserẽ tse. Metuserẽ ta Enoke tse.
<PI>Enoke ta Sarete tse. Sarete ta Marereu tse.<CI>Marereu ta Kaina tse. Kaina ta Enos tse. Enos ta Ses tse. Ses ta Adão tse. Adão ta Deus tse. Iwa niaha.<CM>

<TS1>Satanas Sesus ziakzobyriki naha soho.<Ts>Sesus tuk Deus hyrikoso ziknapykyryk iwatatu buburu Sorodão inarokota bo ziksizo. Ziksizoze Deus hyrikoso jerukbara bo zioktyhyryk. Anaeze hyrikoso sapybara pehatsa Sesus bo zumuku. Diabo inarokota niy. Sesus bo izumuze atahi Sesus Deus harere bo ka yhỹ yhỹ byitykta ana nizihikik.
Sesus iharere humo batu yhỹ niy. Iwa estuba byzoje zirahaze Sesus hauk ahabyitatu niapykyryk. Byzoje estuba zirahaze irapa izumu. Hauk ahabyitatu zikzurukutahi irapa izumu.<CM>
Iwaze Diabo ipe niy:<CM>— Ikia Deus tse tihi zeka ta harahare pe. “Atsikara tuziktykta” — niy.<CM>

Batu Sesus niy. Tubabatu taparaktsa Deus harere papeu humo ziwatahakanaha:<CM>— Kytsa batu mydisahawy humo zuba mozurukunaha. Sizubarẽtsa disahawy hauk maha zeka sispitu zuba mykaranaha. Sizubarẽtsa Deus harere bo hyỹ maha zeka sakurẽtsa moziknaha. Sakurẽtsa — niaha. Iwa taparaktsa ziwatahakanaha.<CM>
Iwaze Diabo Sesus hara joboni tabo zioktyhyryk.
Ipe niyzo:<CM>— Nanabyi bo iktsa tykta — niy. Atsoko mybarawy tsizubarẽna nizokparaka. Aidy sityryktsa tuze niwatihi natakaha.

Diabo kino:<CM>— Uta anaty abo nynybaik my. Ikia hi sipehakatsa tsimozik. Sityryktsa ikia sopyk abazubata maha. Ikia asoho mynatsasokonaha “Atakta tsimysapyrẽta” mynakaranaha. Aba uta kapitão mybarawy ezekta myzubaha katyryktsa. Aty kakparawy zeka ibo mybarawy ty nyny my. Ikia kaokeryk aekaratsa humo puruk puruk zuba tsimy zeka kabo tsimytsaso zeka, “Ikia tsamysapyrẽta” iwa tsimy zeka mybarawy ty abo nyny my. Anamy mozik — niy. Iwa Diabo Sesus pe nikara.<CM>

Sesus:<CM>Batu niy. Tubabatu taparaktsa papeu iwatahaha humo. Deus harere ziwatahakanaha tihi:<CM>— Deus bo zuba tynapamykysokonaha “Ikia tsamysapyrẽta”. Ata kino zipehakaze ikiahatsa iharere humo zuba hyỹ tsimykaranaha — ziwatahakanaha. Iwa de.<CM>

Iwaze Diabo Sesus bo izumuzo. Diabo Serusarẽhe bo Sesus zioktyhyryk. Anaeze Deus wahoro zubata hara bete ziriktohohikare. Joboniha bo zioktyhyryk. Niytahi ipe niy:<CM>— Ikia Deus tse tihi zeka nabo wytyk bo tukutyny. Tyk bo tynapurukta! Taparaktsa wataha:<CM>
“Bijoikpe iknyktsitsa Deus tsumuẽhĩtsitsa ikia bo mynasipeha. Paperykynaha. Ikia humo simypokzitsiukrẽtsa” niaha. Ziwatahakanahazo.
“Haraharetsa bete tsimynaraha zeka bijoikpe iknyktsa aty paik maha. Iwatahi ba zikahyrikywy” niaha — niy.<CM>
Sesus:<CM>Batu niy. — Tubabatu taparaktsa Deus harere ziwatahakanaha. “Deus ta ba ziakzobyrinaha”. Hawa ha ty ikia tsimyzihikik Deus bo batu tsizipeha. Iwa taparaktsa ziwatahakanaha — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Diabo Sesus bo imysapybyikia ty zipehaka. Sesus iharere humo batu yhỹ niy. Diabo nipamykysobaze zerekekspyk.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus tahyriziktsokzawy humo ziakbata Karireja eze.<Ts>Sesus Karireja bo ziksizo. Deus hyrikoso ituk ziknapykyk. Myzubaha paikpa isoho ziknatsasokonaha. Isohowy ziwabybanaha.
Sesus Deus wahoro eze ziakbataze nisihyrinymyryky. Myzubaha iharere siakparawy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus Nasare eze niapykyrykspyk.<Ts>Kyze Sesus Nasare bo ziksizo. Anaeze itaypyk. Iwaze mybyrykywy eze Sesus Deus wahoro bo pororo ziknakara. Deus wahoro bo nitsuk.

Niytahi ziknapamykysokota perytsa Deus harere ty papeu ty Sesus bo nyny niy. Iwaze kyik niy. Deus harere iwatahaha nitsasoko. Opykani haty nikara, sizubarẽtsa ziwabykynaha. Tubabatu Deus harere Isaijas ziwatahaka. Isaijas Deus sohokotsa Sesus papeu ty zoksapare niy. Niytahi papeu zikaha. Iwatahaha:<CI>

<PI>— Deus hyrikoso katuk mynapykyryk. Iwatahi uta sinamybyitsa bo zikpeha.<CI><PI2>Sinamybyitsa bo wasaniha motsasoko.<CI><PI>Sihurukuhutsa bo zikpeha. Tysisapare.<CI><PI2>Sihyrizikubyitsa bo zikpeha. Tysizororowyta! Iwaze mokozozonaha.<CI><PI>Sipokzitsiukbyikitsa bo zikpeha. Ahapybywytsitsa bo aidy pãotaha!<CI>
<PI>Uta sizubarẽtsa bo zikpeha. Ispe my “Deus tsimysapyrẽta.<CI><PI2>Myzubaha mysisapywyky. Sitsyhyryze Deus bo maha”.<CI><PI0>Iwa papeu humo ziwatahakanaha. Abaka iharere wasani mykara — niy.<CM>
Sesus iwatahaha opykani haty nikara. Papeu zihokbohik, iperykytsa bo nynyrezo niy. Iwaze dyhyzo niy. Kytsa Deus wahoro eze nidyhydyhykynahatsa nikozotoktokonaha.
Iwaze ispe niy:<CM>— Isaijas Deus harere ziwatahaka. Jabasykyri tsiwabykynaha. Abaka iwahi mykara — niy.<CM>
Sizubarẽtsa Deus wahoro eze ziwabykynahaze, Sesus humo siharereziurẽtsa. Iharere siakparawy. Ziwabykynahaze ihumo sipybyrẽtsa. Iwatsahi asa zuba nipamykysokonaha:<CM>

— Aty skaraba Sose tse ja — nikaranaha. Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Tozeka ja ikiahatsa hi aharere tsimytsasokonaha “O mozororowykytsa ikia arahwiwy tsiku!” Amy ty ikia tsikykara botu tsiwabynaha hỹ. Kaparanaũ eze tuze ikia soho botu tsiwabynaha hỹ. Aba atsatu ahudikhudikwy eze tu tsimy. Ikia ahudikhudikwy eze niwatihikta kabo tsimy — nikara.<CM>
Uta ikiahatsa pe:<CM>— Hawa motsasoko wasani mykara. Deus sohokotsa tahahudikhudikwy eze tu zeka batu wasani sisopyk. Wasani habyitsa tu kytsa batu siakparawy — niy. Wasani mykarazo.<CM>
— Tubabatu Isareu eze hyritsikbyrize. Hyritsik baratu harakykbyi niytyk tseheze. Sirapa izumu. Iwaze Deus Erias haramukuka bo zipeha.

Atatsa Sarepata eze niapykyryk. Sidõ eze niapykyryk. Atatsa Sudeubyitatsa. Bipyri. Erias Deus sohokotsa atatsa bo zipeha. Haramukukaka sizubarẽza Isareu eze. Deus Erias zipeha haramukuka bipyri bo — Sesus nikara.<CM>

— Tubabatu Eriseu niwatihi Deus sohokotsa Isareu eze tu. Nama takõrõrõtsa ty nibibibakata. Sizubarẽtsa Isareu eze nibibibakanahatsitsa. Eriseu batu isty zororowy. Nama zuba zizororowy. Nama bipyri zuba — Sesus nikara.<CM>
Ana ziwabykynahaze kytsa Deus wahoro eze tahasakanikinaha. Tahakyrikinaha.

Inakyikyikbaiknaha, Sesus itsipa humo zioktyhyryknaha. Zikyrikinaha tahahudikhudikwy ekze zioktyhyryknaha. Tahahudikhudikwy hara bete nikaranaha. Hara joboni tabo zioktyhyryknaha. Iharatsupetowy bo tapetohikta nikaranaha.
Batu zikaha. Sesus sitazahara buruk niukuru.<CM>
<TS1>Maku ihyrikoso sapybara ibo pororo ziknakarata.<Ts>Sesus Kaparanaũ bo niukuru. Kaparanaũ Karireja eze ky. Anaeze Sudeutsa zinymyrykynahatsa wahoro bo nitsuk. Anaeze kytsa nisispirikpoko.
Mybyrykywy eze Deus wahoro eze nisispirikpoko. Paikpa iktsa nikaranaha:<CM>— O wasani nikara. Tsihyrinymyrẽta babata — nikaranaha. Sesus humo sispirikporẽtsa.
Anaeze estuba maku ata bo hi hyrikoso sapybara pororo ziknakaranaha. Sesus bo iktsa niyze ibo huahua niy.<CM>
Nipukaraka:<CM>— Hawa sa myty tsimy Sesus Nasare ezekta. Amy bo sa tsikzumu. Tsimymyiksiwyhik tsihikik sa. Ikia soho humo kahyrinymyrẽta. Ikia Deus zapehata — niy.<CM>

Sesus hyrikoso sapybara zipeha:<CM>— Aksobyity! Nabo pãoty — niy. Maku wytyk bo inaraha. Hyrikoso sapybara humo kytsa okze tu inaraha. Batu nabaze taty hyrikywy ahabyita. Sesus harere humo ziponaha.<CM>
Iwatsahi kytsa sizubarẽtsa ibaze tu nikozotoktokozonaha:<CM>— O amy skaraba Sesus hyrikoso sapybara pe: “Nabo pãotaha” myze hyỹ sisopyk — niaha.<CM>
Iwaze nanabyitaba Sesus soho ziwabykynaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus sizubarẽtsa nisizororowyky.<Ts>Sesus kyikyk niy. Deus wahoro ekze izoik. Iwaze Simaõ wahoro bo nitsuk. Anaeze Simaõ wapyry niapykyryk. Atatsa ityrykani ihumuẽzumu. Wahoro ezektsa Sesus bo nitsasokonaha.
Niytahi Sesus iwanu baze rikto niy. Ityryk ykzo pe niy. Iwaze ityrykani ihumuẽzumu iwatatsa tu mahani. Iwaze atsoko kyik niy, kytsa nisidisahawyky.<CM>

Iwaze zunabazoze sizubarẽtsa ituktsa simyitsapyritsa Sesus bo nasioktykynaha. Nanabyi nazukmuwykynahatsa Sesus bo nisioktykynaha. Iwaze simyitsapyritsa tatsyhyrypetsa ty sihumo paik nikaranahaze nisizororowybaik.

Hyrikoso sapybara kino niwatihi nisiksiwyhik. Asa kino kytsa ekze nisiksiwyhikze huahua niaha:<CM>— Ikiakta Deus tse hi. Deus pehaha hi — niaha. Iwatahi Sesus hyrikoso sapybara nisibetsakik:<CM>— Ahakso byitaha! — niy. Sihyrinymyrytsa Sesus hi Deus tse babata. Sesus Deus pehaha sihyrinymyrẽtsa iwatahi anatyhi — batu tyso — niy. Iwaze Sesus harere humo niaksohobyrinaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus wasaniha nitsasoko.<Ts>Iwaze inakyokze Sesus nio. Atazuba jerukbara bo niukuru. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa Sesus ziberikinaha. Zihobyknahaze ipe niaha:<CM>— Amo sa tsipiksikiri, mytuk tutarekta — niaha.
Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Batu zik. Aba utakta ustsa hudikhudikwy ezektsa bo Deus harere humo mysispirikpo. Iwatahi ikzumu — niy. Deus soho ty mysispirikpo. Deus tyryktsa moziknaha.<CM>
Sudeutsa zinymyrykynahatsa wahoro bo anabo wasania ty nipamykysoko. Nanabyitaba ziknapamykysoko.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa nisiwatawy.<Ts>Sesus zitsikpaparaknahatsa bo zumu. Asahi pinymyrynahatsa. Kyze Sesus pihikzotsabyri sak eze niriktohoko. Kenasere pihikzotsabyri inarokota. Myzubaha harape baze tu niriktotohokonaha. Zihyrizabaiknaha. Deus harere ziwabykynaha. Sesus Deus harere humo nisispirikpoko. Sizubarẽtsa ziwabykynaha.
Iwaze petoktsa tsarahatsa bo nikozo. Tsarahatsa nimyra eze niapykyknaha. Zitsikpaparakanahatsa botu ziponaha. Niahatsahi tahatõhõryk nitsapikiknaha.
Sesus Simaõ tsaraha bo takoro. Ipe niy:<CM>— Nabo pihik itsikpukte tohi bo zuk tykta! — niy. Yhỹ niy. Niytahi tsaraha eze dyhy niy. Sizubarẽtsa tsaraha eze tu nisispirikpoko.<CM>
Iwaze nisispirikpobaze Simaõ pe niy:<CM>— Tsaraha ty nabo maporik bo zoktykta! Anabo ahatõhõryk ty tsioktsoktsokzonahaktsa kytsa! — niy.<CM>
— O myhyrinymyrykytsa katsa dik botu tsitsikpaparakanaha. Unata batu istyzo. Iwatsatuza ikia harere zehita hyỹ my. Mytõhõryk taoktsotsokokzo — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Peduru tuktsa piknutsazokowy pihik bo zioktsotsokzonaha. Piknutsa estuba zubabyitsa nasizokonaha. Tõhõryk piknutsa inahareknaha, piknutsa humo asiba niaktsawakba.

Tahatõhõryk asiba zitsawakbanaha tahatuktsa bo huahua niaha. Tahatuktsa usta tsaraha ezektsa bo hua nikaranaha.<CM>— Pany. Aidytahaktsa. Nawazekta! Tymytsumuẽhĩnaha — niaha. Izumunahaze tsarahatsa petoktsa piknutsa ty inasihareknaha. Piknutsa tsakyrik ty asiba nitaboknaha.

Anabo Simaõ Peduru nikozoze Sesus okeryk taekaratsa humo puruk puruk niy. Sesus humo ispirikporẽta hi iwatahi taekaratsa humo puruk puruk niy. Ipe niy:<CM>— O ikiakta ẽryktohitu ziktotykta. Uta kamysapybyita mykara — niy.<CM>
Nipybybaiknaha. Piknutsa bo paikpa iktsa nikaranaha. Iwa kytsa kino niwatihi nipybybaiknaha. Piknutsa bo paikpa iktsa nikaranaha.

Tsiaku, itsy Suão ahatsa Sebedeu hyrytsa piknutsa estuba zubabyitsa humo nipybybaiknaha. Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Ahapyby byihu ja! Tapara zikzitsikpaparakanahaze piknutsa ziknasizokonaha. Abaka ikiahatsa katuk mektsa ty tysitsumuẽhĩnaha. Kytsa bo Deus soho tynatsasokonaha. Ahaharere humo ka sizubarẽtsa Deus harere bo hyỹ maha — niy.<CM>
Iwaze tahatsaraha ty bybybyuhikare niaha. Tahatõhõryk zerekbaiknaha. Tahanamy kino niwatihi zerekbaiknaha. Iwaze Sesus hapik niukurunaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus inakõrõrõbaikta zizororowy.<Ts>Nakõrõrõbaikta asiba nibibibata tu zizororowy.<CM>Kyze Sesus hudikhudikwy eze tuze maku ibo izumu. Nakõrõrõbaikta. Atahi Sesus okeryk wytyk bo inaraha. Sesus humo tispirikporẽta iwatahi inaraha. Wytyk bo hok bohyk ahata inaraha iwaze ipe:<CM>— O tsahyrinymyrynikita, tsipitsihikik zeka tsipikzorowy — niy.<CM>
Sesus ihumo paik niy. Ikia pe — Yhỹ my. Uta pazororowykta — niy. Atsoko iakõrõrõtsa nihokdanaha.

Iwatahi Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Sasabyitsa bo kaja sosobyity. Aba ikia Deus wahoro ezekta bo tsipawatawy! Hawa taparakta Moises papeu humo ziwatahaka atsatu ikia Deus bo nyny tsimy. Iwaze sizubarẽtsa azororowy piwabynaha — niy.<CM>
Iwatatu Sesus maku pe — Sosobyity. — Nanabyitaba Sesus soho nitsasoko. Iwatsahi kytsa Sesus bo zumunaha ziwabykynaha. Simyitsapyritsa kino niwatihi ziknasizororowyky.
Sesus kino jerukbara bo atazuba niparak. Anaeze Deus bo nipamykysoko.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus ityryk niakbabata zizororowy.<Ts>Kyze Sesus nisispirikpoko. Sizubarẽtsa ibo zumunaha. Pariseutsa, Moises harere ty nisihyrinymyrykynahatsa iwatsa zumunaha. Karireja iknyktsa, Sudeja iknyktsa, Serusarẽhe iknyktsa sizubarẽtsa iwatsa izumubanaha. Deus zikwy Sesus tuk ziknapykyryk. Iwatahi simyitsapyritsa nisizororowyky.<CM>
Kyze kytsa ityryk niakbabata zebykyknaha. Iwanu bete tu Sesus bo zebyk tsihikiknaha. Sesus bo ityryk niakbata zihoek tsihikiknaha. Batu dik.<CM>

Wahoro inahareknaha. Iwatsahi ityryk niakbabata tatuk batu paku niaha. Sizubarẽtsa humo batu paku aha. Iwatsahi wahoro hara bo zidokoronaha. Iziwy zipeksykiknahaze ityryk niakbabata wanu bete inaripiknaha. Sesus okeryk kytsa tazahara bo inaripiknaha.

Iwaze Sesus iharereziuwytsitsa pe niy:<CM>— O kytsa “Sesus myhumo tsimypokzitsiukrẽta” tsimaha. Iwatahi ikiahatsa humo kakurẽta — niy. Iwaze ityryk niakbabata pe niy:<CM>— O ikia tihi “Kasapybyita Deus humo batu yhỹ mykara” tsimy. Iwatatu paokzohik. Amysapybyita tu tsimykara tatu paokzohik inakokozo — niy.<CM>

Iwaze Pariseutsa, Moises harere humo zinymyrykynahatsitsa niwatihi mytsatyziu nikaranaha. Sesus harere humo tahakyrikinaha.<CM>— Amy skaraba. Hawa sa nitsasoko. Deus zuba mymyokzohik. Ata zuba isapybara ty piokzo mykara — mytsaty nikaranaha. Kytsa iwa mytsaty nikaranaha.<CM>

<sup>(22-23)</sup> Sesus tsihyrinymyrẽta tu iwaze ispe niy:<CM>— O hawa skaraba kytsa. Iwahatu pahaokzohik my zeka tsihokdaharẽna. Batu zikozonaha. Uta kyiktykta my zeka ana humo kino tsihokdaharẽna. Nizororoze kazikwybaba humo ahahyrinymyrẽtsa. Iwatu utakta wyzik niwatihi my — niy.
Ityryk niakbabata pe niy:<CM>— O uta ape “kyiktykta! Awanu ty pohyrykty! Tsiksikta” — niy.<CM>
Atsoko inatarikto. Iwaze tawanu ty kokpuhyryk niy. Tawahoro bo ziksi. Deus bo nisakibaziki:<CM>— O ikia humo ka kakurẽta. Ikia hi tsikzororowy — nikara.
Sizubarẽtsa zinynahaze nipybybaiknaha. Deus bo nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— O Deus ikia humo ka mykurẽtsa. Niwa ha ty ka katsa batu tyny — niaha.<CM>

<TS1>Rewi Sesus tuk zinymyrykyta niyzik ituk niukuru.<Ts>Kyze Sesus niparak. Maku pehatsa tsyhyryze siokyrysarobykyktsa bo iktsa niy. Rewi inarokota. Siokyrysarobykwy sapy eze nidyhyky. Iwaze Sesus:<CM>— Pany kapikta! — niy. Hyỹ niy.<CM>
Kyikyk niy. Tanamy ka zerekbaik. Iapik niparak.
Niytahi Rewi tawahoro eze tamyikahaka. Kytsa siokyrysarobykyktsa sizubarẽtsa, ustsa kino niwatihi, ituk tahadisahakanaha.

Pariseutsa, Moises harere soho humo sihyrinymyrẽtsa kino niwatihi tahakyrikinaha. Asahi zinymyrykynahatsa nisibetsakaknaha:<CM>— Hawa skaraba — tsikykaranaha. — Ikiahatsa siokyrysarobykyktsa tuk tsipahadisahakanaha. Ikiahatsa simysapybyitsa tuk tsipahadisahakanaha — niaha.
Iwaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Simysapybyitsa simyitsapyritsa watsa. Sakurẽtsaktsa mozororowykytsa bo ba zikumunaha. Simyitsapyritsa zuba mozororowykytsa bo pomonaha.
Iwatahi ikzumu simysapyrẽtsa bo ka ba. Utakta simysapybyikitsa bo hi ikzumu iwaze simysapybyitsa kahumo simysapyrẽtsa moziknaha. Iwaze imysapybyri pimoewynaha — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus myzuwy nitsasoko.<Ts>Niahatsahi nipamykysokozonaha:<CM>— Suão Batista tuk zinymyrykynahatsa hauk ahabyitsa ziknakaranaha. Iwaze Deus bo ziknapamykysokonaha. Pariseutsa tuk zinymyrykynahatsa kino niwatihi hauk ahabyitsa ziknakaranaha. Ikia tuk zinymyrykynahatsa batu. Asa hi mynatahadisahakanaha mozikukunaha niwatihi. Amy humo sa atuk zinymyrykynahatsa tahadisahakanaha — nikaranaha.<CM>
Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Maku tasukzaze tatuktsa tuk tamyikaha niy. Tumy mytakuku. Tahadisahakanaha — niy.

— Iwaze isukzata myserekze kytsa batu siaku iwaze hauk ahabyitsa mykaranaha. Iwaze utakta kazo bo myziksizoze zinymyrykynahatsa batu siaku iwaze hauk ahabyitsa mykaranaha — niy. Iwaze Sesus Pariseutsa bo nitsasoko, myzuwy soho nitsasoko.<CM>

Niytahi Sesus nipamykysokozo. Panu soho humo ziwatawyky. Iwa nisihyrinymyryky. Sesus tihi:<CM>— Ba aty tohi panu ezytyk ty zizyzyka, isuk ibyky myzutsuku. Iwa my zeka isuk mysykbaik. Panu ibykta tu ezytyk humo mymyibaik — niy.<CM>

Nipamykysokozo. — Kyze ba aty tohi duabohotsa tsik ezytyk ty siraratsa hwyk ibykta bo pisusu iwa my zeka duabohotsa tsik ezytyk mynapytoze ibykta tsasuk mytok mypokbaik — niy. Duabohotsa tsik tsasuk ibykta bo susu tsimy zeka pimyibaik.
Duabohotsa tsik taweba. Duabohotsa tsik ezytyk tsasuk ezytyk eze tu tsipisusu eze ka.<CM>
Iwaze duabohotsa tsik isuk kino tisapyrẽna maha. Bykyze atahi duabohotsa tsik ezytyk batu iakparawy. Asahi:<CM>— O duabohotsa tsik ziperyky jokboha niy — nikara.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Sudeutsa byrykywy soho humo nisihyrinymyryky.<Ts>Sudeutsa byrykywyze zinymyrykynahatsa Sesus tuk waratok buruk niukurunaha. Zinymyrykynahatsa tirikotsa inasibakanaha nisityhyktyhykyknaha iwaze nisiborokonaha.
Pariseutsa nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— Amy skaraba niwa tsimykaranaha. Nawa zuruze mybyrykywyze katsaktsa batu tarabaja mysopyk — nikaranaha.<CM>
Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Ikiahatsa batu ahahyrinymyry Dawi soho ziwatahaka.

Taparakta Dawi itukytsa taharapaspykze hawa nikaranaha. Deus wahoro bo nitsuk. Atsikara zibykyknaha. Atsikara Deus bo nyny niy ana hi ziokok. Iwaze itukytsa kino niwatihi ziokoknaha. Atsikara humo Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokonahatsa zuba zikziokoknaha. Kytsaktsa batu zikaha. Anaka papeu Dawi soho batu ahahyrinymyry ja — niy.<CM>
— Utakta Deus zikpehata ikiahatsa wata. Uta hi mybyrykywy tsihitsa niwatihi my. Uta zuba mybyrykywy eze pipehaka. Myzubaha kaharere bo yhỹ maha — niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus itsyhyrype noikta zizororowy.<Ts>Kyze Sesus itsyhyrype noikta zizororowy. Usta mybyrykywyze Sesus Deus wahoro bo nitsuk. Anaeze nisispirikpoko. Atsokyka itsyhyrype noikta bo iktsa niy.

Kytsa taparaktsa zinymyrykynahatsitsa, Pariseutsa kino niwatihi Sesus bo iktsaziu nikaranaha. Ibo nikozotoktokonaha:<CM>— O mybyrykywyze hawa pizororowy ja — nikaranaha. Hawa Deus sohokotsa botu ziwatahakanahatsa siharere bo ka Sesus batu yhỹ my nizihikiknaha.

Sesus tsihyrinymyrẽta. Hawa taparaktsa mytsaty nikaranaha, Sesus zinymyry. Iwaze Sesus itsyhyrype noikta pe niy:<CM>— Kyiktykta! Mytazahara eze riktotykta — niy.<CM>Itsyhyrype noikta atsoko kytsa tazahara eze tarikto.

Niytahi Sesus taparaktsa nispehaka:<CM>— Utakta ikiahatsa pehatsa. Hawa skaraba mybyrykywy eze ahasopyk. Mybyrykywy wasani ja tsipisapyky zeka, yhỹ tsimaha. Mybyrykywy eze hawa ja tsipisapybyri zeka wasani ja tsimaha. Mybyrykywy eze kytsa hawa ja tsipitsumuẽhĩkĩ zeka, yhỹ tsimaha. Mybyrykywy eze kytsa hawa ja tsipimyiwy zeka wasani ja tsimaha — niy.<CM>
Sesus sizubatsa bo iktsaziu niy. Iwaze itsyhyrype noikta pe niy:<CM>— Atsipa ty kabo nynyty! — niy. Maku tatsipa ty nyny niy. Iwaze nizororohik.
Iwatsahi kytsa Sesus humo tahakyrikinaha. Iharere ziwabykynahaze asa zuba nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— Hawa sa Sesus ty tsimaha tabezehik sa — nikaranaha. Iwa ihumo tahakyrikinahatsa nikaranaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa nisiwatawyky.<Ts>Kyze Sesus hara bo nido. Unata Deus bo nipamykysoko. Inakyokze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa bo nisiwatawyky.
Zinymyrykynahatsa sizubarẽtsa dose ahatsa bo. Sesus kino nisiwatawyky.<CM>
Ituk zinymyrykynahatsa: Simaõ ta Peduru ty zinaroko, itsy Ãdere kino niwatihi. Tsiaku, Suão Tsiaku tsy. Piripi, Baratoromeu,
Mateus, Tome, usta Tsiaku Arapeu tse,
Tadeu, Simaõ, bipyritsa batu iakparawy Sudas usta Iskariotses inarokota iwatsa, Sesus watawyhytsa. Aibani Sudas Iskariotses Sesus humo isopyksapybyita nikara.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus nisihyrinymyryky iwatatu nisizororowyky.<Ts>Sesus hara zikarape bo zinymyrykynahatsa tuk nisik. Amytsĩ eze pykpyk niaha. Iwaze sizubarẽtsa Sesus bo izumunaha. Sizubarẽtsa ituk niukurunahatsitsa Sesus bo izumunaha. Sudeja ezektsa, Serusarẽhe ezektsa, Tiro ezektsa, Sidõ ezektsa, iwatsa izumukunaha.<CM>
Nanabyi ezektsa izumukunaha. Sesus harere ziwaby tsihikiknaha. Nizororo tsihikiknaha iwatsahi izumukunaha. Mektsaktsa hyrikosotsa sapybaratsa situktsa izumukunaha asahi Sesus nisiksiwyhik.
Myzubaha Sesus zibyby tsihikiknaha. Iwatsahi Sesus zikwy humo nizororokonaha. Deus harere humo nisizororoko. Sesus zikwy humo nisizororowyky.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus mykuwy soho mysukatsihikwy ana soho humo nisihyrinymyryky.<Ts>Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa bo iktsaziu niy. Sakurẽnikitsa soho nitsasoko ispe niy:<CI><PI>— Ahakurẽtsaktsa ikiahatsa batu amy tohi tsimaha.<CI><PI2>Ahanamybyitsa Deus tyryktsa tsimoziknaha — niy.<CI>

<PI>— Ahakurẽtsaktsa abaka aharaparẽtsa.<CI><PI2>Bykyze ikiahatsa ahadisahawynikitsa tsimaha — niy.<CI><PI>— Ahakurẽtsaktsa ikiahatsa abaka tsimopukarakanaha ahamysapybyri humo tsikykaranaha<CI><PI2>iwaze hi bykyze hazi tsimykaranaha kawatsa tsimoziknaha.<CM>

Ahakurẽtsaktsa kytsa ikiahatsa humo tahakyrikinahaze ahape:<CM>“Nabo pãotaha!” mykaranaha. Katuktsa humo takyrikinaha. Iwaze ikiahatsa Deus tyryktsa tsimoziknaha. Siharerewabymybarẽtsa, ahaharere pisapybyrikinaha zeka ahakurẽtsaktsa! — niy.<CM>

— Ahakurẽtsaktsa, kytsa mymysapybyrikinahaze ikiahatsa soho humo ahakurẽtsa tsimoziknaha. Ahayzikrẽtsaktsa! Deus tukze ahanamy tsizubarẽna tsimaha. Tubabatu taparaktsa iwa Deus sohokotsa sisopyk niaha. Deus sohokotsa atsatu sisopyk — Sesus niy.<CM>

Niytahi Sesus sinamynikitsa bo nipamykysokozo. Sininiwy soho nitsasoko.<CI><PI>— O ahawahi sinini tsimynakaranaha. Aba ahanamyrẽtsa. Tapara tu ahayzikrẽtsa tsimykaranaha.<CI><PI2>Ahanamy mopykze sinini tsimykaranaha.<CI>

<PI>O ahawahi sinini tsimynakaranaha.<CI><PI2>Abaka ahadisahawyrẽtsa. Ahadisahawy bo zuba mytsaty tsimykaranaha zeka sinini tsimykaranaha.<CI><PI>Bykyzehu aharapa zeka tsimopuziukunaha.<CI><PI2>O ahawahi sinini tsimynakaranaha abaka ahayzikrẽtsa,<CI><PI>bykyze ahamysapybyri humo mytsaty tsimykaranahaze ana humo hi sinini tsimynakaranaha. Tsimypukarakanaha.<CI><PI2>O ahawahi sinini tsimynakaranaha.<CM>

Sizubarẽtsa nanabyitaba ikiahatsa humo siharereziurẽtsa. Iwaze taparaktsa Deus sohobyitsa tu siharereziurẽtsa. Kytsa “Katsaktsa Deus sohokotsa” mybarapetu ziknakaranaha. Asatu kytsa ziknataharereziu tsihikiknaha. Iwaze sizubarẽtsa ahahumo siharereziurẽtsa pykyhytutaha ikiahatsa siwatsa tsimaha — niy.<CM>
<TS1>Mysukyrytsitsa mysipokzitsinaha.<Ts>Kaharere tsipiwabykynahatsitsa. Uta ikiahatsa pe my:<CM>— Ahasukyrytsitsa tysipokzitsinaha! Ahasukyrytsitsa tysisapywykynaha zeka wasani tsimykaranaha.

Deus bo tsimypamykysokonahaze:<CM>“O Deus kasukyrytsitsa bo wasanitykta. O Deus kasukyrytsitsa humo tysisapywyky”. Iwa ahasukyrytsitsa tsyhyryze Deus bo typamykysokonaha — niy. Niytahi sisukyrytsitsa sopyk nisiwatawy niy. Sesus nisispirikpozo:<CM>
— Aty paokpyk zeka usta taba kino niwatihi tsimy. Aty akpyzazawy pibok zeka asuk humo niwatihi nyny taha. Iwa zeka wasani tsimykara.<CM>
Ba zikakyri aty ape:<CM>“ka bo ja” my zeka ibo nyny tsimy. Aty anamy piakse zeka ba kabo tyzisizokta tsimy wasani tsimaha.<CM>
Sizubarẽtsa ahabo wasani maha tsimyzihikiknaha. Iwaze ikiahatsa sibo tsipisapywykynaha atsawatu sisopyk. Atsawatu kytsa bo wasani sisopyk tsimaha.<CM>

Ikiahatsa ahatukytsa humo zuba ahamypokzitsiukrẽtsa zeka Deus okze “ahasopyksapybyitsa tsimykaranaha” my. Kytsa simysapybyitsa kino niwatihi. Simysapybyitsa situkytsa humo simypokzitsiukrẽtsa. Kytsa ykparawytsa mysipokzitsikinaha.<CM>

Ikiahatsa kytsa humo wasania ty zuba tsimykaranaha zeka asa kino ahawa tu munaha ikiahatsa sisapybyikitsa watsa. Deus okze ka ahamysapybyitsa tsikykaranaha. Iwatsaze kytsa simysapybyitsa kino niwatihi sisopyk. Simysapybyitsa kytsa bo wasania ty zuba, kytsa sibo sisopyk wasani mykaranaha.<CM>

Ikiahatsa ahanamy ty kytsa bo nynyspyk tsimaha zeka kyze myzisizonaha iwa mytsaty tsimaha. Deus okzeka ahamysapybyitsa tsimaha. Kytsa simysapybyitsa kino niwatihi iwa mykaranaha. Tahanamy ty nyny mykaranaha zeka bykyze sinamy pisizonaha. Iwaze hi sinamy sibo myzisizonaha.<CM>

Ahasukyrytsitsa tysipokzitsikinaha! Tysisapywykynahaktsa! Ahanamy ty nynyspyktaha! Iwaze ahanamy ja myzisizo. Ba ahanamy ziperynaha. Iwaze ahanamy baba Deus tuk tsizubarẽna. Deus hyrytsa tsimoziknaha.<CM>

Deus myzubarẽtsa bo mymysapywyikik. Asa kino iharere humo batu yhỹ mykaranaha, asa bo hi mysisapywyikik, simysapyrẽtsa niwatihi mysisapywyikik. Abazubatsa mysisapywyikik. Ikiahatsa ahamypokzitsiukrẽtsaktsa! Ahazo wata atsawatu tsimypokzitsikinaha — Sesus niy.<CM>
