<TS1>Myikaha zubarẽna soho humo nisihyrinymyryky.<Ts>Maku estuba disahawyzozowy baze nidyhyky ana ziwabyze Sesus pe niy.<CM>— O Deus tyryktsa aparakbaha sakurẽtsa. Deus tyryktsa tuk tahadisahakanahaze sakurẽtsa.<CM>
Kyze iwatahi Sesus nipamykysoko.<CM>— Kyze estuba maku myikaha zihitsa mozik. Sizubarẽtsa nisiakzoko.
Imyikaha inakymyze itsumuẽhĩtsa sakzohotsa bo nisipeha ispe niy: “Pany kamyikaha inakymy” nikara. Yhỹ niy. Iwaze sakzohotsa bo niparak. Kytsa batu zuk.<CM>

Sakzohotsa batu yhỹ niaha. Tapara estuba itsumuẽhĩtsa pe niy:<CM>“O uta zik batu, waratok iakse. Tapara uta katsuhuk bo mynakozore.” niy. Iwatahi ikia zihitsa pe tsimy. “Waratok iakse tahi batu pão my” niy.<CM>
Iwaze usta itsumuẽhĩtsa pe niy:<CM>“Uta zik batu, pikuzatsa mytsyhyrytsa wa iksiakse. Aba sibo iktsa my, hawa ja mykaranaha. Iwatahi imyikaha bo ba zikparak” niy.<CM>
Usta ziharawy niwatihi tsumuẽhĩtsa pe niy: “Jaba iksukza iwatahi ba imyikaha bo ba zikumu” niy.<CM>

Iwaze itsumuẽhĩtsa ziksizo. Tamyikahakata bo nitsasobaik. Tamyikahakata ana ziwabykytahi taokaniki. Niytahi tatsumuẽhĩtsa pe niy:<CM>“Aidykta! Nanabyitaba sihudikhudikwy taba! Ske buruk tykuru! Sinamybyikitsa siekbyritsa sihyrizikubyitsa pãozikahabyitsa iwahatsa tynasioktyhyryknaha” niy! Hyỹ niy.<CM>
Ziksizoze itsarawybara kino anatu niy.

Kyze zihitsa ipe niyzo:<CM>“Nabo pãozotykta! Ske buruktsa bo tsimy. Hỹbyri mykaranahatsa tuktu tynasioktyhyk. Iwaze kawahoro mynahareknaha” niy. Iwaze itsumuẽhĩtsa sihudikhudikwy taba niparakzo. Iwaze tamyikahakata wahoro bo nasioktyhyryk. Abaka mydyhydyhywytsa tsarawykytsa zuba. Batu iwewehe bara eze tu nikara — niy.
— Uta tapara baba iksiakzonahatsa hi kadisahawy ty batu hauk zikaha — Sesus niy. Iwa kytsa soho asaktsa Deus harere bo batu yhỹ niaha ana humo hi nisiwatawyky.<CM>
<TS1>Aty sa uta katukta babata mozik niy.<Ts>Kyze myzubaha Sesus tuk niukurunaha. Sesus tasukpe bo iktsa nikara. Nipamykysoko.<CM>

— Aty katukta babata mozihikik zeka. Kaharere humo zinymyrykyta mozik. Atakta kahumo tsimypokzitsiarẽtakta my. Uta tsipikpokzitsiziu zeka uta kino wasani my. Bykyze zuba itukta, izo, ije, ioke, ihyrytsa itukytsa iwatsa mysipokzitsi.

Tapara kahumo pikpokzitsi baba. Bykyze itukytsa zuba. Iwa myzeka katukbabata mozik — niy. Sesus tihi:<CM>— Ikiahatsa sinini tsimykaranaha zeka ja ana hi tsipazoziknaha. Maku iharapatawyhyta pebykyrykze mohyrikosokda atawahi tsimaha. Aty maku harapatawyhyta zebykyrykta wata atahi katukta mozik. Atakta iharapatawyhyta puhyryk ahabyizeka ba katukta zikyzik. Katukta babata sinini mykara tsipazoziknaha maku harapatawyhyta zebykyrykta wata my atatu hawaziy — niy. Iwatahi Sesus nipamykysokozo.<CM>

— Zihyrinymyrykyta my zeka taparaka mytsatyziu tsimaha. Aty wahoro mozukni zeka tapara mytsatyziu my. Kyze maku wahoro jobonita mozukni tsihikik zeka tapara dyhy my iwaze tatuk zuba mytsatyziu mykara. Kaokyrysaro tsizubarẽna zeka. Iokyrysaro izubabyizeka myziakbata zuba iwazeka ba zikymy.
Iwaze kytsa sizubarẽtsa wahoro bo iktsa maha zeka pimyijanaha.
Asahi:<CM>“O atakta ziakbata tatu batu ikymyhuk” nikaranaha. Hawa maku taparaka wahoro soho bo mytsatyziu niy, ikiahatsa niwatihi katuk tsinymyrykynahatsa tsimaha zeka mytsatyziutaha — Sesus niy.<CM>

Sesus nipamykysokozo tasoho humo nisihyrinymyryky. Ispehatsa wata mytsatyziutahaktsa! — Kyze aty sodadutsa pehakatsa des miutsa sodadutsa tuk mowatsoronahaze takyriwytsitsa bo maha. Tapara aparakbyitu mytsatyziuty. Sihyrinymyrykytsa pe my:<CM>“Mysukyrytsitsa sodadutsa tozeka ja abazuba” my. Sihyrinymyryrẽtsa pehatsa bo motsasonaha zeka:<CM>“O mypehakatsa mysukyrytsitsa sodadutsa wĩte miutsa abazubatsa maha. Iwatsahi katsa ba zikwatsoronaha” maha.
Iwaze hi ẽryktsa botu takyriwytsitsa bo kytsa mysipehaka. Ispe niaha:<CM>“O pão pão byitahaktsa tsimaha” maha. Ba zikwatsoro — iwa Sesus nikara.<CM>

— Iwa ikiahatsa ahanamy ty arek ahabyizeka ikia batu katukta babata zikyzik. Hawa ispehatsa sodadutsa soho humo mytsatyziu nikaranaha ikiahatsa niwatihi katuk zinymyrykynahatsa tsimaha zeka mytsatyziu tsimaha — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Poro itsarỹkbara soho humo nisispirikpoko.<Ts><sup>(34-35)</sup> — Zinymyrykyta babata poro waha. Poro titsarakrẽna my. Iwa poro waha tsimahaktsa. Poro itsarỹk byizeka batu tykykyzo my. Batu zik. Poro itsarỹk byizeka wytyk tuktu zeka isapybara mozik. Poro itsarỹk byizeka tsipipaparanaha itsarỹk byizeka istsitsi humo batu isapy iwatahi istsitsi ty batu tyharatoto. Tsipipaparabaiknaha zuba.<CM>Ikiahatsa kaharere ty wabyziu ahabyizeka poro itsarỹkbara waha tsimoziknaha, ahamysapybyitsa tsimoziknaha. Iwatsahi ikiahatsa kaharere tsipiwabytoktonaha. Pykyhytu tahaktsa! Tsipiwabyziunaha zeka kaharere bo yhỹ tsimaha. Niahatsahi katuk zinymyrykynahatsa babatsa tsimoziknaha — Sesus nikara.

<TS1>Hozipyrykza nizarata soho humo nitsasoko.<Ts>Kyze okyrysaro bykyktsitsa, tahapehatsa tsyhyryze zebykyryknaha. Asahi Sesus bo zumukunaha. Simysapybyitsa nikaranaha niwatihi ibo zumukunaha. Myzubaha Sesus harere ziwaby tsihikiknaha.

Pariseutsa kytsa Deus harere nisihyrinymyrykynahatsitsa kino niwatihi Sesus zisapybyrikinaha.<CM>— Atakta simysapybyikitsa tuk iakparawy. Kytsa simysapybyikitsa nikaranaha situk tadisahaka — nikaranaha.<CM>
Sesus ana ziwabytahi kytsa bo nipamykysoko:<CM>

— Kyze aty hozipyrykzatsa humo tsiraratsahohokrẽta zeka. Iwaze nubaze taokarawy bo myziksinahaze estuba nikyrybyri iwa nizarata. Iwatahi nizarata pokzi piberiki tisukatsihikrẽta kyzekta ustsa tyka amytsĩ eze nisierekek. Nokponi hozipyrykza arara nizarata piberiki. Ustsa ty ka erekek niy. Tapara nizarata piberi. Hana bo skaraba my. Tyberi beri ibo typiktumuzo niy.<CM>
Myzikahazoze arara hozipyrykza isukyriki buruk korohyk my. Nizarata tu zisihykzo. Nizarata humo tsakurẽta nikara.
Atsoko iwahoro bo piksi. Taotutsa pauktsitsa bo piksizoze ispe my: “Ikiahatsa katuk ahakurẽtsa tykaranaha karara hozipyrykza nizarata tu ikzikahazo” my. Wasani nikaranaha.<CM>

Iwaze bijoikpe iknytsitsa sizubarẽtsa sisopyksapybyitsa nikaranaha Deus botu nisiokzohik anahumo hi sakurẽtsa. Maku estuba tapara imysapybyita nikara iwaze Deus harere bo hyỹ nikara. Atakta hozipyrykza nizarata zikahazo tawata. Atahi Deus harere bo hyỹ my zeka bijoikpe iknyktsitsa ihumo sakurẽtsa nikaranaha. Aparakbaha humo sakurẽtsa. Deus imysapybyita tu ziknakarata ziokzohikze bijoikpe iknyktsitsa kino ihumo sakurẽtsa — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Mytsozikewy zihokzahik naha soho humo nitsasoko.<Ts>Sesus nikarazo sizubarẽtsa bo atsawatu nitsasokozo:<CM>— Estuba wytyk mytsozikewy tsizubarẽna niy. Mytsozikewy mytsyhyrytsa waha parata hi. Estuba pihokda zeka iwatatsahi mytsozikewy piberi.

Wahoro ke bo piberiki. Tykahabyize rika ty hupok my. Tawaharo pioketsyktsyk. Itsozikewy humo tahi zikwatu piberiki, itsozikewy izikahaze atatsa tatukykyryk pe niy: “O katuk ahakurẽza ky. Katsozikewy nihokdata tu ikzikahazo. Wasani mykara” niy.<CM>

Atatsa tatsozikewy zikaha atatsa tsakurẽtatsa. Maku estuba tapara imysapybyikita ziknakara iwaze Deus harere bo hyỹ mykara zeka bijoikpe iknyktsitsa Deus tsumuẽhĩtsitsa ihumo atatsa watatsa sakurẽtsa.<CM>
<TS1>Itse tazo zerikikta soho nitsasoko.<Ts>Deus kytsa humo tsimypokzitsiukrẽta niy. Sesus nipamykysokozo.<CM>Maku petoktsahatsa ihyrytsa.
Iypykziubyitahi:<CM>— O kazo mybo anamy ty nynytykta! Kaziky bo, uta kabo tsimy — niy.<CM>Hyỹ niy. Tanamy ty sibo nyny niy.
Byri puẽtsik iypykziubyita tanamy zizozoko. Iwatahi meky botu niukuru. Mektsa botu tasapy. Anaeze isopyksapybyita nikara. Tanamy ziwebaik zuba.<CM>
Kyze nepykbaze ba amy tohi humo ba ziktadisaha, ata kino niwatihi batu idisahawyky. Tarapaspyk. Iwatahi anaeze sihudikhudikwy eze estuba zuba tabo paku niy.
Atakta:<CM>— O nabo pazaharezatsa tysidisahawykta! — niy. Iypykziubyita iarapa zumuze.<CM>
— O karaparẽta. Utakta pazaharezatsa disahawy ty pikdisaha tsihikik — niy. Batu. Ba aty tohi ibo nyny ziky.
Kyze mytsaty nikara.<CM>— O nabo kazo baze zuba mydisahawy momoewyky zuba.
Kazokta tsidisahawyrẽta. Karapaspyk mohyrikosokdaka. Piksizoze. Kazo pe my:<CM>“O kazo utakta kasopyksapykbyita ikykara. Ikiakta ba kape katse tsimy.
Atsebyitatu zeka abaze zuba atuktu my. Iwatatu tarabajaziu my” — niy. Iwatahi ziksizo. Tazo zerekek tatu iwatatu ziksizo.<CM>
Kyze izo ziperyky. Itse zumukuze waratok sak eze tatse bo nikozo, nokponi eze tu izo ibo nikozo. Isukziubyita nikorotso. Iwaze izo ihumo imypokzitsi izumu. Iokeryk niparak tatse zihapyrykyk.
Itse:<CM>— O utakta kasopyksapybyita ikykara kazo Deus okze kamysapybyita ikykara. Ikia kape ba katse tsimy — niy. Iwaze izo.<CM>
— O kytsa aidyktaha katsumuẽhĩtsitsa katse suk ty iziuha ty zuba wabehyrytynaha! Katse humo korobyktaha. Inahatsa ipyrysuktsa humo kino niwatihi wabehyryktyny — niy.
Aidytaha pikuza tsibezenaha. Kamyikaha nakymy. O kakurẽta. Atakta katse asiba nihyrikosokdata tu atatu.
Nokponi tasapyta tu kabo ziksizo niy. Yhỹ O mykurẽtsa wahoro ezektsa kino niwatihi nikaranaha.<CM>
Kyze usta ziky taparakta ypykyhy waratok ikny ziksita. Berekzetsa suka ziwaby kytsa nikarikinaha.<CM>
Iwaze tazo tsumuẽhĩtsa pe niy:<CM>— “O niytahi amy skaraba” niy.<CM>
“O atsy ziksizo. Azo pikuza zibeze tamyikaha bete zibeze. Tsakurẽta. Atsy batu ihyrikosokda ibo ziksizo. Tsakurẽta” niy.<CM>

<sup>(28-30)</sup> “O batu imysapy. Utakta ba ziktsuk. Kaokanirẽta” niy. Bykyze sizo izoize ipe niy:<CM>“O ikia kino pakutynykta katse. Tsikadisaha” niy.<CM>“Batu. O atuk mynapykyryk ta tu. Tsimyzikpehakaze uta hyỹ mynakara. Iwatatu batu katy myikaha. Batu pikuza ty tybeze. Atse anamy ziaksebaikta tu iwaze wytykyryk humo ziwebaik, iwaze anamy zipykta tu sa ziksizoze tumy tsipikuku itsyhyryze pikuza tsibeze” niy.

<sup>(31-32)</sup> Izo ipe niyzo:<CM>“O katse ikiakta katuk hi tsimynapykyryk. Uta kanamy atsatu natawihikik. Niwatsa tu abaka mykurẽtsa tsimykaranaha. Tumy takuku. Wasani my. Atsy asiba nihyrikosokda iwatatu atatu. Nizarata wata ziksizo” niy. Aty imysapybara ty nikaratatu zimoewy, Deus humo tispirikporẽta iypykbyita wata. Maku imysapybyita tu my zeka pimoewy Deus bo myziksizo iwaze Deus mysiokzohik. Iypykziubyita wata tazo bo ziksizo — iwa Sesus nisispirikpoko. Deus myzubaha humo tsimypokzitsiukrẽta nisispirikpoko.

<TS1>Ispehatsa pykyhytu ziknybyita soho nitsasoko.<Ts>Kyze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa pe niyzo. Kytsa Deus harere bo batu yhỹ nikaranaha iwatsa tu sihyrinymyrẽtsa, tahanamy soho humo zuba sihyrinymyrẽtsa. Sisoho nisiwatawyky.<CM>— Kyze estuba maku inamyrẽnikita niapykyryk. Itsumuẽhĩtsa inamy ziperyky. Atahi inamyrẽnikita tsyhyryze okyrysaro zikzibykyk, ana hi ihyriziktsokzawy. Iwaze kytsa inamyrẽnikita bo zumukunaha. Ipe niaha:<CM>“O atsumuẽhĩtsa ba aokyrysaro bykyktsa hi anamy ziakseke. Atahi anamy piwebaka. Aokyrysaro humo batu wasani zeky, mybarapetu mykara” niaha.

Iwaze maku inamyrẽnikita iperykytsa pe niy:<CM>“Hawa skaraba wasape hi sa asoho humo nikaranaha” niy. “Kaokyrysaro ty kabo zozotyny. Ikia kaokyrysaro ty kabo tysirezoty. Ikiakta paiksiwyhik kanamy perytsa ba zikziksizo. Mektatu maku kanamy perytsa mozik” niy.<CM>

Iperytsa tapetu isopyk:<CM>“O maku inamyrẽnikita kape niy ‘Nabo pãotykta’ niy. Mektatu maku inamyperytsa mozik. Iwaze uta sa hawa my. Uta wytyk piu naha humo batu kapaik. Kytsa bo okyrysaro humo kamykzasikpybyrẽta.

Uta kahyrinymyrẽta. Iwatatu myperybyitatuze kytsa inamyrẽnikita bo okyrysaro pisirezonahaze siharereziuwy mozik. Asa wahoro bo hi mytsuk. Kytsa:<CM>‘O mywahoro bo paku tsimy. Ikia katsa mytuk tynapykyrykspyk’ maha” niy.<CM>
Iwatahi kytsa sizubarẽtsa nisipeha. Kytsa inamyrẽnikita bo okyrysaro zisirezonaha nisipehaka. Iwaze tapãbabakta pe niy. “Hawa sa maku inamyrẽnikita bo okyrysaro ty nynyrezo tsimy” niy.<CM>

“O situtawy tsizubarẽna, tsihohokrẽna” niy.<CM>Yhỹ nikara. “Iktsa ty apapeu ty abo nyny my. Anaeze dyhyty! Aidyty! Tsapukte eze zuba apapeu humo tsipiwatahaka. Nawa zuba tysirezo tsimy” niy. Yhỹ niy.<CM>

Kyze iperytsa usta pe niy:<CM>“Ikia ja. Hawa sa maku inamyrẽnikita nynyrezo tsimy” niy:<CM>“O wanatsitsa sizubarẽtsa tsihohokrẽtsa” niy.<CM>Yhỹ nikara.<CM>“Iktsa ty apapeu ty abo wabehyrykty. Ikia za tsapukte zuba apapeu humo tsipiwatahaka. Nawa zuba tysirezo tsimy” niy. Iwaze iharereziuwy niyzik.<CM>

Iwatahi maku inamyrẽnikita tatsumuẽhĩtsa soho bo mytsaty mykara:<CM>“O atakta kanamyperytsa tsihyrinymyrẽta babata. Iwatatu imysapy byitatu tsihyrinymyrẽta” — niy. Iwa mytsaty nikara inamyperytsa soho niy.<CM>

Iwaze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa bo nitsasokozo, okyrysaro soho humo nisispirikpoko. Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Abaktsa kytsa tahanamy bo zuba mytsaty mynakaranaha iwatsahi sihyrinymyrẽtsa. Katyryktsa asahi Deus harere bo hyỹ mykaranaha. Okyrysaro soho humo batu sihyrinymyryziu iwatsahi tsinymyrykynaha — niy. — Kytsa tsyhyryze ahaokyrysaro ty natawihikik. Iwaze tsimyhyrikosokdanahaze ahanamy Deus tuk tsimaha. Bykyze Deus tsipihobyknahaze asa humo ahaokyrysaro tsiwihiknaha ahahumo sakurẽtsa iwatsahi ahabo wasani tynakaranahaktsa.<CM>

Kyze ikiahatsa ja ahanamy zuba tsikaeni tsimaha zeka situk wasani tsimykaranaha iwaze ikiahatsa ahanamy tsizubarẽna tsimaha zeka situk niwatihi wasani tsimykaranaha. Ikiahatsa ja ahanamy zuba tsikaeni tsimaha zeka situk batu wasani tsimykaranaha. Iwaze ahanamy tsizubarẽna tsimaha zeka niwatihi situk batu wasani tsimykaranaha — niy.<CM>

— Ikiahatsa namy zuba tsikaeni tsimaha zeka situk mybarapetu tsimykaranaha. Kytsa ahaokyrysaro humo tsimysispihikbatakanaha zeka ba zikspirikponaha. Ikiahatsa ahaspirikpo byizeka Deus isapyrẽnikia ty ba ahabo nyny ziky.<CM>
Ikiahatsa mektsa namy ty pykyhytu ahabyizeka, batu aty tohi ahanamy ty nynyzo ziky.<CM>

Kyze ba aty tohi petoktsahatsa ipehatsitsa bo ziky myhyriziktsokzawy humo my zeka. Itsumuẽhĩtsa petoktsa hatsa bo ba zikaha. Petoktsa hatsa tsimysitsumuẽhĩnaha zeka estuba hi akparawy mozik. Ustakta akparawybyita mozik. Sitsumuẽhĩtsa mytsaty nikara:<CM>“O estuba zuba kakparawy. Ustakta batu kakparawy” Iwa mytsaty nikara. Sesus ispe niy ikiahatsa niwatihi. Deus harere bo hyỹ tsimaha zeka iwaze okyrysaro ty iokboha zuba ahakparawy. Ikiahatsa okyrysaro humo zuba ahakparawy zeka iwaze Deus harere bo batu yhỹ tsimaha — Sesus niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus nisispirikpokozo.<Ts>Pariseutsa Sesus harere ziwabynahaze iharere okyrysaro soho humo tahakyrikinaha. Asahi okyrysaro siakparawy iwatsahi zimyijakanaha.

Niytahi Sesus Pariseutsa bo nipamykysokoze ispe niy:<CM>— Ikiahatsa kytsa okze tsinakaranaha:<CM>“O katsaktsa wasani tsimykaranaha” ahasopyk. Deus ahahumo tsihyrinymyrẽta. Wasanibara humo tsihyrinymyrẽta. Hawa mytsaty tsimykaranaha humo tsihyrinymyrẽta. Kytsa ahasoho bo mytsaty mykaranahaze:<CM>“O wasani mykaranaha” mytsaty ahabyitsa nikaranaha. Deus okzeka anaka imysapybara ty tsimykaranaha. Iwa Deus mytsaty nikara.<CM>

Taparaktsa Moises harere zahahyrinymyryky Deus harere bo yhỹ nikaranaha. Taparaktsa Deus sohokotsa botu ziwatahakanaha ana humo hi sizubarẽtsa yhỹ nikaranaha. Iwatsa tu ziknapykyryknaha. Niytahi Suão Batista nipuruk. Iwaze Deus wasaniha nitsasoko. Kytsa bo wasaniha nitsaso:<CM>“Deus tyryktsa tuk mynapykyk. Taharere ba zimyi” niy. Abaka Deus sohokotsa atsatu mopamykysokonaha. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa Deus tyryktsa moziknaha. Sizubarẽtsa Deus harere ba zimyinaha — niy.<CM>

Sesus nisihyrinymyrykyzo Deus harere soho, Deus harere tawahi mynapykyryk niy.<CM>Amy ty taparaktsa, Deus sohokotsitsa botu ziwatahakanaha, ba zikokza. Bijoikpe mopyk naha humo ba ihokdaha wytyk mopyk naha humo kino ba ihokdaha. Deus iwatahaha ba zikokda. Ziwatahaka naha tsikaeni zuba ba zikokda. Mybarawy mopykze kino siwatahaha tawahi mynapykyk. Deus harere mynapykyk. Iwa Sesus nisihyrinymyrykyzoze niy.<CM>

— Maku tasukza zeka ba mektatsa tu ziakse. Aty taoke pimoewy zeka mektatsa tu piakse zeka Deus okzeka batu imysapy. Iwaze wytyk kino niwatihi. Atatsa kino tabarikta pimoewy zeka mektatu piakse zeka Deus okzeka batu imysapy. Atatsa batu imysapy — Sesus ispe niy.<CM>

<TS1>Inamyrẽnikita Rasaru ahatsa soho nitsasoko.<Ts>Sesus nisispirikpokozo. Abaka kytsa Deus harere bo hyỹ mykaranaha. Aiba ka iharere bo ba yhỹ zikaha. Sesus tihi:<CM>— Kyze maku estuba inamyrẽnikita tadisahawy humo zikzibyituhukutu isapyha ty zuba ziknakara. Tasuk ty ka ipokzitsia ty zuba ziknakara. Iwaze hi ziknatamyikahaka.<CM>
Iwaze usta maku inamybyita. Rasaru inarokota inakõrõrõbaikta. Atahi inamyrẽnikita hokbowy baze ziknadyhyky.

Tadisahawy zikziperyky. Inamyrẽnikita tisorekrẽta hi batu ibo nyny ziknakara. Tadisahawy tsihizik humo kino ba nyny ziknakara. Iwaze inamybyikita itsuhuha ty zuba ziknatadisahaka. Tsikuparinitsa iakõrõrõtsa ziknasihierokok.<CM>

Iwaze Rasaru nihyrikosokda. Bijoikpe iknytsitsa Abarão bo zioktyhyryknaha. Abarão Deus baze mynapykyryk. Anabo bijoikpe iknytsitsa inamybyikita zioktyhyryknaha. Inamyrẽnikita kino niwatihi nihyrikosokda kytsa ziytyknaha. Iwaze inamyrẽnikita hyrizikararawy sinini ykarawy bo tasapy, anaeze sinini mynakara.
Inamyrẽnikita kytsa simysapybyikitsa sapy bo zumu. Iwaze nokponi Abarão bo iktsa niy. Rasaru kino ituk niapykyryk. Abaka inamyrẽnikita sinini mynakarata Abarão bo iktsa niy.<CM>

Iwaze Abarão bo huahua niy:<CM>“O kazo kahumo amypokzitsiukta! Ikia Rasaru kabo tyzipehakta. Tatsyhyry humo pihik ty sokyk ziyk. Sok my zeka bykyze atahi kastiãrik bo tsikziny itsikwarika ty. Uta izo humo mokorobaka. Sinini mynakara” niy.<CM>
Abarão ipe niy:<CM>“O batu ba. Ikia mytsatytykta! Ikia aokzetuze anamyrẽta ziknakara. Rasaru inamybyikita niy. Abaka Rasaru tsakurẽta. Ikia batu aku sinini tsimynakara” niy.

“Nawahi ihoketsihirizezebara nisihiza my mytazaharaze. Aparakbaha usta taba batu zikaha. Ihoke ba zikskaputabanaha niaha. Aparakbaha katuk ikia bo batu koikny zikaha. Ikiahatsa kino niwatihi mybo ba zikziskaraputabanaha” niy.<CM>
Inamyrẽnikita tihi:<CM>“O kazo ikia pe my:<CM>‘Rasaru kazo wahoro bo tsipehakta’
Anaeze uta katukytsa mytsyhyry wa mopykyryknaha. Iwatahi tynasipehare. Iwa tsimyzeka katukytsa sinini ykarawy bo ba zikzumunaha” niy.<CM>

Niytahi Abarão ipe niy:<CM>“O Rasaru ba zipeha. Atukytsa Deus harere Moises ziwatahakanaha isohotsitsa kino niwatihi botu ziwatahakanaha nisisupehekenaha. Iwatahaha humo yhỹ maha zeka ba sinini ykarawy bo ba zikumunaha. Ana harere bo hyỹ mykaranaha zeka sinini ykarawy bo ba zikumunaha” niy.<CM>
“O batu ba kazo. Maku nihyrikosokdata iwaze nahyrizikpo sibo mozumu zeka iwaze Deus harere bo hyỹ mykaranaha. Simysapybyitsa nikaranaha pimoewynaha” niy.<CM>

Abarão: “Batu ba” niy. “Atukytsa Deus harere bo ma ahabyi zeka. Hawa ha ty Deus sohokotsa ziwatahakanaha bo kino niwatihi ma ahabyizeka. Niahatsahi amata nahyrizikpo zeka Deus harere bo batu yhỹ maha ihumo batu sispirikpo maha.” niy — Sesus nikara.<CM>

<TS1>Imysapybyiwy mykara ana hi pimoewyze Deus piokzo.<Ts>Kyze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa bo nipamykysokozo.<CM>Kytsa ustsa mysimyiwykynaha ana soho ty hi nipamykysoko. Kytsa simysapybyikitsa nikaranaha iwa nikaranaha. Atakta usta maku pimyiwyze sinini mykara.

Sesus:<CM>— Atakta harahare ty pisoikaĩhiknaha zeka buburu zuba bo mopapyknaha iwaze moharazuk, ana wa zeka batu sapy. Kytsa kahumo jokboha sispirikpo iwaze amata pimyiwyky iwatahi kahumo ispirikpobyritahi sinini ykarawy bo pipehahik tawahi sinini mynakara — niy.<CM>

Sesus nisihyrinymyrykyzo. Ustsa kytsa pahasapybyinaha zeka tysiokzohik:<CM>— Pykyhytutaha! Atukytsa simysapybyitsa mykaranaha zeka ikia tsipipeha. Atahi imysapybyita nikara zeka anahumo hi tisukatsihikrẽta zeka tsiokzohik.
Niwatihi amata myzisapy byrikizeka ana humo hi batu iaku iwaze tsiokzohikzo. Imysapybyri ty ana nikara naha humo ba mytsaty tsimykara — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Deus humo sispirikporẽtsa.<Ts>Sesus nisihyrinymyryky. Deus humo sispirikporẽtsa. Sesus ykzohotsa ipe niaha. Asahi:<CM>— O katsaktsa ikia humo myspirikporẽtsa. Aba katsa puẽtsik tymospirikpo — niaha.<CM>

Iwaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Deus zikwy humo amy tsimyzapykykynahaze Deus ana humo hi hyỹ my. Tsimyzapykykynaha zeka umaha ataharatatsa tysibokbokyknaha iwaze buburu zuba bo piparik. Niytahi hwi zibokyk buburu zuba bo piparik. Ikiahatsa Deus humo tsimyspirikpobabanaha zeka iwatahi hwi zibokyk buburu zuba bo piparik. Ikiahatsa Deus humo ahaspirikporẽtsa mostarada rik wa. Niytahi Deus zikwy humo hwi zibokyk buburu zuba bo piparik — niy. Ahaspirikpo kino mostarada rik wa zeka iwazehi zeka umaha pe tsimaha. Aidy ikia tu hyrykokytyze buburu zuba bo piparik. Iwatahi my zeka hyỹ mykara.<CM>

<TS1>Sitsumuẽhĩtsa hawa my.<Ts>Sesus nisihyrinymyryky:<CM>— Ikia atsumuẽhĩtsa waratok buruk ja mysiparikik. Hozipyrykzatsa ja mysisuparaka. Waratok ikny ziksize ikia ipe tsimy: “Aidytykta na bete dyhy ty! Tsikadisahakta” tsimy.
Iwa ba ziky. Atsumuẽhĩtsa hi papokzitsiki. Ikia ipe: “Asuk ty korokbykty! Kadisahawy ty! Mypewytsa ty wabehyrykty! Uta tapara pikdisaha bykyze ikia kasapy bo tsipadisaha” niy.
Atsumuẽhĩtsa aharere bo hyỹ my zeka ikia ba ziktsaso. “O tsamysapyrẽta”. Ba ziky. Atsumuẽhĩtsa zuba.<CM>

Ikiahatsa iwata tsimaha. Ikiahatsa Deus harere bo hyỹ tsimaha zeka “kamysapyrẽta ba ziky.” Ikia atsumuẽhĩtsa wata. Tsimytsasokonahaze: “Utakta Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa my iharere bo hyỹ ikykara” tsimaha. Iwa tsimaha — Sesus nikara.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus mytsyhyrytsa watsa siakõrõrõtsa nisizororowy.<Ts>Niytahi Sesus Serusarẽhe bo niukuruze Karireja ziharamu. Samarija buruk ziharamu.
Izumuze kytsa mytsyhyrytsa watsa Sesus zihobyknaha. Kytsa tahakõrõrõtsa humo nibibibakanahatsa tu. Ẽryk tu pykpyk niaha.
Sesus bo opykani hua nikaranaha:<CM>— O Sesus mypehatsa myhumo amypokzitsiuhukta — nikaranaha.<CM>

Sibo nikozoze ispe niy:<CM>— Nabo tsiksizonahaktsa! Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokonahatsa bo tsikahawatawynaha. Ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa pahapiaksukparanaha nawa taha — niy.<CM>Yhỹ niaha. Nitururuknaha ske buruk niukurunahaze nizororobaiknaha. Kytsa tahakõrõrõtsa humo asiba nibibibanahatsa tu nizororobaiknaha.
Estuba nizororota ziksizo. Atahi Samarija ezekta bipyri niy. Nizororota Sesus bo ziksizo. Nizororota Deus bo nipamykysoko. — O Deus ikia hi tsikzororowy. Iwatahi kakurẽta — niy.
Sesus bo zumuze iokeryk taekaratsa humo puruk puruk niy. — O Sesus ikia hi tsamysapyrẽta — nikara. Atakta maku bipyri, Samarija ezekta.<CM>

Niytahi Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Mytsyhyrytsa watsa zuba tsikzororonaha. Ustsa sa hana bo nizororonahatsa. Ustsaktsa sa batu eretezo niy. Estuba zuba Deus bo nipamykysoko. O Deus ikia hi tsamysapyrẽta. Ikia tsikzororowy hỹ — niy.
Ustsa Deus bo batu pamykyso.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Kyiktykta! Nabokta! Ikia kahumo tsikspirikpotawy azororowybaba — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Hawa kytsa Deus tyryktsa moziknaha.<Ts>Kyze Pariseutsa Sesus pe nikaranaha.<CM>— Hawaze sa kytsa Deus tyryktsa moziknaha niaha. Nawa puruze Deus tyryktsa mozumunaha — niaha. Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Deus tyryktsa bo ka ba zikozonaha. Kytsa iwatawy piberikinaha zeka ba zikozonaha niy.
Ba aty tohi naeze Deus tyryktsa ziky. Nabo Deus tyryktsa. Wabyziutaha! Abaka kytsa Deus harere bo hyỹ mykaranaha zeka asahi botu Deus tyryktsa moziknaha iwa Deus tyryktsa ahatuk tu my — nikara.<CM>

Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa pe niy:<CM>— Uta myziksizoze pareparezo mozikta wata my. Bijoikpe eze tu nanabyitaba pareparezo mykaraze tawata iwaha bo myzubatsa kabo iktsa maha. Taparaka sinini mykara. Abaka kytsa kahumo batu sispirikpo — iwa Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa zuba nipamykysoko. Sesus:<CM>— Bykyze Deus bo piksizoze ikiahatsa tsipikny tsihikiknaha. Utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik. Bykyze tsimytsasokonaha. “O uta Sesus piny tsihikik. Sesus mytazahare zeka tsimysapyrẽta. Uta Sesus pe tyziksizota mykara.” Batu ba, mohokda tsimaha — nikara.<CM>
Wastuhu ikiahatsa pe maha:<CM>— Nabo iktsataha! Sesus mozumuku. Tabo iktsataha Sesus mozumuku iwa maha zeka tyberi beri byitaha! Kytsa harere bo ka ma ahabyitaha!
Myziksizoze tsipiknynaha. Bijoikpe buruk nanabyitaba mypubyri pare parezo waha. Aparakbaha kabo tsimykozonaha. Utakta Deus zikpehata myziksizoze iwahi my — niy.<CM>
Sesus:<CM>— Tapara sinini mykara. Abaka kytsa kahumo batu sispirikpo.
Myziksizoze kytsa Noe okze ziknakaranaha ky watsa. Zikzibyituhukutu ziknatahadisahakanaha, zikzikukunaha aha ziknatahasukzakanaha.
Iwa my. Iwaze Noe tsaraha puẽtsikbyita bo nitsukze nahawa. Takoroze atsoko hyritsik inawõ. Ustsa kytsa pihik humo tahababaiknaha. Iwatsa sispirikpobyitsa tahababaiknaha.<CM>

— Ro okze tu niaha wa tihi niy: Zikzibyituhukutu kytsa ziknatahadisahakanaha, zikzikukunaha, ziknasiparikiknaha, wahoro zikzitsetsikiknaha, sinamy ty nyny ziknakaranaha sinamy ziaksekenaha. Ro Sodõ hudikhudikwy ezektsa iwa ziknakaranaha.
Iwaze Ro Sodõ ekze niparakze. Atsoko Deus izo hyritsik waha bijoikpe ikny tu izo inawõkõ. Izohyri tywaha inawõkõ anaezektsa nisibabaik.<CM>
Iwahi myziksizoze atsawatu my.
Uta myziksizoze aty ape baze rikto zeka tanamy bo ba zitsuk. Tanamy ba zebyk. Aty waratok eze mopykyryk zeka ba tawahoro bo baziksizo!<CM>
Ro oke bo mytsatytaha atatsa niparakze tasukpe bo iktsa niytatsa. Nihyrikosokda izo bo niharakoro.
Iwaze aty mowak zeka tanamy pihokzaba tahi wasani habo tasapy. Aty Deus humo tispirikporẽta zeka inamy zuba mohokda atahi tawahi Deus tuk mynapykyryk. Wasani mykara.<CM>
Myziksizoze petoktsa harape tuk atsa bete tu purubakanaha zeka estuba katuk pioktyhyryk. Ustakta perikik.
Petokzahaza wanatsitsa mysiwazikinaha zeka estuba katuk pioktyhyryk. Ustatsa katsa perikik.<CM>

Kytsa petoktsa waratok piwekenaha zeka estuba katuk pioktyhyryk ustakta perikik — niy. Zinymyrykynahatsa ipe niaha:<CM>— Hana eze sa iwa tsimy — niaha. Niytahi Sesus harere pinymyrykynaha. Mytsatyziu mykaranaha.<CM>

Sesus tihi:<CM>— Hawaze nirata zeka urubutsa nakypyknaha. Piborobanaha. Urubutsa Deus bo mytsaty zikahabyitsa sihorotsa zuba nasiborokonaha. Kytsa Deus bo mytsaty zikahabyitsa ihumo sispirikpobyitsa iwatahi babyitatu uta myziksizoze kaharere zuba wasani my — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Haramukuka kytsaharerewabytsa aha humo nisispirikpoko.<Ts>Sesus haramukuka soho nitsasoko. Zinymyrykynahatsa nisihyrinymyryky. Hawa kytsa Deus bo myzapykykynaha, ibo mopamykysoikiknaha ba pyk zikaha. Iwaha humo zinymyrykynahatsa nisihyrinymyryky. Iwatahi haramukuka soho nitsasoko.<CM>
Atahi:<CM>— Kytsaharerewabytsa hudikhudikwy eze niy. Ata kino Deus humo batu ipyby. Kytsa humo batu ma isopyk sihumo batu imypokzitsiu.

Anaeze niwatihi haramukuka ziknapykyryk. Atatsa ibo pororo ziknakara. Ibo ziknatsasoikik:<CM>“O tsiktsumuẽhĩ ky” nikara. “Kasukyrytsa humo kaharere bo wabyty. Ata kino moziksapybyriki. Kaharere tsipiwaby zeka kasukyrytsa sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy bo tsimytsahurukik” niy. Iwa atatsa nipamykysoikik.<CM>
Batu aidy ahabyita ziknakara kytsaharerewabytsa batu yhỹ niy. Bykyze ta humo tu mytsaty niy. “Iwatatu utakta Deus humo batu kapyby. Kytsa humo batu ma kasopyk sihumo batu kamypokzitsiu.

Abaka haramukuka pikykniki. Iwatahi haramukuka pitsumuẽhĩ. Atatsa tasukyrytsa harere soho piwaby. Uta hi atatsa pibetesaka. Iharere ty waby byizeka pikyknizo. Kakubyri mozumu zeka kakidipyk mynaparak” niy — Sesus nikara.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus aparakbaha bo nipamykysoko.<CM>— Kytsaharerewabytsa harere bo wabytahaktsa! Atakta imysapybyitatu nikara. Iwatatu atatsa zibetesaka.

Deus ta abazuba tsimysapyrẽta. Ikiahatsa ahatuktu zuba:<CM>“O Deus ja mymytsumuẽhĩ tsimaha” iwa ba ziktsasonaha. Mymytsumuẽhĩ tsihikik hỹ. Iwatsahi ibo tynapamykysoikiknaha. Unata okoroze ahaeze Deus bo tynapamykysokonaha.

Atahi pahatsumuẽhĩ hỹ. Deus tatyryktsa mysitsumuẽhĩ. Atsoko mysitsumuẽhĩ hỹ. Sihumo tsimypokzitsiarẽta. Utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik. Myziksizoze kytsa kahumo sispirikporẽtsa moziknaha ana hi mozihikik. Deus bo mynapamykysoikiknaha hi mozihikik. Iwatsahi Deus bo tynapamykysoikiknahaktsa kytsa! — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Pariseu okyrysaro bykyktsa ahatsa soho nitsasoko.<Ts>Kyze Sesus nipamykysokozo. Wabytaha simyspihikbatatsa soho humo nisihyrinymyryky. Asaktsa:<CM>— “O katsa zuba wasani Deus okze tsimykaranaha” nikaranaha. Ustsa humo ka tahasupewykynaha — niy. Iwatahi Sesus sisoho nitsasoko.<CM>
— Kyze makutsa petoktsa Deus wahoro zubata bo inapupunaha. Iwaze Deus bo nipamykysokonaha. Estuba Pariseu. Usta okyrysaro bykyktsa iwa ahatsa.

Pariseu ata zuba niriktohoko. Atazuba Deus bo nipamykysoko nawa nikara.<CM>“O Deus ikia humo ka kakurẽta. Ikia kasoho bo wasani mytsaty tsimy. Ustsa kytsaktsa sinamy siakparawy. Utakta batu. Ustsa kytsaktsa mektsaktsa okeza nasipyrirykyknaha. Utakta batu, niwa kasopykbyita. Utakta tohi okyrysarobykyktsa byitawata mynakara.

Pororo mynakara petok mozurukuze hauk ahabyita mynakara. Ikia bo kanamy ty nyny kasopyk. Kanamy tsapukte buruk iwaze abo nyny kasopyk” niy. Iwa tatuktu zuba nipamykysoko. Atahi imysapybyikita nikara isukatsihikbyita nikara.<CM>

Iwaze okyrysaro bykyktsa nokponi tu rikto ahata. Bijoikpe bo iktsa ahabyita tu nikara. Wytyk bo zuba okmymy ahata nikara. Tarok humo zuba baybay nikarata. Iwaze hi Deus bo nipamykysokota iwa nikara:<CM>“O Deus kahumo amypokzitsihukta! kamysapybyita tu mykara” nikara.<CM>

Niahatsahi makutsa petoktsa tahawahoro bo ziksizonahaze — Sesus nikara. Iwaze Sesus nitsasokozo:<CM>— O Pariseu wasanibara ty mykara. Atakta okyrysarobykyktsata ziksi wasani nakarata. Aty: “O utakta wasani” my zeka. Deus ipe:<CM>“O atakta batu wasani isopyk.” Aty: “O kamysapybyita tu mykara ana humo hi kasukatsihikrẽta” my zeka Deus ipe my:<CM>“O atahi wasani isopykta” my — Sesus nikara. Iwa nisihyrinymyryky.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus jabyitsa ahatsa niy.<Ts>Kyze mektsaktsa kytsa tahahyrytsa Sesus bo nisioktyhyryknaha. Iwatsahi nisiharekpypyikiknaha. Iwaze zinymyrykynahatsa tahasakparekenaha. Nisibetsakaknaha.

Sesus ana ziwabyze taokaniki iwaze ispe niy:<CM>— Kyzehu tahaktsa jabyitsa uta kabo tynasioktyhyryknahaktsa! — niy. Zinymyrykynahatsa pe niy:<CM>— Siypyktsa humo ka tsihokdaharẽna jabyitsa humo ka mahani ihokzaha. Iwaze Deus tyryktsa hi jabyitsa watsa maha.
Jabyitsa hi: “Kytsa harere bo ma sisopyk”. Jabyitsa wa tsimaha zeka Deus harere bo: ma tsimaha. Deus bo ma ahabyi zeka ityryktsabyitsa tsimaha — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Tsinamyrẽta Sesus bo zumu.<Ts>Niytahi ispehatsa hudikhudikwy ezektsa tuk tsinamyrẽta Sesus bo zumu. Sesus pe nikara:<CM>— O myhyrinymyrykytsa wasani tsimynakarata. Hawa sa mykara iwatahi mohyrikosokdaze uta Deus tuk kawahi mynapykyryk — niy.<CM>
Sesus:<CM>— Amo skaraba ikia kape wasani tsimynakarata tsiky. Deus zuba wasani mynakara.

Amy ty Deus sohokotsa botu ziwatahakanaha ahyrinymyrẽta. Deus harere tihi nitsasoko: Mektsa okeza ba ziksipyrirynaha. Ba zibezenaha. Usta namy ty hyryk hyryk byitaha. Ba zik spihikbatanaha. Ahazotsa humo awatu taha — Sesus niy.<CM>
— O mypehatsa jabasize tu Deus harere humo wasani ziknakara ana humo ka botu ikspirikpoba ziknakara — niy.

Sesus ziwabyze nitsasokozo:<CM>— Ikia aba estubaha tsimy. Anamy ty sinamybyitsa bo nyny tsimy. Aokyrysaro humo kino niwatihi nynybaik tsimy. Iwaze hi anamy baba Deus sapy eze tu my. Anamy baba ty mynapykyk. Bykyze pany! Kapik tynao — niy.<CM>
Atakta ana ziwabyze iaku byri ta. Tsinamyrẽta hi tanamy pokzi tsiwy tuk batu hyỹ niy.
Sesus tisukatsihikrẽta bo nikozoze atahi zinymyrykynahatsa pe niy:<CM>— Iwaha hiba tsihokdaharẽna sinamyrẽtsa Deus tyryktsa moziknaha.
Tsihokdaharẽna siraratsa kamero inarokota mysukwowowy ispioke buruk mytsuk. Ihokdahanikia tsinamyrẽta Deus tyryk mozik — Sesus niy.<CM>
Sizubarẽtsa ana ziwabynahaze asahi nipamykysokonaha.<CM>— Hawa hatsa sa Deus tyryktsa moziknaha. Aty skaraba Deus myzioktyhyryk — nikaranaha.<CM>
Sesus:<CM>— Kytsa tuk ka ba zikaha. Deus tuk batu amy tohi ihokzaha — niy.<CM>
Niytahi Peduru Sesus pe niy:<CM>— Katsaktsa mywahoro tsikzerebaiknaha. Iwatsahi ikia tuk tsiknamysapynaha — niy.<CM>

Yhỹ my. Sesus:<CM>— Uta kaharere wasani my. Ahawahoro tsiperekeknaha zeka Deus usa wahoro ty ahabo nyny my. Niwatihi ikiahatsa tatukytsa tsimyserekeknaha zeka, tahyrytsa, tazotsa, tsimyserekbanaha zeka iwa abakta ustsa itukytsa moziknaha.
Abakta ustsa tatukytsa, ustsa hyrytsa, ustsa zotsa iwatsa Deus ahabo nyny my. Bykyze ikiahatsa tsimyhyrikosokdanahaze Deus tuk ahawahi tsimynapykyryknaha — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus tabezewy soho mynahyrizikpo naha humo kino nitsasokozo.<Ts>Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa meky botu nisioktyhyryk. Anaeze ispe niy:<CM>— Wabytaha! Serusarẽhe bo tsimykurunaha. Utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik. Kytsa hawa ja katy maha. Hawa Deus sohokotsa botu ziwatahakanaha kasoho atsatu maha. Botu ziwatahakanaha abaka mykaranaha.

<sup>(32-33)</sup> Bipyritsa bo pikoktyhyryknaha. Pikspihikbatanaha. Piksapybyrinaha. Pikpyriryknaha. Pikezozoknaha. Pikpypyknaha. Iwaze pikbezenaha iwa katy maha. Iwaze petok puruze mynahyrizikpo — Sesus niy.
Zinymyrykynahatsa iharere humo sihyrinymyrybyitsa nikaranaha. Iharere tsihokdaharẽna. Hawa ha iharere piwatawyky naha humo batu sihyrinymyry.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus ihyrizikubyrita zizororowy.<Ts>Sesus Serikoho bo niukuru. Zumubahanize ihyrizikubyrita ske sak eze nidyhyky. Kytsa ziharamukunahaze ispe nikara:<CM>— Uta kabo ja — ziknakara.
Niytahi kytsa sizubarẽtsa ziharamukunaha. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa nisiwabyze ispe nikara:<CM>— Amo skaraba — niy.<CM>
— O Sesus Nasare ezekta mozumu — nikaranaha.<CM>
Niytahi ihyrizikubyrita Sesus bo huahua niy:<CM>— Sesus, Dawi tsekoka kahumo amypokzitsiukukta! — niy. Iwa hua nikara.<CM>
Iwatsahi kytsa ziharamukunaha tsahi zibetsakaknaha:<CM>— O aksobyitykta — niaha. Tybyi zuba nikara. Opykani hua nikara:<CM>— Sesus Dawi tsekoka kahumo amypokzitsiuhukta — niy.<CM>
Sesus ske pokteze pyk niy.<CM>— Pany! Kabo pãotyny kabo tyzioktyhyryknaha — niy.<CM>
Iwaze izumuze Sesus tihi:<CM>— Amy skaraba hawa sa abo my — niy.<CM>— O kapehatsa ba zikozonaha. Kahyriziktsa tysizororowykta — niy.<CM>
Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Uta kahumo tsaspirikporẽtawy iwatahi tsikzororo — niy.<CM>

Kyze atsoko ihyrizikubyrita nikozozo. Nihyriziktsa zororo Sesus hapik niukuru. — O Deus ikia humo kakurẽta — nikara. Kytsa niwatihi Deus bo nipamykysokonaha. — O Deus ikia hi tsamysapyrẽta — nikaranaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sakeu Sesus humo meky watu niyzik.<Ts>Sesus Serikoho bo zumukuze.
Kyze Sakeu Serikoho ezekta okyrysaro bykyktsa. Tsinamyrẽta. Kytsa namy zikziakseke. Imyspihikbatanikita. Tsiokyrysarozubarẽta tu iwatatu batu nyny ziky.
Atakta:<CM>— Sesus ziny tsihikik tahi nikara. Iwatahi isoho piwaby — niy. Batu ibo zikozo. Iypykzezebyita hi nikara. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa zihirizabanaha iwatahi Sesus ty batu tyny.
Tsihokdaharẽta. Iwatahi ske buruk siharaze niparak. Hwi ske sak eze tu buruhua tabo nido.<CM>— O abahi Sesus tykara tabo mozumu kaopuke buruk harakmo myze ibo mokozo — mytsaty niy.
Kyze Sesus iopuke buruk izumuzakaze jo bo iktsa niy. Sesus:<CM>— O aidytynykta. Tynasikta! Sakeu pe niy. Aba uta awahoro bo mynakozore. Abaze dyhy my — niy.<CM>Yhỹ niy.<CM>
Iwaze Sakeu aidy sarapuruk niy. Tsakurẽta iwahoro bo zumunahaze.
Ustsa kytsa tihi:<CM>— O Sesus tisorekrẽta baze tu modyhyky. Batu imysapy — nikaranaha.<CM>

Kyze wahoro eze Sesus nipamykysobaze Sakeu kyik niy. Sakeu:<CM>— O nezeba kytsa okyrysaro iaksebaik. Iksispihikbataikik Sesus. Abaka mahani kasorok. Kaokyrysaro ty tsapukte buruk pinyny. Siakubyrinikitsa bo nyny my. Sinamybyikitsa bo nyny my — niy.<CM>
Sesus:<CM>— Iwa wasani. Jaba ikia apokzi ikzumu. Ikia bo iknakara patsumuẽhĩ iky. Mekywatu tsimozik.
Ustsa ikia wata sisopyksapybyikitsa tu mykaranaha. Iwatahi mybarawy bo ikzumu. Sisopyksapybyikitsa tu nikaranaha asahi meky watu moziknaha zeka Deus bo mysioktyhyryk — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Maku tatsumuẽhĩtsa bo okyrysaro zisirezo ana soho humo Sesus nisihyrinymyryky.<Ts>Ziwabynahatsa bo nipamykysokozo. Aba Serusarẽhe zumubahanikinahaze iwatahi Sesus aparakbaha nisihyrinymyryky. Kytsa — Aba ja Deus tyryktsa mozumunaha — mytsaty ahabyitsa nikaranaha.
Iwaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Kyze maku myhyrizikwanita nokponi mokuru. Meky botu mokuru. Myzumuze ispehatsa mozik tsihikik niy. Bykyze myziksizoze.

Ijobyitu tatsumuẽhĩtsitsa mytsyhyrytsa watsa tuk mopamykysoko. Ispe niy:<CM>“Uta ikiahatsa bo ouro ty ahawa tu nyny my. Ouro mytsyhyrytsa waha ty nyny my. Ahawatu nyny nyny my” iwa nyny mykara. Ouro humo tarabaja tsimahaze puẽtsik tsipiaksenaha. Iwataha — niy. Iwa ispe niyze niparak.<CM>

Meky botu niukuru. Kyze itukytsa ihumo batu siakparawy. Kytsa sakyriukrẽtsa. Iwatsahi wastuhu kytsa maku myhyrizikwani bo niukurunaha. Iwaze ibo zumunahaze. Kytsa tihi:<CM>— O katsaktsa batu ikia humo makparawy. Kyzekta ikia abaka mypehatsa byita tuzik — niaha.<CM>
Iwatatu maku myhyrizikwani ispehatsa niyzik. Iwaze tahudikhudikwy ziksizoze tatsumuẽhĩtsitsa bo nisihuahua. Iwaze sitsumuẽhĩtsitsa ibo zumunaha ispe niy:<CM>— Hawa sa ouro ty tsikykaranaha — niy.
Tapara estuba zubata tapehatsa pe niy:<CM>— O kapehatsa ikia estuba ouro ty kabo nyny tsiky. Ta humo katsyhyrytsa wa iakse — niy.<CM>

Myhyrizikwanita tihi:<CM>— O katsumuẽhĩtsa tsamysapyrẽta ikia wasani tsikykara. Ouro ty estuba zuba abo nyny ikyta tu abazuba tsisararawy. Iwatahi ikia bo hudikhudikwy mytsyhyrytsa watsa nyny my. Iwaha tyziperyky tsimy. Ikia ispehatsa tsimozik — niy.<CM>
Usta tsumuẽhĩtsa ipe niy:<CM>— O kapehatsa ikia kabo ouro ty estuba nyny tsiky ta humo mytsyhyry wa iakse — niy.<CM>
Iwatahi maku myhyrizikwanita tihi:<CM>— Ikia hudikhudikwy mytsyhyry wa tyziperyky. Ikia ispehatsa tsimozik — niy.<CM>
Usta tsumuẽhĩtsa ipe niy:<CM>— O kapehatsa ouro ty estuba kabo nyny tsikahaty taty abo nynyzo my. Utakta panu eze iakwaraka, jokpitsĩhik. Aba kino estuba zuba my.

Ikia pokso kapybyrẽta hi ikykara. Ikia batu amy tsumuẽhĩ tsihikik. Ikia humo hi kytsa sinamybyitsa. Ikia namy tsizubarẽna. Ikia kino nyny nynybyity. Ikia waratok sizonita bo batu ziksiparik. Tsinasizozeke zuba. Kyrizykbyitatu tsinasizozeke zuba. Iwa sitsumuẽhĩtsa nitsasoko — Sesus niy.<CM>

Iwaze myhyrizikwanita zibetsakak ipe niy:<CM>— O batu amysapy. Ikia katsumuẽhĩtsa batu apasara tsihik. Batu imysapy aharere humo zuba piwatawy. Ikia mytsaty tsimy utsa kytsa tysinamybyiwyky. Ikia mytsaty tsimy nyny ahabyitatuze kanamy ziakseke zuba. Ikia mytsaty tsimy kapairikihibara tu pizozeke zuba.
Iwatahi amy skaraba maku okyrysaro perytsa bo ouro ty batu nyny tsiky. Iwazeka abaka ouro puẽtsik zuba tsipiakse niy. Iwa myhyrizikwanita — niy.<CM>
Iwaze sinytsitsa pe niy:<CM>— Ouro ty estuba zubataty okoktaha! Iwaze maku katsyhyrytsawa ibo nyny tahaktsa — niy.<CM>
Sinytsitsa tihi:<CM>— O mypehatsa, atakta botu ouro katsyhyrytsawaha niy — niaha.<CM>
Myhyrizikwanita tihi:<CM>— Utakta wasani mykara. Maku tsinamyrẽta tu namy ty abazuba ibo nyny my. Maku inamybyita tsikaeni zuba my zeka piakseba — niy.

Abaka kasukyrytsitsa kabo tynasioktyhyknaha. Kahumo siharerewabymybarẽtsa. Niahatsahi kape niaha:<CM>— O ikia batu mykparawy. Ikia mypehatsa byita tuzik niaha. Aba kaokze tu tysibanaha — niy! Iwatsahi sisukyrytsitsa nisibaiknaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus Serusarẽhe bo zumuku.<Ts>Kyze Sesus Serusarẽhe bo zinymyrykynahatsa haraze niukuru,
Bytykara wa sihudikhudikwy zumubahaninahaze Betipake myzubaha bara. Betanija hara jobonikita Oriwereja inarokoha pauk baze niy. Sesus zumuze tatuktsa petoktsa nispeha.<CM>
Iwa ispe niy:<CM>— Sihudikhudikwy bo pãotaha kytsa! Atsezubaha tsimypupunahaze pikuza tsibik tsipipiktumunaha. Atahi isoikãihikta niy. Ibete dyhyhukbyita niy. Satsukyktaha! Kabo tyzioktyhyknaha!
Aty ahape: “Amo maha zeka”. Myhyrinymyrykytsa tihi mype tyoktyhyrykspyk. Niahatsahi tsimykaranaha. Bykyze ahabo tasirezo tsimaha — niy.<CM>
Kyze zumunahaze wasani pikuza bo zumunaha. Sesus nikara nahawa tihi ibo zumunaha.
Zisatsuknahaze zihitsa ispe niy:<CM>— Hawa skaraba tsimykaranaha — niy.<CM>
— O myhyrinymyrykytsa mype kabo tyzioktyhyknahaktsa niaha tsahi tsimykaranaha — niaha.<CM>
Sesus bo zioktyhyryknaha, tahasuk pikuza bete zizozokonaha. Iwaze Sesus ibete nido.
Kytsa ske buruk tahakpyzazawy zipaparakanaha. Sesus ykparawytsa tahakpyzazawy zipaparakanaha.
Oriwereja tsahara inasikze iapiktsa sizubarẽtsa sakurẽtsa. Siaksoho opykrẽtsa inakaranaha:<CM>— O Deus tsamysapyrẽta. Sesus zuba awata mynakara — nikaranaha.<CM>
— Deus Sesus zipehaka. Deus pauk bazekta tu katsa mybo izumu. Atakta tsimysapyrẽta. Atahi abazubata bijoikpe eze tu niy. Bijoikpe iknyktsitsa ihumo sakurẽtsa — nikaranaha.<CM>
Pariseutsa sitazahara eze Sesus bo nipamykysokonaha. Ipe niaha:<CM>— O myhyrinymyrykytsa zinymyrykynahatsa pe aksobyitahatykta! Siharere ka batu imysapy — niaha.<CM>
Sesus tihi:<CM>— Aparakbaha soso ahabyizeka haraharetsa kaka maha — nikara.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus Serusarẽhe ezektsa humo nipuziuku.<Ts>Sesus Serusarẽhe zumubahaneze nipuziuku. Nawa nikara.<CM>
— O Serusarẽhe ezektsa! Tsinymyrykynaha zeka aty ahahumo tsimynakokozo. Awatutaha. Abaka batu ahahyrinymyry.<CM>
Bykyze ahasukyrytsitsa mozumunaha. Ahudikhudikwy myzipykbaiknaha. Pahahurukwybaiknaha. Ahudikhudikwy pok taba piukunaha, paikpa piukunaha.

Nanabyitaba ahasukyrytsitsa zuba. Ahawahoro myzipykba. Wahoro ezektsa niwatihi nasipyk. Haraharetsa harape betektsa mynatsubanaha. Ikiahatsa Deus mozumuze pahaoktyhyryk ana humo hi batu ahahyrinymyry.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Deus wahoro zubata isturupeze bo nitsuk.<Ts>Kyze Sesus Deus wahoro zubata isturupeze bo nitsuk. Anaeze kytsa bo nikozo. Kytsa tahanamy zihuakaknaha. Okyrysaro ty kytsa bo nyny nikaranaha. Iwatahi nisiksiwyky Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Nabo pãotaha! niy.<CM>
Deus harere niy:<CM>“Atakta uta kawahoro zubata Deus bo mynapamykyso.” Iwa botu ziwatahakanaha. Ikiahatsa hi kawahoro sitsyhyryboarẽtsa parik wa tsikzoknihiknaha — niy.<CM>
Zibyituhukutu Sesus Deus wahoro zubata isturupeze nisihyrinymyryky. Taparaktsa ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa, Deus harere humo sihyrinymyrytsitsa iwatahatsitsa iwatsa Sesus humo batu siakparawy.
Iwatsahi taparaktsa Sesus zibezekyzykynaha. Ustsa kytsa pokso sipybyrẽtsa nikaranaha tsahi batu. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa Sesus ziwabytoktokonaha.<CM>

<TS1>Aty harere humo Sesus kytsa mysipeha. Aty sa ipe: — Natihiktsa — my.<Ts>Kyze usta okoro eze Sesus Deus wahoro zubata isturupeze kytsa nisihyrinymyryky. Deus wasania ty nitsasoko Deus soho ty kytsa bo nipamykysoko. Iwaze taparaktsa Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa, ziwatahakanahatsitsa, kapitaõtsa iwatsa zumubanaha.
Sesus bo zumukunahaze. Ipe niaha:<CM>— Aty sa ikia pe kytsa tysihyrinymyrykta niy. Aty sa zapeha — niaha.<CM>
Ispe niy:<CM>— Uta kino ikiahatsa pe my.
Aty sa Suão Batista pe:<CM>“Kytsa tysiharasusu” niy. Tozeka ja kytsa ipe niaha. Tozeka ja Deus ipe niy. Aty sa Suão Batista pe:<CM>“Kytsa tysiharasusu” — niy.<CM>
Taparaktsa asa zuba nipamykysokonaha.<CM>— Katsaktsa sa hawa tsimaha. Tsimytsasonaha zeka Deus ipe niy iwatahi Sesus mype:<CM>“Amo sa Suão humo batu ahaspirikpo” my.
Tsimytsasonaha zeka kytsa ipe niy. Iwaze kytsa sizubarẽtsa katsa harahareziktsa mybo mynasipaparanaha. Suão hi Deus sohokotsa mytsaty mykaranaha — nikaranaha. Iwa asa zuba nipamykysokonaha.<CM>
Iwatsahi Sesus pe niaha.<CM>— Katsaktsa batu myhyrinymyry aty sa Suão Batista pe:<CM>“O kytsa tysiharasusu!” niy — niaha.
Sesus:<CM>— Uta kino niwatihi. Uta ahabo ba ziktsaso, aty ja kape:<CM>“Kytsa tysihyrinymyrykykta!” — niy. Iwa Sesus Pariseutsa bo nipamykysoko.<CM>

<TS1>Duabohotsa perytsitsa sisopyksapybyitsa soho humo nitsasoko.<Ts>Kyze Sesus aparakbaha bo nipamykysokozo. Duabohotsa perytsitsa sisopyksapybyitsa soho humo ziwatawyky.<CM>Maku estuba duabohotsa nisiparikik. Waratok tsihitsa tsumuẽhĩtsa pe:<CM>— Duabohotsa tysiperynahaktsa! — niy. Iwaze nisierekek. Mekybotu niparak.

<sup>(10-11)</sup> Iwaze nisizozikiknahaze, usta tatsumuẽhĩtsa duabohotsa mysiperykynahatsa bo zipeha. Hwiharatsa itsapukte buruk piakse. Duabohotsa perytsitsa itsumuẽhĩtsa nitsakikinaha. Batu amy tohi ty ibo nyny niaha. Niytahi sizihitsa mektatu ziakzo. Duabohotsa perytsitsa ata kino niwatihi nitsakikinaha. Sisopyksapybyitsa nikaranaha. Batu amy tohi ty ibo nyny niaha.
Iwatahi zihitsa usta tsumuẽhĩtsa zipeha duabohotsa perytsitsa bo zipehazo. Waratok perytsitsa ata kino nitsakikizonaha. Zisukehekzonaha. Batu amy tohi ty ibo nyny niaha. Zihyrikywykynaha.
Duabohotsa zihitsa mytsaty nikara — Hawa sa my. Katse kahumo tsipokzitsiarẽta iwatatu pipeha. Ata humo ka ja ba zikaha — nikara.<CM>

Iwaze itse niparak. Kyze duabohotsa perytsitsa zihitsa tse bo nikozonahaze asa zuba nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— O duabohotsa zihitsa tse tabezehikta kytsa nikaranaha, iwaze inamy takse. Atakta izo mohyrikosokdaze atahi tazo namy piakse. Atahi duabohotsa mynasitsihitsa mozik, ana pokso iwatsahi tabezehikta kytsa! Iwaze katsa hi duabohotsa tsihitsitsa tsimoziknaha. Iwa asa zuba nipamykysokonaha — Sesus niy.<CM>
— Itse sibo zumuze waratok ekze ziksiwyhiknaha. Zibezehiknaha. Duabohotsa zihitsa hawa sa waratok perytsitsa humo my
Niytahi zihitsa perytsitsa bo mozumuku. Mysibaik. Iwazeka waratok ty mektsa bo tu nyny my. Ustsa perytsitsa bo nyny my — Sesus nikara.<CM>Ana ziwabynahaze asahi Sesus pe:<CM>— O batu ba — niaha.<CM>

Iwaze Sesus sibo iktsaziu nikara. Ispe niy:<CM>— Deus harere botu ziwatakanaha. “Kytsa wahoro nizoknikinahaze nitsasonaha ‘O ana harahare batu isapy’ iwa maha zeka mopapyknaha.” Ata hi harahare hi abazubata niyzik. Anahi harahare tisapyrẽta humo ustsa harahareziktsa buruhuwa niaha — niy.
Harahare bete mynarahanaha zeka nisipaparabaik. Atahi harahare kytsa bete mynaraha zeka iwaze wytyk tazy moziknaha.<CM>

<TS1>Kytsa okyrysaro humo Sesa abazubata bo nyny mykaranaha ja.<Ts>Taparaktsa Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa, ziwatahakanahatsitsa sihyrinymyrẽtsa iwatsa soho humo Sesus nitsasoko. Hawa mykaranaha anahi ziwatawy niaha tsahi itsipa humo zioktyhyrynaha. Batu zik kytsa pokso sipybyrẽtsa.

Iwatsahi kytsa Sesus bo nisipehakanaha. Kytsa — O Sesus myhyrinymyrykytsa! — mybarapetu nikaranaha. Asaktsa siharerewabymybarẽtsa. Kytsa Sesus nizokparakanaha iharere ziwabytoktokonaha. Bykyze isoho humo — “O atakta batu imysapy” maha hi — nizihikiknaha. Iwatsahi ispehatsa bo pioktyhyryknaha.

Iwatsahi siharereziutsa wa niukurunaha nizokparakanaha tu iwatsahi Sesus pe nikaranaha.<CM>— O ikia tsahyrinymyrẽta ikia hi kytsa bo tsimypamykysokota wasani tsimykara. Deus harere humo tsinymyry wasani tsimykara. Wasani nisihyrinymyryky.
Kapitão Sesa Homa ezektsa pehakatsa okyrysaro ty ibo nyny tsimaha zeka wasani ja — nikaranaha.<CM>
Asaktsa simysapybyitsa tu mykaranaha ana humo hi Sesus tsihyrinymyrẽta.<CM>

Iwatatu ispe niy:<CM>— Pany okyrysaro ty kabo nynytaha! Aty naro sa okyrysaro humo iwatahaha. Aty hyrikoso sa okyrysaro humo ziwatahaka — niy. — Sesa hyrikoso okyrysaro humo niy.<CM>Sesa naro iwatahaha okyrysaro humo niwatihi — nikaranaha.<CM>
Sesus tihi:<CM>— Ikiahatsa kapitão namy ty ka ibo nyny taha! Okyrysaro ty kapitão bo tsisizonaha. Deus humo kino niwatihi. Deus namy baba ty ka ibo nyny tahaktsa! Deus namy tsisizonaha — niy.<CM>
Sesus harere pisapybyri naha hi mozihikik naha batu zik. Aparakbaha okzeka Sesus harere batu tymyi. Iwatsahi batu tyso. Sesus harere humo paikpa mytsaty nikaranaha.<CM>
<TS1>Mynahyrizikpo naha soho humo nitsasoko.<Ts>Kyze Sadusitsa Sesus bo zumunaha. Asahi kytsa myhyrizikosokdanahaze ba ziknahyrizikponaha mykaranaha. Iwatsahi Sesus bo nipamykysokonaha.<CM>

— O myhyrinymyrykytsa Moises mytsyhyryze papeu humo ziwatahakaze: “Taparakta maku ihyrytsa byitatu nihyrikosokdaze itsy haramukuka ziakse! Iwaze atatsa tabykyhyze mopurukze kytsa tihi: ‘O iziky tse nipuruk’ maha.<CM>
Nawaze tuk itukytsa sete ahatsa nikaranaha. Taparakta tasukza. Hyrytsa ahabyita tu nihyrikosokda.
Niytahi itsy haramukuka ziakse. Itsy kino niwatihi itybykyhybyitatu nihyrikosokda.

Bykyze ustsa itukytsa kino niwatihi harape wanu sapy zikziaksekenahatsa tu batu sihyrytsa byitsa tu niakbakanaha. Iwaze itukytsa mytsyhyry wa atatsa ziaksenaha, estuba nihyrikosokdaze iwaze itsy ziakse siwatu atatsa zioktyhyryknaha. Iwa niaha. Kytsa sete itukytsa sihyrytsahabyitsa tu niakbakanaha.<CM>
Bykyze atatsa kino niwatihi nihyrikosokda.
Nawa puruze myzubaha mynahyrizikponaha aty sa ibarikta babata” nikaranaha, sete itukytsa ahatsa atatsa ziaksenaha — iwa Sesus bo nikaranaha.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Abaktsa kytsa tahasukzanaha.

Iwatsa tu mohyrikosokdanahaze mynahyrizikponaha. Mynahyrizikponahaze ba zik mysukzazonaha. Iwaze Deus tihi:<CM>“Ikiahatsa tsimynahyrizikponaha zeka bijoikpe bo tsimaha, ba zik karazonaha ba zik mysukzazonaha.”
Iwatsahi bijoikpe iknyktsitsa watsa tsimoziknaha. Deus hyrytsa tsimoziknaha.

Tsimyhyrikosokdanaha zeka tsinahyrizikponaha iwatsahi ahahyrinymyrẽtsa niy. Tubabatu Moises niwahi ziwatahaka. Mytsatytaha! Moises okyrysaro mokorobaka soho ziwatahaka. Hana eze okyrysaro ikny Moises Deus yksoho ziwaby Deus tihi:<CM>“Utakta Deus my, Abarão kahumo tispirikporẽta. Isake niwatihi ka humo tispirikporẽta. Adiri Sako kahumo tispirikporẽta” iwa.
Kytsa siakbatsa Deus humo batu sispirikpo. Kytsa asatu zuba Deus humo sispirikporẽtsa. Iwatsahi taparaktsa asatu maha. Deus okze ka myzuba asatu — niy.<CM>
Estuba iwatahahatsitsa ipe niy:<CM>— O myhyrinymyrykytsa ikia tsiktsasoziuku niy.<CM>
Iwatsahi batu amy tohi ziktsasonaha. Sesus harere humo sipybyrẽtsa — nikaranaha. Nihareretsihikbyrinaha.<CM>
<TS1>Deus myzipehata mywata mozikta soho.<Ts>Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Amy skaraba kytsa nitsasokonaha Kiristu, Deus zipehata ahawata Dawi tsekokatsa tu nikaranaha.
Deus hyrikoso humo Dawi babata Samo papeu humo ziwatahakaze:<CI><PI>“Deus kapehatsa pe: ‘Kapanuryk taba dyhyty
<PI>Bykyzehu uta Deus asukyrytsitsa ty apyrytsa pukezi<CI><PI2>tysipykwy apokso sipybyrẽtsa’.”<CI><PI0>Iwa Samo papeu humo iwatahaha.
Dawi hi Kiristu pe niy “Kapehatsa”. Iwa Dawi pehatsa. Dawi tsekokata atsatu sa. Atsatu hiba — Sesus nikara.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus iwaze Moises harere humo zinymyrykynahatsitsa tuk nipamykysoko.<Ts>Kytsa sizubarẽtsa Sesus ziwabykynaha iwaze atahi zinymyrykynahatsa pe niy.<CM>

— Pykyhytutaha! Moises harere humo zinymyrykynahatsitsa humo pykyhytutaha! Asaktsa tahasuk humo isapyha ty zuba siakparawy. “Katsaktsa wasani tsimaha” mytsaty ahabyitsa tu nikaranaha. Kytsa nisihobyknahaze sibo nipamykysoziukunaha. Deus wahoro eze ziknadyhydyhykynahaze tisapyrẽna zuba mynazihikiknaha. Tahamyikaha eze isapyhazuba mynazihikiknaha.<CM>

Kytsa mohyrikosokdanahaze haramukukaka okyrysaro piaksekenaha. Iwaze aparakbaha okzeka Deus bo mopamykysoikiknaha. Simysapybyikitsa tu nikaranaha iwatahi Deus sinini ykarawy bo mysipehahik. Sihyrinymyrykytsitsa tu sinini tynakaranaha — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Haramukuka okyrysaro ty ikatyhi Deus bo nynybaik niy.<Ts>Sesus Deus wahoro zubata isturupeze anaeze kytsa okyrysaro suk bo pokpok nikaranaha. Iwaze hi Sesus sinamynikitsa tahaokyrysaro typok pok nikaranaha ana bo hi Sesus nizoko.
Iwaze Sesus haramukuka bo iktsa niy. Atatsa inamybyitatsa tu petok zuba pok niy.
Sesus tatuktsa pe niy:<CM>— Atatsa hi wasani mykara. Okyrysaro ty ikatyhi nynybaik niy. Sinamynikitsaktsa okyrysaro ty nynytohi nikaranaha. Deus okze ka atatsa abazuba nyny niy.

Sinamynikitsaktsa okyrysaro ty tsizubarẽna zerekeknaha. Atatsa katsa batu. Atatsa inamybyitatsa tu okyrysaro ty tadisahawy huakzetu haty nynybaik niy. Atatsa katsa okyrysaro ty nynybaik niy. Sinamynikitsa Deus okze ka tsikaeni zuba nyny niaha — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Deus wahoro zubata mynakbi naha soho nitsasoko.<Ts>Kyze kytsa Deus wahoro zubata soho humo nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— O haraharetsa taparaka siziurẽtsa niaha. Iktsa taha. Haraharetsa watahawytsa zuba Deus bo nyny niy. Haraharetsa siwatahawy zuba tisapyrẽna — niaha. Nipamykysokonahatsa tu Sesus ispe niy:<CM>

— Haraharetsa bo iktsataha. Haraharetsa sisapyrẽtsa bo iktsa taha. Aibatohi haraharetsa ba harape betektsa mynatsubanaha. Mopaparahabaiknaha harahareziktsa natsubanaha. Deus wahoro zubata eze haraharetsa mytõtõbanahaze iwaze mopykba.<CM>

<TS1>Hawa sa kytsa mysininiwykynaha ana soho humo Sesus nisihyrinymyryky.<Ts>Zinymyrykynahatsa tihi:<CM>— O myhyrinymyrytsa hawaze skaraba Deus wahoro zubata mopykba. Hawaha humo sa mybo tsipiwatawy — nikaranaha.<CM>

Niytahi Sesus iwatawy soho nitsasoko:<CM>— Pykyhytutaha! Kytsa pahaspihikbatakanaha. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa mozumunahaze:<CM>“O utakta Kiristu. Aba Deus zipehata kytsa mysioktyhyryk” maha. Pahaspihikbatakanaha zeka situk ka pão pão byitaha!
Nanabyi soho tsipiwabynaha zeka kytsa ẽryktsa mowatsoronaha. Kytsa bytykara eze kino niwatihi mowatsoronaha ana hi tsipiwabynaha zeka ahapyby byihu ja! Tapara niahawatihi. Mybarawy pykbara tu.<CM>
Sasabyitsa myharape banaha. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa mowatsorokonaha.
Nanabyitaba wytyk mytydydyky tu morapa humo kino niwatihi. Iwatsahi kytsa sizubarẽtsa tarahapapiyknaha. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa sinini maha. Bijoikpe eze mypybywy natakaha.<CM>

Tapara ana bo zuk ahabyizetu kytsa ikiahatsa ahasukyrytsitsa bo pahaoktyhyryknaha. Ikiahatsa kino sihumo sinini tsimykaranaha. Deus wahoro bo pahaoktyhyryknaha iwaze sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy bo pahahuruknaha. Kahumo pahasukyrykynaha.
Ispehatsa okze pahasukyrykynaha. Pahasukyrykynahaze ikiahatsa wasaniha soho ty tsimypamykysokonaha.<CM>
Aba ahahyrinymyrẽtsa. Kytsa ispehakatsa okeryk pahaoktyhyryknahaze ahaharere soho bo batu mytsaty tsimykaranaha. Mytsaty mytsaty byitaha!
Uta kino aharere ty ahabo nyny my. Ahahyrinymyrẽtsa tsimoziknaha. Kaharere ikiahatsa bo motsaso. Ahasukyrytsitsa ahaharere humo ba zikaha.<CM>

Iwaze ahazotsa siharereziubyitsa tu ahasukyrytsitsa bo pahaoktyhyryknaha. Ahazikytsa ahatukytsa kino niwatihi siharereziubyitsa tu ahasukyrytsitsa bo pahaoktyhyryknaha. Wastuhu pahabanaha. Atyryktsa tuk pahabanaha.
Ikiahatsa kahumo ahaspirikporẽtsa iwatsahi kytsa ahahumo batu siakparawy.
Iwatsatu ahabyri typykyknaha. Deus pahapokzitsiki. Aharadi estuba mohokda zeka tsihyrinymyrẽta.
Ikiahatsa sinini tsimaha zeka, awahi Deus tuk tynapykyryknaha. Ikiahatsa Deus tuk tsimynaopykyryknaha — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Serusarẽhe mynakbi ana soho nitsasokozo.<Ts>Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Kyze sodadutsa Serusarẽhe myziharapyryryknahaze tsimykozonahaze atsoko naktsihyripetoktokba iwazeka ahahyrinymyrẽtsa. Serusarẽhe naktsihyripetoktokba.<CM>

Iwaze asaktsa Sudeja eze mopykyryk zeka hara bo tywaknaha! Asaktsa tahahudikhudikwy eze mopykyknahatsaktsa aidy pãotaha! Asaktsa jeruk bara eze mopykyryknahatsaktsa sihudikhudikwy bo erete erete byitaha.
Iwahaty sinini mykaranaha. Deus sohokotsitsa botu ziwatahakanaha atsatu mysisininiwykynaha.<CM>

Wytykyryk sihyryzahaza sisukatsihikrẽza moziknaha. Sijeza kino niwatihi tahabykytsa tuk sisukatsihikrẽza moziknaha. Nawa puruze kytsa sizubarẽtsa sinini mykaranaha. Deus kytsa sisopyksapybyikitsa humo sinini ty ka niy.<CM>

Sizubarẽtsa sokorotsaputsa ty mysibezenaha. Ustsa meky botu mysioktyhyryknaha. Bipyritsa asaktsa Deus humo batu sispirikpo Serusarẽhe bo mozumunaha. Anaeze tuze Serusarẽhe pisapybyrinaha. Serusarẽhe ezektsa bipyritsa pokso sipybyrẽtsa mykaranaha. Kyze Deus tihi: “O niwazubakta!” my — Sesus nikara.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Deus zipehata mywata myziksizo.<Ts>— Bijoikpe eze myziwatawy nanabyi piwatawy. Iwatawy haramwe eze byzoje eze byrisoiktsa eze iwahatsa natakaha. Mybarawy ezektsa sinyhybyitsahi iwatsahi sipybyrẽtsa. Iwatawy pokso sipybyrẽtsa. Buburu zuba ykpyri waha humo. Aparakbaha sipybyrẽtsa.
Batu siaku sipybyrẽtsa zuba. “Hawa sa my” maha. Bijoikpe ezektsa mytydydykyknahaze mokurunaha. Iwatsahi sipybyrẽtsa babatsa. Kytsa babyitsa tu mynatsunaha.<CM>
Iwaze uta Deus zikpehata ahawata myziksizo iwaze aparakbaha tsipiknynaha. Bijoikpe zatata eze tu mynasik. Iwa uta myziksizoze kasapyrẽta kazikwyrẽta my.
Iwa myze ahakurẽtsa tsimoziknaha! Ahapyby byihu ja. Ahapunihikrẽtsa tsimoziknaha. Atsoko uta katyryktsa bo pahaoktyhyryk.<CM>
<TS1>Umaha soho nitsasoko.<Ts>Kyze Sesus kytsa bo nipamykysokozo. Myziksizo ana soho humo hi ziwatawyky. Iwa nisihyrinymyryky.<CM>
— Umaha bo iktsatahaktsa! Ustsa hwitsa bo iktsatahaktsa! Okyrysaropoktsa myponahaze ikiahatsa ahape tu ahasopyk. “O takarasapyky” tsimaha.

Iwa ahahyrinymyrẽtsa. Iwa my zeka ahahyrinymyrẽtsa. Iwata iwatawy tsizubarẽna bijoikpe bo tsimykozonahaze ikiahatsa ahape tu ahasopyk. “O abahi zuba Sesus tatyryktsa tuk myziksizo. Atahi abazubata mozik tsimaha”.
Wasani tsimykaranaha. Wastuhu abaktsa kytsa anabo hi iktsa maha. Kaharere ty atsatu mykara, bykyzehu zuba mohyrikosokdanaha
Bijoikpe mohokda. Mybarawy kino niwatihi mohokda. Kaharere zuba ba zikokza. Kaharerebaba ka tawahi mynapykyk — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Tsikasuparakanahaktsa iwaze iktsaziutaha.<Ts>Sesus ispe niyzo:<CM>— Iktsaziutaha! Ahadisahawy bo mytsaty mytsaty byitaha. Ahamyitsapyri humo mytsaty mytsaty byitaha. Ahamyikaha bo kino mytsaty mytsaty byitaha. Iwaze nawa puruze sizubarẽtsa sinini mykaranahaze anahumo ja ahapyby byihu.
Iwa puruze atsoko mozumu. Hawa siraratsa taokarawy bo mynapupunaha sinyhybyitsa tu mynapupunaha ikiahatsa batu siwatsa tsikahasukparanahaktsa iwatsahi nawa puruze mozumuze batu ahapyby.<CM>

Iwaze ahabyi ahaspihik tsiwabykynaha. Tsipiperykynahaktsa Deus bo tsimypamykysoikiknaha “O Deus ikia tymytsumuẽhĩkta! Kytsa mymysininiwykynaha humo ikia mybo iktsa tsimyze tymytsumuẽhĩ iwatsahi mypunihikrẽtsa tsimoziknaha. Katsa tsimywaknaha iwaze Sesus myziksizoze mypunihikrẽtsa” tsimaha — Sesus nikara.<CM>
Kyze zikzibyituhukutu Sesus Deus wahoro zubata isturupeze nisihyrinymyryky, zunubakaze hara Oriwereja inarokota bo nidoko.
Miwa botu Deus wahoro zubata bozo niy. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa Deus wahoro zubata bo niukurunaha. Sesus natawabyhyk niahatsahi ziwabykynaha.<CM>
<TS1>Hawa kytsa Sesus zibeze tsihikiknaha.<Ts>Kyze Sudeutsa myikaha zumubahanikize, anawaha eze Deus taparaktsa nisitsumuẽhĩ mytsaty ziknakaranaha. Atsikara ipytowybara ty pororo ziknakaranaha.

Kytsa myikaha inakymyze taparaktsa Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa sihyrinymyrykytsitsa kino niwatihi Sesus ziberikinaha. Iwatsahi zibeze tsihikiknaha. Aparakbaha pokso sipybyrẽtsa. Iwaze sipapatu Sesus zibeze tsihikiknaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sudas Sesus sukyrytsitsa bo zumu.<Ts>Niytahi Satanas Sudas tuk niapykyryk. Sudas usa naro Iskariotses inarokota. Sudas Sesus tuk zinymyrykyta.

Iwatatu taparaktsa bo niparak. Taparaktsa Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysonahatsitsa iwaze Deus wahoro perykytsitsa ahatsa bo niparak. Atahi Sesus sukyrytsitsa bo zumu. Iwatahi situk nipamykysoko:<CM>— O Sesus batu ahakparawy. Tsipibeze tsihikiknaha. Uta pahatsumuẽhĩ. Bykyze uta hi ibo pahaoktyhyryk — niy.<CM>
Iwaze ziwabynahatsitsa sakurẽtsa niapykyryknaha.<CM>— O ikia tsimymytsumuẽhĩ zeka okyrysaro ty abo nyny tsimaha — niaha.<CM>
— Yhỹ. Bykyzehuta! Aba ibo piksizo — niy.<CM>— Yhỹ. Tsipiksi za — niaha.<CM>Kyze Sudas mytsaty nikara. — Hawa sa Sesus bo mysioktyhyryk. Yhỹ ja, bykyzehu — niy. Ziperyky zuba.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus tamyikaha bo nisiakzo.<Ts>Kyze Sudeutsa myikaha inakymy. Nawa puruze atsikara ipytowybara ty ziokikiknaha. Sudeutsa hozipyrykzatsa zipyryktsa ty nisibakanaha.
Niytahi Sesus Peduru Suão ahatsa nisipeha. Sesus:<CM>— Nabo kytsa mydisahawy humo bubutaha — niy.<CM>
— Hana eze sa mydisahawy humo bubu tsimaha — niaha.<CM>
Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Wabytaha! Sihudikhudikwy bo tsipomonahaze maku pihik suk bykyhy tuk tsipihobyknahaze ata hi iapik tu wahoro bo mytsukze paku paku tsimaha
Zihitsa pe:<CM>“O Sesus hana eze skaraba mymyikaha ty katuktsa tuk hauk tsimaha tsimahaktsa!”
Ata ahape: “Iktsatahaktsa my”. Wahoro jobo tsimydoknaha. Ipokpedawy bo pykyhytu mydyhywytsa bo iktsa tsimaha. Anaeze hi mymyikaha ty tsimymydisahanaha — niy.<CM>Yhỹ niaha.<CM>
Iwatsahi petoktsa zinymyrykynahatsa nitururuknaha. Sihudikhudikwy izumunahaze Sesus nikara naha watu niy. Iwaze tahamyikaha zikymynaha. Anaeze hozipyrykza tsibik zizokonaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus tatuktsa tuk tadisahaka.<Ts>Zunubaze Sesus zumu. Zinymyrykynahatsa tuk tahadisahakanaha
Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Uta ahatuk pikdisaha tsihikik zetu. Ahahumo kahyrizikbarẽta. Aba sinini my iwatahi ahatuk pikdisaha tsihikik.
Aba na waha ty ikiahatsa tuk ba zikdisahazo. Deus tyryktsa mozumunahaze bykyze zuba pikdisahazo. Bijoikpe eze zuba pikdisahazo — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus taopowysuk ty okok niy. Deus pe niy:<CM>— Ikia humo ka mykurẽtsa — niy. Iwaze sibo nyny niy:<CM>— Paiktahaktsa! Tsõtahaktsa — niy.
— Uta aba zuba duabohotsa tsik pikuku. Ba zikuzo Deus tyryktsa mozumunahaze zuba pikuzo. Bijoikpe eze tu zuba piku — niy.<CM>

Bykyze Sesus atsikara ty okok niy. Deus pe niy:<CM>— Ikia humo ka mykurẽtsa — niy. Atsikara zitsatsakara. Iwaze sibo nyny niy:<CM>— Hauk tahaktsa! Atsikara kanury my. Anaty hauk tsimaha zeka kanury soho bo mytsaty tsimaha.<CM>“Sesus mysapyzeky nihyrikosokda tsimaha” — niy.<CM>

Niytahi duabohotsa tsik soho ty nipamykysoko. Zikuze duabohotsa tsik soho nitsasoko.<CM>— Anaka kaharere ezytyk. Tsipikunahaze kaspu waha tsipikunaha. Kaspu aparakbaha bo mozipoko ana soho bo mytsaty tsimaha — niy.
— Mytazahaeze estuba “O Sesus kaharereziuwybyita. Abaka batu Sesus tukta my” niy. Atahi kasukyrytsitsa bo pikoktyhyryk.

Utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik. Tubabatu kytsa botu ziwatahakanaha. Deus harere “Uta mohyrikosokda nikaranaha. Atakta kasukyrytsitsa bo pikoktyhyryk. Atahi sinini mykara” — niy. Tisukatsihikrẽta mozik.<CM>
Iwaha ziwabynahatsa hi batu siaku.<CM>— O aty skaraba! Utakta batu. Utakta batu — nikaranaha.<CM>

<TS1>Aty sa myhyrizikwanita mozik.<Ts>Iwaze zinymyrykynahatsa asa zuba nipamykysokonaha. Aty sa myhyrizikwani babata nikaranaha.<CM>— Utakta mypehakatsa wata ahazubarẽtsa tyziktsumuẽhĩnaha.<CM>O batu, utaza. Batu, utazakta! Uta ja — nikaranaha.

Iwa nipamykysokonahaze Sesus tihi:<CM>— Ispehatsa bipyritsa tuk asahi kytsa nisipehakanaha. Kytsa tarabaja ziknakaranaha. Tadisahawy supesapy humo nisiakzokonaha, iwatsahi nizekezokonaha kytsa sisoho pe mykaranaha. “O asahi myharereziuwytsa maha mybetesatsitsa” mytsaty ahabyitsa tu nikaranaha.
Ikiahatsaktsa meky watu. Ikiahatsa kytsa tuk “O ustsa kytsa tysitsumuẽhĩnahaktsa” tsimaha.

Deus tihi: “Aty myhyrizikwanita atahi ituktsa tsumuẽhĩtsa babata. Atahi mypehatsa wata. Atahi katyryktsa tukta my” niy. Aty sa abazubata tozeka ja tadisakata ustaza sidisahawybykyktsa ja mytsatytaha. Tadisahakata hiba tsimaha. Atahi myhyrizikwanita. Uta hiba ahatazahaeze mydisahawybykyktsa wata — niy. Iwa zinymyrykynahatsa nipamykysokozo.<CM>
— Uta sinini mykaraze. Ikiahatsa katuktu tsinapykyryknaha.
Kazo zikwy humo mypehatsa mozik. Niwatihi uta pahany.
Iwatuze ikiahatsa mypehatsa tsimoziknahaze kadisahawy zozowy baze tsipadisahanaha. Iwa Isareu ezektsa harere tsipiwabynaha — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Peduru nisupeheke.<Ts>Kyze Sesus Simaõ Peduru pe niyzo.<CM>— Simaõ wabyziutykta! Satanas kape niy:<CM>“O uta ikia tuktsa zinymyrykynahatsa mysiakpy zeka ikia yhỹ tsimy. Simaõ Peduru piakpy zeka yhỹ tsimy” niy.<CM>Yhỹ ahumo za tsipiakpy — iky. Iwa Satanas botu niy. Hawa hahauktsa karetsawakatsa dua eze siriktsa mysidydykynahaze ky iwaze Satanas pakpy zeka amy ty isapyrẽnikia motare my. Satanas tapetu nikara:<CM>— O tozeka ja Simaõ Peduru Sesus humo ispirikpota babata iwatahi piakpy — niy.<CM>

Iwaze utakta Deus bo atsyhyryze botu ikpamykysoko:<CM>— O Deus Simaõ Peduru tsikaeni zuba kahumo ispirikpo tsipitsumuẽhĩ iwatahi atahi kahumo tispirikporẽta babata mozik — niy. Iwaze Sesus Peduru pe niy. — Kahumo tsimyspirikpozoze atukytsa tynasipunihikwyky. Iwaze tysitsumuẽhĩ. Asahi ahumo sispirikporẽtsa moziknaha — niy.<CM>
Peduru ipe niy:<CM>— Utakta atukta babata katsipa humo pikoktyhyryknaha zeka yhỹ my. Uta kino atuk tu mohyrikosokda — niy.<CM>
— O Peduru, kyze kokuaro ipobyi tu harakykbyi hi “Batu Sesus kanyhy” tsimy — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa nisisupeheke.<Ts>Iwaze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa pe niy:<CM>— Ahapehaze iky ahaperykbyitsa tu ahaokyrysaro anabyitsatu ahapyrysuktsabyitsa tu, amy humo ahakubyri zika — niy.<CM>— Batu amy tohi mykubyri — niaha.<CM>
Abaka meky watu. Peryk tsibyknaha! Okyrysaro ty wabehyryktaha! Ahasokorotsapu byizeka ahakpyzazawy humo tsipihuaknaha iwaze sokorotsapu tsipiakse.

Ziwatahakanahatsitsa ikiahatsa pe my. Tubabatu kasoho ziwatahakanaha. Amy ty botu ziwatahakanaha atsatu kytsa mykaranaha. Ziwatahakanaha:<CM>— Deus zipehata isopyksapybyita wata maha — niaha. — Kytsa kasoho humo nawa pahaspihikbatakanaha — niy.<CM>
Iwaze zinymyrykynahatsa ipe:<CM>— O mypehatsa sokorotsapu petoktsa — niy. — Niwazuba — niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus Oriwerejatsa hara bo nido.<Ts>Sesus hara bo niparak. Atsa botu ziknakara. Iwaze Oriwerejatsa hara bo nido. Zinymyrykynahatsa niwatihi ituk niukururunaha.
Hara bo zumunahaze ispe niy:<CM>— Deus bo typamykysonahaktsa! Iwaze kytsa pahasapybyinaha zeka batu tsimaha. Ikiahatsa isapybara humo ba yhỹ tsimaha — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus bytykarawatu tirĩta meteros niapykyryk. Iwaze Sesus taekaratsa humo puruk puruk niy. Deus bo nipamykysoko.<CM>

Atahi:<CM>— O kazo nawa tsimyzihikik zeka sinini my kasukyrytsitsa pikbezenaha. Uta tu zeka ba kahyrikosokda tsihik. Ikia hi: “Tyhyrikosokdakta” tsimyzeka mohyrikosokda. Ikia harere bo yhỹ my — niy.<CM>
Atsoko bijoikpe iknykta Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa ibo inasik zitsumuẽhĩkĩ iwatahi tsipunihikrẽta niyzik.
Sesus Deus bo nipamykysokozo. Tisukatsihikrẽta nikara. Itsizuk ispu hyritywaha zipoko wytyk bo inatsuku.<CM>
Deus bo nipamykysobaze nikyikykzo. Zinymyrykynahatsa bo zumuzo. Sibo zumuze sisukatsihikrẽtsa hi zurubakanaha.
Ispe niy:<CM>— Amo sa tsipurubakanaha. Kyiktaha! Deus bo typamykysonaha! Iwa ahabyi zeka imysapybara ty tsimykaranaha — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Isukyrytsitsa Sesus zioktyhyryknaha.<Ts>Sesus nipamykysokoze kytsa sizubarẽtsa zumukunaha. Sudas siharaze zumuku. Atahi zinymyrykynahatsa tukta kytsa haraze inaukuru. Iwaze Sesus kytsa bo piwatawy nikara tahi. Iwaze Sesus bo izikeba ziharapyrykik.<CM>

Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Tsipikarapyryk zeka sibo tsipikwatawy. Ikia hi kasukyrytsitsa bo tsipikoktyhyryk. Imyspihikbatanikita tsimy. Utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik. Ikia tsipikarapyrykyk nawa kasukyrytsitsa bo tsipikwatawy.<CM>
Iwaze zinymyrykynahatsa Sesus sukyrytsitsa bo nikozonahaze ipe niaha:<CM>— O mypehakatsa katsa kino sa mykuwytsa natahaboboknaha — niaha.<CM>
Niytahi ipaukbazekta zinymyrykyta hi taparaktsa tsumuẽhĩtsa zispizykik.
Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— O awatu tykta! — iwaze Sesus ispi ty okokzo niyze atsoko zispizororowy.

Kyze Sesus Deus wahoro zubata ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa ispehatsa, Deus wahoro perytsitsa iwatsahatsa pe niy:<CM>— Amy skaraba ahaupepetsa, ahakuwytsa iwatsa tsiknasebykyknaha awatutaha. Utakta katsyhyryboabyita. Batu kakyri.

Ahatuk zikzibyituhukutu. Deus wahoro zubata eze kytsa iksihyrinymyryky iwatsa tu sa batu katsipa humo katy oktyhyryk. Abaka ikiahatsa hawa tsimyzihikiknaha naha humo tsimykaranaha iwatsahi katsipa humo tsikoktyhyryknaha. Hawa ha ty Satanas hyrikoso sapybara pehatsa zahapeha iwa tsimaha. Ikiahatsa Satanas harere bo yhỹ tsimykaranaha.<CM>

<TS1>Peduru Sesusta batu kanyhy nikara.<Ts>Kytsa Sesus isukyrytsitsa bo zioktyhyryknaha. Deus wahoro zubata eze ziknapamykysokonahatsa tuk myhyrizikwanita wahoro bo zioktyhyryknaha. Peduru ẽrykani tu iapik niukuru. Atazuba niukuru.
Kyze niaha tsahi izo zipoknahaze taparakta wahoro peze nidyhydyhykynaha. Peduru situk nidyhyky.
Estuba itsumuẽhĩtsata ibo nikozo. Izo baze niakpyzazakata iwatatsahi nikozo. Atatsahi:<CM>— O ikia hi sa Sesus tukta — niy.<CM>
— O Batu. Batu kanyhy — niy.<CM>
Bykyze usta ipe niy:<CM>— O ikia hi kok Sesus tuk tsinymyrykyta — niy. Iwaze:<CM>— O batu ba, batu kanyhy — niy.<CM>
Bykyze mekta tu ipe niy:<CM>— O hawa skaraba ikia hi sa Sesus tukta. Ikia kino sa Karireja ezekta. Ikia hi Sesus tukta — niy.<CM>
Peduru ipe niy:<CM>— Batu kanyhy. Aty skaraba Sesus — niy.<CM>
Iwa nitsasokoze kokuaro nipo. Peduru mytsaty niy. Nezeba Sesus kape niy:<CM>— O kokuaro ipobyize ka “Batu Sesus kanyhy” tsimy — niy. Atsoko Sesus Peduru bo nikozo.<CM>
Iwaze Peduru niparak. Nipuziuku.<CM>
<TS1>Sodadutsa Sesus nitsakikinaha.<Ts>Kytsa Sesus ziperykynahatsa zimyijakaranaha. Nitsakikinaha.
Zihyrizikwarakanahaze ipe nikaranaha:<CM>— Ikia ahyrinymyrẽta zeka aty skaraba zaki — nikaranaha.
Asahi Sesus zisapybyrikinaha.<CM>

<TS1>Kytsa Sesus kytsaharerewabytsitsa bo zioktyhyryknaha.<Ts>Miwa botu taparaktsa inakypykyknaha. Ispehaktsa, sihyrinymyrykytsitsa, kapitaõtsa iwatsa inakypykyknaha. Bykyze Sesus taparaktsa bo zioktyhyryknaha.<CM>
Iwatsahi ipe nikaranaha:<CM>— Ikia hi Deus zapehata zeka mybo tytsasokta — niaha. Sesus hi:<CM>
— Uta yhỹ my zeka, ikiahatsa batu kahumo ahaspirikpo. Ikiahatsa kaharere bo batu yhỹ zikaha. Uta hiba Deus zikpehata my.
Abaka Deus tuk modyhyky. Deus zikwyrẽnikita tuk modyhyky — niy. Niahatsahi nipamykysokonaha.<CM>
— O ikia hi sa Deus tse — nikaranaha.<CM>— Iwa ikiahatsa ziknatsasokonaha — Sesus niy.<CM>
— Amy skaraba kytsa tsimysiberikinaha iwaze hi Sesus harere soho motsasokonaha. Katsa kino iharere imysapybara ty tsiwabykynaha. Niwazuba — taparaktsa nikaranaha.<CM>
<TS1>Kytsa Sesus Piratus bo zioktyhyryknaha.<Ts>Niahatsahi aparakbaha kyikyik niaha. Sesus Piratus bo zioktyhyryknaha.

Piratus bo zumunahaze Sesus amybara humo tu zisohometukunaha. Iwa nikaranaha.<CM>— Atakta kytsa bo nipamykysoko. “Homa ezektsa pehatsa bo okyrysaro ty batu nyny tsimaha” zispihikbatakanaha. Atakta “Deus zikpehata mypehatsa mozik” — mybarapetu nikaranaha. Iwa Piratus bo zisohometukunaha.<CM>
Iwatahi Piratus Sesus pe niy:<CM>— Ikia hi sa Sudeutsa pehatsa babata — niy. — Yhỹ. Wasani tsiky — niy.<CM>
Piratus kytsa sizubarẽtsa bo, taparaktsa Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa kino niwatihi ispe niy:<CM>— Atakta wasanita. Tsimysapyrẽta mynakara batu amytohi ty ziky — niy.<CM>

Kytsa tahaharere ty harapubetehe nikaranaha.<CM>— Atakta batu imysapy — mybarapetu nikaranaha.<CM>— Kytsa Sudeja eze Karireja eze kino niwatihi kytsa nisihyrinymyrykyze nisimyiwyky. Aba tykara bo izumu. Kytsa nisimyiwyky iharere humo — nikaranaha. Iwa zisohometukunaha.<CM>
<TS1>Kytsa Sesus Erodes bo zioktyhyryknaha.<Ts>Piratus ana ziwabyze ispe niy:<CM>— Hawa skaraba atakta hi sa Karireja ezekta — niy.<CM>Yhỹ nikaranaha. Iwatahi Piratus Erodes pehatsa bo zipehahik.<CM>
Sesus Karireja ezekta tu Erodes bo zipehahik. Atahi Karireja ezektsa pehatsa. Iwaze Serusarẽhe bo inakozore. Iwatahi Piratus Sesus Erodes bo zipehahik.<CM>

<sup>(8-9)</sup> Erodes Sesus bo nikozoze tsakurẽta nikara. Nezeba Sesus humo ziwaby iwatahi Sesus ziny tsihikik. Sesus zikwy piny tsihikik. Amy ty kytsa batu zikaha Sesus mykara ana humo hi piny tsihikik. Sesus batu ibo harere.
Taparaktsa Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa tuk iwatahatsitsa kino niwatihi niriktotohokonaha. Asahi zisohometukunaha. Siharerewabymybarẽtsa.
Erodes sodadutsa tuk Sesus zimyijakanaha. Sesus myzisukyrykiknaha. Iwaze isuk tisapyrẽta ty ihumo korokbyk niaha. Iwaze zimyijakanaha. Niahatsahi Piratus bo zisihyrykzonaha.<CM>
Iwaze Erodes Piratus iharereziuwy niyzik. Nezeba sakyriwytsa ziknakaranaha. Abaka siharereziuwytsa niyziknaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus tabezewy.<Ts>Piratus myhyrizikwanikita, Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa tuk, kytsa Sudeutsa hudikhudikwy pehatsitsa iwatsa inakypykyknaha. Piratus hi:<CM>Tynazuzuknahaktsa!<CM>

Iwaze ispe niy:<CM>— Atakta kabo tsizioktyhyryknaha. Ikiahatsa tihi:<CM>“O atakta isopyksapybyita” tsikykaranaha. Batu ba. Ikiahatsa okze ituk ikpamykysoko. Utakta batu amy tohi ihumo iky. Atahi batu tymyi. Tsiktsasokonaha batu sapy niy.
Erodes niwatihi isoho “Batu tymyi” niy.
Iwatahi katsa mybo zipehahikzo. Atahi batu tabeze my. Uta pipeha hwi ty tytsakikta. Bykyze piksiwyhik — Piratus niy.<CM>
Tubabatu Paskoa myikaha eze Piratus estuba ziknazukekenaha.

Iwaze Piratus hi:<CM>— O Sesus myzuke. Tapara tytsakikta bykyze myzuke — niy.<CM>Aparakbaha opykani kadi nikaranaha:<CM>— Sesus tabezehikta! Bahabas tyzukehikta — nikaranaha. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy eze tu niapykyryknaha.<CM>
Situkta estuba nizukenaha. Sakyriukrẽnikitsa hurukwy eze Bahabas niapykyryk. Kytsa bakatsa. Iwatsahi nitsahuruknaha.<CM>
Piratus Sesus nizuke tsihikik iwaze kytsa bo nitsasokozo:<CM>— O Sesus myzukehik tsimaha — niy.<CM>

<sup>(21-22)</sup> Aparakbaha opykani kadi nikaranaha:<CM>— Tabezehikta! Iharapatawyhyta humo tabezehikta — nikaranaha. Iwaze Piratus nitsasokozoze:<CM>— Hawa skaraba nikara. Batu amy tohi ihumo. Batu tymyi. Tybeze beze byitaha. Iwatahi uta pipeha tytsakinaha bykyze myzukeze — niy.
Batu ba. Aparakbaha opykani kadi nikaranahazo. Hỹ byri nikaranaha:<CM>— Tabezehikta! Tabezehikta! — nikaranaha.
Iwaze Piratus hi:<CM>Yhỹ niy. Siharereze Bahabas nizuke.
Bahabas kytsa bakatsa nizuke. Maku iharereziubyikita nizuke. Sesus ty zuba sibo nyny niy. Iwaze siharereze tabezewy.<CM>

<TS1>Iharapatawyhyta humo zihyrizikiknaha.<Ts>Kyze sodadutsa Sesus zioktyhyryknahaze ske buruk maku zihobyknaha. Simaõ inarokota. Sireni ezekta. Tatsuhuk ikny ziksikirita. Simaõ nizokbatsinaha. Ipe niaha:<CM>— O iharapatawyhyta tsebykta — niaha. Niytahi iharapatawyhyta tasukyriki bete ziskik. Sesus hapik niukuru.<CM>
Aparakbaha iapik niukurunaha. Wytykyryk kino niwatihi iapik niukurunaha. Kykyry zipokzitsikinaha iwazahi nipukarakanaha.
Sesus sibo uwok niy ispe niy:<CM>— O Serusarẽhe eze kykyry katy pokzi pokzi byitaha. Ikiahaka zuba ahapokzi iwaze ahahyrytsa pokzi tynapukarakanaha.
Iwatuktu puruze kytsa tihi:<CM>“Sakurẽza sibykyhybyiza. Sakurẽza sibykyhyhuk byiza. Sakurẽza tahabykyhytsa ba ziksiwazuknaha.” Kytsa sinini mykaranaha, ana pokso hi mohyrikosokda tsihikiknaha.
Iwaze aparakbaha mykaranaha “Hara mybete mynaraha. Harahare katsa mymyokpitsĩ” mykaranaha. Mysinini humo iwa ty mytsaty mykaranaha.
Iktsa tsimaha. Hawa kytsa kahumo mykaranaha. Kamysapyrẽta tuzeka hawa mykaranaha. Ikiahatsa ja, ahasopyksapybyitsa tu tsikykaranaha hawa sa ahahumo mykaranaha — niy.<CM>
Kyze petoktsa kytsa Sesus tuk nisioktyhyryknaha. Kytsa bakatsitsa. Kytsa tahapehatsa harere bo batu yhỹ nikaranaha. Sesus tuk mysibezenaha.

Zumunahaze isapy bo niaha. Iharekpokoso inarokoha bo izumunahaze Sesus iharapatawyhyta bete zitsyhyrysoikare eze nisihyrizikiknaha. Ipyrytsa ty kino niwatihi zihyrizikiknaha. Nikymynahaze iharapatawyhyta jobo ziriktohiknaha. Ituk kytsa petoktsa siharapatawyhytsa humo nisihyriziknaha. Nataba nataba aha.<CM>

Sesus Deus bo nipamykysoko:<CM>— O kazo kytsa sihyrinymyrybyitsa kahumo mykaranaha ba ziktsapusare. Sisopyksapybyitsa tu tysiokzohik — niy.<CM>Iwa Deus bo nipamykysoko. Niahatsahi Sesus suk zibokiknahaze hi sodadutsa zibiakaknaha.

Kytsa ibo iktsa nikaranaha. Taparaktsa niwatihi zipyrirykyknaha. Asahi:<CM>— Ustsa kytsa tsiksitsumuẽhĩkĩ. Aba ikia tu tsikatsumuẽhĩkta! Ikia hi Deus zapehata zeka tynasikta! Ikia hi Kiristu zeka ja — nikaranaha.<CM>
Sodadutsa niwatihi zipyrirykyknaha. Iopukeze duabohotsa tsik ty itsãrãkbara ty ibo nyny nikaranaha. Iwa zimyijakanaha.
Ipe nikaranaha:<CM>— Ikia hi Sudeutsa pehatsa babata zeka tynasikta! — nikaranaha.<CM>
Iharapu bete botu ziwatahakanaha: <font size=-1>SUDEUTSA PEHATSA </font>aha iwatahaha.<CM>

Estuba sibakatsa ituk zumuzakaze Sesus zisapybyriki:<CM>— Ikia Deus zapehata zeka ikiatu tsikatsumuẽhĩkta iwaze katsa tymytsumuẽhĩ. Ikia zikwy tu zeka tymytsumuẽhĩkta — niy. Iwa zisapybyriki ta nikara.<CM>
Usta iharere ziwabyze takyriki. Zibetsakik.<CM>— Iwa Sesus pe ka niwazubakta niy ikia sa Deus humo batu apyby katsa hiba ituk tsimykzanaha. Katsa kino sinini tsimykaranahaze wasani.
Mysapybyitsa hi tsimykaranaha. Atakta batu amy tohi byitatu — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus pe niy:<CM>— O Sesus kabo mytsaty tsimy. Abazubata tsimozikze kabo mytsatytykta — niy.<CM>
Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Yhỹ kyzetu. Ikiakta katuk tu bijoikpe bo tsipasapy — niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus nihyrikosokda.<Ts>Kyze tokbaha niyzikze miwa niyzik. Haramwe bawa niyzik unata ky wa nio bykyze iharakibikia eze inaharamwezo.
Panu ipamaba ipokpedawy Deus wahoro zubata eze ky nisykbaik. Tsapukte buruk nisyk.
Iwaze Sesus opykani kaka niy:<CM>— O kazo kahyrizikarawy ty abo nyny my — niy. Iwa Deus pe niy. Iwaze zumuza.<CM>
Sodadutsa pehakatsa ibaze niriktohokota nikozoze, ta tihi:<CM>— O atakta tsimysapyrẽta hi — niy. Iwa Deus bo nipamykysoko.<CM>
Kyze kytsa sizubarẽtsa: — Hawa ha sa — nikaranaha. Iwatsahi nipuziukunaha. Iwatsahi tahawahoro bo tahasukatuk tu ziksikinaha. Sisukatsihikrẽtsa nikaranaha.
Sesus tuktsa ẽryktsatu nikozokonaha. Wytykyryk Karireja eze kykyry iapik niukurunaha. Asiza kino jẽrykzatu nikozokonaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus nury nitsahoroknaha.<Ts>Kyze nubaze maku Sose inarokota Piratus bo zumu. Sose Arimeteja ezekta Arimeteja Sudeja eze niy. Kytsaharerewabytsa tsimysapyrẽta. Wasani zuba ziknakara.
Taparaktsa tukta batu yhỹ niy. Mektatu. Ustsa Sesus tabezekta nikaranahaze, Sose batu yhỹ niy. Atakta Deus tyryktsa tukta.<CM>
Atahi Piratus bo zumu. Sose hi:<CM>— O Piratus Sesus nury ty uta kabokta. Uta iytyk bo mytsahorok — niy. Piratus:<CM>Yhỹ niy.
Niytahi Sesus nury nazipikze, panu ty ziakwaraka. Tubabatu harahare hoke bo anabo hi nitsahorok. Batu aty tohi iytyk ezytyk bo nitsahorok.
Tahabyrykywy harazetu nikymynahaze iwatahi Sose Sesus nury ty atsoko babatu ity hoekare niy. Anaeze tyhoek niy.<CM>
Wytykyryk iapik niukurunahaza. Karireja eze kykyry inaukurunaha. Iytyk haneze nitsahorok naha bo zinykynaha. Harahare yktaba nitsahorok zinykynaha.
Bykyze tahawahoro bo ziksizonaha. Jokmorẽnikia ty inury bo susu nikaranaha.<CM>Byriri Deus harere humo tahabyrykynaha. Iwaze domiko pomoze zuba jokmorẽnikia ty myziskyknaha. Iwa nikaranaha.<CM>

<TS1>Deus Sesus zihyrizikpowy.<Ts>Kyze petok zuruze miwa botu domiko eze wytykyryk niukurunaha. Iytyk bo zumukunaha. Jokmorẽnikia itsakykyha tuk niukurunaha. Kykyryk hi:<CM>— Inury bo jokmorẽnikia tsipiokmorẽnaha ky — nikaranaha.
Harahare hoke bo iktsa niaha. Harahare puẽtsikbyita ty meky botu zikare niy.
Iwaze iytyk bo nipupunaha. Anaeze Sesus nury ty batu ityny:<CM>— Hana bo sa inury — nikaranaha.
Atsoko makutsa petoktsa sibaze natakahanaha. Sisukbarazarẽtsa.
Iwazahi sipokso nipybybaiknaha, wytyk bo ziktsutsu niaha. Tahahikiubobohiknaha. Sipybyrẽza nikaranaha.
Kytsa ispe niaha:<CM>— Amo skaraba siakbatsa ytyk botu ispita tsipiberikinaha inahyrizikpo. Batu aty tohi tykarezeka. Hana bo ja. Mytsatytaha!
Nezeba Sesus ikiahaka pe niy:<CM>“Utakta Deus zikpehata kytsa kasukyrytsitsa bo pikoktyhyryknaha. Iharapatawyhyta humo pikpyryknaha. Myhyrikosokda. Petok puruze mynahyrizikpo” niy — niaha.<CM>
Niahaza hi Sesus harere bo mytsaty niahaza hi iytyk ekze puke puke niaha.
Ziksizonahaze zinymyrykynahatsa bo iytyk tsarywybara soho nitsasokonaha.
Niahaza hi Maria Madarena, Soana, ustatsa Maria Tsiaku je, situkza iwaza zinymyrykynahatsa bo nitsasokonaha. Zinymyrykynahatsa wytykyryk harere humo batu ma niaha.
Kytsa mytsaty nikaranaha. Paze! nikaranaha. Wytykyryk harere bo batu ma niaha.<CM>

Iwaze Peduru kyik niy. Iytyk bo niparak. Ziktsutsu iktsa niy. Iytyk bo inakozore. Panu zuba zinyhikare. Anaeze tapanu metutu zerekik. Iwatahi tawahoro bo ziksizo. Inury hana bo ja, isapy bo nekpa iwatsahi paikpa mytsaty nikara!<CM>

<TS1>Emaus ske buruk Sesus inatakaha.<Ts>Kyze asta okoroze tu Sesus tuktsa petoktsa niukurunaha. Emaus bo niukurunaha. Serusarẽhe ekze niukurunaha. Emaus jokboha botu des kirometeros niy. Emaus bo ziksizonaha.<CM>
Iwatsahi ske buruk inapamykysokonaha. Hawa skaraba nikaranaha. Tahatuk tuka inapamykysokonaha.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus sibo izumu. Kytsa tahatuk tuka nipamykysokonahaze Sesus situk ske buruk niukuru.
Kytsa petoktsa Sesus batu sinyhy bipyri ja nikaranaha.
Iwaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Amo skaraba ske buruk tsimypamykysokonaha — niy. Siakubyitsa tu pykpyk niaha.<CM>
Estuba Kereopas inarokota atahi ipe niy:<CM>— Ikia sa asukmota Serusarẽhe ezekta sa tsimynakozore zuba niy. Ikia zuba hi “hawa sa niy” batu sa awabyhy — niy.<CM>

— Hawa sa niy — Sesus niy. Iwatsahi ibo nitsasokonaha. Ipe niaha:<CM>— O Sesus soho niaha. Nasare ezekta. Atahi Deus sohokotsa babata. Tsihyrinymyrẽta. Hawa kytsa zikahabara ty Sesus ziknakara. Kytsa okze amy tohi batu iokdaha nikara. Iharere tisapyrẽna. Deus okze ka zikzisapywyikik.

Taparaktsa Deus wahoro eze ziknapamykysokonahatsitsa, mypehakatsitsa hudikhudikwytsa ezektsa iwatsa bipyritsa bo Sesus zioktyhyryknaha. Iwatsahi asa hi: “Atakta tabezehikta!” nikaranaha. Iwaze isukyrytsitsa harapatawyhyta humo zipyrykiknaha. Iwaze nihyrikosokda.<CM>
Katsaktsa Sudeutsa atahi mymybetesakatsa. Iwa mytsaty tsikykaranaha. Abaka harakykbyi hi ziharamu.
Miwa botu wytykyryk iytyk bo inury sapy bo zumunaha.
Batu ityny niaha. Hana bo ja. Bijoikpe iknyktsa Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa bo nikozonaha. Asahi: “O Sesus ispituzo” nikaranaha. Sipybyrẽza nikaranaha. Iwaze ziksizonaha.<CM>
Kyze katsa ituktsa iytyk bo tsiktururuknaha. Hawa skaraba wytykyryk nitsasokonaha atsatu tsinykynaha — niaha.<CM>

Kyze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Hawa skaraba Deus harere humo batu ahaspirikpo. Hawa ha ty Deus sohokotsa botu ziwatahakanaha humo batu ahaspirikpo. Ikiahatsa batu ahahyrinymyry. Hawa ha ty Deus sohokotsa ziwatahakanaha tsikaeni zuba tsinymyrykynaha.
Deus zipehata sinini mykara. Bykyzehu zuba bijoikpe bo modozo — niy.<CM>
Niytahi nisihyrinymyryky. Hawa ha ty Deus sohokotsa botu ziwatahakanaha anahi nisihyrinymyryky. Moises harere humo ziakbataze iwaze hawa haty ustsa sohokotsa ziwatahakanaha nisihyrinymyryky.<CM>
Zumubahaninahaze Sesus asiba harakmo zuba niy.<CM>
