— O bytykareze tukta katsa mybo pakutynykta niaha. Abaka punubaka miwa moku — niaha.<CM>Yhỹ niy. Iwaze nitsuk. Petoktsa baze nitare.
Sesus nidyhyky. Atsikara ty okok niy. Deus bo nipamykysoko:<CM>— O myzo ikia tsamysapyrẽta. Ikia hi mydisahawy ty mybo nyny tsimykara — niy. Bykyze atsikara ty zuktsak niyze sibo nyny niy.
Atsikara zitsatsakarakze atsoko Sesus zinynaha. Iwaze babyita tu hokda zuba niy.

Iwaze asa zuba nipamykysokonaha.<CM>— Katsaktsa batu mytsaty tsikaha. Ske buruk nimyhyrinymyrykyze katsa batu mytsaty tsikaha. Taparaktsa Deus sohokotsa watahaha nimyhyrinymykyze mykurẽtsa tsikykaranaha — niaha.<CM>
Niahatsahi Serusarẽhe bo niukuruzonaha. Anabo zukzuk niaha. Zinymyrykynahatsa bo zumunaha. Iwaze inahapekypykbanaha.<CM>
Kytsa sibo nitsasokonaha:<CM>— O Sesus inahyrizikpota Simaõ Sesus iny — nikaranaha.<CM>
Iwaze petoktsa ske buruk hawa sa niaha nitsasokonaha.<CM>— Hawa Sesus atsikara zitsatsakarakze tsinynaha — nikaranaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa bo babyita tu natakaha.<Ts>Ana nitsasokonahaze tu Sesus natakaha. Atsoko istazaha eze kaha zuba niy. Ispe niy:<CM>— Ahakurẽtsaktsa tsimoziknaha — niy.<CM>
Sipybyrẽtsa nikaranaha. Nipybybaiknaha. Ihyrikoso zuba zinynaha mytsaty ahabyitsa nikaranaha.
Iwatahi Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Amy skaraba tsikpybybaiknaha. Amo skaraba paikpa mytsaty tsimykaranaha. Amo skaraba kahumo batu ahaspirikpo.
Katsyhyrype bo iktsatahaktsa! Kapyrytsa bo kino niwatihi iktsatahaktsa! Uta hiba. Kanury bo bubutaha! “O Sesus babata” tsimaha. Nihyrikosokdata itsanibyita ipoiktsa byita iwa — niy.<CM>
Nipamykysokoze tatsyhyrype ziwatawyky. Tapyrytsa humo kino niwatihi ziwatawyky iwatsahi sakurẽtsa nikaranaha.
Sesus humo sispirikpohuk byitsahi nipybybaiknaha.<CM>
Iwaze hi Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Hawa sa ahadisahawy — niy. Iwaze piknu izohota ty ibo nyny niaha.
Siokze tu piknu ziboroko.
Ispe niy:<CM>— Utakta ahatuk tuze ziknapamykysoko. Hawaeze Moises botu kasoho ziwatahaka. Hawa ha ty isohokotsa botu ziwatahakanaha ty hi atsatu ty mynakara.<CM>
Hawa eze kytsa Samo papeu humo botu kasoho ziwatahakanaha. Aba kino atsatu mynakara. Isohokotsa, kasoho botu ziwatahakanaha aba kino atsatu mynakara — niy.
Niahatsahi nisihyrinymyryky. Iwaze Deus harere papeu humo ky zinymyryziukunaha. Tubabatu papeu humo ziwatahaka:<CM>— Deus zipehata mohyrikosokda. Harakykbyihi puruze mynahyrizikpo, ispitu mozikzo.

Iwatahi Deus wasania ty aparakbaha bo tytsasokonahaktsa! Zipehata humo wasania ty tsimypamykysokonahaktsa! Tsipamykysokonahaze aparakbaha bo:<CM>“Ahamysapybyri tsimoewynaha awatutaha! Niytahi Deus ahamysapybara humo pahaokzohik” niy. Tapara Serusarẽhe ezektsa bo tsimytsasokonaha.
Niahatsahi mektsa tyryktsa bo tsimytsasokonaha. Ikiahatsa pahatsumuẽhĩ. Ikiahatsa kazikwy humo tarabaja tsimaha. Iwaze kytsa bo tsimypamykysonaha.

Wabyziutahaktsa! Tapara kazo harere kabo nitsasoko. Utakta iharere ahabo iktsasoko. Byi puẽtsik Deus hyrikoso ahabo myzipeha.<CM>Iwaze Serusarẽhe eze tsiperynaha. Deus hyrikoso ikiahatsa bo myzipeha. Deus zikwy pahapeha my — niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus bijoikpe bo nido.<Ts>Betanija bo Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa nisioktyhyryk.
Anaeze sitsyhyryze Deus bo nipamykysoko:<CM>— O kazo tysipokzitsikikta! — niy. Iwaze jo bo nidoko. Nisereke. Bijoikpe bo nitsuk.<CM>
Zinymyrykynahatsa Deus bo nisakibazikiknaha. Iwaze Serusarẽhe bo ziksizonaha. Sakurẽtsa nikaranaha.

Zikzibyituhuku naha tu Deus wahoro zubata isturupeze nikaranaha. Deus bo ziknasakibazikiknaha:<CM>— O Deus ikia zuba tsamysapyrẽta — nikaranaha. Iwa Deus bo nisakibazikiknaha.<CM>O Teopiro niwa zuba botu iwatahaba De.<CM>

<TS1>Suão Sesus soho wasaniha ziwatahaka<Ts><TS1>Suão Sesus wasaniha soho ziwatahaka.<Ts>Tapara mybarawy isuknihibyize Sesus Kiristu my. Atahi koikny baktatu Deus. Inaro kino ana zuba — Deus harere baba zuba — hỹ. Tapara bijoikpe wytyk nizukni — Deus harere baba zuba — nikara. Atahi Deus tihi nikara. Deus koikny baktatu nikara. Iwa tapara nikara.
Iwa tapara Deus koikny baktatu. Atahi — Deus harere baba zuba — niwatihi. Deus tuk atatu nikara hỹ.
Deus nanabyi nizukni ihumo hi. Nanabyi nizukninaha ituk tu nikara.

Tazikwy humo tsizubarẽna mykara. Tazikwy humo myzubaha myspitu tsimykaranaha. Myzubaha nisihyrinymyryky. Wasaniha ty hi sibo ziwatawyky. Hawa myzubaha amypubyriha bo iktsa mykaranaha iwa Sesus myzubaha nisihyrinymyryky. Sihyrinymyrẽtsa moziknaha. Atahi rika wata niy.<CM>

Rika miwa haeze pok maha zeka amypubyri mozik. Iwaha hi — Deus harere baba zuba — myzubaha bo nisihyrinymyryky iwatsahi ihumo sispirikporẽtsa moziknaha. Iwatsahi wasania ty nimyhyrinymyrykynaha rika ty hopok my tawa. Myzubaha simysopyksapybyitsa nikaranaha. Asahi wasani haty batu ziknakaranaha. Wasaniha ty — Deus harere baba zuba — nisihyrinymyryky, atahi rika ty pok maha tawata.<CM>
Aiba Deus maku myzubaha bo zipeha. Suão inarokota niy.
Deus sohotsa zumuze Sesus mybo ziwatawy. Sesus — Deus harere baba zubata — hỹ niy. Iwaze Sesus amypubyriha hyritywa kytsa bo ziwatawyky iwatsahi kytsa Deus harere bo hyỹ mykaranaha.
Suão byitatu — Deus harere baba zuba. — Isoho tsasohotsazubata nitsasoko. Ata soho hi ziwatawyky. Myzubaha pe nikara:
— Deus harere baba zubata hi mozumuze pahahyrinymyry. Mybarawy bo mynasikze myzubaha Deus harere ty mysihyrinymyry iharere amypubyriha hyritywa my — Suão niy.<CM>
Iwaze mybarawy bo inasik. Myzubaha bo zumu. Tapara mybarawy nizukni. Ata hi izumu. Iwaze mybarawy ezektsa ihumo batu sispirikpo. Tsimysapyrẽta tu mybarawy ezektsa ihumo batu sispirikpo.
Tatukytsa bo izumu. Sudeja ezektsa tatukytsa bo izumu. Asa kino niwatihi ihumo sispirikpo byitsa nikaranaha.
Wastuhu ihumo sispirikporẽtsa. Iwatahi ispe niy:<CM>— O ikiahatsa Deus tuktsa tsimoziknaha. Kahumo tsimyspirikponahaze Deus tyryktsa tsimoziknaha. Deus hyrytsa tsimoziknaha — niy.

Deus hyrytsa niyziknaha. Aparakbaha wytykyryk ikny nipupurukuknaha. Kytsa wytykyryk niwatihi isty tyrykzuwy naha humo nipupurukuknaha. Kytsa aba ziknakaranaha iwatsahi sihyrytsa nipupurukuknaha. Deus hyrytsa meky watu. Deus ispe:<CM>— O ikiahatsa kahyrytsa tsimoziknaha. Ikiahatsa Sesus harere bo hyỹ tsimykaranahaze ihumo ahaspirikporẽtsa iwatsahi kahyrytsa tsimoziknaha — my. Iwa Deus tahyrytsa soho motsasoko.<CM>

— Deus harere baba zuba — mywata niyzik. Sesus Kiristu maku babata niyzik. Ata zuba Deus tse. Atahi mybo inasik. Mytuk zikzuruku niy. Kytsa tuk ziknapykyryk. Sesus Kiristu sihumo tsimypokzitsiarẽta ziknakara, nisitsumuẽhĩ tsihikik tsimyzihikrẽta wasania ty nisihyrinymyryky. Deus harere ty nisihyrinymyryky. Isoho tsimaha:<CM>— O atahi imysapyrẽnikita ipunihikrẽnikita — tsimaha.<CM>

Suão Batista Sesus soho ziwatawyky iwatahi myzubaha bo hua nikara. Atahi:<CM>— O Sesus imysapyrẽnikita. Utakta batu. Atahi tazikwy tsizubarẽna my. Utakta batu. Kazikwy tsikaeni zuba. Uta kapurukbyizetu atakta koikny baktatu mykara. Tawahi koikny baktatu my.<CM>
Katsaktsa mysopyksapybyitsa tsimykaranaha. Sesus myzibyituhukutu mymysapywyky. Katsaktsa mysopyksapybyitsa tsimykaranaha atahi myhumo tsimypokzitsiarẽta my, iwatahi myzibyituhukutu mymysapywyky hỹ.

Tubabatu Moises Deus harere ziwatahaka. Ana harere humo hyỹ tsimykaranahaze, wasani tsimaha, Moises niy. Sesusta mype niy:<CM>— O ikiahatsa humo kamypokzitsiarẽta. Ahasopyksapybyitsa tsikykaranaha iwaha humotu Deus ahahumo tsimypokzitsiukrẽta.<CM>Deus harere ty nisihyrinymyryky.<CM>
Ba aty tohi Deus iny. Ikatahi itse zuba ziny. Ata Deus ihumo tsimypokzitsiarẽta. Atahi mybo inasikze, mytuk zikzuruku iwatahi Deus mybo ziwatawy — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Suão Batista isoho nitsaso.<Ts>Iwaze kytsa Sudeja ezektsa taparaktsa ziknapamykysokonahatsa sistsumuẽhĩtsa iwatsa Suão Batista bo kytsa nisipeha. Aty skaraba ikia Suão Batista pe taha. Iwaze Suão Batista bo zumunahaze asahi:<CM>— Aty skaraba ikia. Tozeka ja ikia Deus zapehata. Tozeka ja usta ja. Katsa batu myhyrinymyry — nikaranaha.
Iwaze Suão tihi:<CM>— O batu. Utakta Deus humo kapehabyita atahi kytsa mymyokhyrykta — niy. Iwa nitsasoko.<CM>

Iwaze kytsa ipe niahazo:<CM>— Aty skaraba ikia. Ikia hi sa Erias — niaha.<CM>— Erias byitatu — niy.<CM>— Ikia hi sa Deus sohokotsa — niaha. — Tubabatu Moises nitsaso Deus sohokotsa mozumu. Ikia hi sa isohokotsa — niaha.<CM>Batu niy.<CM>
— Iwaze Suão pe niaha mypetykta aty skaraba ikia. Katsa mybo tytsasokta iwaze taparaktsa bo tsimaha. Hawa ikia soho mytsaty tsimykaranaha. Tsinymyry tsihikiknaha — nikaranaha.<CM>

Suão tihi:<CM>— Utakta jerukbara eze hua mykara niy. Opykani motsasoko. Hawa Isaijas Deus sohokotsa tubabatu ziwatahaka atsatu mynakara. Deus harere tsiwabyziukunahaktsa. Iharere bo hyỹ tynakaranahaktsa kytsa mykara — niy. Iwa Suão niy.<CM>

<sup>(24-25)</sup> Kytsa zumukunahatsa Suão pehatsitsa, Pariseutsa maha. Ipe niaha:<CM>— Ikia Kiristu byitatu Erias byitatu. Deus sohokotsa byitatu tsiky. Iwatatu sa kytsa pihik ty tsimysiharasusuku — niaha.

<sup>(26-27)</sup> Suão ispe niy:<CM>— Utakta pihik ty kytsa mysiharasusuku. Usta ahatuk mykarata. Aba ikiahatsa batu ahany hỹ. Utakta Deus harere ty pahahyrinymyry. Abahi ata kino niwatihi pahahyrinymyry. Izikwyrẽnikita. Utakta tsikaeni zuba kahyrinymyrytatu. Atahi tsihyrinymyrẽta hỹ utakta batu. Iwaze utakta ihumo kasikpybyrẽta. Ipyryksuktsa mysibokik zeka kasikpybyrẽta mozik utakta iwabyita tu my. Atahi imysapyrẽnikita iwatahi utakta kasikpybyrẽta — niy.
Iwa Suão nitsasoko. Kytsa asahi ibo izumukunaha iwa nitsasoko. Betanija eze nisiharasusuku. Betanija koiknykta sak eze buburu Sorodão inarokoha.<CM>

<TS1>Deus hozipyrykza wata izumu.<Ts>Byi izokorozoze iwaze Suão Sesus bo nikozo jokeryk inaukuru. Iwaze Suão kytsa pe niy:<CM>— Iktsaziutahaktsa kytsa. Ta maku bo iktsaziutahaktsa. Atahi Deus izipehata. Ziknapamykysokonahatsa hozipyrykzatsa ziknasibakanaha kytsa sisopyksapybyitsa ziknakaranaha, sisapyzeky hozipyrykzatsa ziknasibakanaha. Iwaze Deus sisopyksapybyitsa nikaranaha nisiokzohik. Nawa ata kino mysapyzeky mohyrikosokda. Mysopyksapybyitsa tsimykaranaha atahi mysapyzeky mohyrikosokda. Hozipyrykzatsa watsa — Suão niy. Sesus soho iwa nitsasoko.
Tapara isoho iktsasoko. Ahape iky: — Atahi izikwyrẽnikita ana hi iwaby niy. Uta batu. Kazikwy tsikaeni zuba. Utakta kapurukbyize atakta niwata tu atahi koikny baktatu. Tawahi mynapykyryk — iky.

<sup>(31-33)</sup> — Sesus tsimysapyrẽta izikwy tisapyrẽna. Taparaka batu kahyrinymyry. Aba kahyrinymyrẽta. Tapara Sesus zikwy ty batu tyny. Jatu tu Deus zikpeha:<CM>“Myzubaha tysiharasusu” niy ana humo hi zikpeha. Myzubaha pihik eze iksiharasusuku.<CM>Deus zikpehaze tihi: “Atahi tsimysapyrẽta izikwy tsizubarẽna tsipiny” niy. Iwa tsipiny.<CM>“Utakta kahyrikoso myzipeha. Kahyrikoso mynasik amytudu wata mynasikze maku papyry bete inazok. Ata kino tsimysapyrẽta izikwy tisapyrẽna tsipiny. Atahi pahatsumuẽhĩ. Atahi kahyrikoso pipehaze ahatuk mynapykyry hỹ” niy. Iwa Deus kabo nitsasoko. Zikpehaze iharere bo hyỹ iky — Suão niy. Kyze Suão nitsasokozo.

— Iwaze jobo iktsa iky. Deus tahyrikoso amytudu wata inasikze iktsa iky. Amytudu Sesus papyry bete inazoze ikozo. Sesus Deus zipehata kahyrinymyrẽta. Iwatahi ahabo: “Sesus Deus tse babata tsimysapyrẽta izikwy tsizubarẽna”. Iwa ikiahatsa bo mykara — niy.<CM>
<TS1>Tapara babatsa Sesus tuktsa.<Ts>Iwaze Suão Batista Sesus bo nikozozo. Suão zinymyrykynahatsa petoktsa tuk niriktohoko.
Iwaze Sesus ziharamuze.<CM>— Iktsaziu tahaktsa — Suão niy. — Atahi Deus zipehata. Hozipyrykzatsa wata myzubaha pibezenaha. Sisopyksapybyitsa sapyzeky mohyrikosokda — niy.<CM>
Niahatsahi Suão zinymyrykynahatsa iharere ziwabynahaze zerekiknaha. Sesus hapik niukurunaha.

Sesus tasukpe bo uwok niyze sibo iktsa niy. Ispe niy:<CM>— Amo sa kapik tsinakurunaha. Amy sa tsipiberikinaha — niy.<CM>— O myhyrinymyrytsa haneze sa awanu sapy — petoktsa iapik niukurunahatsa nikaranaha.<CM>
— Pany! Katuk tyzinyre — niy.<CM>Iwaze Sesus hapik niukurunaha. Iwanu sapy bo zumukunaha. Tyk boze niy. Ibaze nidyhydyhykynaha. Ituk nipamykysokonaha. Ibaze tu zunubaiknaha.<CM>
Ãdere inarokota. Atahi Simaõ tsy niy. Suão ziwabyze Sesus hapik niukuru.<CM>
Kyze zokorobyi tu atsoko taziky bo niukuru. Zihobykze ipe niy:<CM>— O kaziky Deus zipehata Kiristu tsinynaha. Atahi Deus bo mymyoktyhyrykta my — niy.<CM>

Iwaze taziky Sesus bo zioktyhyryk. Izumuze Sesus ibo iktsaziu niy. Ipe niy:<CM>— O ikia hi Simaõ Suão tse. Abaka mekytu anaro myzik. Sepas ty pinaroko. Sepas Peduru atsatu maha. Petok inarohota atsatu piwatawyky. Atahi harahare wata — mykara.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus Piripi Natanieu iwa ahatsa nisipeha.<Ts>Iwaze izokoroze Sesus:<CM>— Utakta Karireja bo moparak — niy.<CM>

Tapara jubyi tu Piripi ziberiki ipe niy:<CM>— Aidykta katuk — niy. Piripi Betesaida ezekta niy. Anaeze Ãdere Simaõ ahatsa zikzurukunaha Betesaida ezektsa niaha. Sesus Piripi zihobykze ipe:<CM>— O katukta — niy.<CM>Piripi hyỹ niy.

Kyze Piripi Natanieu iberiki zihobykze. Ipe niy:<CM>— O Natanieu katsaktsa Deus zipehata tsinynaha. Tubabatu Moises isoho ziwatahakata. Tapara Deus sohotsitsa niwatihi isoho ziwatahakanahatsa. Abaka tsinynaha. Sesus inarokota. Sosetse. Nasare ezekta — niy.<CM>
Niytahi Natanieu ipe niy:<CM>— Anahi batu kanyhy niy. Tyzeka ja amy Nasare eze ja tisapyrẽna — niy.<CM>— Pany katuk iktsa tsimy! — Piripi niy.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus Natanieu bo nikozo. Izumuze Sesus kytsa pe niy:<CM>— Iktsataha. Atahi mozumuku Isareu ezekta. Maku mospihikbatabyikita tsimysapyrẽta — niy. Iwa Sesus Natanieu soho nitsaso.<CM>
Iwaze Natanieu Sesus pe niy:<CM>— Haneze sa tsikny — niy.<CM>— O tapara Piripi zaberiki, uta botu any, ikia umaha pukezi tsikdyhykyze anaeze any — Sesus niy.<CM>
Natanieu ipe niy:<CM>— O ikia Deus tse babata. Ikia Isareu ezekta tu abazubata tsimy — niy.<CM>
— O ikia kahumo tsaspirikporẽta. Tapara umaha pukezi tsikdyhykyze any tawy iwatahi kahumo tsaspirikporẽta. Kazikwy hi abazuba bo iktsa tsimy.

Utakta maku babata iknasikta ahawata ikyzik, ikiahatsa bijoikpe zoksapare naha bo iktsa tsimy. Kyze tsipinynaha bijoikpe iknyktsa Deus tsumuẽhĩtsitsa kabo nasik nasikiknaha. Iwaze neduk nedukuknaha. Ana hi tsipinynaha — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus mysukzawy bo niukuru.<Ts><sup>(1-2)</sup> Kyze petok zuruze Sesus mysukzawy bo niukuru. Mywanu horokwy myikaha Kanaã eze. Kanaã Karireja eze niy. Sesus je imyikaha bo niukuru. Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa kino niwatihi imyikaha bo niukurunaha. Tapara zihitsa ispe niy:<CM>— Pany! Kamyikaha bo tynaha — niy.<CM>Yhỹ niaha. Iwaze simyikaha bo niaha.
Kyze duabohotsa tsik zikukunaha. Iwaze duabohotsa tsik nipykze Sesus je tihi tatse pe niy:<CM>— Katse duabohotsa tsik nepykba — niy.<CM>
— Kaje amykzo byihuktsa. Abaka Deus zikwy piwatawy zeka batu wasani ziky — niy.<CM>
Niytatsahi zihitsa tsumuẽhĩtsa pe niy:<CM>— O kytsa katse ahape my zeka hyỹ tsimaha — niy.<CM>

Bytykareze tu pihik suk niapykyryk. Napetok napetok napetok pihik suk niy. Pihik suk morosuk ibuzoinikia zuba tsipomobyitsa. Sudeutsa tapara tahadisahakanaha tahatsyhyrypikiknaha. Bykyze tahatsyhyrypikikzonaha simypewytsa niwatihi nisiokipikiknaha. Siwahoro eze pihiksuk tsizubarẽna.
Iwaze Sesus zihitsa tsumuẽhĩtsa pe niy:<CM>— Pihik ty susutaha! Pihiksuk tyzihareknahaktsa! — niy.<CM>Hyỹ niaha.<CM>— Pihik ty zak bo tu tyharektaha.<CM>
Iwaze pihik ty zihitsa bo nyny tsimaha — ispe niy.<CM>Hyỹ niaha. Iwaze pihiksuk ty okok maraksu maraksu nikaranahaze iwaze zihitsa bo wabehyryk niy.

Pihik tu duabohotsa tsik niyzik. Zihitsa ziakpy. Zihitsa batu inyhy. Aty sa pihik duabohotsa tsik nizuknihik anahi batu inyhy. Sitsumuẽhĩtsa zuba zinymyrykynaha. Niytahi zihitsa tasukzakata pe niy:<CM>

— Taparaka kytsa bo duabohotsa tsik tisapyrẽna situktsa bo nyny ziknakaranaha. Bykyze tahasoroknahaze zuba duabohotsa tsik isapybara ty situktsa bo nyny ziknakaranaha. Ikiakta batu. Aba zuba ikia duabohotsa tsik tisapyrẽna tsipokzitsarẽna mybo nyny tsiky — niy.<CM>

Iwaze Sesus zinymyrynahatsa ihumo sispirikporẽtsa.<CM>— O atahi Deus zikwy ziwatawy — nikaranaha. Tapara Deus zikwy Kanaã ezektsa bo ziwatawyky. Kanaã Karireja eze niy. Anaeze hi Deus zikwy Sesus tuk niapykyryk niy.<CM>
Niahatsahi Kaparanaũ hudikhudikwy bo niaha. Sesus, taje, tatukytsa, zinymyrykynahatsa ahatsa Kaparanaũ bo zumukunaha. Anaeze niapykyrykspyknaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Deus wahoro zubata bo zumu.<Ts>Kyze Sesus zinymyrykynahatsa tuk Serusarẽhe bo niukuru. Sudeutsa myikaha bo pororo ziknakaranaha. Tubabatu Deus taparaktsa Esito ekze mekybotu nisioktyhyryk ana bo hi mytsaty ziknakaranaha. Myikaha paskoa inarokoha niy.

Deus wahoro zubata isturupeze bo zumuze nitsuk. Anaeze kytsa sizubarẽtsa bo nikozo. Wastuhutsa pikuzatsa ty, hozipyrykzatsa ty, amytudutsa ty iwatsa ty nisihuakaknaha. Ustsa kytsa okyrysaro humo harape bo zihuakaknaha. Anaeze nidyhydyhykynaha. Kytsa inapupunahaze siokyrysaro ty zihuakzonaha.

Sihumo Sesus taokaniki. Pikuzatsa hwyk tsaziki ty tsizezerẽna ty wabe niy. Kytsa ipokso zipobaiknaha. Aidy nitururuknaha. Kytsa tahapybyspyk niwakbaiknaha. Hwibihitsa nisitsihipetotokbaik. Okyrysaro tsizubarẽna zitõbaik.
Sesus opykani huahua niy:<CM>— Ahanamy ty ka wabehyryktaha! Ikiahatsa kazo wahoro zubata eze ahanamy zozowy tsikzukninaha ba zikaha. Niwazubaktsa. Nabo pãotaha — niy.<CM>

Iwaze zinymyrykynahatsa ibo iktsa nikaranahaze mytsaty nikaranaha. Tubabatu Deus harere papeu humo ziwatahaka ana bo hi mytsaty nikaranaha.<CM>— O Deus awahoro zubata kytsa ataeze hi simysapybyikitsa mykaranaha. Iwatahi taokaniki — niy. Iharere bo mytsaty nikaranaha.<CM>

Iwaze Sudeutsa taparaktsa Sesus pe niaha:<CM>— Aty sa ape niy: “Kytsa Deus wahoro zubata eze tysiksiwyhiktsa!” Aty sa anaharere ape niaha. Deus zikwy ty mybo tsiwatawykta! Deus zikwy mybo tsipiwatawy zeka wasani — niaha.<CM>
Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Ikiahatsa Deus wahoro zubata tsipitsehepetotokbaiknaha zeka usta wahoro mektatu mozoknizo. Mektatu ezytyk mozoknizo. Harakykbyihi puru nahatuk tu pikymy hỹ — niy.<CM>

— Batu ba niaha. Harakykbyihi puru nahatuk tu Deus wahoro zubata mektatu ba zikukni mybarapetu tsimykara — niaha. — Mytukytsa tubabatu tawahoro nizuknikinaha, kuarẽta seis niytyk tseheze zikymynaha. Paze harakykbyihi puru nahatukta zuba mektatu ba zikzuknizo — niaha.<CM>

Sesus harere humo batu sihyrinymyry. Iharere tsihokdaharẽna. Nitsasokoze wahoro tanury humo ziwatawyky. Inury wahoro wata niy. Mohyrikosokdaze petok puruze mynahyrizikpo mykara. Anahi ziwabykynahatsa batu sihyrinymyry.

Sesus nahyrizikpoze anaharere bo mytsaty nikaranaha. Iharere ty zinymyrykynahatsa mytsaty nikaranaha. — Deus harere wasani my, hawa ha ty Sesus nitsasoko inury soho atsatu niy — nikaranaha. Iwaze iharere bo hyỹ nikaranaha ihumo sispirikporẽtsa niyziknaha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus mywatu nimynyba.<Ts>Sesus Serusarẽhe eze tuze kytsa sizubarẽtsa ihumo sispirikporẽtsa moziknaha. Paskoa myikaha myze sizubarẽtsa ihumo sispirikporẽtsa moziknaha. Deus zikwy ty ituk iktsa nikaranahaze iwatsahi iharere bo hyỹ nikaranaha ihumo sispirikporẽtsa niyziknaha.
Sesus sibo tasoho ty batu watawy sihumo tsimytsatyharẽta nikara.
Kytsa mytsaty mykaranaha ana humo hi Sesus tsihyrinymyrẽta. Sesus batu tyso:<CM>— Hawa takta sa mytsaty my — my. Iwa batu tyso. Amy ty kytsa mytsaty mykaranaha humo tsihyrinymyrẽta hỹ.<CM>

<TS1>Nikodemus Sesus bo nikozore.<Ts><sup>(1-2)</sup> Unata eze Nikodemus inarokota Sesus bo zumu. Taparakta Pariseutsa Sudeutsa niy. Atahi unata wahoro hara bo nidoko. Atahi:<CM>— O myhyrinymyrytsa! Ikia mopyktsa babata tsihyrinymyrẽta. Deus zikwy ty kytsa bo tsipiwatawyky. Ikia zuba Deus harere bo hyỹ tsimykara iwatahi Deus zikwy ty mybo tsipiwatawyky. Iwaze katsa tsimytsasokonaha Deus ikia zapehaka tsimykaranaha — niy.
Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Tsiwabytotokta! Hawa haja motsasoko wasani my. Ikia kyripuruzo ahahabyizeka batu Deus tyryk zikyzik. Deus tyryk tsimozik tsihikik zeka tsimypurukzokta — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Nikodemus hi:<CM>— Hawa sa maku taypykta tu mopurukzo. Taje harakoke bo ba ziktsukzo — niy.<CM>
Niytahi Sesus ipezo niy:<CM>— Hawa motsasoko wasani my. Maku pihik ikny nipurukze niy. Maku mopurukzoze Deus hyrikoso ituk mynapykyryk iwaze Deus tyryk mozik. Iwa mopurukzo zeka Deus tyryk mozik.
Tsikpuruknahaze myje ikny katsa myzotsa hyrytsa zuba tsimaha. Katsa tsimypupurukzonahaze Deus hyrikoso humo iwatsahi katsa Deus tyryk tsimoziknaha.
Iwatahi ape my:<CM>“Tsimypupurukzonahakta” my. Iwaze ikia batu apyby Deus tyryk tsimozikta iwa abo motsasokoze mytsaty mytsaty byity tsimy.

Zopoktsa nabybykyknahaze hana ikny ja batu myhyrinymyry siakpyri zuba piwabynaha. Hana bo mokurunaha batu myhyrinymyry. Ba nabo myku zikaha. Atsawatu hawa Deus tyryk tsimozik batu ahyrinymyry, Deus hyrikoso kino zopoktsa waha nabybykyk my. Hana ikny ja batu myhyrinymyry. Hana bo ja batu myhyrinymyry. Katsa Deus hyrikoso humo ityryk tsimoziknaha iwa ahahyrinymyrẽtsa zuba — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Nikodemus ipe niy:<CM>— Hawa sa my. Aharere humo batu kahyrinymyry — niy.<CM>
Sesus niy:<CM>— Ikiakta Isareu ezekta sihyrinymyrykytsa iwatatu sa batu ahyrinymyry.
Amy ty inymyryky hi anahi motsasoko. Amy ty botu iwaby anahi zuba motsasoko. Tanyhyhi motsasoko. Ikiahatsa kaharere batu ahakparawy — niy.

— Ikiahatsa Deus tyryktsa tsimoziknaha ana soho hi motsasoko. Anahi motsasokoze kaharere humo batu yhỹ tsimaha. Kaharere bo hyỹ tsimaha zeka hawa Deus tuk ahawahi tsimynapykyknaha anatyhi yhỹ tsimaha — my.<CM>— Kaharere Deus tuk ahawahi tsimynapykyryknaha soho anatyhi hyỹ tsimaha. Batu ahahyrinymyry mytsaty my.
Uta zuba bijoikpe ikny iknasik. Iwatahi kytsa bo motsasoko. Ziknynaha tahi kytsa bo motsasoko. Utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik niy.<CM>

Tubabatu Moises pyryhyk hyrikoso barõse nizukni. Na pyryhyk hyrikoso hwi humo typu niy. Kytsa simyitsapyrẽtsa pyryhyk hyrikoso bo iktsa nikaranahaze nizororokonaha. Atawahi utakta Deus zikpehata kytsa wata ikyzik iwaze kytsa iharapatawyhyta humo pikyriziknaha.
Kytsa kaharere bo hyỹ mykaranaha zeka kahumo sispirikporẽtsa maha. Kytsa kahumo mospirikponaha zeka Deus tuk tahawahi mynapykyryknaha. Kahumo sispirikporẽtsa Deus tuk tahawahi mynapyrykyknaha hỹ

Yhỹ, Deus mybarawy ezektsa humo tsimypokzitsiarẽta. Nawatsa humo tsimypokzitsiarẽta babata. Iwatahi tatse zipeha. Estuba zuba itse babata. Asaktsa kahumo mospirikponaha zeka Deus tuk mynapykyryknaha, ituk tahawahi mozurukunaha. Deus tuk mynapykyryknaha ba zikykbazonaha.
Deus tatse izipehaze myhumo iakyri byita. Ba kaeze ẽryk zikahasapynaha. Iwatahi uta mozumuze kazo bo pahaoktyhyryk niy iwaze mybarawy ezektsa humo batu iakyri.<CM>
Aty Deus tse babata humo ispirikpo zeka Deus bo mymyoktyhyryk. Deus ihumo ba ziktaokani. Aty kaharere bo hyỹ ahabyi zeka atahi Deus bo ba zikmyoktyhyryk Deus ihumo tsiakyriukrẽta.

Deus tatse zuba zipeha. Sizubarẽtsa sisopyksapybyitsa tu nikaranaha nisiwatawyky. Wasani mykara nisiwatawyky. Atahi okoroze ky wa. Myzubatsa ihumo batu siakparawy. Sisopyksapybyitsa nikaranaha iwatsahi ihumo batu siakparawy. Asahi miwa ha nizihikiknaha. Iwatsahi batu ihumo sispirikpo.<CM>

Sizubarẽtsa sisopyksapybyitsa tu nikaranaha ana humo hi kaharere bo batu yhỹ zikaha. Sisikpybyrẽtsa ustsa kytsa humo. Asahi kytsa papatu nikaranaha, asaktsa sibo iktsa mykaranaha zeka sisikpybyrẽtsa. Miwa ezektsa watsa ustsa ba ziksinynaha. Iwa humo hi sisikpybyrẽtsa.<CM>

Ustsa kytsa kaharere bo hyỹ mykaranaha simysapyrẽtsa, kahumo sispirikporẽtsa iwatsahi tisapyrẽna ty mykaranaha. Ihumo wasani mykaranaha ana humo hi kytsa sihyrinymyrẽtsa. Iwororoha ezektsa watsa ustsa mysinynaha batu sisikpyby — niy. Iwa Sesus Nikodemus tuk nipamykysoko.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus Suão ahatsa.<Ts>Kyze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa ituk Sudeja bo niukurunaha. Anaeze niapykyrykspyk naha kytsa nisiharasusuku.
Suão Batista niwatahi myzubaha nisiharasusuku. Eno eze. Eno Sarĩ pauk baze niy. Pihik tsizubarẽna eze hi nisiharasusuku.
Suão ihurukuhubyizetu myzubaha nisiharasusuku. Aiba tohi zuba kytsa sakyriukanikitsa hurukwy bo nitsahuruknaha.<CM>
Suão Batista tuk zinymyrykynahatsa Sudeu zipehakanaha. Asahi:<CM>— Aty sa wasanita nikaranaha Suão nisiharasusukuze ja nikaranaha. Sesus nisiharasusukuze ja. Aty sa wasani — nikaranaha.

Iwatsahi Suão pe niaha:<CM>— O myhyrinymyrytsa! Botua ikia amakta taba buburu tsiky. Mytuk maku nipykyrykspyk. Botua isoho ty mybo tsiktsasoko, Sesus my. Atahi myzubaha nisiharasusuku. Sizubarẽtsa iapik mokurunaha. Ikia hapik ba ziktururuknaha — niaha.<CM>
Iwaze Suão ispe niy:<CM>— Ana humo hi kakurẽta my. Deus zuba tazikwy ty myzubaha bo nyny my. Asaktsa Deus humo Sesus harere piwabytotokonaha asa bo hi izikwy ty sibo nyny my — niy.
Botua ahabo iktsasoko.<CM>— Utakta Kiristu byita atakta Deus zipehata my. Taharaze zuba zikpeha — niy. Iwaze isoho motsasoko.<CM>

— Maku tasukzata tsakurẽta my. Itukta kino niwatihi ihumo tsakurẽta. Tasukzata mokozoze itukta ihumo tsakurẽta. Utakta itukta wata my. Myzubaha Sesus tuk mokurunaha, ana bo hi mokozoze kakurẽta. Isukzata tukta wata my.
Sesus zinymyrykynahatsitsa sizubarẽtsa. Katuk zinymyrykynahatsa batu sizuba. Wasani my iwatahi kakurẽta — my. Iwa Suão zinymyrykynahatsa pe niy.<CM>

<TS1>Atahi bijoikpe iknykta inasik tsimysapyrẽta.<Ts>Atahi bijoikpe iknykta tsimysapyrẽta my. Ata zuba tispirikporẽta. Mybarawy ezektsa batu. Aparakbahatsa tsikaeni zuba sihyrinymyryrẽtsa maha. Mybarawy soho eziky ty zuba mopamykysokonaha.
Atakta bijoikpe iknykta ihyrinymyrẽnikita hỹ. Ata kino nikozo naha zuba motsasoko. Ziwaby naha zuba motsasoko. Batu sizuba iharere bo hyỹ mykaranaha.
Kytsa iharere bo hyỹ mykaranahaze asahi — Deus tsimysapyrẽta wasape mykara — mykaranaha

<sup>(34-35)</sup> Deus tihi:<CM>— Utakta katse Sesus pipehaka. Ihumo kamypokzitsiarẽta. Kahyrikoso ituk tawahi mynapykyryk. Kahyrikoso hi izikwy kazikwy hi atsatu my. Ata kino wasaniha zuba natsasoko. Kahyrikoso humo zikwy tsizubarẽna — niy.

Iwaze aty Deus tse harere bo hyỹ mykara, atahi meky watu mozik, atahi tawahi Deus tuk mynapykyryk. Aty Deus tse harere bo yhỹ ahabyi zeka, atahi Deus tuk ba zikykpykyryk. Deus ihumo takyri, iharere bo yhỹ ahahabyizeka iwatahi ihumo Deus takyri. Atahi Deus tuk batu tawahi mynapykyk niy, sinini ykarawy bo myzipeha.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus Samarija ezektatsa tuk nipamykysoko.<Ts>Kyze Sesus niukuru Sudeja bo Pariseutsa pokso niparak. Tapara kytsa Pariseutsa pe niaha:<CM>— O kytsa Sesus hapik sizubarẽtsa. Atahi kytsa sizubarẽtsa nisiharasusuku. Suão Batista tuk zinymyrynahatsa batu sizuba maha — mybarapetu nikaranaha.<CM>
Sesus kytsa batu isty harasusu. Zinymyrykynahatsa zuba kytsa nisiharasusuku naha.
Anahi Sesus ziwabyze Sudeja ikny niparak. Karireja bo ziksizo. Zinymyrykynahatsa ituk niukurunaha.<CM>
— Samarija bo koiknyktsa kytsa! — Sesus niy.<CM>Yhỹ nikaranaha.<CM>

Niahatsahi Sikare myzubaha bo zumunaha. Tubabatu taparakta Sako nihyrikosokdaze tahudikhudikwy Sose bo nyny niy itse ziakse. Sose nihyrikosokdaze niwatihi itsekokatsa tahudikhudikwy ziaksenaha. Sikare myzubaha baze tu nihyrikosokdata Sako hudikhudikwy niy.

<sup>(6-8)</sup> Iwaze Sesus pihik zokowy bo izumu. Tapara Sako tykoke nizukninaha. Tokbaha niyzikikze Sesus iakubyrizumu tahi pihik zokowy baze nidyhyky. Zinymyrykynahatsa myzubaha bo niaha. Tahadisahawy bo nitururuknaha.<CM>Iwaze wytyk Samarija ezektatsa nabo izumu. Pihik zotsata niparaktatsa Sesus zihobyk iwaze ipe niy:<CM>— O kaboktsa pihik ty uta piku — niy.

— Batu ikiakta Sudeja ezekta hỹ. Ikza Samarija ezektatsa. Iwaze amo sa “Kabo pihik ty maraktyktsa” tsimykara — niy. Sudeutsaktsa ba Samarija ezektsa opowysuk eze ka ba zikunaha iwatatsahi hỹbyi nikara.<CM>

Sesus:<CM>— O amy tisapyrẽna zuba Deus abo nyny my hỹ. Ana humo hi ja tsahyrinymyrẽtatsa “Kaboktsa pihik ty” botu ape iky — niy. Amy tsa ty hỹ zeka iwatahi Sesus niy. — Ikia batu kabo nyny tsimy. Tsikny zeka ikia kino “kabo ky pihik ty” tsimyze. Yhỹ my. Utakta Deus pihik baba ty abo nyny my. Ana tsipikuze mekywa tu tsimozik. Tsimyhyrikosokdaze tsinahyrizikpoze, Deus baze awahi tsimynapykyryk — Sesus niy.<CM>
Niytatsahi:<CM>— O ikia sa batu apihikzowyky pihik zowy tsiokitsihizezerẽna batu izowyky. Hawa sa pihik ty marak tsimy — niy.

— Tubabatu mydiri nihyrikosokdata Sako tykoke ziuku. Iwatahi pihik atsaeze ky zikzikuku. Ihyrytsa niwatihi pihik zikzikukunaha. Siraratsa kino niwatihi pihik zikzikukunaha. Niytahi pihik hoke itsekokatsa ziaksenaha. Mybo nizapikso. Sako harere kytsa ziwabyziunaha. Maku abazubata niy, pihik zikuku. Hawa skaraba ikia hi ja abazubata — niy.<CM>
Niytahi Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Aty na pihik piku zeka tsiarupukrẽtazo.

Uta pihik ty abo nyny maha tsipiku zeka ba iarapuruk zikzumuzo. Pihik mekywaha ty abo nyny my. Hawa pihik pupuputsa watsa pihik batu zepyk pihik ty abo nyny my zeka awahi tsimynapykyk iwatatsahi ba iarapuruk zikzumuzo. Ba ziktsehezo pupuputsa watsa iwaze mekywa tu tsimyzuruku. Tsimyhyrikosokdaze tsimynahyrizikpo iwaze awahi Deus tuk tsimynapykyryk — niy.<CM>
Ana ziwaby tatsahi:<CM>— Ana pihik ty kabo nynyty ky niy. Iwaze ba karapuruk ziyk. Ana pihik ty kabo nyny tsimyzeka pihik ba zikzizozo — niy.<CM>
Niytahi:<CM>— Abarikta kabo tyzioktyhyktsa! — niy.<CM>
— Batu ba. Ikza ba kabarikta ka — niy.<CM>— Ikia wasape tsiky niy. Tsiktsasoze “Ikza batu kabarikta ka” wasape tsiky.
Ikia kytsa katsyhyrytsa watsa tu tsiksiakse. Abakta abariktabyitatu aktaba haĩ niy. Deus okzeka batu amysapy iwaze kape tsikyze:<CM>“Ikza batu kabarikta ka” wasape tsiky — niy.<CM>
Iwaze ipe niy:<CM>— Ikia Deus sohokotsa babata tsimy.

Katsa tsimypamykysokonaha anaeze hara bete Deus pe “O ikia tsamysapyrẽta” tsimykaranaha. Iwa mydiritsa nihyrikosokdanahatsa nimyhyrinymyrykynaha. Ikiahatsa Sudeutsa tsimypamykysokonaha, nabo Serusarẽhe eze zuba Deus pe. “O ikia tsamysapyrẽta” tsimykaranaha. Aty sa wasani mykara — niy. Iwa atatsa Sesus pe niy.<CM>
Niytahi:<CM>— Aibani hara bete Deus bo batu tyso “O Deus myzo ikia zuba tsamysapyrẽta” tsimaha. Serusarẽhe eze Deus bo batu tyso.<CM>“O Deus myzo ikia zuba tsamysapyrẽta” tsimaha — niy.

— Ikiahatsa Samarija ezektsa tsimaha. Deus soho humo ahahyrinymyry byitsa tu ikiahatsa tihi:<CM>“O Deus ikia tsamysapyrẽta” tsimykaranaha. Ikiahatsa batu ihumo ahaspirikpo. Katsaktsa Sudeutsa tu. Ihumo myspirikporẽtsa. Deus Sudeutsa nisinyky. Deus bo mymoktyhykta niyzik.

Kyze abaka ikiahatsa Deus tyryktsa tsimoziknaha. Iharere bo hyỹ tsimykaranaha. Amy motsasoko anaty hi tsimykaranaha. Wasani tsimaha. Iwaze Deus ahahumo tsakurẽta. Iwa tsimyzurukunaha zeka tsakurẽta — Sesus niy.
— Deus inurybyita ihyrikoso zuba my. Batu zinynaha. Kytsa Deus humo sakurẽtsa maha zeka wasani mozurukunaha. Hawa wasani zuba motsasokonaha. “O Deus ikia zuba tsamysapyrẽta mykaranaha” — niy.<CM>
Kyze atatsa ipe niy:<CM>— Deus myzipehata mywata mybarawy bo mynasik. Kiristu mozumuze ihumo myspirikporẽtsa tsimoziknaha, atahi Deus bo mymyoktyhyryk niy. Ana humo hi kahyrinymyrẽtatsa — niy.<CM>
— Uta hiba Deus zikpehata. Utakta abo mopamykysoko Deus zikpehata my — niy.<CM>

Iwaze babatu zinymyrykynahatsa sidisahawy tuk ziksikizonaha. Sesus atatsa tuk iktsa niahaze paikpa mytsaty nikaranaha. Batu tyso niaha — O Sesus amo sa ituk tsikpamykysoko. Hawa sa ituk tsikykara — iwa batu tyso nikaranaha.<CM>
Niytatsahi taopowysuk zerekik atsoko myzubaha bo niy.
Myzubaha ezektsa pe niy:<CM>— Pany. Maku bo ky niy. Atahi pihik zowy baze nidyhyky. Hawa ha ty ziknakara naha ty kabo nitsasoko. Kiristu Deus zipehata ja iky. Pany ibo ky — niy.<CM>
Yhỹ nikaranaha. Iwatsahi myzubaha ezektsa Sesus bo zumukunaha.<CM>
Iwaze batu sibo zukbyize zinymyrykynahatsa hi:<CM>— O myhyrinymyrytsa amy ty hauktykta — nikaranaha.<CM>
— O batu ba. Uta kino meky watu kadisahawy. Ahanyhybara — niy.<CM>
Zinymyrykynahatsa asa zuba nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— Aty kok idisahawy ibo zibykare nikaranaha. Mypapatu kok idisahawy ty ibo nyny niy — nikaranaha.<CM>

Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Pikdisaha zeka kakurẽta my — niy. — Atsawatu kazo harere bo yhỹ my zeka kakurẽta babata mykara. Kazo zikpehatawy iharere humo yhỹ ikykaraze kakurẽta. Iharere nihawatu my zeka kakurẽta mykara kasoroktawa mokuru.

Ikiahatsa hi: “Napetok napetok nawaze byzoje morahaze kyze arostsa moakuknahaze. Mydisahawytsa mokymynahaze arostsa tahazyzyknaha!” tsimaha. Iwa tsimytsasokonaha. Utakta ahape my: “O batu. Abatu nikymy”. Atsawatu mytsaty tsimykaranaha “O kytsa batu sizuba Sesus humo sispirikporẽtsa maha” tsimaha. Ahape my. Iktsa tsimahaktsa! my. Kytsa asahi kaharere bo hyỹ mykaranaha kahumo sispirikporẽtsa sibo iktsa tsimahaktsa! Abatu kahumo sispirikporẽtsa maha. Ba byri hu tsimaha. Arostsa moakuknahaze tsa watsa abatu kytsa kaharere bo hyỹ mykaranaha kahumo sispirikporẽtsa maha — niy.<CM>

— Maku siriktsa nisiparikik niy. Mektatu arostsa nisizyzykyk niy. Kytsa petoktsa arostsa humo sakurẽtsa. Atsawatu maku kasoho motsasoko, mektatu kasoho humo mysihyrinymyry iwatsahi kytsa kahumo sispirikporẽtsa, ana humo hi kytsa petoktsahatsa sakurẽtsa. Iwatsahi kytsa kahumo sispirikporẽtsa sakurẽtsa hỹ. Asahi nahyrizikponahaze katuk tahawahi mynapykyryknaha ana humo hi sakurẽtsa hỹ — Sesus niy.<CM>
— Estuba maku atazuba mysiparik iwaze maku mektatu mysizozek mykaranaha. Wasani maha.

Atsawatu estuba maku hi kasoho kino motsasoko mekta tu kytsa kahumo mysihyrinymyrykynaha. Iwatsahi kytsa sizubarẽtsa kahumo sispirikporẽtsa. Kaharere tsimytsasokonaha zeka ana humo hi kytsa kaharere bo hyỹ mykaranaha. Kahumo sispirikporẽtsa zeka mekywatsatu moziknaha. Ustsa kytsa botu kasoho nitsasokonaha iwatsahi siharere humo kaharere bo hyỹ mykaranaha iwaze sispirikporẽtsa moziknaha iwatsahi ahakurẽtsa tsimaha — niy.<CM>

Kyze Sikare ezektsa Sesus bo zumukunaha. Ihumo sispirikporẽtsa. Atatsa harere ziwabynahaze Sesus harere bo hyỹ mykaranaha iwatsahi ihumo sispirikporẽtsa moziknaha. Atatsa nitsasokoze:<CM>— Hawa ha ty ziknakara naha ty kabo nitsasoko — atatsa harere ziwabynahaze. Iwatsahi Sesus humo sispirikporẽtsa hỹ.
Iwaze Samarija ezektsa zumukunahaze ipe niaha:<CM>— Pany mywahoro bo paku tyny — nikaranaha. Yhỹ niy. Anaeze situk petok zurure.<CM>
Mektsatu ihumo sispirikporẽtsa. Sibo nitsasokoze myzuba ihumo sispirikporẽtsa.

Asakino atatsa pe niaha:<CM>— Tapara katsaktsa Sesus bo hyỹ tsimaha ihumo myspirikporẽtsa aharere humo tsikykaranaha. Abaka katsa ihumo myspirikporẽtsa iharere humo. Atahi mybarawy ezektsa mysioktyhykta — nikaranaha. Iwa atatsa bo nipamykysokonaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus taparakta tse zizororowy.<Ts>Kyze petok zuruze Sesus Karireja bo ziksizo. Samarija ekzekta niparak Karireja bo niukuru.
Tapara Sesus ziknatsasoko — O Deus sohokotsa tahudikhudikwy ezektsa okzeka iharere bo batu waby zikaha. Utsa kytsa iharere bo piwabyziukunaha, tahudikhudikwy ezektsa batu — Sesus niy:<CM>

Kyze Sesus bo zumuze Karireja ezektsa Sesus humo sakurẽtsa nikaranaha. Asahi Serusarẽhe amyikaha bo niaha. Anaeze Sesus bo nikozonaha. Deus hyrikoso ituk mynapykyryk zinynaha. Deus zikwy ituk zinynaha. Iwatsahi sibo zumukuze sakurẽtsa nikaranaha.<CM>

Iwaze Kanaã bo ziksizo. Pihik duabohotsa tsik nizukni nahaeze, Kanaã Karireja eze tu niy. Kyze taparakta Kaparanaũ myzubaha ezekta Kanaã eze tu niy. Atahi:<CM>— Katse tsimyitsapyrẽta. Asiba zumuzata atahi Kaparanaũ eze nihoeke, asiba nira — niy.

Iwaze kytsa taparakta pe niaha:<CM>— Sesus izumu Sudeja iknykta. Karireja bo. Mybo izumu — niaha. Iwaze taparakta Sesus bo zumuze ipe niy:<CM>— O Sesus tupakta kawahoro bo tsimy, katse moraka. Pany katse tyzizororowykta! — niy.
Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Kytsa kahumo batu sispirikpo. Tapara Deus zikwy humo piwatawyky. Anabo hi iktsa mykaranahaze iwatsahi kaharere bo hyỹ maha iwaze kahumo sispirikporẽtsa — Sesus niy.<CM>
— O pany Sesus! Aidytykta, katse irabyitu — niy.<CM>
— Tsiksizokta! Awahoro bo atse botu nizororo. Tsakurẽta niyzik — Sesus niy.<CM>Maku Sesus harere bo hyỹ nikara ihumo tispirikporẽta nikara. Iwatahi tawahoro ziksikizo.
Atazuba tawahoro bo ziksikirize ske pukteze tu itsumuẽhĩtsitsa zihobyknaha. Ipe niaha:<CM>— Atse nizororo. Iwatahi tsakurẽta — nikara.<CM>
— Katse sa nizororo haramwe haneze ja — niy.<CM>— O jatu tokbaha eze atsoko jokboha niyzik. Abaka iakzobyita mopykyryk baba zizororo niy — niaha.<CM>

Jatu kino haramwe tokbahaze Sesus tihi:<CM>— Atse botu nizororo — niy. Iwa Sesus kape niy. Anabo hi mytsaty nikara. Iwatahi Sesus humo tispirikporẽta niy. Iwahoro ezektsa kino niwatihi Sesus humo sispirikporẽtsa niyziknaha.<CM>
Iwahatu Sesus Deus zikwy ziwatawyky. Sizubarẽtsa bo Deus zikwy ziwatawykyzo niy. Karireja ezektsa bo Deus zikwy ziwatawy. Sudeja ekze niparakze Deus zikwy petok ziwatawy niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus ityryk niakbabata zizororowy.<Ts>Iwaze Sesus Serusarẽhe bo niukuru. Sudeutsa myikaha bo Serusarẽhe bo zumuku.

<sup>(2-3)</sup> Serusarẽhe eze zarape waha eze niy. Zarape Betesda inarokoha Sudeu harere niy. Betesda zarape waha eze Serusarẽhe hokbowytsa baze niy. Hokbowy hozipyrykzatsa ty inapupukunaha inarokota zumubahani. Iwa katsyhyry watsa iwatsa hokbowytsa iwa niaha. Anaeze kytsa sizubarẽtsa ziknakpykyryknaha. Simyitsapyrẽtsa niaha. Sihyrizikubyitsa, siekbyritsa, sityryktsa niakbabatsa, pãozikahabyitsa iwatsa anaeze ziknapykyryknaha. Sizubarẽtsa ziknasisperykynaha.

Bijoikpe iknykta Deus tsumuẽhĩtsa pihik wastuhu ziknasikik. Pihik zikziktsik pepepewyky. Pihik zikzitsikpepepewykyze kytsa pihik bo ziknautsotsokoknaha. Aty tapara ziknahazukukze zikzizororowy ky.<CM>
Anaeze hi Sesus zumu. Maku bo iktsa niy. Atahi tubabatu tsimyitsapyrẽta sinini ziknakara niy. Tirĩta oito anos niytyk tseheze sinini ziknakara.
Sesus ibo iktsa niy. Tubabatu ziknahoekek ana humo hi tsihyrinymyrẽta. Iwaze ibo iktsa niyze ipe niy:<CM>— Ikia skaraba hawa tsimy tsimyzororo tsihikik sa — niy.<CM>

— Yhỹ niy. Myzororo ikykarazetu — niy. — Batu aty tohi katukta ziky. Batu aty tohi zikmokty pihik bo niy. Uta zuba zeka batu pihik bo ziksi. Iwatahi mektsatu katy haraze mykaranaha hỹ pihik bo. Utakta batu. Mektsatu zuba nazororoko naha — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— O kyiktykta! Awanu ty kokpuhyktykta. Tsiksikta — niy.<CM>
Atsoko itarikto. Tawanu ty kokpuhyryk niy. Niparak niy. Tsakurẽta nikara hỹ. Nawazuruze Sudeutsa byrywy zumuze hỹ nikara.

Iwatsahi Sudeutsa izororowyhyta pe niaha:<CM>— Aba katsa Sudeutsa tsimymybyrykynaha niaha. Ikia tarabaja tsimykara. Wasanibara tsimy. Ikia awanu tsipisik, iwatahi tarabaja tsimykara — niaha. Myhyrinymyrywy tihi:<CM>— Mybyrywy pumuze batu tarabaja zikaha — niy.<CM>
Iwaze izororowyhyta ispe niy:<CM>— Zikzororowyta tihi kape niy: “Awanu ty kokpuhyryktykta tsiksikta” — niy.<CM>
Niahatsahi ipe niaha:<CM>— Aty skaraba ape. “Awanu ty kokpuhyktykta tsiksikta!” niy — niaha.<CM>
— Batu kanyhy. Inaro batu kawabyhy — niy. Kytsa batu ity nyzo. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa anaeze niy. Iwatahi Sesus niparak. Iwatahi maku naro batu iwabyhy.<CM>
Kyze Sesus izororowyhyta. Deus wahoro zubata eze zihobyk. Ipe niy:<CM>— Abaka ikia tsikzororo hỹ awatu ty. Tsimynamysapybyi zeka sinini tsimykara — niy.<CM>
Iwaze izororowyhyta Sudeutsa bo ziksizo ispe niy:<CM>— Maku Sesus inaro atahi zikzororowy — niy.
Iwatsahi Sudeutsa Sesus nizokyrykynaha. Sesus maku zizororowy zuruze tahabyrykynaha ana humo hi tahakyrikinaha. Iwatsahi Sesus zimyijakaranaha.<CM>
Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Kazo tarabaja mynakara, batu pyk ziky. Uta kino niwatihi tarabaja mynakara — niy.<CM>

Iwaze Sudeutsa taparaktsa zibeze tsihikiknaha. Tapara maku zizororowy. Sudeutsa byrykywy eze tuze maku zizororowy. Bykyze nitsaso Deus kazo isopyk niy. Nitsasokoze Deus kazo my, tazikwy Deus zikwy atsatu my nikara. Iwatsahi ihumo tahakyrikinaha.<CM>

<TS1>Aty sa Deus tse ipehawy.<Ts>Iwaze Sesus taparaktsa pe nitsasokozo:<CM>— Hawa motsasoko wasi my. Deus tse babata my. Atazuba batu. Atazuba batu mykara. Hawa Deus mykara naha ty zuba mykara. Hawa Deus motsasoko naha atsatu motsaso. Kazo tsizubarẽna mykara atsatu mykara pisopykzuku — niy.<CM>

— Iwahatu Deus kahumo tsimypokzitsiarẽta. Tatse humo tsimypokzitsiarẽta. Iwatahi hawa mykaraze tatse bo piwatawyky. Utakta ihumo myzisopykzuku. Nawa kasoho mytsaty mykara. Jaba maku ityryk niakbabata izororowy anabo hi iktsa tsikaha. Abahi kazo tsizubarẽna kabo piwatawyky. Kabo piwatawyky zeka pahawatawyky. Ikiahatsa hi: “O tisapyrẽna tsimaha.” Tsimypybynaha — niy.<CM>
— Kyze Deus siakbatsa mynasihyrizikpobawy. Uta kino niwatihi. Kahumo istsihitsa mysihyrizikpowyzo. Deus tse humo mynasihyrizikpoba.

Deus mybarawy ezektsa bo batu tyso “O ikia wasani tsimykara. Usta pe batu amysapy tsimykara” my. Batu. Uta zuba mybarawy ezektsa pe: “Ikia wasani” mykara. Usta pe: “Ikia batu amysapy” mykara — iwa Deus harere kape niy.<CM>— Ikia zuba mybarawy ezektsa soho tsipiwatawyky. Aty ja imysapybyikita tsimytsasoko. Aty tsimysapyrẽta tsimytsasoko — niy.

— Iwatsahi sizubarẽtsa kasoho humo maha “O ikia Deus tse babata. Aharere tsipiwabynaha. Tsimyharerewabyrẽta tsimy” maha. Asa kino niwatihi Deus harere piwabykynaha. Kaharere bo yhỹ ahabyi zeka kytsa okzeka Deus harere bo niwatihi batu yhỹ maha. Iharere kino batu ziwabykynaha. Atahi zikpehahik iharere siwabyhybyitsa hi batu ma zikaha — niy.<CM>

— Amy sa motsasoko wasani my. Aty kaharere bo hyỹ mykara zeka meky watu mozik. Tawahi ispituzo Deus tuk mynapykyryk. Atahi zikpehakata humo tispirikporẽta. Iwatahi tawahi ispitu mynapykyryk. Deus batu tyso ipe. “O ikia batu amysapy. Sinini ykarawy bo tsimy” my. Iwa batu tyso, batu sinini ykarawy bo ba zipeha.

Amy wasani motsasoko. Utakta Deus tse. Abaka sizubarẽtsa simysapybyitsa mykaranaha. Asahi kaharere piwabyziukunaha siakbatsa watsa maha. Abahi kaharere bo hyỹ maha zeka meky watu moziknaha. Kahumo sispitu tahawahi Deus tuk mynapykyryknaha.
Deus zuba mynasihyrizikpo. Kazo kape tynasihyrizikpo iwatahi uta kino niwatihi siakbatsa mynasihyrizikpo.
Utakta kytsa wata Deus zikpehata. Deus humo kytsa pe my: “Ikia Deus okzeka wasani” mykara. Ustsa kytsa pe: “Ikia batu amysapy” mykara. Deus harere humo iwa motsasoko.<CM>
Batu paikpa mytsaty tsimykaranaha. Bykyze siakbatsa kaksoho piwabynaha. Kaksoho piwabynahaze tahaytyk ekze myzipunaha.

Asaktsa wasani ziknakaranaha. Nahyrizikpobanahaze tahawahi Deus tuk mynapykyryknaha. Iwaze asaktsa batu simysapy ziknakaranaha nahyrizikponaha kino niwatihi. Simysapybyitsa ziknakaranaha mybara botu tahasapynaha. Tahawahi sinini mynakaranaha. Deus bara botu zitahasapynaha Deus pokso tahawahi mynapykyryknaha. Batu siaku maha — niy.<CM>

<TS1>Aty sa Sesus zipeha.<Ts>— Motsasoko nahaka kaharere bara tu my.<CM>Tapara kazo harere piwaby iwaze motsaso. Tapara kazo mykara bykyze atsatu mykara iwa mozihikik. Botu zikpehata kabo nitsasoko anahi motsasoko. Iwatahi kytsa pe my: “Ikiahatsa ahamysapyrẽtsa.” Ustsa kytsa pe: “Ikiahatsa batu ahamysapy” mykara. Iwa motsasoze wasani mykara — niy.<CM>
— Utatu kasoho motsaso zeka batu sapy. Iharere batu wasani tsinakaranaha.
Iwa batu tyso. Usta kasoho motsasoko. Kazo kasoho motsasokoze iharere kino tisapyrẽna hỹ iharere humo wasani mykara.<CM>
Tubabatu ahatuktsa Suão Batista bo tsipehakanaha. Ata kino kasoho nitsasoko. Hawa ha nitsasoko wasape niy.
Iwa Suão Batista kasoho ahabo nitsasoko. Utakta pahaoktyhyryk my, iwa Suão Batista kasoho nitsasoko. Iharere batu kasoho tsihikik ahabo zuba kasoho nitsasoko — Sesus niy.<CM>

— Rika inapokze amypubyri mozik. Iwaze parakbaha mokozonaha. Haneze miwa bo mokozonaha. Suão Batista rika wata nikara. Deus harere nitsasoko. Iwaze Deus okzeka wasani ahahyrinymyrẽtsa. Anahi Suão harere humo ahahyrinymyrẽtsa.<CM>

Hawa ha Suão nitsasoko tisapyrẽna nikara. Hawa ha uta motsasoziuku tisapyrẽna hỹ. Uta Deus zikpehata kytsa wata piwatawyky. Iwahatu kytsa kape maha:<CM>“O azo mybo zapeha. Deus zikwy tsipiwatawyky” mykaranaha.
Kazo zikpeha kino kasoho motsasoko. Ikiahatsa iharere batu ahawabyhy. Iwaze ihumo batu ahaspirikpo — niy.<CM>
— Kazo mybarawy ezektsa bo zikpeha. Iharere bo tsikaeni zuba yhỹ tsimykaranaha. Kahumo batu ahaspirikpo tsihik iwatsahi iharere bo tsikaeni zuba yhỹ tsimykaranaha — niy.
— Deus harere botu ziwatahanaha anaty hi tsipinymyrykynaha. Ana humo ja Deus tuk mywahi tsinapykyryknaha ba zikaha. Deus kasoho motsasoko.

Tsinahyrizikponahaze Deus tuk ahawahi tsimynapykyryknaha. Kahumo ahaspirikporẽtsa. Iwa Deus papeu humo nitsasoko. Ikiahatsa kino kahumo batu ahaspirikpo iwatsahi tsinahyrizikponahaze Deus tuk ba ahawahi tsipahasapynaha. Ikiahatsa kaharere bo batu yhỹ tsimaha.<CM>

Kytsa kasoho zuba motsasokonaha. Kasoho motsasokonaha zeka. “O atakta tsimysapyrẽta my” maha. Mybarapetu sisopyk. Asahi kahumo tsikaeni zuba siakparawy “O atakta tsimysapyrẽta maha” zeka mybarapetu mykaranaha.
Ikiahatsa Deus humo batu ahapokzitsi ana humo hi kahyrinymyrẽta — niy.

— Uta aparakbahatsa bo kazo harere humo my. Zikpeha iharere bo hyỹ ikykara. Ikiahatsa kahumo batu ahaspirikpo. Usta mozumu zeka ipehabyitatu taharere humo zuba mozumu, ikiahatsa iharere bo yhỹ tsimykaranaha.<CM>

Deusta atababata zuba my. Batu ustaka. Ikiahatsa Deus ahape my: “O ahamysapyrẽtsa tsimaha” anahi batu ahatsihik. Kytsa ahasoho motsasokonahaze “O ahamysapyrẽtsa.” Anahi zuba ahakparawy. Iwatsahi kaharere bo batu yhỹ tsimykaranaha kahumo batu ahaspirikpo — niy.<CM>
— Utakta kazo bo myze ikiahatsa soho batu tyso. “O batu simysapy maha” my. Ikiahatsa Moises nihyrikosokdata harere humo tsimyzurukunaha iwaze “O katsa wasani tsinakaranaha” tsimaha. Batu ba.
Moises nihyrikosokdata kasoho ziwatahaka. Iwaha hi ikiahatsa iharere bo hyỹ tsinakaranaha zeka kaharere bo niwatihi hyỹ tsimynakaranaha.
Iharere ziwatahaka naha bo yhỹ ahabyi zeka kaharere bo kino niwatihi ba hỹ tsimaha — niy.<CM>Iwa Sesus Sudeutsa taparaktsa bo nitsasoko.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus sizubarẽtsa nisidisahawyky.<Ts>Kyze Sesus pihik amakta taba zitsikza. Pihikzotsabyri Karireja inarokota niy. Usa inaro Tiberias niy.
Kytsa sizubarẽtsa iapik niukurunaha. — O Sesus simyitsapyrẽtsa nisizororowyky. Ata bo hi iktsa tsimaha — nikaranaha. Iwatsahi iapik niukurunaha.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus hara bo nido. Zinymyrykynahatsa tuk nidyhydyhykynaha.
Paskoa zumukunahatsa hi Sudeutsa myikaha niy. Paskoa inarokoha myikaha bo pororo ziknakaranaha. Hawa Deus taparaktsa nisitsumuẽhĩkĩ anahumo mytsaty ziknakaranaha.

Iwaze Sesus aparakbaha inazuzuknahaze sibo iktsa nikara. Ẽryktsa tu izumukunaha niy. Iwaze Sesus Piripi pe niy:<CM>— Haneziky ty sa mydisahawy sizubarẽtsa bo nataskyryk. Haneziky ty sa atsikara nataskyryk — niy.<CM>

Sesus ta zuba mytsaty nikara.<CM>— Utakta mysidisahawy. Hawa Piripi mytsaty mykara ana humo hi pinymyryky. Tozeka ja kahumo tispirikporẽta nikara iwatahi Piripi pe iky. “Haneziky ty sa mydisahawy nataskyryk” — niy.<CM>

Iwaze Piripi Sesus pe niy:<CM>— Batu kahyrinymyry. Myokyrysaro byizeka ihuak bara ty ba zioknaha. Pibyituhukutu mytyktseheze tarabaja my zeka batu atsikara ba zioknaha. Tarabajaziu mykara zeka ba zikpyk atsikara tsikaeni zuba aparakbaha bo nyny my — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Ãdere zinymyrykyta Simaõ Peduru tsy tihi niy:<CM>
— O ta zito jabasta mybo izumu. Atahi mytsyhyry wa zuba atsikara, piknutsa petoktsa zuba aha niy. Myzubarẽtsa mydisahawy panytu — niy.<CM>

Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Ikiahatsa kytsa pe tsimaha “Tyk bo dyhy dyhy tahaktsa tsimaha” — niy. Nabo towahaditsa tisapyrẽna. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa tadyhydyhynaha, Sĩko miutsa kytsa nidyhydyhykynaha. Wytykyryk sihyrytsa ahatsa niwatihi nidyhydyhykynaha.

Iwaze Sesus atsikara ty okok niyze Deus pe niy:<CM>— Ikia humo ka mykurẽtsa — niy. Iwaze atsikara ty zinymyrykynahatsa bo nyny niy. Nyny nikaraze tsizubarẽna niyzikzik. Ibiakyrybarawa niukuru. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa bo nyny nynyzo nikaranaha. Piknutsa kino niwatihi kytsa bo nyny nikaraze sibiakyhybyitsa wa niukurunaha. Nyny nikaraze tsizubarẽtsa niyzikiknaha. Iwaze nyny nynyzo niy kytsa sizubarẽtsa bo niy. Kyze kytsa tihi:<CM>— O mysorokrẽtsa tsikahasorokbyrynaha — niaha.
Tahadisahabanahaze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa pe niy:<CM>— Itsatsakyha ty jerehe peryk bo tsipupunahaktsa! Tsipupunaha zeka wasani my — niy.<CM>
Iwaze itsatsakyhy ty arehe ty peryk bo zipupukunaha. Dose mytsyhyry tsawa peryktsa mysipyk naha wa Sesus atsikara ziubara piknutsa tsizubarẽtsa nisiubara aha.<CM>
Iwaze aparakbaha izikwy bo iktsa niahaze asa zuba nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— Aty skaraba Sesus. Atahi kok tubabatu tsisperykynaha. Atahi Deus sohokotsa babata — nikaranaha.<CM>
Iwatsahi Sesus ziokty tsihikiknaha. Ipe maha:<CM>— Ikia mypehatsa tsimozik — maha. Sesus hawa mytsaty nikaranaha tsihyrinymyrẽta. Iwatahi atazuba niparak. Hara bo nido niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus pihik tsiksukpe buruk niukuru.<Ts>Kyze zunubaze zinymyrykynahatsa pihikzotsabyri bo nisiknaha.
Niahatsahi tsaraha sihezõni taeze kokokorohyk niaha. Kaparanaũ bo pihikzotsabyri ziktsikzakanahaze, miwa buruk tu asa zuba niukurunaha. Sesus batu sibo zuk niy.
Ziturikinahatsa tu atsoko zopoktsa inabybyknaha. Pihik zopoktsa humo atsoko ihiridawy waha.

Turi turi turi nikaranaha. Nokponi turi nikaranaha. Sĩko kirometero ziturikinahaze. Kyze atsoko Sesus bo iktsa niaha. Atahi sibo izumuku. Pihik tsiksukpe buruk inaukuru. Harazuk ahabyita inaukuru. Sibo izumubahanikize sipybyrẽtsa nikaranaha.<CM>— Aty skaraba — nikaranaha.<CM>
Kyze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Ahapyby byihuktsa — niy. Uta hiba Sesus ispe niy.<CM>
Iwatsahi Sesus pokso batu sipyby. Ipe niaha:<CM>— Pany! Tsaraha bokta! — niaha. Atsoko tsaraha amykta taba niukurunaha bybybyu niaha.<CM>

<TS1>Kytsa sizubarẽtsa Sesus ziberikinaha.<Ts>Iwaze kytsa sizubarẽtsa asa kino pihik amykta taba nitarenaha Sesus ziberikinaha. Asa zuba nizapykykynaha Sesus sa hana bo. Jatuka tsaraha estuba zuba hỹ niaha. Zinymyrykynahatsa tsaraha eze kokokorohyk niaha. Asa zuba koikny niukurunaha. Sesus situk batu ityny niy.<CM>
Nipamykysokonahaze ustsa tsarahatsa bybybyu niaha. Tsarahatsa Tiberias iknyktsa. Haneze Sesus kytsa nisidisahawyky naha bazebabatu tsarahatsa bybybyu niaha.

Iwaze Sesus bo batu zuk ituk zinymyrykynahatsa kino batu niaha tsarahatsa tsihitsa kytsa pe niy:<CM>— Sesus sa hana bo zinymyrykynahatsa kino hana bo sa — niy.<CM>— Pihikzotsabyri botu zitsikzanaha — niaha.<CM>— Yhỹ. Tupakta! Katsa kino siapik tatsikza — niaha. Tsarahatsa eze kokokorohyk niaha. Turi turi turi. Kaparanaũ bo bybybyu niaha. Sesus ziberikinaha iwatsahi pihikzotsabyri zitsikzanaha.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus atsikara hyrity wa.<Ts>Myzubaha iziberikinaha. Iwaze zihobyknahaze ipe niaha:<CM>— O mypehatsa hawa eze sa tsikzumu. Katsa tsikaberikiknaha hỹ — nikaranaha.<CM>
— Hawa motsasoko wasani my — Sesus niy.<CM>— Ikiahatsa atsikara tsioknahatsawy tsimozikberikinaha. Ana iwatawy naha humo batu ahahyrinymyry — niy.

— Ahadisahawy bo zuba mytsaty tsinakaranaha hỹ. Ahasorokrẽtsa tsikaha. Usa mydisahawy humo meky watu tsimoziknaha. Ana ty kino hauk tsimaha zeka Deus tyryktsa tsimoziknaha. Tsimyhyrikosokdanaha zeka Deus myzahahyrizikpowyzo iwaze ituk tsimynapykyryknaha. Ahawahi Deus tuk tsinapykyryknaha. Utakta inasikta ahawata ikyzik Deus hi kazo. Atahi:<CM>“Kaharere bo hyỹ tsimykara. Iwatahi tadisahawy kino kytsa bo nyny tsimykara” niy. Ikiahatsa kino niwatihi Deus harere bo hyỹ tahaktsa — Sesus niy.<CM>
Iwaze Sudeutsa ipe niaha:<CM>— Hawa skaraba katsa Deus harere bo hyỹ tsimykaranaha hawa skaraba Deus mozihikik — niaha.<CM>

<sup>(29-31)</sup> Deus hi:<CM>— Atahi ahabo ipehata humo tyspirikponahaktsa! — niy. — Utakta Deus zikpehata. Kahumo tsimyspirikponaha zeka Deus harere bo hyỹ tsimaha — Sesus niy. Kytsa Sesus pe niaha:<CM>— Taparaktsa myzotsa jerukbara eze atsikara waha ty tahadisahakanaha. Deus harere papeu humo ziwatahaka “Moises bo nipamykysokoze atsikara waha kytsa bo inatsuku. Atsikara waha bijoikpe ikny kytsa nisidisahawykynaha” — iwa Moises Deus zikwy sibo ziwatawyky.<CM>— Ikia ja. Azikwy ty sa mybo tsipiwatawy tsimykaranaha. Iwaze zuba ahumo myspirikporẽtsa tsimoziknaha — tsimykaranaha.

— Hawa utakta motsaso wasani my. Moises atsikara ty zuba kytsa bo nyny nikara. Ana atsikara morapa hwiwy zubaha niy. Kazo hi atsikara babata kytsa bo nyny mykara. Ana atsikara baba humo kytsa meky watu moziknaha. Deus tyryktsa moziknaha atsikara baba humo — niy.

— Deus atsikara ty mybo nyny my bijoikpe iknyky. Utakta atsikara waha, uta hi bijoikpe iknykta. Uta kino kytsa kahumo meky watu moziknaha niy. Mynahyrizikponaha kahumo tahawahi Deus tuk mynapykyryknaha — niy.<CM>
Kytsa ipe niaha:<CM>— Anaty mybo nyny tykta! Ana hi mydisahawy mozik. Mydisahawy ty mybo nyny tynakara — nikaranaha.<CM>

Sesus niy:<CM>— Uta hiba atsikara baba niy. Deus myzubaha bo nyny mykara. Ikiahatsa kaharere bo hyỹ tsimykaranaha. Kahumo tsimyspirikponaha zeka ahakurẽtsa tsimoziknaha iarapa byitawata tsakurẽta. Ikiahatsa kahumo tsimyspirikponaha zeka aharapabyitsa watsa tsimoziknaha. Ahakurẽtsa tsimykaranaha.<CM>
Ikiahatsa kaharere bo batu yhỹ tsimaha. Utakta kazikwy iwatawyky anabo hi tsinynaha. Iwa humo kabo batu yhỹ zikaha.

Aparakbaha kahumo mysispirikpoko ana hi kazo mozihikik. Iwatsahi kahumo sispirikporẽtsa mykaranaha. Aty skaraba kahumo tispirikporẽta atahi batu tyso “O ikia kahumo batu spirikpo, iwahi ba ziktsaso” — niy.<CM>
— Utakta bijoikpe ikny iknasikze Deus harere bo zuba hyỹ mynakara. Hawa sa mozihikik naha humo batu yhỹ iky iwa humo batu zuk. Atahi zikpeha iwatahi iharere bo zuba hyỹ mykara.

Hawa sa Deus mozihikik. Kytsa asahi kahumo mospirikponaha mysipokzitsiki. Iwatsahi kahumo sispirikporẽtsa ba ziksiere. Mybarawy mopykze kahumo sispirikporẽtsa mynahyrizikponahaze Deus tuk tahawahi mynapykyknaha.<CM>

Yhỹ kazo harere bo mykara. Aty skaraba katse harere bo hyỹ mykaranaha asahi ituk tahawahi mynapykyryknaha. Mybarawy mopykze kahumo ituk mynahyrizikponaha. Ana kino Deus harere bo my hỹ — Sesus niy.<CM>
Kyze Sudeutsa asa zuba isoho zisapybyrikinaha. Nitsasokoze:<CM>— Uta hiba atsikara waha, uta hiba bijoikpe iknykta nikara — ana humo hi zisapybyrikinaha.<CM>

— Iwatsahi nikaranaha hawa skaraba. O atahi sa Sesus zuba. Sose tse sa nikaranaha. Ije niwatihi tsinynaha. Hawaha ta sa “Utakta bijoikpe iknykta” nikara. Atahi mybarapetu nikara — nikaranaha. Iwa asa zuba zisapybyrikinaha.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Awatutahaktsa ahamysapybyrihuktsa! — niy.
Kazo zikwy humo zuba kytsa kahumo sispirikporẽtsa. Ata kino zikpeha iwaze kytsa kahumo mysispirikpoko. Mybarawy mopykze asahi mynasihyrizikpo iwa Deus tuk tahawahi mynapykyryknaha.<CM>

Tubabatu Deus sohokotsa iharere papeu humo ziwatahakanaha:<CM>— Aparakbaha Deus mysihyrinymyryky — niy. Iharere hi kasoho my. Kytsa kahumo mospirikponaha zeka ana kino Deus kazo ihyrinymyrywy. Ana humo hi mysihyrinymyryky.
Batu aty tohi Deus ityny my. Uta zuba iny atahi zikpeha.<CM>
Motsasoko wasani my. Aty skaraba kahumo tispirikporẽta atahi mynahyrizikpoze Deus tuk tawahi mynapykyryk niy.
Sesus tihi:<CM>— Utakta atsikara baba my. Kahumo kytsa meky watu mozurukunaha. Deus tyryktsa moziknaha. Kahumo simysapyrẽtsa moziknaha.<CM>
Taparaktsa ahazotsa niakbakanahatsa jeruk bara eze atsikara waha ziokoknaha. Iwatsa tu niakbakanaha.
Aba atsikara baba soho ahabo motsasoko. Ana ty tsimymydisahanaha zeka ba zikumuzanaha ana hi bijoikpe iknykyry. Deus tuk mywahi tsimynapykyryknaha — niy.<CM>

Utakta hi bijoikpe iknykta my. Mybarawy ezektsa bo iknasik. Myzubaha mekywatsatu ziyziknaha iky. Kytsa kahumo sispirikporẽtsa mohyrikosokdanahaze Deus tuk tahawahi mynapykyryknaha. Atsikara ty sibo nyny my ana hi katsani. Katsani ty mybarawy ezektsa bo nyny my. Iwatsahi mynahyrizikponaha asahi Deus tuk tahawahi mynapykyryknaha.<CM>
Iwaze Sudeutsa asa zuba nipamykysokonaha.<CM>— Hawa skaraba Sesus tatsani ty mybo nyny my. Hawa skaraba inury taboro — nikaranaha.<CM>

Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Hawa motsasoko wasani mykara. Utakta Deus zikpehata ahawata ikyzik. Ikiahatsa katsani ty hauk ahabyizeka batu Deus tyryktsa zikyziknaha. Batu meky watu zikyziknaha. Ikiahatsa kaspu ty tsõ ahahabyizeka batu Deus tyryktsa zikyziknaha. Batu meky watu zikyziknaha.<CM>
Aty katsani pihauk zeka Deus tyryk mozik. Mekywatu mozuruku. Aty kaspu piku zeka Deus tyryk mozik. Mekywatu mozuruku. Tsimysapyrẽta mozik. Mybarawy mopykze mynahyrizikpo.
Iwatahi katsani mydisahawy baba my. Kaspu mypowy baba my.
Aty katsani ty tadisaha zeka atahi katuk mynapykyryk. Aty kaspu piku zeka atahi katuk mynapykyryk. Kahyrikoso zikwy situk mozuruku. Uta kino situk niwatihi mozuruku — niy.<CM>
— Kazo humo myspitu tsinakaranaha. Uta zikpehata kazo humo kaspitu. Kazo mozikyrizikpozo my. Atsatu kytsa asahi katsani ty tahadisahakanahaze nasihyrizikpo — Sesus niy.<CM>

— Utahi atsikara baba bijoikpe iknykta inasik niy. Tubabatu taparaktsa niakbakanahatsa atsikara waha ty ziknatahadisahakanaha. Atsikara waha bijoikpe ikny inatsukunaha. Aparakbaha atsikara tisapyrẽna ty tahadisahakanaha asahi niakbabaiknaha. Utakta atsikara wata. Uta bijoikpe iknykta iknasik. Kytsa katsani ty tahadisahakanaha zeka Deus tuk tahawahi mynapykyryknaha — niy.<CM>
Iwa Sesus Sudeutsa zinymyrykynahatsa wahoro eze nisihyrinymyryky. Kaparanaũ eze nikara.<CM>

<TS1>Hawa katsa Deus tuk mywahi tsimynapykyknaha.<Ts>Kyze kytsa Sesus tuktsa iharere ziwabykynahaze betsakze nikaranaha. Asa tihi:<CM>— O iharere batu mykparawy. Iharere tsihokdaharẽna hỹ. Batu aty tohi yhỹ my — nikaranaha.<CM>

Upyk harere ahabyitsa tu iwatatu Sesus tsihyrinymyrẽta nikara. Imyspirikpowy soho humo taokanikinaha. Iwaze ispe niy:<CM>— Kaharere tsihokdaharẽna niy. Kaharere batu ahakparawy iwatsahi kaharere bo batu ma zikaha — niy.
— Utakta iknasikta ahawata ikyzik. Kahumo batu ahaspirikpo iwatahi kaharere tsihokdarẽna. Utakta bijoikpe bo kazo bo piksizoze anabo hi iktsa tsimaha ja kaharere bo yhỹ tsimaha.<CM>

Deus hyrikoso humo aparakbaha meky watu moziknaha. Aparakbaha ihumo Deus tuk siwahi mynapykyryknaha. Kytsa zuba zeka batu Deus tuk mynapykyknaha. Batu zikaha. Iwa zeka kaharere bo hyỹ tsimaha zeka Deus hyrikoso ahatuk my. Iwaze ikiahatsa Deus tuk ahawahi tsimynapykyknaha.<CM>

Wastuhu kaharere bo ba hỹ zikaha ana humo hi kahyrinymyrẽta — niy. Iharere iakparawy byitsa soho humo botu zinymyry. Estuba sisukyrytsitsa bo zioktyhyrykta humo kino tsihyrinymyrẽta. Zinymyrykynahatsa nisinaropykykze tsihyrinymyrẽta.<CM>
Iwatahi ahape iky.<CM>— Tapara kazo yhỹ my iwaze kytsa kahumo sispirikporẽtsa. Asa zuba kazo harere bo hyỹ mahaze asahi kahumo sispirikporẽtsa moziknaha — niy.<CM>
Iwa Sesus tuktsa sizubarẽtsa iharere bo batu yhỹ niaha. Batu iapik pãozo.
Kyze Sesus tuk zinymyrykynahatsa dose tsa pe niy:<CM>— Ikiahatsa ja. Ikiahatsa kino sa tsipikarikiknaha — niy.<CM>
Iwaze Simaõ Peduru ipe niy:<CM>— Mypehatsa aty hapik sa tsimaha. Ikia humo mekywa tu tsimoziknaha. Hawa tsimyhyrikosokdanahaze Deus tuk mywahi tsimynapykyknaha anahi ikia zuba tsikmyhyrinymyryky.
Iwatsahi aharere humo myspirikporẽtsa. Ikia zuba Deus zahapehata tsimaha. Tsamysapyrẽta — niy. Iwa Simaõ Peduru niy.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Utakta dose mytsyhyrytsa hawa zinymyrykynahatsa iksiwatawyhik. Estuba ahatukta Satanas mozik — niy.<CM>
Sesus Sudas soho nitsasoko. Sudas Simaõ Iskariotses tse niy. Atahi Sesus sukyrytsitsa bo pioktyhyryk niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus tatukytsa tuk.<Ts>Kyze Sesus Karireja bo niukuru. Sudeja bo ka batu pão. Sudeutsa taparaktsa zibeze tsihikiknaha. Iwatahi Sudeja bo batu pão. Karireja eze zuba niapykyryk.
Tapara Sudeutsa myikaha bo pororo ziknakaranaha. Taparaktsa jerukbara eze tahaparik zizikinaha naha bo hi mytsaty ziknakaranaha. Iwaze amyikaha bytykara isiparik bo niapykyryknaha.
Iwaze Sesus tukytsa ipe niaha:<CM>— Sudeja bo ikiakta tsiksikta. Anabo tsimyzeka hawa tsimykara atuktsa iktsa maha. Azikwy bo iktsa maha.
Tsipany tsihikik zeka ba okpitsĩkĩ ziky. Atahi izikwy ty sizubarẽtsa bo mysiwatawyky. Iwatahi Sudeja boktsa — niaha.<CM>
Itukytsa kino ihumo sispirikpobyitsa nikaranaha iwa ipe nikaranaha.<CM>
Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Uta aba amyikaha bo ba zikumu. Ikiahatsaktsa myikaha bo zeka wasani my tsimykaranaha.

Aparakbaha asahi Deus harere bo batu yhỹ zikaha kahumo tahakyrikinaha. Ikiahatsa humo ka batu siakyri. Uta kahumo zuba sakyrirẽtsa nikaranaha. Utakta ispe my: “Ikiahatsa ahamysapybyitsa tsikykaranaha” my iwatsahi kaharere humo tahakyrikinaha.
Ikiahatsaktsa simyikaha boktsa! Utakta ba zikparak. Abaka ba zikumu. Bykyze zuba my — niy. Iwa Sesus tatukytsa pe niy.<CM>
Iwaze itukytsa simyikaha bo niukurunaha. Sesus Karireja eze nitare.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus simyikaha bo.<Ts>Kyze Sesus niwatihi simyikaha bo niy. Kytsa bo batu tyso. Ity sohabyita tu simyikaha bo niukuru. Kytsa batu sihyrinymyry. Sipapatu niparak.

<sup>(11-13)</sup> Sudeutsa taparaktsa simyikaha bo niukurunaha. Asahi myikaha eze Sesus ziberikinaha. Asahi:<CM>— Sesus sa hana bo — nikaranaha. Aparakbaha isoho nitsasokonahaze Sudeutsa taparaktsa batu siwaby tsihik. Iwatsahi akbyibatu zuba nipamykysokonaha. Asaktsa:<CM>— O tahi tsimysapyrẽta — nikaranaha. Ustsa kytsa:<CM>— O batu. Batu imysapy. Atahi kytsa bo nisispihikbataka — mybarapetu nikaranaha. Iwa Sesus soho nitsasokonaha.
Iwaze Sesus zumu. Deus wahoro zubata bo nitsuk. Anaeze iziakbata kytsa nisihyrinymyryky. Simyikaha asiba nepykze nisihyrinymyryky.

Taparaktsa Sudeutsa iharere batu siakparawy. Asa kino:<CM>— Hawa hãta skaraba Deus papeu humo zinymyryba. Nimyhyrinymyrykynahatsitsa batu tyhyrinymyry iwatatu tsihyrinymyrẽta. Batu wasani my — nikaranaha.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Amy ty pahahyrinymyryky kaharere bara zikpehata harere zuba pinymyryky. Iharere zuba sizubarẽtsa mysihyrinymyryky — Sesus niy.

Ikiahatsa hi:<CM>— O amy ty nisihyrinymyryky iharere zuba ja — tsimykaranaha. Utakta ahape my:<CM>— Aty sa Deus harere piwaby tsihikik anahi kaharere baba hi pihyrinymyryky. Atahi kaharere Deus kabo zinyny niy ana humo hi tsihyrinymyrẽta.

Wastuhu kytsa tahaharere ty zuba nisihyrinymyrykynaha. Ustsa kytsa batu. Deus harere humo zuba nisihyrinymyrykynaha. Asahi tahaharere ty zuba nisihyrinymyrykynaha. — Ziwabynahatsa sisoho:<CM>— O siharere wasani my, myhyrizikwanitsa moziknaha — nikaranaha. Iwa kytsa sisoho motsasokonahaze anahi mozihikiknaha. Kytsa Deus harere ty zuba nisihyrinymyrykynaha. Aparakbaha hi:<CM>— O Deus harere tisapyrẽna — nikaranaha. Ana soho humo hi sakurẽtsa nikaranaha. Anahi Deus harere soho piwaby tsihikiknaha. Asa zuba wasani mykaranaha. Batu mybarapetu mykaranaha.<CM>

— Tubabatu Moises nihyrikosokdata ahadiritsa bo Deus harere ty nisihyrinymyryky. Batu aty tohi iharere bo hyỹ ziknakara. Amy humo sa ikiahatsa tsipikbeze tsihikiknaha — niy. Aparakbaha Deus wahoro zubata eze tu Sesus harere ziwabykynaha.<CM>

— O ikia paikpa mytsaty tsimykara. Hyrikoso isapybara atuk my. Aty sa pabezetsihikik — nikaranaha. Iwa kytsa sisukmotsa nikaranaha. Serusarẽhe ezektsa sihyrinymyrẽtsa. Sudeutsa taparaktsa Sesus pibeze tsihikiknaha anahi sihyrinymyrẽtsa.<CM>
— Sudeutsa byrywy eze kazikwy ty pahawatawyky. Kazikwy humo nipybybaiknaha. Kazikwy bo iktsa tsimykaranahaze, “O batu amysapy my. Atahi byrywy eze tarabaja niy” tsimykaranaha — Sesus niy.<CM>
Tubabatu Moises Deus harere ziwatahaka — Ahahyrytsa makuskyrytsa tysipiakzyzyknaha. Siwatahawy mozik atahi Deus tyryk niyzik ziwatawy. Ikiahatsa ahabykyhytsa tabyrywy eze tsinasipiakzyzykyknaha.

Tabyrywy ahaskyrywytsa tysipiakzyzykyknaha Moises harere humo. Iharere bo yhỹ tsimyzihikiknaha iwatsahi tysipiakzyzykyknaha.<CM>Uta maku izororo baba mybyrywy eze ana humo hi ja tsikahakyrikinaha. Amo humo ja tahakyrikinaha — niy. — O atahi mybyrywy eze tarabaja my. Maku zizororowyze tarabaja nikara. Batu amysapy tsimy — tsikykaranaha.<CM>
Sizubarẽtsa tsimytsasokonaha:<CM>— Atahi batu wasani my mybarapetu tsimykaranaha niy. Hawa tohi mykara batu tyso “O atahi batu imysapy my”. Awatutaha — Sesus niy.<CM>
<TS1>Sesus hi Deus zipehata.<Ts>Serusarẽhe eze wastuhu kytsa nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— Atahi sa pibeze tsihikiknaha — nikaranaha.<CM>
— Atahi kytsa okze motsasoko. Batu aty tohi ity sohometu. Tozeka ja taparaktsa Sesus humo sispirikporẽtsa. Tozeka ja Sesus Deus zipehata ana humo hi yhỹ mykaranaha — nikaranaha.
Iwa wastuhu Serusarẽhe ezektsa nikaranaha. — Deus zipehata mozumuze batu aty tohi hana iknykta ja zikaha. Katsa zuba ihumo myhyrinymyrẽtsa iwatahi batu Deus zipehata my — nikaranaha.<CM>

Iwaze Sesus sizubarẽtsa Deus wahoro zubata isturupeze nisihyrinymyryky. Opykani haty nisihyrinymyryky:<CM>— Ikiahatsa batu ahanyhỹ. Ikiahatsa hana ikny ta ja izumu ba tsimykaranaha. Deus kazo zikpehatawy ikzumu hỹ. Ba ahabyizeka ba zik zumu. Atahi wasani mykara. Ikiahatsa batu ahahyrinyhy.
Uta zuba iny. Ibaze iknapykyry tatu my. Atahi mybarawy bo zikpehatawy — Sesus niy.<CM>

Iwaze kytsa nizokbatsi tsihikiknaha. Sisukyrytsitsa bo itsipa humo tsioktyhyknaha nikaranaha, batu nabaze ity paik ahabyitsa. Deus — Batu yhỹ. Katse Sesus ba zioktynaha — niy. Iwatsahi itsipa humo batu ity oktyhyryk.
Kytsa sizubarẽtsa ziwabynahaze iharere bo yhỹ nikaranaha ihumo sispirikporẽtsa. Ziwabynahatsa hi:<CM>— Deus zipehata zikwy tsipinynaha. Iwatsahi Deus zipehata my mytsaty tsimykaranaha — niaha.<CM>

<TS1>Deus wahoro zubata perytsitsa Sesus pioktykyzykynaha.<Ts>Iwaze Pariseutsa parakbaha Sesus nizikerykynaha. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa Sesus soho nitsasokonahaze iwatsahi zioktyhyryk tsihikiknaha. Pariseutsa parakbaha, Deus wahoro zubata eze ziknapamykysokonahatsa taparaktsa iwatsa asahi Deus wahoro perytsitsa nisipehakanaha. Sesus itsipa humo tyzioktyhyknaha nisipehakanaha.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus niy myzubaha bo:<CM>— Utakta ahabaze jokbohatu mopykyrykspyk. Aiba zuba kapehatsa bo piksizo.
Iwaze tsipikberinaha ba zik zikahanaha. Kazo bo piksizoze ba kapiktu zikaha — niy.<CM>

Sudeutsa asa zuba nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— Hana bo skaraba mykara katsa ba zik zikahanaha. Tozeka ja ustsa kytsa bo my. Bipyritsa bo ja mykara. Sudeutsa nanabyitaba mynapykyryk Kerekatsitsa baze mynapykyryk. Tozeka ja Kereka ezektsa mysihyrinymyryky — nikaranaha.
Tapara mype niy:<CM>— Tsipikberikinaha bazik zikaha naha. Piksizoze ba kapiktu zikaha niy. Iharere myhumo tsihokdaharẽna — nikaranaha.<CM>

<TS1>Deus hyrikoso myhumo pupuputsa hyrity wa.<Ts>Kyze Sesus sizubarẽtsa bo nipamykysokozo. Opykani haty nipamykysoko. Simyikaha nepyksohokoze nisihyrinymyrykyzo. Nawa zuruze ispe niy:<CM>— Aty tsiarapukrẽta zeka pihik piku. Aty meky watu mozik tsihikik zeka kabo tyzumukta. Iwaze tsipikuze hi kahumo tispirikporẽta tsimysapyrẽta mozik — Sesus niy.

— Pihik waha ituk mynapykyryk. Pupuputsa wa mykara. Asahi kaharere bo hyỹ mykaranaha kahumo sispirikporẽtsa. Hawa kytsa pihik pikuikiknaha utakta situk mynapykyryk. Iwatsahi mekywa tu moziknaha. Simysapyrẽtsa. Iwa Deus harere papeu humo botu iwatahaha — Sesus niy.<CM>

Sesus iwaze nitsasoko Deus hyrikoso soho ziwatawyky. Deus hyrikoso Sesus tuktsa tuk mynapykyryk. Deus sibo myzipeha tsihikik. Tapara Deus hyrikoso myzipeha iwaze Sesus tuktsa isoho motsasoko. Mybarawy bo mynasik. Tapara Sesus Deus bo piksizoze iwaze hi Deus hyrikoso mybarawy bo atsoko mynasik. Tapara Sesus Deus bozo my. Bykyze Deus hyrikoso mybarawy bo myzipeha niy.<CM>

<TS1>Kytsa sizubarẽtsa metutu nikaranaha.<Ts>Kytsa sizubarẽtsa asa zuba Sesus soho humo nipamykysokonaha. Mektsatu nitsasokonaha. Wastuhu kytsa nikaranaha:<CM>— Atakta Deus sohokotsa babata, atahi taperyky hỹ — nikaranaha.<CM>
Ustsa nikaranaha:<CM>— Atakta Deus zipehata Kiristu my — nikaranaha. Ustsa:<CM>— O batu, Deus zipehata Karireja ezekta ja nikaranaha.
Deus harere papeu humo Sesus soho botu iwatahaha nikaranaha. Ziwatahaka:<CM>“Deus zipehata Dawi tsekoka my Berẽhe eze mopuruk. Sudeja eze my.” Iwa Deus harere niy — nikaranaha.<CM>
Iwaze kytsa isoho humo niharapepehakanaha. Mekywatu siharere nikaranaha.
Iwaze Deus wahoro perytsitsa Sesus ziokty tsihikiknaha. Asahi batu itsipa humo ity okty.<CM>

<TS1>Sudeutsa taparaktsa Sesus humo batu sispirikpo.<Ts>Kyze Deus wahoro perytsitsa. Pariseutsa bo ziksizonaha. Zumukunahaze nisipehakanahatsitsa ispe niaha:<CM>— Amo sa Sesus ty batu tyoktyhyryk — niaha.<CM>
Deus wahoro perytsitsa hi:<CM>— O batu aty tohi iharere wata my. Iharere tisapyrẽna hỹ. Iwatsahi itsipa humo batu tyoktyhyryk — nikaranaha.<CM>
Pariseutsa tihi:<CM>— Ikiahatsa kino niwatihi. Iharere humo ja zahaspirikpoko — niaha.
Sadusitsa aparakbaha taparaktsa ihumo batu sispirikpo. Batu estuba zikino ihumo batu ispirikpo. Pariseutsa niwatihi ihumo batu sispirikpo.
Kytsa sizubarẽtsa Moises harere humo batu sihyrinymyry. Asa zuba ihumo sispirikporẽtsa. Deus ispe niy:<CM>— Ikiahatsa batu ahamysapy tsimaha. Sinini ykarawy bo pahapeha my — Pariseutsa niaha.<CM>
Maku Nikodemus ituktsa niapykyryk. Tapara atahi unata Sesus bo nikozore.

Atahi tatuktsa pe niy:<CM>— Katsaktsa Sesus harere batu mywabyhy. Iharere ty waby ahahabyizeka ba ibete hỹ zikaha. Batu ziktsasonaha: “Atakta batu imysapy my. Iwatahi sinini ykarawy bo Deus pipeha” niy. Iwa tubabatu nihyrikosokdata Moises mydiritsa nisihyrinymyry — niy.<CM>

<sup>(52-53)</sup> — O ikia niwatihi hazi nikaranaha. Ikia kino ja Karireja ezekta nikaranaha. Iwa tsimytsasokoze Deus papeu humo ihyrinymyrybyita wata — nikaranaha. Taparaktsa hi:<CM>— Deus sohokotsa batu Karireja ikny ta my. Deus papeu humo tsinyziukukta tsimy. Iwatahi atakta Sesus batu Deus sohokotsa my — nikaranaha. Kyze tahawahoro bo ziksibanaha.
<TS1>Wytyk sizubatsa oke.<Ts>Sesus Oriwerejatsa hara bo niukuru.

Miwa botu Deus wahoro zubata bozo niy. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa Deus wahoro bo niaha. Sesus ziwabykynaha iwatsahi izumukunaha. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa izumunahaze isitazahaeze nidyhyky. Iwaze nisihyrinymyryky.<CM>

Iwaze Deus harere watahatsitsa Pariseutsa niwatihi iwatsa Sesus bo zumunaha. Wytyk ibo zioktyhyryknaha. Atatsa ipyitsakatatsa tu sizubarẽtsa ziknasihewabykyryk. Pariseutsa nizokparakanahaze sibo iktsa niaha. Iwatsahi wytyk zioktyhyryknaha. Kytsa sizubarẽtsa tazahaeze atatsa Sesus bo zioktyhyryknaha. Niritohoko.<CM>
Iwaze Sesus pe niaha:<CM>— O myhyrinymyrykytsa atatsa wytyk usta ibarikta byita tu zipyrirykyknahaze sibo iktsa tsikaha. Iwatsahi atatsa abo tsikzioktyhyryknaha.

Tubabatu nihyrikosokdata Moises myzotsa bo nitsasoko. Papeu humo ziwatahaka. “Wytyk usta maku zikzipyrirykyk zeka atatsa ty ka bohitaha. Haraharetsa ty tsibezenaha” iwa Moises botu myzotsa nisihyrinymyry. Ikia ja, Hawa sa tsimy — nikaranaha.<CM>

Ana hi nitsasokonahaze — Tahaharere tsyhyryzehe nikaranaha iwatsahi nizapykykynaha — mytsaty ahabyitsa nikaranaha. Asa zuba nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— O iharere meky watu my. Amy ty Moises botu ziwatahaka batu yhỹ my iwaze batu imysapy my — iwa mytsaty nikaranaha.<CM>Iwaze Sesus okmymy hãtatu wytyk bo tatsyhyry tyty tapauk baze ziwatahaka. Atatsa bo ka batu iktsa niy.
Hawa sa tsimy ipe nikaranaha. Kyze niziktsutsuhuku tatu kyik niy sibo iktsa niy. Ispe niy:<CM>— Ikiahatsa baze aty imysapyrẽta zeka atahi harahare tapara mopapyk — niy.
Iwaze wytyk bo okmymyzo niy tatsyhyry ty ziwatahakazo.<CM>

Kytsa Sesus harere ziwabynahaze sisikpybyrẽtsa nikaranaha. Iwatahi taparakta maku puke niy. Iwaze estuba estuba zuba zipokonaha. Ziharawyta iypykbyita puke niy. Sizubarẽtsa puke puke niaha. Iharere humo sisikpybyrẽtsa iwatsahi zipobaiknaha. Atatsa zuba Sesus tuk nitare, niriktohoko.
Sesus kyikzo atatsa bo iktsaziu niy. Ipe niy:<CM>— O wytyk kytsa sa hana bo. Asahi ape “Ikia batu amysapy” nikaranaha. Asahi haraharetsa ty zabezekyzykynaha. Kytsa sa hana bo — niy.<CM>

— O mypehatsa zipobaiknaha. Aba batu aty tohi kabo “Ikia batu amysapy” mykaranaha — niy. Sesus ipe niy:<CM>— Uta kino niwatihi. Abo batu tyso “Ikia batu amysapy my” iwa abo batu tyso. Tsiksiktsa abaka awatu tynakara! — Sesus niy.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus harere humo kytsa meky watu moziknaha.<Ts>Kyze Sesus kytsa sizubarẽtsa, Deus wahoro zubata eze nisihyrinymyrykyzo. Ispe niy:<CM>— Deus harere ty pahahyrinymyryky Deus harere bo hyỹ tsimykaranaha zeka wasani tsimoziknaha. Asahi kahumo mospirikponaha zeka imysapybara pimoewynaha Deus mysiokzo. Asa kino kahumo tisapyrẽna mynakaranaha, meky watu moziknaha hỹ — nikara. Iwahatyhi ispe niy.<CM>
Kyze Pariseutsa tihi:<CM>— O ikia asoho zuba tsimytsasoko. Asoho tsimytsasoko zeka batu amysapy tsipimyiki — mybarapetu nikaranaha.<CM>

Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Utakta wasani mykara. Kasoho motsasoko zeka wasani my. Ikiahatsa hana ikny tsikzumunaha humo batu ahahyrinymyry. Hana bo tsimykurunaha humo batu ahahyrinymyry. Utakta kahyrinymyrẽta. Hana ikny ikzumuku naha humo kahyrinymyrẽta. Hana bo moparak naha humo kahyrinymyrẽta. Iwatahi wasani mykara — niy.<CM>
— Kytsa harere ty tsiwabyziu zeka ikiahatsa tihi: “O tahi batu wasani” tsimykaranaha. Iharere tsihokdaharẽna humo iwa tsimykaranaha. Utakta batu ka moso. Iwata humo hi batu tyso kytsa harere zuba.
Motsaso zeka ikahatsa batu ahamysapy kaharere ahasoho ty wasani mykara. Atakta zikpeha atahi astsatu motsasoko. Uta zuba byita tu mykara. Kazo zikpeha katsaktsa harapetok tsimykaranaha
Moises taparaka ziwatahakaze. Kytsa petoktsa atsatu motsasonahaze siharere piwabynahatsa siharere soho: “O wasani mykaranaha” maha.
Uta hi kasoho motsasoko. Kazo kino niwatihi. Atahi zikpeha kasoho motsasoko. Kasoho tsimytsasokonaha. Iwa atsatu petoktsa kasoho motsasokonaha — niy.<CM>

Kyze ipe niaha:<CM>— Haneze skaraba azo — niaha.<CM>— Uta batu ahanyhy tsimykaranaha. Kazo kino niwatihi batu ahanyhỹ. Tsipiknynaha zeka kazo kino niwatihi tsipinynaha. Iwaze katsa tsimymynynaha — niy.<CM>

Anaharere humo kytsa sizubarẽtsa bo nitsasoko. Sesus Deus wahoro zubata eze kytsa sizubarẽtsa okyrysaro suk baze nisihyrinymyryky. Sisukyrytsitsa itsipa humo batu ity oktyhyryk. Deus sibo batu yhỹ niy iwatsahi Sesus tsipa humo batu ity oktyhyryk.<CM>

<TS1>Aty skaraba Sesus.<Ts>Sesus ispe niyzo:<CM>— Uta piksi. Ikiahatsa tsipikberinaha zeka ba zikzikahanaha. Uta pahatsumuẽhĩ tsihikik. Ba zikzikahanaha. Tsimyhyrikosokdanahaze Deus ahasapybyitsa tsimykaranaha ba ziksiokzohik. Ikiahatsa ba kapik pão tsimaha.<CM>

Sudeutsa asa zuba nipamykysokonaha:<CM>— Ata mybo nitsasoko “hana bo sa piksi batu iapik pão zikaha” nikara. Tozeka ja atatu tabeze. Tabeze zeka katsa batu iapik pão zikaha — nikaranaha. Iwa asazubatsa tu nikaranaha.<CM>

Sesus nikarazo:<CM>— Ikiahatsaktsa mybarawy ezektsa. Utakta Deus iknykta ikzumu. Hawa kytsa mytsaty mykaranaha ikiahatsa niwatihi atsatu mytsaty tsimykaranaha. Utakta batu. Kazo mytsaty mykara naha ty zuba mytsaty mykara kazo wata my.

Botu ahabo iktsasoko. Tsimyhyrikosokdanahaze Deus ahamysapybyi ty tsikykaranaha ba zahaokzo. Kahumo ahaspirikpo ahabyizeka tsimyhyrikosokdanaha katuk batu tsimynapykyryknaha. Utakta Deus zikpehata. Kawahi mynapykyryk. Kaharere bo yhỹ ahabyi zeka iwaze tsimyhyrikosokdanahaze ahamysapybyi ty tsikykaranaha ba zahaokzohik — niy.<CM>
— Aty skaraba ikia — niaha. — Uta botu ahabo iktsaso — Sesus niy.

— Ahabo puẽtsik motsaso tsihikik. “Ahaharere hi batu wasani tsimaha” anahi motsaso tsihikik. Atahi zikpeha iharere zuba motsasoko. Iharere wasani my. Batu mybarapetu ziky. Anaty hi zikyrinymyryky atsatu kytsa sizubarẽtsa bo motsaso — niy.<CM>
Nitsasokoze zikpehata tazo soho nitsasoko. Sudeutsa ana humo hi batu siwabyziuhu. Iharere sihumo tsihokdaharẽna my.<CM>

Utakta kytsa wata Deus zikpehatawy. — Iharapatawyhyta humo tsibezenahaktsa! — tsimykaranaha. Iwa tsipikbezenaha. Bykyze tsipikbezenahaze ikiahatsa tihi:<CM>— O ataktsa wasape mykara tawahi mynapykyryk tsimykaranaha. O atakta Deus zipehata tsimykaranaha. Atahi tazo harere zuba aparakbaha nisihyrinymyryky — tsimykaranaha. — Hawa tazo nitsasoko yhỹ niy. Taharere ty ka batu tyso. Tazo harere zuba nitsasoko anahi nisihyrinymyryky — tsimykaranaha.<CM>
Tahi zikpeha katuk mynapykyk. Iharere bo hyỹ kasopyk — atahi kapokzitsikitsa. Ba zikare — niy.<CM>
Iwatsahi kytsa sizubarẽtsa iharere bo hyỹ nikaranaha ihumo sispirikporẽtsa nikaranaha. Asahi ziwabykynahatsa ihumo sispirikporẽtsa nikaranaha.<CM>

<TS1>Kytsa hawa sakurẽtsa moziknaha.<Ts>Iwaze Sesus Sudeutsa pe niyzo ihumo sispirikporẽtsa asa bo hi nitsasoko ispe niy:<CM>— Kaharere bo hyỹ tsimykaranaha zeka katyryktsa tsimoziknaha. Katuk zinymyrykynahatsa babatsa tsimoziknaha.

Amy ty wasani tsipinymyrykynaha, iwatsahi meky watu tsimoziknaha. Taparaka ahapokzitsiukbyitsa tu ahamysapybyitu tsikykaranaha. Abaka mahani ahapehatsa myzahapokzitsiki iwatsahi ahapunihikrẽtsa tsimoziknaha — niy.<CM>

— O batu aty tohi mypehatsa humo mymypokzitsiubyitsa. Katsaktsa nihyrikosokdata Abarão tsekokatsa tsimaha. Amy humo sa mybo tsimy. “Kytsa mypehatsa humo mymypokzitsiubyitsa” tsimykara. Batu — nikaranaha.<CM>

Sesus ispe:<CM>— Kaharere wasani my. Wabyziutaha! Hawa batu mysapy tsimykaranaha. Ahasopyksapybyitsa tsimykaranaha zeka iwatsahi ahapokzitsiukbyitsa tsikyziknaha. Ahapehatsa Satanas mozik. Iharere bo ma tsikykaranaha iwatsahi ahasopyksapybyitsa tsimykaranaha. Ba hawa tohi zikaha. Iwatsahi ahahumo ahapokzi byitsa niy.
Mypehatsa kytsa nasipokzitsizo. Asahi sipokzitsiuk byitsa itukytsa nymyhyrybyita mykaranaha. Bipyritsa zuba. Tatse batu, atahi mymypokzitsiki. Mypehatsa tse humo mymypokzitsiki.<CM>

Utakta Deus tse my. Iwatahi kahumo tsimyspirikpokonahaze Deus tyryktsa tsimoziknaha. Iharere bo zuba hyỹ tsimykaranaha. Tapara Satanas ahapehatsa tserikiknaha, iharere bo ka batu yhỹ tsimaha iwatsahi ahasopyksapybyity tsikykaranaha tsimoewynaha — tsimykaranaha. — Uta ahapehatsa mozik kahumo ahapunihikrẽtsa tsimoziknaha.
Ikiahatsa nihyrikosokdata Abarão tsekokatsa tsimaha ana humo hi kahyrinymyrẽta. Kaharere bo batu yhỹ tsimykaranaha. Amo sa tsikbeze tsihikiknaha. Iwatsa tu Abarão tsekokatsa tu tsikbeze tsihikiknaha.
Kazo zikwatawyky atsatu motsasoko. Ikiahatsaktsa Satanas tyryktsa tsikyziknaha. Atahi ahazo my. Hawa mykara atsatu tsimykaranaha — Sesus niy.<CM>

<sup>(39-40)</sup> Kytsa tihi:<CM>— O batu, katsaktsa Abarão tsekokatsa. Nihyrikosokdata Abarão mydiri mysopyk — niaha. Sesus ispe niyzo:<CM>— Deus harere kabo nitsasoko. Iharere humo zuba zahahyrinymyryky. Ikiahatsa tsikbezekyzykynaha kaharere humo batu ahakparawy niy. Deus harere baba batu ahakparawy. Nihyrikosokdata Abarão Deus harere bo hyỹ ziknakara. Ikiahatsa Abarão tsekokatsa tsimaha zeka iwata Deus harere bo hyỹ tsimaha. Ikiahatsa Satanas wata tsikyziknaha.
Hawa nikara atsatu tsimykaranaha — niy.<CM>— O katsa batu Satanas watsa tsimaha Deus zuba myzo. Iharere bo zuba hyỹ tsimykaranaha — mybarapetu niaha.<CM>
Sesus:<CM>— Deus zikpeha. Uta mybarawy bo iknasik — niy. Deus ahazo my zeka ikiahatsa tihi:<CM>— O zipehata tsimysapyrẽta tsimykaranaha — niy.<CM>
— Kaharere bo batu yhỹ tsimykaranaha. Kaharere bo batu ma zikaha. Iwatsahi batu wabyziu zikaha aha humo kaharere tsihokdaharẽna my niy.

Ikiahatsaktsa Satanas hyrytsa tsikyziknaha. Hawa mykara ikahatsa kino niwatihi tsimykaranaha. Tahi imysapybyita mynakara. Ikiahatsa ahasopyksapybyitsa tsinakaranaha. Hawa mykara yhỹ ahasopyk. Ataharere humo hi kytsa naharapebakanaha. Deus bijoikpe mybarawy nizuknize ata harere humo hi nahapebakanaha. Aba kino niwatihi kytsa nasiakzokotu. Deus harere babata bo batu yhỹ mykara. Batu wasani ziky tsimyspihikbatarẽta. Pispihikbatakaze hawa mozihikik atsatu mykara. Kytsa mymyspihikbatakanahaze ihyrytsa moziknaha — Sesus niy.<CM>
— Uta wasani motsasoko. Iwatsahi ikiahatsa kahumo batu ahaspirikpo — nikara.
Ba amy tohi ziksonaha:<CM>— O ikia tsimymysapybyriki — my. — Kaharere wasani ziky iwatsa tu kaharere bo batu yhỹ zikaha tsimykaranaha.
Deus tyryktsa iharere bo hyỹ mykaranaha. Ikiahatsaktsa Deus tuktsabyitsa tsimaha. Iwatsahi Deus harere bo batu yhỹ tsimynakaranaha — nikara. Iwa Sesus taparaktsa bo nitsasoko.<CM>

<TS1>Sesus iwaze Abarão.<Ts>Sudeutsa Sesus pe niaha:<CM>— O ikia hyrikoso sapybara humo tsimytsasoko. Batu amysapy tsimy. Paikpa mytsaty tsimykara. Samarija ezektsa wata batu amysapy tsimy — mybarapetu nikaranaha.<CM>
Sesus tihi:<CM>— Aharere batu wasani my. Hyrikoso sapybara humo batu tyso. “Kazo zuba wasani mykara”. Ikiahatsa tsiziksohometukunaha.
Batu katyso “Utakta wasani my.” Deus zuba moziksapywyky “Atakta wasani” mykara. Kytsa kasoho humo piksohometukunahaze Deus tihi: “O ahaharere batu ahamysapy tsimykaranaha” — niy.<CM>
— O kaharere tsiwabytoktonahaktsa. Aty kaharere bo hyỹ mykara zeka atakta kazo tuk tawahi mynapykyryk — niy.<CM>

Iwatsahi Sudeutsa ipe niaha:<CM>— Abaka tanymyryky hỹ. Ikiahi hyrikoso sapybara humo tsimypamykysoko. Tubabatu taparakta Abarão nihyrikosokda. Deus sohokotsa kino niwatihi nihyrikosokdanaha. Niakbabanaha. Ikia hi motsasoko “Aty kaharere bo hyỹ mykara Deus tuk tawahi mynapykyryk. Siakbatsa ba zikakpykyknaha kaharere humo hyỹ my” tsimy — nikaranaha.

— Tubabatu Abarão mydiri nihyrikosokda. Abarão atatuze nitsasokoze kytsa iharere ziwabyziukunaha. Tubabatu siakbatsa Deus sohokotsitsa nihyrikosokdanaha. Asahi nitsasokonahaze kytsa siharere ziwabyziukunaha. Ikia ja. Tozeka ja tsimytsasokoze kytsa aharere piwabyziukunaha. Aty skaraba tsimy — nikaranaha.<CM>

Sesus ispe niy:<CM>— Utakta kasoho tu motsasoikik zeka “O uta zuba wasani hi mykara” Anahi mykara zeka batu aty tohi kaharere piwabytoktokoro. Kazo kasoho humo moziksapywyky. “O wasani hỹ mykara” — my. Ikiahatsa kazo soho tsimykaranaha zeka — O atakta mypehatsa my tsimykaranaha. Iwa kazo soho tsimykaranaha — niy.<CM>
— Ikiahatsa hi batu Deus ahanyhy tsimykaranaha. Utazuba iny. Motsasoko zeka “batu kanyhy my” mybarapetu mykara. Ikiahatsa watsa mozik. Utakta iny. Iharere bo hyỹ mykara hỹ — Sesus niy.
